The parking spot is a block away and it is a private spot so there is no worry about finding parking on the street. Tyler was very easy to communicate with and I would recommend staying here if you are planning a trip to Montreal.
Amazing place, very clean on arrival. They were always available for any questions we had. It was a great stay!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, Bailey was a fantastic host, extremely accommodating. The property and location was better than we expected.
Bailey had stocked the fridge and pantry with a few of the essentials for our arrival, a very welcoming touch. Bedrooms and living areas were large and very comfortable. Tranquil location, with beautiful views of Pittwater.
Looking forward to our next stay at Bailey's place.
we loved our stay in avalon. place was amazing. views were great and the community was just lovely

Amazing house with direct access to the beach and private jetty. We had a ball! (Website hidden by Airbnb) you can think of IS in the house. This is not one of those properties that have "RENTAL" written all over it, this is a HOME. 
Breakfasts on the verandah overlooking  the water and the sound of waves crashing against the shore is something special. 
The house is large enough for a large group, where everyone is comfortably accommodated yet have enough privacy to feel completely disconnected from the group due to the bedrooms being located over three different levels. 
Tip: you might want to grab a sleeping eye mask as it get pretty bright in the house once the sun is up.

Loved our stay at Bailey amazing home in Avalon! The quality of decor and all his pieces throughout the house very tastefully done. Didn't want to leave and the view from the deck is breathtaking. Down a few steps off the deck and you are swimming in the clear waters of Pittwater.
Accommodated our large group very well and hope to return again. 
Thanks Bailey for the starter pack in the kitchen. Yummy! Great host! 
Cheers Liz

An awesome and amazing house that just made for such a relaxing and easy weekend away. The view is just stunning and the house is very nicely decorated with all the essentials. Loved that the house had access to a private beach. Bailey was so easy to communicate with and always replied promptly to any questions. Thank you for making our stay so lovely.

Bailey was a great host! 
He responded immediately to the reservation and got us out of a sticky situation! 
The house is absolutely amazing! Has beach acess and the best view of Pittwater! We had the best backdrop and wedding photos! 
The house is super clean! Modern and comfortable beds. The 4 levels and total of 14 bedroom just gave everyone that extra room to breath and space to move! 
We will definitely be back!
Great place, very special spot. Private access to the beach and spacious home, great for large groups. Go for it!!
Beautiful, tranquil location on beach. Excellent for entertaining and kids. Place was very clean and well-appointed.
One of the most amazing places I have been to. 100% recommend it

Had a great stay! Fitted our extended family very comfortably and we loved the location and the balcony view. The inclinator made things easy for our elderly guests as the house goes over several levels. Bailey was a great communicator and Paradise Beach is a quiet place to swim and full of character!

Our family enjoyed a fantastic stay at Beach Escape to celebrate my mum's 60th birthday. 
There was a lot of planning and logistics in the lead up to our stay and Bailey was always prompt and accommodating with questions. 
It's a great house for a large family, offering us the perfect bedroom configuration for 9 adults and 4 kids as well as plenty of living space so we weren't living on top of each other. 
We loved the beautiful Pittwater views and dining outdoors on the large deck facing the view.
Beach Escape is also pet friendly which meant all our family were welcome. 
It was fantastic having the amenities of Avalon only 5 mins drive away but feeling like we were in a quiet secluded area far away from the hustle & bustle of Sydney. 
There's plenty of pedestal fans but no air con & blinds on west facing windows made for a hot stay on the days that reached almost 40 degrees. But it meant we made the most of the wonderful harbour beach down the stairs. 
Would highly recommend Beach Escape to large groups.

This house is perfect for a large extended family group. It has so much room that you can go off and have a quiet time by yourself even if the house is fully occupied. The beds, bedding and towels are high quality, and the kitchen has everything you need to cater for a large group. The private beach and the hot tub are wonderful for just hanging out and relaxing. The house's many levels mean that even crying babies don't disturb others in the house.
Waking up to the gorgeous views of the trees, boats and water can't be matched. I would highly recommend this house and would come back.

A very large home that can genuinely handle a larger group. Lots of retreat areas so people can spread out. Location is the quintessential waterfront Pittwater experience. The host was good on the communication and any issues or advice quickly addressed. Highly recommend this property

We were made to wait almost two hours out the front without any information from the host as to how to get into the house. Thursday was my actual birthday and this almost had us packing up and heading home - we were minutes away from cancelling the weekend as we had no way of getting in to the house we had booked for 12 guests. We then get inside and everyone starts to arrive and we all shower and use the toilets. By the time we come out the smell of raw sewage is so unbearable that we can't use the balcony for the dinner we had planned or open any windows on a hot day in a house that has no air con (not that air con was ever listed or promised however). The smell only got worse throughout the weekend as we continued to use the bathrooms. 6 out of 12 guests chose to leave on Friday as a result - ruining the weekend we had planned for my birthday. Two of the couples who left had travelled interstate for this. So they had paid for 3 nights and only got to stay 1 in rooms that stunk of sewage. This could have and should have been resolved on Friday or Saturday - but no solution was offered and we were expected to stay in a house that stunk of sewage. On top of this on Friday, as we bring items down from the car into the house we place two cases on a shelf along the kitchen wall and it comes off completely and lands on my foot. After looking at how it was constructed, a 30-50kg shelf was screwed together by 4 small screws and was never constructed to hold any sort of weight, making it a danger to guests. And lastly, the alarm. At 2.30am on the Saturday morning the house alarm (that we had been told did not work) began going off and woke everyone in the house. The four surrounding suburbs encountered a blackout and as a result the alarm went to auxiliary power and then went into alarm (the blackout is obviously not the owners fault) The alarm continued to go off for an hour and there was no information anywhere as to how to make it stop. We were left to figure this out for ourselves. The number we called inside the panel had no idea, the host was not contactable and the lady he put us in touch with suggested "we push a couple of buttons". The house should not have been rented out with the sewage pump the way it was and the host should have information on hand for his alarm system. We know that the host MAY not have known the pump was broken, but we did make him aware as soon as we noticed it within a couple of hours of arriving and no solution was offered for the three day stay. If we had...

A wonderful home away from home. There was enough space to cater and allow for our family of seven couples with little ones in tow. Beautiful view and location. The kiddies loved having their own private beach and bird visitors of cockatoos, kookaburras and lorikeets every day. Just a note to make sure the fridges are cleared of food prior to the next visitors stay.

This spacious property is truly amazing with stunning features and beautiful views on every level. Bailey's hospitality was exceptional. I would highly recommend this property for a relaxing holiday, especially for large groups of 6 or more.

Location is to die for and the beach perfect for regular visits. Great for little kids. The view from both living areas and many of the bedrooms is spectacular. Becuas each room is so beautiful, there were not arguments about who got which room. The living space is one of the most beautiful homely area for relaxing. All in all a most spectacular house.

We had a group of 13 and all had a great time there. The house was clean and well equipped from the bathrooms to the kitchen. The house was spacious and having 4 bathrooms between a large group was definitely handy. A few items including milk and soft drinks were supplied and left in the fridge which was a nice touch. Can't fault this house. We all had a fun and memorable stay!

This house was so beautiful! The location was breath-taking and the house was a delight. The house plan is very well thought through, clean and homely. Our group loved the weekend away, would highly recommend. The host was also very accommodating :D
房源地理位置頗佳,無論購物或用餐都非常方便｡房源剛新裝修,家具､裝潢新簇,牙刷､毛巾準備齊全,房東還蠻細心連雨傘都準備好｡好幾次碰到問題,房東也會儘快回覆及即時處理!
房间真的很不错,今后会介绍给朋友
My host Wilson was really helpful and nice. The accommodation was pretty good and it is actually superb for Hong Kong standards.
房间很新,很漂亮,整洁,很棒

房东人非常nice,早早就和我联系,全程沟通顺畅｡房源地理位置极佳,去时代广场､希慎广场5分钟路程｡内部装修一新､整洁｡

缺点:我们原先6个人入住因此选了这套房源,最终4个人入住｡个人认为最多6人已饱和｡当晚恰逢下大雨,雨水打在空调板上的声音非常大,特别是小房,因此睡得不算舒适｡洗澡时,花洒的水过小,马桶冲一次水要等很久｡

总而言之,若是6人入住,算是性价比高的选择｡也谢谢房东的帮忙｡
Great place, very clean and Wilson is a superb host.

This is our first experience to book an accommodation with Airbnb and it's fantastic! Best location for anyone who wants the easiest access to all types of transportation for work or for leisure. As for parents like us travelling with an elderly and two active young children, Wilson's apartment is the best to meet our needs. Not only it is so clean and safe for kids, its convenient location allows us to return for nap and rest when kids are tired between our busy holiday schedules. Wilson is so approachable and very thoughtful in many details.
Clean linens, towels, kitchenware, clothes washing powder, indoor storable clothes liner, refills of every consumable daily essential items eg toilet papers, tissues etc.
There are some stairs upon entry into lobby/lift of the building but it is a very common feature in Hong Kong. You can open the French-door-type glass doors fully before you enter with big luggages. The building guards/administrators on duty are very friendly too.
Surprisingly, it's so quiet and comfortable to sleep, considering its prime location in one of the busiest parts of Hong Kong. Eating, shopping, sightseeing...all within walking distance or so easy for additional transportation when preferred.
Thank you for making our stay in Hong Kong so memorable.
Strongly recommended!

We didn't meet Wilson but he made things easy the day before checking in Wilson had sent me a email with all the info I needed to get into his place which was awesome. The location was great it was close to the MTR/public transportation, restaurants, market, etc... The only con to the location is that it was a little hard to get a taxi because coming out of the building cars are not allowed to stop in that area so you would have to walk a bit when taking/coming from a taxi. This has nothing to do with wilson but I thought I would mention it anyways the elevator in this building is extremely slow. The apartment was decent, it didn't wow me or anything but as expected places in HK are small. For a group of 9 it was a bit tight but that didn't bother us since we were out most of the time. The apartment looks pretty much like the pictures there is one thing I would like to say is I wish Wilson would have taken pictures of the second bathroom to his place kus it was tiny. I'm a really tiny girl and even I had a hard time in there. So that probably would have changed my mind on picking his place to stay because we were really looking for a 2 bathroom place. I mean yes the small restroom is considered as 1 but it was so tiny that we didnt even use the shower in it kus it  was tiny but oh wells. Overall our stay was fine but I did feel like the floors could have been a bit more clean.
非常棒的地段,交通非常方便,房间非常整洁,格局也比较合理,但提醒有一间最小的卧室床比较小,需要考虑好尺寸,整个房子不大,个人觉得最大的房间可以住一家三口或者四口,上下铺的,大小一样的双人床,中间房间是一张双人床,最小的房间适合比较娇小的人,客厅住人的话应该睡得不太舒服,是沙发,房东的提示一直非常清楚,我们入住退房都非常顺利,附近还有好吃的饭店,很赞｡
地理位置非常棒!两个正常房间,一个单人位,两个沙发床,厨房和卫生间都还不错!唯一的不足就是床品不是很充裕,而且偏硬｡但是房东沟通无障碍,还在最后一天给我们延长至12点退房,感谢!妈妈很满意!
Great Experience for my guests, they loved the place and the feeling of having 8 people stay together in the same apartment. Very convenient location, great host and superb interiors.

Getting there is simple and easy access to all transport mode.  easy to locate this apartment, clean and quiet, more than enough space for 4 of us. Highly recommend Wilson's apartment in Causewaybay..
Wilson give accurate information about the stay using (Hidden by Airbnb) . very near to mtr station. walking distance of 100m/1min. easy to find food around.

Wilson's apartment was in a very convenient location, barely a minute walk from Causeway Bay station. Wilson was also very responsive to my email queries. We encountered typhoon weather on one day and Wilson also sent an update on the situation which was very helpful. The apartment was as described and for the 4 of us was spacious enough. There were many amenities close by and Causeway Bay was an fun area to explore. I would have no reservations about returning to HK and staying here.
Super location and modern clean place! It would be suitable for family to live. We would definitely live here again when next time coming to HK.
Wilson的房子整潔明亮,樓下便是購物區,食肆林立,交通方便,我的客人一行9人及2位小朋友住得很舒適,非常滿意,下次仍然會選擇住這裡｡

Had a good stay in Wilson's apartment with our group of 6. The apartment is spacious for Hong Kong's standards. The living room and bedrooms are renovated, with the bathroom and kitchen being a bit older. Pictures are accurate.  Apartment very centrally located - 5 min walk from SOGO, 5 min walk to Times Square, etc. It is situated on top floor of a building that has businesses on the bottom 4 floors. Elevators are small and slow, and entrance is directly on a busy street. Wilson is a great host as he was quick to respond to our requests. One of the ACs broke down and was fixed the next day. Overall great stay - great alternative as opposed to staying at hotel for two weeks (we saved lots of money)

Great location, close to bus-stop and MTR, shopping areas and fresh market
Easy for shopping, dining, traveling ...
This place is good for 5 adults and 2 babies
Perfect location. Near shops n mtr. 6 stars luxury apartment. Very clean n big one. Everything was provide very well. Seem like hotel .  Really satisfied wilson! U help me so much.
房子很乾淨,很舒服,很適合我們一家5口連BB｡房子地點很好和乾淨,交通方便,周圍都是商店和餐廳｡Wilson 很友善,容易聯絡,下次再來香港一定會選擇住這裡!
It's really a great and sweet house. Carmen is so nice lady. The last day we went out buying tickets and forgot checkout time. Carmen reminded us won't be worry and wait in patience.

It's very clear and quiet.

Very good

房主的房间非常的整洁,同时也非常的温馨 周边环境也很好｡
    房间地点离地铁站不远,步行5分钟即可到达｡离铜锣湾只要一个地铁站,也可以步行前往金紫荆广场｡
    房主很友好也很热情,向我们简单交代了一些注意事项,还提供了一些游览建议｡
    总之,这是一次非常好的住宿体验｡
Carmen’s apartment is cosy, clean and well located. Carmen did her best to help us every time we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Carmen is a nice and warm host. Her place is small but cosy and very convenient. The location is perfect to visit HK : both close to lively areas at night, and to nature paths for an early jogging.

The flat is cosy and very well located, and Carmen was really helpful throughout our stay! Just be aware that the apartment may not be suitable for 3 tall adults (as it was our case), as beds are very small.

There are 2 types of AirBnBs - one feels like a hotel and the other is someone's actual home. This is the latter - do not expect a hotel experience. Location is great (Star St in Wanchai has boutique shops & nice restaurants, you're less than 5 min walk from the MTR and less than 30 min walk to Central). Building is more modern than most in the area, with a doorman and elevator. Apartment has an open view (not easy to come by on HK island!) Carmen keeps her place tidy and well equipped with everything you need. Bed is short (as others have noted) and the sofa is small too. Bathroom is basic but shower has hot water and ok pressure. Kitchen is tiny but there is plenty of space in the fridge and a water boiler. Carmen is friendly and super responsive! Bottom line: Great for a couple of nights only.

I stayed with my parents and it was great to have a separated bedroom from them. The apartment was not huge because of HongKong's high population density, but it was simply decorated and comfortable enough!  Some of visitors were too tall for the bed but with my 155cm height, I had no problem sleeping on it.  Hot water from shower was abundant. The view of skyscrapers from windows was good. I could even partly see New Years fireworks from windows. 

Apartment concierges were at a ground floor 24 hours. They open the entrance door when you come home. Some of them can communicate in English. They are all kind and helpful.

Carmen was super kind and communicative host. Her indication was accurate and helpful. She kindly left an octopus card for visitors to charge and use. 

There is a washing machine in a listing but HongKong was too humid to dry laundry fast.  You can use a laundry shop next to the apartment. They wash and clean your laundry in a day.

The location was only a few minutes from a tram station. 
Walkable distance from Central and Causeway Bay. 

There are many towns in HongKong but I am totally satisfied with staying in Wanchai. 
Wanchai has modern skyscrapers, hipster attractions, and daily local markets and small restaurants.  St Francis street looked very sophisticated and I didn’t feel unsafe. In front of the apartment, there are rainbow stairs which looks like an Instagram shooting spot and a lot of foreign people were taking photos. If you are a vegetarian, I strongly recommend a restaurant “天然齋 Green Veggie” 15min from the apartment.

Logement situé dans un quartier typique à proximité des activités de pêche. L'appartement est spacieux, fonctionnel, proche de toutes les commodités et dispose de tout l'équipement nécessaire pour passer de très bonnes vacances. Marie est une excellente hôte, attentive au bien-être des locataires. Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à Espinho, d'où nous avons rayonné sur tout le centre et le nord du pays. La proximité de la plage à moins de 5 minutes à pied permet également de très belles soirées estivales. Hôte que je te recommande pleinement!

Logement très propre, Maria nous a super bien accueillis avec des boissons fraîches dans le frigo comme cadeau de bienvenue. Marie est très facilement joignable.


Superbe expérience AirBnb, je recommande vivement ce logement. Très bon quartier pour découvrir la pêche portugaise.

Un appartement plus que parfait, une hôte   très å l écoute disponible, un accueil chaleureux de la part de Maria nous a fait nous sentir en très å l aise.nous recommandons fortement cet appartement pour son emplacement idéal, son calme, sa propreté et son prix plus que correct. Il est très bien équipé de la table à repasser å la machine à laver et sèche linge enfin liste trop (Website hidden by Airbnb) terminerai en remerciant les propriétaires pour ces vacances formidables.
Muy buen sitio

The apartment is really nice. All you need is there.
Maria is very beautiful. Thanks
Peter
Marie and Maria were very helpful. The apartment was clean and we found everything we needed. Just as described.
Una casa muy amplia con un trato muy bueno. Estancia muy amplia y limpia, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La playa está a dos minutos andando, pueblo muy tranquilo. Hemos estado muy agusto.

Une semaine très agréable ! Un appartement très bien situez ! Avec une hôte très a l'écoute ! Un petit hic mais tout petit minuscule il manquais les première nécessité gel douche papier toilette etc ! C'est toujours mieux pour se sentir vraiment à l'aise ! A part sa rien à redire et propriétaire très gentille aussi au passage !
El alojamiento está bien, suficientemente equipado pero lejos del centro de la ciudad.

Agréable appartement spacieux pour 5 personnes.  Très bien situé près de la plage. Nous recommandons vivement.
Et sans oublier le très chameureux acceuil de Maria

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement spacieux qui correspond tout à fait à l accueil d' une famille (nous étions 5 dont 1 (Website hidden by Airbnb) proximité de l'océan 5min à  pieds et des commerces nous ont simplifié les (Website hidden by Airbnb) gare (10min à pieds)nous a permis de ne pas utiliser notre voiture (rester au garage clos)de la semaine .Enfin l accueil De Maria à notre arrivée à été très chaleureux et le fait qu'elle parle Français nous a de suite mis à l aise.
Petit resto pas cher (6 euros le menu avec boisson)en bas de l appartement ou la cuisine est familiale et traditionnelle nous a beaucoup plu!!!!
Nous recommandons cet appartement
Excellent séjour, appartement très agréable !

Apartament czysty, zadbany i dobrze wyposażony. Bardzo wygodne łóżka. Idealny na pobyt wypoczynkowy w wakacje. Pani Marie szybko odpisywała na wiadomości, a wskazówki zostawione dla nas były bardzo pomocne - polecone super restauracje z pysznym i tanim jedzeniem. Gorąco polecam :)
I was happy to stay here. Apartment was big and clean. Location was also good, near cafes, beach, train station. Host helped with any questions.

Logement impeccable, Pres de toutes commodités . 
Situé à 200m du superb spot de surf d'espinho. 
Marie vous met à disposition un petit guide ou tout est bien expliquer , ainsi que conseil des bonnes adresses , resto, visite à effectuer. 
Bref je conseil vivement.
Nice treatment and attention, high recommendable!!
Nous avons passé un tres bon sejour. Accueil super et appartement tres bien equipé

A 15 min. a pé do centro de Espinho e da estação de comboios. Casa boa para grupos, fomos 7 e coubemos perfeitamente. A cozinha está bem equipada. Ambas a Maria e a Marie foram muito simpáticas e muito acessíveis. Uma ótima estadia!

Nous avons apprécié:
- les informations précises des lieux, commodités, guide touristique, ...
- Proximité de la plage.
- proximité des axes Porto, Aveiro, Braga, ...

A estadia no Beach Manor excedeu as expectativas. O apartamento tem condições ótimas de habitabilidade, é espaçoso e apresenta bons acabamentos de reconstrução. Os equipamentos de cozinha são de boa qualidade, o mobiliário e a decoração de bom gosto.
A localização do apartamento na Foz do Douro, o passeio marítimo, os seus jardins, as esplanadas e as praias, tornam este lugar privilegiado.
Voltaremos por todas estas razões e pela simpatia da assistente que nos recebeu, o diligente apoio telefónico do Jorge e o profissionalismo da Concierge.

We enjoyed our stay here very much!  The place was very clean and comfortable.  It was right by the ocean, shops, grocery store, restaurants and bars.  The flat was modern and new.  Highly recommended.  Transportation (bus) nearby.   Wonderful!

We stayed at the appartment for 5 days and had a nice stay. It's nearby the sea in a quiet area of porto. You find everthing you need, even for a longer stay. There's a washing maschine, dish washer, mirco wave etc. 
We enjoyed our time there and would go book again! The only negative point: we had to wait a long time in front of the appartment to get our keys, because of an organisational missunderstanding - annoying but I guess it isn't usual.

The apartment is exactly like on the photos: clean, modern, right next to the beach and spacious enough for a family of four. The bathroom and bedrooms are very nice and big. Super market is two minutes walking from the apartment. Porto city center is a 15 minute bus ride away. Communication with the host was always fast and clear. We were even provided with a welcoming gift! 
There are, however, two downsides: the apartment is not equipped with an airconditioner or fan (which is not disastrous, but it can get pretty hot if you're not used to Portugese summers), and sounds from upstairs neighbours and the busy road it lies on can be heard at night. If you're a light sleeper, I suggest taking soundproof earplugs with you. 
Otherwise, it's a beautiful apartment if you want to enjoy both the city center of Porto and the beach!

Beautiful appartement on a great spot very close to the beach. Just a 1 minute walk. Unfortunately the noise of the traffic near the house was load. Take the historical tram to the old city of Porto,  it is very convenient. Many good restaurants in the neighborhood. The interior of the apartment is very new.  Good beds, bathroom nice and clean. Great. We loved our stay in this great place.

Très bel appartement, propre, spacieux, bien situé et très bien équipé.  Stationnement pour la voiture toujours disponible à proximité. Nous sommes enchantés et le recommandons vivement à tous. Merci à Jorge. Si nous séjournons une nouvelle fois à Porto, nous y reviendrons avec beaucoup de plaisir. Merci  à Jorge pour tout.

The apartment is really spacious and new with a dishwasher and a washing machine. It is although quite noisy mainly because of the road. As we were staying already in Porto we asked if it was possible to drop off our luggage before 14 o clock which wasn't possible and check in wasn't complety easy but overall it was good.

I stayed only 2 days but the way I was welcomed was perfect with on top of it a big bottle of wine, of water and a map of Porto... What more can you ask for?
The apartment was very nice and as described on the pictures :
with 2 rooms with double beds. 
A nice bathroom with a big shower and a toilet 
+ an additional separate toilet .
The kitchen was well equipped with everything needed .
The neighborhood was very nice and really close to the beach ( 1 minute walk true a little tunnel) 
Perfect for running or biking along the coast 
At least 2 supermarkets in the same street and bakeries+
Less than 15' minutes drive to the airport and 15' to city center .
Many different buses + the old tramway and double decks hop on hop off buses .
The perfect place to stay if you want to combine beach holidays and visits .
Le quartier est très sympa, à 100m de la plage. L'appartement est grand et lumineux, avec vue sur l'océan. Nous avons vraiment beaucoup apprécié cette expérience !

We met Renato at exactly the time that we had planned. He was very helpful and explained all the necessary information to us, supermarket, bakery,cafés, transport into the Centre of Porto etc. The place is in a great location just one minute from a very pretty beach and the local people nearby were very friendly and helpful.
Jorge and his team were great. Thank you for a lovely relaxing time.

It was my third time in Porto and I wanted a place around the Foz area cause I really like it there. Lots of parking available and quite a lively area with spectacular bars/restaurants right on the beach (the beach is not the best though)

Jorge's place is, quite frankly, spectacular. A 2 bedroom appartment with absolutely everything you may need. We even cooked there and it felt like home.

The style of the place is very modern, comfy leather couch and all. The host was very punctual and we had no problems at all

As a summary, I certainly recommend both the place and the host. It was a pleasure and I am already looking forward to being back there again

Très bel appartement très bien situé. 
Spacieux, propre, confortable, je le recommande.

The apartment is absolutely fantastic! It is only steps from the beautiful beach area of Foz do Douro and was very spacious and clean. Jorge was great with communication and always available if needed. If you are looking for a nice place to stay in Foz, then I would recommend this place.

O apartamento é fantástico, muito bem equipado e confortável. Localizado na melhor zona do Porto com estacionamento fácil e gratuito  nas proximidades o que nos permitiu quase sempre andar a pé. 
Fomos com o nosso bebé e tivemos apenas um problema com o aquecimento que só pode ser regulado centralmente e por isso a casa estava sempre feia, e só ficou resolvido no ultimo dia de 4. Tirando isso uma estadia foi perfeita. Recomendamos.
O apartamento é muito confortável, com uma vista ótima e muito bem equipado. As camas sao muito confortáveis.
A equipa do Porto Concierge ofereceu-nos à chegada uma garrafa de água e de vinho para melhorar o ótimo serviço de acolhimento.
Vamos repetir!

Our stay here was really great. From the moment we checked in they were very attentive and had very open communication. The property looked exactly as it did in the pictures, I would even say it was better. There was a lot of space, the kitchen was very well stocked and clean. There was an extra half bathroom, which we weren't expecting but was very nice to have. And the bedrooms were big, very nicely decorated, and the beds were fantastic. My group and I really enjoyed our stay here and would not think twice before staying here again!

This condo is just as described. It's in a great location near public transit and if you prefer to just hang about the neighborhood it's a few steps out the front door. The condo is modern, clean and quiet. And the beds are super comfy!
zona agradavel do Porto
Lovely,clean apartment. Very modern. Very comfortable beds.

We had a very enjoyable stay at Beach Manor. The flat was as bright as advertised and very convenient for two couples. The location was perfect, with restaurants and shops within walking distance and handy public transport to the centre of Porto. We had no issue finding parking spots on the street for our car. On the (minor) negative side, we thought a second set of keys should have been provided when the place is for two couples and you require the key to get out of the building. The washing machine did not tumble dry clothes so a dryer would have been handy. Last I had to fix the TV myself as it was not working, but in the end we never watched it anyway :-)

It is a very nice and comfortable appartment very well located if you like beach and walking. No metro station around but there is a good bus connection with the city centre and Matosinhos area if one wants to visit more than Foz quarter. 
I can recommend this offer.

It was great to stay at this place, it looks like the pictures show, works well for one or 2 people, very comfortable and in a good location. I was able to easily get to where I needed to go, and was also easy to just walk around. The apartment itself was clean and cozy, Rita was very friendly upon arrival and always responsive when I had any questions, before, during and after my stay. Definitely recommend staying here!
very nice and available

Rita no pudo recibirnos en casa, pero envío a una compañera muy amable que nos ayudó en todo lo posible.
La casa es muy acogedora y llena de detalles que la hacen especial (como la fruta o el café)
El barrio es tranquilo y queda a una media hora andando de las zonas más turísticas.
La recomiendo!

Rita fue muy amable y comprensiva ante nuestras necesidades en todo momento ! El apartamento es muy acogedor, está todo muy limpio y en perfecto estado. Se sitúa en una zona muy buena con todos los servicios necesarios próximos.Totalmente recomendable.
The apartment was so well-located and cosy, we loved it! Rita was very nice and attentive. Would definitely repeat!
干净利落的小房子,面积不大,但很温馨,用具用品齐全,房主热情,出行方便,红色大巴站离得很近,音乐厅广场很适合孩子玩,如果有洗衣机就更好了｡

Nos alojamos mi familia y yo, en total tres personas, en el apartamento de Rita durante tres noches.
Rita no pudo recibirnos, pero vino Cristina, que fue muy amable y nos explicó todo con claridad.
El apartamento estaba limpio y provisto de todo lo necesario para el día a día teniendo de todo para cocinar:vajilla, aceite, sal...
A su vez tenía productos de limpieza y de higiene personal.
Está ubicado a menos de cinco minutos andando de la parada de metro de Casa de Música.
Si volviéramos a Porto, repetiremos.

Vérifier s'il n'y a pas de travaux en cours dans l'édifice
Si les lumières de passages fonctionnent bien ?
Ótimo lugar para passar as férias.
Petit appartement, propre, endroit calme pas très loin du métro, mais à une bonne distance des principaux attraits touristiques de Porto.
Rita foi uma excelente anfitriã. Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa. O apartamento é aconchegante, perfeito para nossos 15 dias no Porto. Recomendamos muito. Obrigado Rita!

Bem localizado, espaçoso.
Boa relação custo - beneficio.

Appartement propre et très bien situé pour visiter Porto en quelques jours ! Communication excellente de la part de l'hôte (réactivité). Le logement est conforme au descriptif, vous pouvez réserver en toute confiance. 

L'appartement est proche de tout : commerces, station de métro, bus, casa de musica (je vous y recommande un concert !), aéroport. 
Très pratique pour pouvoir rayonner dans les différents endroits à visiter sur Porto .

I enjoyed my stay at Rita's apartment. It was clean, cosy and the location was great, just 50 or so metres from the nearest metro station. Rita was a good host, easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone who comes to beautiful Porto.

Logement parfaitement propre bien situé près de tous transports (bus,métro) qui permettent de se rendre facilement dans le centre historique comme au bord de plage...bons conseils de rita et plan de la ville fourni je recommande

Kubilay K. est une personne tres aimable vous etes chez lui bien plus que chez vous. Cette experience a ete un vrai plaisir et je repartirais chez lui des que possible. Il prend soin de vous sur tous les plans. En plus le logement est dans un quartier tres vivant et anime. Ce sejour a ete une reussite et je me demande comment voyager sans airbnb. Si vous venez a Istanbul allez chez Kubilay et vous toucherez du doigt cette realite.

Kubilay is now my best friend in Turkey :) I can't exagerate for his hospitibilty. Despite of my insistance he paid for my dinner, dessert a nice tea afterward and paid for the minibus to the shisha place. Frankly, it might have exceeded the rent I paid. I wanted to go to Kurdistan but non of information was available in English he called the bus company for me and then he came with me to the bus terminal then he barganed on my behalf and I got a cheaper ticket as the result. He didn't leave until he made sure I went on my bus safely. In my return also his friend came with me to Taksim to make sure that I'm getting the right bus to Sabiha airport. I highly recommand him if you want a host who is also your tour guide and freind. Also the prices in the shops are considerably cheaper near his place rather than touristic area like Taksim and you are a 2 TL away from Taksim, so his place is ideal in any sense.

Большое спасибо Кубилаю от всей нашей семьи за тёплый радушный приём, удивительную прогулку по Стамбулу, щедрость, внимательность и гостеприимство! Мы очень хорошо отдохнули в его чистой, светлой квартире. Если получится, с радостью приедем ещё раз.

Kubilay. Thank you very much from all of my family for the warm welcome, amazing trip through Istanbul, generosity, care and hospitality! We really enjoyed our time in your clean and cozy apartment. If this works out, happy to come again.

Oleg, Alena and Egor.

Kubilay est un hote tres agreabe, qui se soucie de vous, vous donne de bon conseil. Il nous avait prevu le petit dejeuner et tous les soirs nous etions acceuillis par du the et des fruits secs.
il est tres facile de se rendre dans les differents lieux interessants de la ville.
a ce prix la, nous ne pouvions rever mieux. n hesitez pas a le contacter.

If you choose an apartment Kubilay - you heard right!
Kubilay a wonderful person with a big heart!
Our little son really loved it!
He has prepared for us a wonderful breakfast! :) Helped us to find the way to the historic center of Istanbul, gave us IstanbulKart to travel around the city.
In his apartment, we feel at home :)

We stayed at Kubilay's home for 3 nights with my boyfriend.
Kubilay has been a great host, very kind and helpful, he made us tea, breakfast and we even had dinner with (so we could discover some delicious specialities).
It's a very nice person and he makes his best to make you enjoy your stay.
The room is very clean and tidy, the bathroom too, nothing to complain about.
The flat is not in the center of the city, so you'll have to take the bus for 15/20 minuts to get to Sultanahmet, but it's worth it because Kubilay's neighborhood is nice, not turistic it's more like a typical turkish area, so you can taste real turkish food (and it's really, really cheap, and delicious).

We really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul, don't hesitate and book this room!

Woooooowww!!! Kubilay is the best host you can find in Istambul, we spend a great time in his house and in the city. He´s so kind, attentive and you can talk any topic with him. Also his breakfast and teas are the best, considering we went in winter. We ask a lot of things and he always  help and response us what we need. We highly recommend 100 % to stay with him. Kubilay, the best experiencie,  thanks for everything!!!!

W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) wwww!!! Kubilay es el mejor anfitrion que puedes tener en Estambul, pasamos un agradable tiempo en su casa y en la ciudad. Es muy amable, atento y ouedes hablar de cualquier cosa con el. Sus desayunos y sus tes son lo mejor, considerando que fuimos en invierno. Le preguntamos un monton de cosas y siempre nos ayudo y nos respondio lo que necesitabamos. Recomendamos 100% alojarse con Kubilay, la mejor experiencia! Gracias por todo!!!

Kubilay is really good host! Welcoming, gentle and polite. Our baby loves to play with him!:) The apartment itself is clean and calm. It takes a bit time to get to the city centre (Taksim or Eminonu) but it's ok for us. I definitely would recommend everyone to stay with Kubilay.

anyone going to instanbul and looking for a beautiful place to stay at and make a friend then please stay at kubilay HIGHLY RECOMEND
EVERYONE to stay at his place thanks a lot kubilay u r the best if u ever come to visit punjab please stay with us

The stay at Kubilays place was very nice. Everything was clean and the check in worked very good. Kubilay is very nice and helpful. A perfect opportunity to visit a non touristic part of Istanbul. Thank you.

Host: Kubilay is an easy-going & really nice guy! That translates to a host that's pretty much as relaxed & helpful as u want him to be. And he gives u space if u want it too.

House and room: Kubilay pretty much opened the house to u. Room is basic.

Location: a good suburb about 30-40mins bus ride away from Taksim, depending on traffic. Pretty convenient; 1 direct bus to the Spice Bazaar. 1 direct bus to Taksim.

Highly recommended to those who wants to experience local living.
Kulibalay it's a very good Guy and i have spent a very good travel in this apartment. If You have some question kulibalay can explain you how discover the city.
Very nice room in a good location. Kubilay is also very accommodating. Would stay here again

Kubilay is a very warm, friendly guy that you will feel confortable to get along with. The apartment is well equiped and in good transport connection to hot spots in Istanbul. It's my first time to stay in a host family but honestly this experience is very impressive and I think his hospitality will never fail you. 
在房主請求下寫中文給華人朋友作為參考哈
房主非常友好 warm而且樂於助人 剛來到伊斯坦布爾有什麽不懂的都可以請教他 住宿條件不錯 位置雖然離市中心有一段距離但是交通非常便利 家門口就有兩路巴士直達市中心和景點區不用轉車他還會提供交通卡給你使用 他還會請你喝土耳其的茶還有土耳其特色的早餐 去旅遊有當地人熱情幫助感覺非常棒 你可以跟他用英語交流 還可以問他一些日常的土耳其語怎麼講 在你下一次還去他那裡住的話 他還會給你特別的優惠 我下次再去土耳其還會選擇他的住宿 這是一次非常棒的體驗

Kubilay is a really sweet guy and a great host. He pointed out landmarks on our way to the apartment so we wouldn't get lost when we ventured out on our own.  He answered a thousand questions about Turkish politics and life in Istanbul.  He is really considerate of guests with maps, keys to the apartment and  an Instalbulkart  in the guestroom.  The apartment is really clean and is in a great location. Everything you need is nearby. The bus is close by and is easy because the stop is one end of the line and Emminou is the last stop at the other end.  It's a very nice place to come home to after a day of being a tourist.

It was a pleasure to stay at his. He helped me out with busticket, brought me for dinner and then tea with his mate. The room is ok and the flat is clean and peaceful. I would highly recommend stay at Kubilay's.

I and my wife stayed at Kubilay's for 4 nights and are really glad we did. Kubilay is a wonderful guy who'd go extra mile to make sure you are comfortable. He gave us Istanbul kart (public transport card in Istanbul). He even woke up at 4 in the morning to make sure our early morning Taxi has arrived on time. He provided pointers for places to visit and eat. He recommended a restaurant nearby and we had the best Iskinder kebab there!

Gaziosmanpasa bus stand is few minutes walk from Kubilay's place. Gaziosmanpasa has direct buses to Taxim Square and Eminönü (all the main tourist destinations are near this stop). 

If you want to stay in a non-touristy place, eat best food, want to do some shopping at local price, want to experience Turkish hospitality definitely stay at Kubilay's.

Thanks for wonderful time Kubilay!

I had a great time here! Kubilay is a really great host who provides you with a nice room, great company, and great conversation. The apartment is also nicely located in a place where Taksim and Eminonu are just a bus ride away, respectively. I stayed for 5 nights.

Kubilay is a helpful and caring host. He gave us clear instructions on how to get from the airport, met us at the metro station and took home. A nice variety of fruit and nuts was offered for breakfast. He provided my mum and her friend with a nice room with two single beds, they had also had a choice to sleep in separate rooms. The accommodation is clean with everything you need. It's quite close to the city center and cheap to get there with a transport card that Kubilay provides. Kubilay is an open-minded well-travelled person who will give you all necessary information on sightseeing and not only. Though my mum doesn't speak English, he managed to explain to her where to find traditional hammam and massage so she and her friend were very happy. Thanks for a great stay, Kubilay!

Замечательный заботливый хозяин! Четко объяснил, как проехать к нему от аэропорта, встретил у метро, был все время на связи. Комнаты чистые со всем необходимым. Кубилай предоставил моей маме и ее подруге выбор: спать в одной комнате с 2-мя кроватями или в разных комнатах. Несмотря на то, что моя мама не говорит по-английски, Кубилай сумел объяснить ей, где находится хамам и массаж, чем она была очень довольна! Расположение квартиры удобное, добираться до центра легко и недорого с транспортной картой, которую предоставляет Кубилай. На завтрак Кубилай предложил нам фрукты, орехи, сыр и вкусный чай со сладостями. Спасибо ему большое за радушный прием, информационную поддержку и готовность помочь в любую минуту!

We couldnt have asked for a better host! It was our first time in Turkey and we were pretty nervous esspecially since our flight arrived at 1 am. Kubilay met us at the Mcdonalds nearby and walked us to the apartment. We felt very safe. We wished we could have stayed longer. Kubilay is a great guy!

This studio is really really well located, comfortable and well equipped. I needed to spend a night away from home running around Montreal, and being on the cusp of downtown and the plateau made it easy for me to reach most places I needed to go on foot. Saint Laurent is right around the corner too. Tarek is a friendly and funny guy, and was easy to coordinate with (he actually checked me in personally at 11pm). Oh, and the bed has been replaced by a full one! Definitely would recommend this place to tourists who want a cosy space and central location.

My husband and I had a great time staying at this studio for our daughters graduation. The location is one block away from McGill Downtown campus. The host was very kind to help us find free parking right next to the house upon arrival. The facade of the house looks like a heritage site, very beautiful. The studio has all new facilities, the bathroom is large for a studio and fully renovated. Kitchen is nice, it also had some breakfast items. This place is great for a couple. The only downside is the mattress, not the most comfortable. Otherwise an A+ place and host. Would highly recommend.

We absolutely loved staying at Tarek's charming place which is just how he described it -- a cozy ground floor studio condo that is perfectly situated. We were just steps from the scenic McGill University, a short walk to the vibrants bars & restaurants on St-Laurent Street, and were conveniently able to walk to many other places during our stay. The exterior of the building is beautiful and historical looking while the interior is updated, comfortable, and super clean... all while being very peaceful and serene when we needed a break from sightseeing. 

Tarek was a superb host -- he was very kind and communicative with us from the get-go and was flexible to some logistical issues we had. He even gave us "must-see" and "must-eat" tips and overall made us feel very welcome on our first visit to Montreal. We would definitely stay here again in the future. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience staying at Tarek's apartment.  It was very clean and spacious for a studio, and the location was fantastic.  We hit quite a bit of unexpected traffic and were about an hour and a half late arriving, and he was extremely accommodating for us.  He helped us find parking, and was available for questions throughout our stay.  Check out was a bit cumbersome because of an unforeseen conflict, but Tarek was very accommodating to make it as easy as possible for us.

We had a really nice stay at Tarek's place. The room is very clean and cozy. Location is perfect too. It is close to McGill University and few minute walk from rue St Laurent. Bus stop is just around the corner too. Tarek is also an amazing host and really accommodating. Would highly recommend!

My fiancé and I arrived on a Thursday afternoon. Tarek met and welcomed us kindly. He showed us the apartment and even gave us some local restaurants and areas we should visit during our week long stay. He was an excellent host. When I reached out with a couple of questions, he responded even though he was away on vacation. The apartment is perfect for a couple looking to spend quality time together. It's cozy, clean and more than I expected for a studio apartment. I would return here without a question. Thank you Tarek!
I enjoyed my stay in this place. it is clean, neat, and we furnished. The host is very helpful and responsive. it is close to downtown and very quite.

Tarek was very helpful and flexible regarding our check in and check out.  We came an hour later than we had expected (as our train was delayed) and he was very understanding.   We were three adults staying for three nights, and although the place is set up for one or two adults, Tarek provided us with an inflatable mattress, and things worked out fine.  The place is nice, fully renovated, and very well located, in the heart of McGill Ghetto.  It's very lively with all the students setting up for the school year.  There are a lot of ammenities close by and the location is quite central.  Overall, a very nice stay.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Tarek's place for a weekend trip to Montreal. Tarek was an extremely gracious, communicative, and accommodating host. His place is clean, cozy, and very comfortable (the bed is a dream). The apartment is in a superb location: convenient to public parking garages, close to more delicious restaurants and cafes and bars than I can count, only a 20-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts, and just a little longer to the Old Port and Notre-Dame Basilica. Our only regret is that we didn't stay longer!

Everything about Tarek's place was great.  Perfect location for checking out Montreal.  He was informative about what to eat/visit/check out and I would absolutely recommend this place to others.  A nice quiet apartment, very close to St/ Laurent!

Tarek was extremely accommodating. When we arrived in Montreal, was about to rain really hard for hours upon hours -- so Tarek arranged to meet us earlier to give us the keys. He also left us some breakfast items. 

The apartment was very clean. Great location. Couldn't have been happier.

My girlfriend and I stayed in this condo for a few nights on a holiday to Montreal, and it was exactly what we needed. The condo itself is fully self contained and in a fantastic location to explore every corner of the city. Tarek was a great host, being very accommodating for late check ins and early check outs, while also recommending some delicious restaurants. The bathroom and kitchen were both very clean in good condition. I'd definitely recommend this condo to anyone, and we will definitely look to stay here again when we next come to Montreal!
Tarek's place is great! Great location, super clean, and Tarek was easy to reach and very accommodating. Would definitely stay again!
Very close to McGill.  A wonderful stay!
This place is very close to McGill University and also very practical to visit the city. A Great place to stay, with all you need to feel like home !

You'll find this place just as expected - charming, clean and in a great location. Separate side door entry is very convenient and the place itself is pretty well maintained. Tarek was easy to communicate with and a gracious host. We were very happy with our short stay here as we explored Montreal!

Jonathan and Catherine's place was really comfortable, clean and nice. Catherine was attentive, she made us feel at home and she even recommended us some places to visit.
We loved the private rooftop, you can read a book, drink a beer or enjoy the view.

Catherine made us feel right at home! She replied very quickly to messages and was very helpful with tips about what to do in Montréal. The place is lovely and the rooftop terrace is a great addition! The flat is in a very lively and vibrant neighborhood. Overall a great stay!

Super séjour. Catherine (la colocataire de Jonathan) est très sympa, souriante et à l'écoute. Ce fut un vrai plaisir d'être en vacances chez eux. Le logement est propre, confortable et bien équipé (bonne connection internet; lave linge & sèche linge; bureau pour travailler...). La chambre  est plutôt spacieuse. Le rapport qualité prix est très bien selon moi. J'ai pu profiter de la terrasse sur le toit avant qu'il ne fasse trop froid. L'appartement est bien situé, il y a des parcs et des rues marchande pas très loin, les autres rues marchande ne sont pas très loin non plus, j'y allais souvent à pied (Mont Royal que j'aime bien est à 30min de marche). Il y a de bon restaurant et de très bon café à moins de 5 minutes de marche. Le metro est à environ à 10-15 minutes. Il y à aussi une station de vélo et une bonne épicerie à quelque minutes.
Le quartier est sympa, la rue est calme. Pour ceux qui veulent faire du shopping ou du lèche vitrine il faudra surement prendre le metro pour aller un peu plus loin. Mais facilement accessible avec le metro.
Très bonne première expérience airbnb.
Friendly and easy-going hosts. The arrival and departure was adapted to our own schedule, perfect. Great room, nice location, friendly hosts, nothing's missing

This is was a great place to stay for my trip in Montreal. You have a great coffee 2 blocks from the apartment called Etincele. Really friendly place and great coffee and home made Madeleine. If you want to buy some cheap fruits and vegetables; go to the shop at corner of Papineau and Beaubien. You also have a great shop at Beaubien and La roche on the way to the metro. 
You will be able to enjoy the rooftop for sunbaking or a apero at the sunset.
Hôte très gentil , place super tranquille , j ai beaucoup aime
Appartement charmant et hôte très chaleureux

À mon arrivée, Catherine, la coloc de Jonathan travaillait, elle  m'a laissé des indications pour avoir accès rapidement à la chambre. L'Appartment est chaleureux et la terrasses sur le toît est tout simplement géniale. Il y avait des petites bouteilles de savon et shampoing sur les serviettes laissé à disposition. Ce qui a été très appréciées. Catherine est très accueillante et facile d'Accès.  Si vous chercherz un coin mignon et âs trop bruyant de Montréal, petite-Patrie est parfait pour vous. La seule chose qui pour moi serait a améliorer est la poussière sur le plancher dela chambre et la cuisine. Somme toute, l'expérience générale est positive.

Well it was the first time that I use airnbn and going to someone's house! I can say it was totally amazing living in jonathan place! He treats me like we were friends before! The house is clean and well located also! I would say it was a brilliant experience and we are even friends now!
This really nice airbnb is close to a Bixi station and to the metro. I enjoyed my stay, Jonathan is a very nice person to live with. I'd definitely stay here again.
Un super hôte et un appartement très agréable. Hautement recommandé.
Great place, very nice roof top terrasse, Jonathan is very friendly and hospitable! :) thank you!
Appartement bien situé, Jonathan était bien gentil il vous mets à l'aise dès votre arrivée.

Clean, spacious, welcoming and warm space.  Jonathan was a great host, offering help with navigating the city, places of interest as well as honest conversation.   I cook, so it was wonderful to have everything I needed.  All in all zero complaints.  I hope to be welcomed here next time!

Jonathan is a very good host. The room is beautiful and the roof terrace is an additional plus. The apartment is very clean and located in a beautiful neighborhood of Montreal. There are nice restaurants and bars nearby. I'd stay there again.

Très bon emplacement, proche du centre ville.
Un logement simple mais très chaleureux pour passer quelques nuits.
La terrasse est très agréable pour finir la fin de journée

J’y suis allé en vacanes et ai beaucoup aimé mon experience à Montréal et chez Jonathan!

I was there on vacation and enjoyed a lot my experience at Montreal and at Jonathan’s. 

Estuve en vacaciones y me ha encantado la experiencia que viví en Montreal y donde Jonathan. 

Estive de férias e gostei muito da experiência em Montreal e no apartamento de Jonathan.

Très bon séjour chez Jonathan. L’appartement était conforme à mes attentes, au calme et très propre. 
Même si je n’ai pas rencontré Jonathan qui etait en vacances, il a tout fait pour faciliter mon arrivée. Merci encore !

Jonathan was very kind, considerate, and helpful. He's very easy to talk to and was available by phone if you needed anything whether information about the appartement or what to do/where to go in the area. The place itself is clean and cozy. It's in a calm, quiet neighbourhood, but easy to walk or bus anywhere else you need to go. The rooftop patio is amazing! I would definitely stay here again :)
Would totallly recommend Jonathan’s home, it’s clean and spacious. Jonathan was really helpful. And the rooftop just adds something special to the apartment.
The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

had a wonderfull airbnb experience stayin at louise place, she wasn't there but her sister eleanor is absolutely nice! it's a quiet house with a real room! louise is sharing her own room and it was the best bed i ever slept in through airbnb!! 
you really feel at home and eleanor let you all the privacy you need! the place is 5mn walk from the train bar & pubs and there's a deli and a laundry 1bloc away the neighborhood is quiet and you have an amazing view on manhattan's skyscrappers!
will definetely recommand this place and will be back there, if needed! 
thanks!

Elle, Louise's sister who rented out the room, was more than accommodating during my stay!

The apartment was beautiful and I wish I could stay there forever. The room is in the back and extremely bright and sunny as well as quiet and private.

Снимали номер с 3 по 9 ноября 2017 втроем - 2 взрослых и ребенок 9 лет. 
Местоположение и район.
Найти гостиницу очень просто. Если добираетесь сами, то выходить надо на трамвайной остановке Баязит, перейти на другую улицу, найти вывеску Burger King  и по этой улочке идти прямо вниз, никуда не сворачивая, ища вывеску гостиницы (она будет справа). 
Теперь о самом районе. Гостиница находится на торговой и оживленной улице. Первое впечатление - как будто ты попала на рынок, становится тревожно. Но потом уже понимаешь, что собственно это не совсем рынок - это магазины по оптовой торговле обувью. Я несколько раз проходила по этой улочке одна - все нормально - никто меня за руки не хватал, никуда не зазывал - здесь люди торгуют оптом, потому я как покупатель не особо интересна. Прогулка по этой улице до гостиницы занимает минуты 3. Зато поднявшись до трамвайной остановке Баязит, ты попадаешь сразу в исторический центр (Гранд Базар) и можешь прогуляться по одной из самых красивых улиц старого Константинополя. Пешком минут за 10 (может меньше, очень близко) доходим до площади Султанахмет, где в вашем распоряжении сразу несколько достопримечательностей - Храм Святой Софии, Цистерна Базилика, Голубая мечеть, колонны, рядом тоже Дворец Топкапы. Так что в плане местоположения гостиницы - все очень хорошо. И - ночью тихо, никто не мешает спать. В  5 утра кажется проходит молитва - её слышно, но еле-еле, я просто чутко сплю. Мы жили в номере 401 - на верхнем этаже. Из окна открывается вид на Мраморное море со множеством кораблей и крыши соседних домов.
Завтраки.
Каждый день одинаковые, но очень вкусные. Из горячего - яйца, картофель фри, омлет кажется (вроде без молока, не знаю, но вкусно), чай, кофе. Нарезки - огурцы, помидоры, оливки, маслины, 2 вида сыра, колбаса-ветчина, жареные кабачки и перцы, йогурт, хлопья. В кувшинах молоко и еще что-то типа цветного разведенного сока.
Номер.
Картинка соответствует полностью нами увиденному. Мебель неновая, но красивая и добротная, и видно, что дорогая. Матрасы толстые и удобные. Белье чистое и не пахнет хлоркой. Могу только добавить, что есть еще мини-бар, чайник электрический и чашки с блюдцами, тройник (поразительно!).  В ванне на троих человек - 5 тюбиков геля и один шампуня, три кусочка мыла и туалетная бумага. Полотенца также предоставляются. Есть сейф, проверили - работает, я так поняла он предоставляется бесплатно....вот только его к шкафу забыли прикрутить -
 спокойно взял под мышку и пошел. Посторонних и неприятных запахов нет.
В целом.
Гостиница очень приятная, тихая, уютная. Соотношения цена-качество оптимальное. Рекомендую данную гостиницу.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We have spend a great time in this airbnb! The location is great ... near a lot of thing (hagia sofia, the blue mosque, the grand bazaar, ...), and we loved the terrace with the view on the sea!
This hotel surpassed my expectations. It’s very cozy hotel. Administrations and staff are very friendly and attentive. I was comfortable. Tasty breakfast. Thank you very much!

The apartment is great, big, confortable,good light and good bathroom. Is a little away from the noisy center street and that is nice. Muro is so nice, always offering tea, info and a nice chat. The breakfast is good, big and very practical to start the day and walk Istambul. We love staying here, because also has a roof top to watch the view.

Muro was nice, however as we've been experiencing a lot lately with airbnb the host has screwed up some important detail.  When we came to check in he said our room was taken and we were to move to another location.  First off, not cool, secondly he didn't offer to give us anything in return for this major inconvenience.  The other place was not up to our standards and we requested a refund which he made in cash.  This was kind of him, but still we want things to run smoothly.  Vacationing is amazing, but it's a costly affair that always adds additional stresses and one stress we like to avoid is accommodation issues.
Muro is friendly and good person.. all other guys who works there are helpful and nice.. just the room was not soo good looking like in picture.. otherwise eveything was Good :)

If you are looking for a place to stay and your budget is limited, this is your place, close to downtown, walking distance to Gran Bazar, Hagia Sofia even Topkapi, do not expect any fancy. Muro is a great host, he helps us to get a taxi, train, give us great tips about the city and always answer our questions. Breakfast is a plus, the variety, and taste make you feel in Turkey (instant coffee no my favorite all do).
A perfect spot for a trip to Maui. Centrally located to everything. The condo is gorgeous & has absolutely everything you need! We highly recommend.
Thank you Ralph & Nancy  for a nice and cozy place to stay in Maui . We had a wonderful time and the accommodations were perfect. I would recommend to everyone to stay at your place.
Great AirBNB experience! Beautiful condo centrally located. Hosts were awesome and handled all the details as stated and then even went above and beyond! Excellent!!!
Nancy and Ralph's place was wonderful.  It was very clean and quiet and the bed was very comfortable.

Nancy and Ralph made our wedding and honeymoon stay great. We arrived at the apartment to have a wedding balloon, wine, and pineapple champagne waiting for us. Everything was very clean, organized and clear. All items needed for a comfortable stay are provided by the host. Communication was clear and immediate which made us very comfortable staying there. Thank you both gain for the amazing stay and location.

The location is perfect, away from the crowds yet a 4 minute walk from the beach, beach walk with access to Kealia Pond boardwalk, the Maui Canoe club, etc!! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the condo itself, being the best equipped we have stayed, from cooking needs, layout and attractiveness, bed comfort, to beach equipment and binoculars!  Ralph and Nancy are attentive to all needs, and welcoming with local wine, chocolates, coffee, and easy communication.  We highly recommend.

Highly recommended, you will not be disappointed! Ralph and Nancy’s place is conveniently and centrally located in a quiet part of the island. Walking distance from Maalaea Harbour which is great if you book any sea tours/excursions leaving from the harbour. Beautiful immaculate condo, cozy, very clean and well equipped. Quiet building and location. Easy and quick check-in, clear communication with the host who is quick to reply. Detailed instructions sent by email before our arrival were very helpful. Short drive to Kihei, Lahaina and Kahului Airport. Affordable and worth every penny. We will definitely return to Maui one day and hope to be able to stay here again.

Ralph's place is clean, modern, comfortable, and in a great location. The thoughtful touches of chilled wine, chocolates, and cold bottled water were appreciated after a long day of travel. The bed was very comfy and the bath/beach towels were soft and fluffy. Parking was easy and the neighbourhood felt very safe. The local restaurants are yummy, and I enjoyed being away from the busy area of Kihei; lounging poolside when I wanted some peace. I'll be back for sure!

Ralph's place was a wonderful and central location for us to stay for our honeymoon. We didn't have to deal with a bunch of tourists on the beach nearby and it was a pretty private street the complex was on. The amenities were great and we especially enjoyed the espresso machine in the condo along with the washer and dryer that allowed us to pack a little lighter for our trip. Relaxing on the patio in the evenings was also very enjoyable. We would definitely stay here again!

Great stay! Condo is exactly as the pictures appear. If you are a coffee drinker, you will seriously enjoy the espresso machine! My coffee at home is less satisfying after using that machine haha! For a pull out bed, very comfortable! However if you are tall like my husband, your feet may slightly hang off the edge. Very quaint and clean little condo, had a homey feeling right away! The beach that is a short walk away was one of my favorite beaches during our whole trip, and we got to walk it every morning! Would definetly recommend for a couple getaway!

This condo is amazing and the hosts are equally amazing! It definitely exceeded our expectations and is so much nicer in person. The A/C unit keeps the room very cool after a day out in the sun. There is a washer and dryer in the room which is such a bonus! Everything is sparkling clean and works perfectly. The bed is very comfortable and easy to unfold. These are hands down the best hosts you will ever have on AirBNB as they truly care about you having a great stay! No detail is forgotten and they truly go above and beyond.

I really enjoyed my stay in Maalaea.  Was a little unsure about how effective simply opening the windows would be at night, but the winds on this part of the island are always strong so I never had to bother with the AC (but it is there if you need it).  Beyond that, the unit had everything I could want.  Plenty of dishes and utensils, excellent internet and guidebooks, and even beach chairs.  Would be a pleasure to return some day.

If you're on the fence between this place and some other one, let me tell you - stay with Ralph!! We had a fantastic week in Maui with Ma'alaea as our home base. Restaurants and shops and aquarium are walkable, and most of the spots on the island you want to be at are no more than 20 minutes away by car. We found the location so convenient and flexible, and were able to do everything we wanted. 

The space is even nicer than it looks in the photos, immaculately kept and with everything you could want. It even has tons of goodies for cooking - salts and spices and even olive oil! The box of beach goodies - chairs, boogie boards, a cooler - were super handy and we used them a ton, saved us money too. 

If you're worried about not having a beach view, don't be. The mountain view is gorgeous, and you can walk to the beach in minutes. 

Mahalo, Ralph! We'd stay here again <3

This is a very great place to stay while visiting Maui. Wake up and make yourselves a cup of coffee from the espresso machine to get the day started. Comes with all the house essentials you can think of. If booking lots of boat activities like snorkeling tours, sunset dinners and guided fishing trips departing from Maalaea harbor. Look no further than this condo because it is a very short walk to the harbor which will cut back travel time and save you money on parking!! I highly recommend dropping by beach bums also located at the harbor for drinks and some delicious BBQ!!! Nice central location on the island makes for easy travel and good time. Loved our stay at this condo! Very unique shower and ac unit to keep you cool! If we make it back to Maui we would look to book this condo again!!

Loved staying at this cute little studio condo. It is perfect for a couple's getaway! The place is fully stocked with everything you will need. Cooking supplies, boogie boards, beach chairs, and travel books with great tips for outdoor activities. Maalaea is a great place to stay on the island because it is close to many things and very beautiful! 
Mahalo, Ralph!

The place was true to the pictures! Very nice and clean.  It was a great place to stay and location was perfect being in the middle of everything.  Ralph was quick to respond prior to going and if we had questions on what adventures to do while in Maui. The espresso machine was neat and already had coffee at the place which was very good!  Would highly recommend and great value!

Wonderful apartment in excellent location. Many extras including beautiful views, excellent coffee machine, beach equipment, long sandy beach close by, comfortable furniture indoor and out. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this apartments and would return.
Great place for a getaway in Maui. Strongly recommend to all travelers.

This is a small but charming place. It is well appointed, all stylish and new surfaces, interesting touches. The Murphy bed was very comfortable. There was wine and chocolate waiting for us and an espresso machine! Ralph was extremely accommodating and easy to reach. Check in was a breeze. This location is very central so you can get everywhere on the island equally well (except of course Hana).  The only downside of this little harbor town is that the area is extremely windy all the time- the windiest part of the island, and one hears it all night.
Such a beautiful suite. Nice private beach behind property. Great location and apartment. Would definitely recommend
A very clean cottage in a secluded farm. We got fresh eggs and muffins from the owner. If you're not afraid of 'water beattles', it's perfect ;)

Stay here if you want a relaxing, beautiful, and unique Hawaiian escape. Wonderful quant town with plenty of nearby beaches and great sight seeing. The farm is lush and absolutely beautiful and everyone is wonderfully hospitable. it made seriously consider moving here.

I had a wonderful peaceful stay, Loved the cute little town about a mile away. Everything was great. I will definitely go back there on future visits and highly recommend this as an alternative to an expensive resort stay.

Great place! As someone who has backpacked Europe and traveled all over the US, I can say this place is outstanding. Affordable price and it still feels like a hotel. You get your own cabin, so nice privacy. Everything feels like brand new, very clean. Les worked hard to attend my necessities and communication was never an issue. Beware that it's a very rainy place, so I'd recommend bringing your umbrella. Location is not prime, so you will need a car... But I kinda enjoyed being away from all the madness. Overall, you will get your money worth it.

L'emplacement était parfait, un petit chez soi sur une ferme. Rev. Lev. nous a très bien accuilli avec des fruits frais et des oeufs. Le village de Hawi est a quelques minutes à pieds et on peut y trouver des belles petites boutiques et de très bons restaurents.

The place is really lovely. The sleeping area is clean and comfortable and the outdoor kitchen and lounging area made it possible to spend much of the time enjoying the fresh air and beautiful landscape. It's a little ways to town but a nice walk. I forgot an item there and they were very helpful in arranging to get it back.
beauiful setting,outside kitchen,lover our stay there

What a treat to have found Rev. Les' cabin... arriving there after a long day of solo travel in planes and cars I felt like I found a sanctuary. 
The cabin is very tidy, and everything is new and well maintained. The bed firm and very comfortable, I slept very well the three nights I was there. 
Although Rev Les informed me of possible daytime farm equipment noises, I never heard them as I was gone most of the days. The nights were quiet except for occasional rains when windows must be closed, there is a fan that keeps things cool and air circulating. This area of the Big Island is lush and tropical and with that beauty comes an abundance of life, so attention must be taken when preparing or storing any kind of food, as the ants will be quick to make an appearance. Sweet Hawi town is nearby with all its charms, and has a lovely Saturday farmer's market under the shade of a massive banyon tree. The fresh organic farm eggs Rev Les left for me were so appreciated, and the kitchen did provide for all I needed to fry them up for a delicious (Website hidden by Airbnb) were the kind and helpful communications I received from Rev Les. Mahalo for a delightful first stay on the Big Island! c:

Situated on a small farm, it is very convenient to Hawi.  Only about a mile, so you can walk to town if you like.  There are a few roosters in the area but otherwise was quiet and peaceful.  I'd never used an outdoor kitchen before but it worked great.  Patio furniture and table on the lawn in front of the cottage provides lots of outdoor living. The bathroom is small but clean and like new.  We'll be back.
Great place to stay, enjoyed the view from our room.

I highly recommend staying here if you want a peaceful and tranquil stay.  The farm Les lives on is full of fresh fruit and the sound of the trees moving in the fast wind is therapeutic. I will definitely be back for some more paradise.
Great place on a working farm, nice & peaceful, with a nice outdoor kitchen area with all the utensils & cookware you'll need. But bring your own food.  Would definitely stay again.  :-)
Highly recommend. Very private and comfortable

Rev. Les''s place is super, its a working farm and you have plenty of privacy at your own little cabin, there are a few on the property.  Everyone is so nice and its a great starting point to explore Hawi and Pololu valley.

The cottage is very neat and clean, like new actually.  It is quiet and yet close to Hawi town.  Nice yard with comfy outdoor furniture and shade awning.  This was our 2nd stay with Rev. Les.  Great communication and he is very quick to respond to any need.
This little cabin was perfect. It was super clean, the bed was great, and the bathroom was nicely renovated.
Rent this place!  If you are looking to explore the North Kohala coast there is so much to do, or not.  And Rev's cottage is perfect for both.

Rev. Les was a great host, greeting us upon arrival and available when needed. Communication throughout was great. The place was super clean and cozy. We would always come back and explore more of the northern part of the island.
Nice spot, beautiful birds and quiet. In a lovely town with lots to do.

My fiancee and I visited Hawi and staying at Rev. Les's gave us a great home base for exploring the surrounding area. The property is nice and felt secure with the gated entrance. The cabin was super cozy and felt like home while we were there with plenty of space and a very comfy bed. 
Rev. Les was responsive and a pleasure to talk to when we met him. We will look back fondly on our stay in Hawi and would love to come back!

Naz and her sister Gülcin were very gracious hosts. We appreciated all of their help. The house was conviniently located with a great view from the terrace. 5 minute walk to metro, bus stop, and Cevahir mall; well-located yet surprisingly quiet. We would recommend staying here

Staying with Naz was a very wonderful experience for my girlfriend and I. Her and her sister are great people, and I would highly recommend booking at her apartment. The apartment is well located next to a large shopping mall that also has the metro station in it. Only two stops to Taskim Square.

The room was exactly as described in the listing and is very comfortable, clean and spacious. We spent one week there and we would definitely stay again if we are in Istanbul.

To met naz and to visit istanbul was a great experience and .
First of all we want to say thank you to naz for her  wonderful hospitality.Our room was very comfortable and clean

Naz was the best host ever. She was very comunicative, friendly and helpful. Everything was like in the pictures. What we liked the most was the hygiene. It was very very clean. The location is central, 3 min away from the metro which can take you to any part od Istanbul, you just need to ask someone. I want to thank Naz for the great time and I highly recommend her place!

Naz was a great host! The room was big with a really comfortable bed. Both Naz's sister and her flatmate are very warm & easy-going people, I enjoyed our conversations. I hope to see you again one day!:)
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Naz, nous sommes contentes d'avoir passé ce court séjour chez toi! La chambre était lumineuse et spatieuse, tu nous as très bien accueillies, merci pour tes conseils! Bonne continuation

We really liked to stay here. Naz and her sister Gulcin are very good and friendly girls, always ready to help and gave a lot of useful information. Location is perfect, 5 minutes to big shopping mall, subway and other transport points. Thank you very much! Hope to see you again someday ;)

I had an amazing time with Naz and her sister. The room was spacious and clean and both hosts were lovely, very helpful and hospitable. I was offered to join them for tea and coffee and had great conversations with them. It was also possible to relax in my room whenever I needed some rest from this lively city. The location of the flat is very convenient due to its proximity to the metro, metrobüs, supermarkets and Cevahir Shopping Mall and the neighbourhood is safe. 
I felt very comfortable there and would always recommend to stay with them :)

Naz and Gulcin are very nice and available we had a great time staying in their apartment and we are really grateful for their hospitality. place was really clean and comfortable in a nice and quiet neighborhood, also location was really good around 3 minutes walking to metro, bus and shopping center. We felt the real Turkish culture, they made us Turkish breakfast and shared a lot of useful information about Turkey and Istanbul. We really enjoyed our time staying there and we definitely recommend for everyone.

My first experience with Airbnb was perfect. The location was great, on one of the sunniest sides of the island, near a mall with a general store and a gas station. The condo was exactly as described, the building is right by the water and it's really tidy and well organised. The view is amazing. You get to wake up with the sound of the waves every morning and watch the beautiful Maui sunsets right on the balcony. The process was really simple and stress-free. The place was immaculate. We really felt at home and got everything we needed and more! I'm really grateful for Sherry and Shane's attention to detail and recommendations about the island. Thank you for making this experience better than we could have imagined. I hope we can stay there again soon!

Beautiful place along the beach. Good location. Pictures are pretty accurate and close to McDonalds, Maui Brewing Co. and a Coffee Shop within walking distance. No central A/C so be prepared to run the fans in the summer. Hosts were very responsive and extremely helpful with requests.
This was one of the coolest places I've ever stayed in. And definitely the most beautiful neighborhood.

The owners, Sherry and Shane, were great. They were very responsive, the place was great and the view was unbelievable. Thank you so much for sharing your place with us. It was a great spot for me and my wife to vacation as it was right by the ocean, grocery stores and restaurants. We highly recommend!

The view from the Lanai is nothing short of spectacular. It was every bit as advertised.
