Amazing place, very clean and great hosts. It has everything you want and more.

The cottage is in a beautiful and quiet street , in the north shore of the island .
Its for people who want to get away.
If you need food and grocery Paia is not too far . (15-20 min)
We met our host , and she explain us about the property.
That's a beautiful property with verity of trees, and fruits around .
In the morning we enjoyed fresh orenge juice directly from the trees . 
the cottage is very nice and well equipmened .
There is everything you need there .
Towels, beach chairs , cooler and more . 
The place was pretty clean.
All tough it was kind of hard to reach our host.
I text Kandy asking about place to see around, but I got a late response and not much information,
In general , the experience was very nice and we all enjoyed it .

We went to Kandy's for our honeymoon and had the worst airbnb experience we have ever had (and we use airbnb a lot).  She stopped communicating with us and then tried to lock us out of the house one night when we went back. Thankfully we found an open window, got in, evacuated our belongings immediately and had to pay for a hotel for the rest of the honeymoon. Completely outrageous.

Beyond that, the place was disappointing. It smells like mildew and she doesn't have screens on many windows so you're stuck in a mildewy sauna. I would not recommend it and would advise people to be extremely careful with Kandy.
This place was an amazing experience!  you're deep in the jungle but still close to Paia. Extremely family-friendly our kids loved it! I will most definitely visit again

Kandy was very accommodating, and provided such a lovely place to stay. She responded quickly if we had questions, and is very much a professional in the world of home away from homes. The house is quiet, cozy, and worked well for a family with teenagers.

Thank you Kandy, It was a great trip!

We enjoyed our time at the cottage so much, we didn't want to leave! As Airbnb hosts ourselves, we love to be the 'guests' when we can, and Kandy was a wonderful host. She communicated excellently with us leading up to, during, and after our stay, with quick answers to our questions and suggestions for how to best enjoy the property and surrounding areas. We found both a fresh chicken egg and several avocados to enjoy within moments of our arrival - yum! The cottage was very clean, comfortable, and incredibly relaxing. We would certainly recommend!

My family loved this 2 bdrm cottage.  It's located on an incredibly beautiful piece of land, quiet and away from the hustle--a perfect place to stay when exploring the road to Hana.   The place is tastefully decorated and extremely comfortable.  We particularly liked lounging in the screened porch room. It's a little far from town, but sometimes that's necessary to fully unwind! The only thing I would change about our stay is the number of nights.... We should have stayed a week at least!

Our stay at Kandy's place was great! Throughout the course of our vacation she was very helpful. The location is quiet and beautiful. The backyard provides fresh fruit, truly making you feel the island vibe. Our stay consisted of 5 people for 2 weeks; the house had plenty of room for everyone to feel comfortable. We will definitely consider staying here again in the future.

Jungle relaxation, just what we needed after a week of hectic ocean front resort land visiting. Fruit everywhere, evening winds cooling breeze, even some nighttime rain tip tapping on the roof. The house is charming, comfortable, and more than enough room for 7 of us.  Kandy and her family are lovely, kind, and generous and made us feel like guests, not just visitors.  I would recommend this property to anyone wanting a respite from the heat and traffic of the oceanfront and easy hop up to road to Hana or upcountry explorations.  Oh, and the outdoor shower- bliss under a night sky filled with stars and moonlight.

5 of us stayed here and there was plenty of room.  The house is very clean and spacious.  We had a vegan Thanksgiving dinner on the huge screened-in porch and one of Kandy's very friendly chickens was our guest of honor!  My personal favorite was the outdoor toilet and shower - cleaner than many indoor bathrooms I have used :)  I would definitely stay here again.
We loved staying in this Private Paradise! My kids enjoyed the yard and it was relaxing and very pleasant.
Beautiful place with an amazing outside living room. Kandy was very helpful.

I have read Mark Twains descriptions of his time in Maui. Guess what my time at this house made me think of those descriptions. A beautiful property with lush vegetation and fruit trees of many kinds which you can partake of. Just down the road is a path that has an absolutely stunning view of the Maui coast with a path to a beautiful rocky beach. The house is comfortable and cool and is a great place to relax and rest after exploration. Every amenity you could want or need is there for you. We enjoyed the barbecue very much and loved that we had the washer and dryer. In short I will attempt to stay here any time I visit Maui this place is an outstanding value. Lastly Kandi is a very responsive host and obviously wants her guests to be impressed, we were, thanks a bunch.

Kandy is a great host. The location is quiet, spacious and equipped with almost everything we need during our stay. 

The house is located in a peaceful jungle area, with very localized decoration and furniture, it has variety of facilities and cultural props to play with while we stayed there.

Kandy is also very responsive and helpful to answer our questions. We'd definitely recommend this place to whoever visit Maui.

Do not stay there!!!! The house is not bad first floor but the secobd bedroom is an attic with a chipped beam and my mother hit her head eneterung it as one side is too low. The host will make you strip the bed and wants money and the gusests to to do zero all the cleaning after. She exaggerated the dishes are dirty as my eldery mother must have forgot to wash afork or two. Crazy many requirements for someone with excellent airbnb re iews and years of use so far. Pay more and get a better host. Greefy lady harassing the guests. The house has some paint chip.issues inside.  Very isoleted yet you can see all the neoghbours in the complex.

Great place. Looks better than the photos. Very well designed, very comfortable, cool furniture. Fully stocked kitchen with everything you might need for a great meal. 

My only issues were the lack of drinkable water provided with the house. I was not aware of this prior. Also a bit buggy, but didn't bother us very much.

Maria Es una persona muy amable y cordial, inmediatamente hice reservación estuvo al pendiente de nuestra llegada e indico algunas cosas importantes acerca de la habitación. El Lugar en realidad no hay como describirlo, dormir justo detrás de la popular Catedral de Barcelona y tener todo exactamente en la parte de abajo (puesto que es un departamento muy hermoso por cierto) recomendaria este alojamiento a familiares, amigos y conocidos sin lugar a dudas. Gracias Sra Maria Eulalia Un Abrazo!

Maria jest bardzo miłą i sympatyczną osobą. Od samego początku wszelkie niezbędne informacje przekazywała na bieżąco i była bardzo pomocna. Oferta była zgodna z opisem oraz oczekiwaniami, więc jakość oceniam na bardzo dobrą. Lokalizacja wręcz rewelacyjna - w samym centrum miasta, w niedalekiej odległości od wielu wartych odwiedzenia miejsc. Polecam serdecznie wszystkim osobom, które szukają wygodnego i dobrze zlokalizowanego pokoju.

We really enjoyed our stay here! Fantastic location - could not have had better! The room was great and perfect for what we needed. Very happy to have our own balcony with a great view! Price was perfect for what we got. Maria was lovely, so helpful and very welcoming as well. We will definitely be back here next time we come :) Muchos gracias!

La communication est très mal passée, Maria ne nous avait pas expliqué qu'elle n'était pas à l'appartement et que c'est sa mère qui nous recevait, les explications données ont été trop compliquées. Nous n'avons pas été bien accueillies et n'avons pas eu de code WIFI.
En revanche, la maman de maria s'est montrée tout à fait correcte à notre égard.
María Eulalia fue muy amable con nosotras , el piso está bien ubicado, precio de acuerdo a lo ofrecido muy bueno

Perfect! The most amazing location and the lady was lovely with us whilst we were staying there. It was just me and my friend in the twin bedroom of her huge old style town flat in the old town. Beautiful original design and the most amazing balcony view. Couldn't have asked for more!
Maria is very nice and helpful and flat has awesome location closed to all must seen places. Highly recommended.

The host was excellent, the apartment is lovely and brilliantly located. The apartment can be a little tough to find as there are two buildings opposite each other that have virtually the same address in (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. However when I called the host she was helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

We had a very good welcome @ Maria's, she is a nice and friendly lady. We felt home and welcome, had a private cosy room and everything we needed was there. The infrastructure was a bit older, but we did definitly not pay to much for our stay.
En general todo fue excelente
Maria was so friendly
Wszystko zgodnie z opisem. Pokój wygodny i świetnie zlokalizowany. Maria to bardzo sympatyczna kobieta, która w każdej chwili służy pomocą. Gorąco polecam.
Excelente localização e recepção !
excelente lugar para conocer Barcelona!! todo muy limpio y organizado.

one of the best Airbnb places I've stayed. Maria's home in itself is beautiful and pleasant. the room has a balcony with a view of the street which was neat. the bathroom was very clean and the bedroom spacious. since the building is in the heart of the city, some might find the city noise bothering but I loved it. Maria is also very nice and accommodating. the location was central and convenient, I highly recommend this stay!

Квартира на 4 этаже в самом центре Барселоны, рядом с Готическим кварталом, с большим балконом и прекрасным видом. В пешей доступности супермаркет, бары, остановка экскурсионных автобусов. Если приехали в теплое время на несколько дней посмотреть город, очень рекомендую!)))) Зимой, пожалуй, будет прохладно.
Great room in a good position. A perfect solution for visiting Barcelona.
Nice place to stay for a few nights.
Good location in the heart of the old town, two separate beds in the sleeping room. If You want to live like local Maria's flat is a proper option.

We had a lovely time staying with Maria in her big appartement in the centre of the city. She was very friendly and you could ask her anything. She even speaks good English, so communication wasn't a problem. At Maria's, you can feel like real locals in Barcalona. The location was amazing and you have a lovely view from the balcony. The bathroom was clean with towels you can use. Would recommend Maria's place if you like feeling a bit like a local.

Thank you Jirka for renting out your apartment to my girlfriend and I. We liked our stay a lot, the apartment have great facilities and are modern. In addition to that we loved the location. Jirka was an awesome host who always replied on mail. Thanks you!

L'appartement est formidable,idéalement situé à 5mn à pied de toutes les animations, une grande terrasse sur laquelle c'est un plaisir de prendre son café le matin. L'appartement est entièrement rénové, c'est agréable d'être dans du neuf. Il est au calme tout en étant dans une zone animée.
David nous a accueilli avec une carafe de Porto et beaucoup de gentillesse et de disponibilité. Il nous a indiqué toutes les bonnes adresses, plan à l'appui, on a tout fait et il a été de très bon conseil. Il est resté disponible par mail tout le temps si nous avions des besoins.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse et merci encore à David et Catia.

Foi o melhor apartamento onde já ficámos através da Airbnb! A Cátia e o David receberam-nos muito bem e foi fácil encontrar o local. À nossa espera tínhamos alguma comida e vinho do porto, bem como muitos guias e mapas para nos orientar pela cidade. Apesar da hora tardia, não hesitaram em dar-nos bastantes dicas para a nossa visita. 
A localização é mesmo muito central e a zona é sossegada. O apartamento é novo, bastante bem equipado e confortável. Acordar de manhã e aproveitar o sol na varanda foi especial. Estava tudo bastante limpo e arrumado. 
No dia da saída, como não entrava ninguém, deixaram-nos ficar à vontade até à hora de apanhar o comboio. Foi mesmo uma experiência cinco estrelas. 
Quando voltarmos, não hesitamos no local de estadia: este rooftop! 
Obrigada Cátia e David pela excelente recepção!
Very friendly. Catia took her time to tell us all the important spots. Apartment was also awesome!

Cátia and David have put a lot of thought into ensuring the flat is nicely furnished and well equipped, plus adding homely touches. They are caring and thoughtful hosts, contacting us before and during our time to check everything was fine. Thank you for remembering my birthday; a very special memory. Cátia provided a comprehensive overview of Porto when we met her at the flat and all her recommendations of what to see, where to go and restaurants to eat at were excellent. We didn't have time for your francesinha challenge Cátia but we'll take it up next time! The flat is in an excellent location; easy walking distance from attractions, but also in an area of great local bars and shops. Many happy times watching the world go by, and the football, at Cafe Java. And of course the roof top terrace is an excellent place to relax and enjoy wine, or beer, after a day of exploring the steep streets and many steps of Porto. We will most definitely be returning. Thank you Cátia and David.

El apartamento era igual que en las fotos. Muy bonito, muy céntrico y con todo lo necesario para la estancia. David y Catia tienen experiencia en tours y te explican perfectamente cualquier cosa que necesites.

Die Kommunikation mit Cátia und David verlief reibungslos. Check-in und check-out waren völlig unkompliziert. Cátia hat uns freundlich in Empfang genommen und uns bei einem Erfrischungsgetränk tolle Insider-Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben. Da wir eine knappe Woche in Porto waren, war es prima, dass Cátia uns auch Tipps für Portos Umland (tolle Strände etc.) geben konnte.

Die Wohnung ist grundsätzlich sauber, modern eingerichtet und liebevoll dekoriert. Die Dachterrasse ein Traum. 
Alles in allem hatten wir einen schönen Aufenthalt. Jedoch wurden während unseres Aufenhalts unter der Woche Bauarbeiten/Renovierungsarbeiten im Haus durchgeführt, weshalb wir durch eine teilweise starke Lärmkulisse gestört wurden. Am Wochenende haben wir davon nichts mitbekommen. Wenn die Renovierungsarbeiten abgeschlossen sind, steht aber auch einem längeren Aufenthalt in dieser Wohnung nichts im Wege.
Appartement très agréable , parfait pour passer un séjour à Porto

Tout était parfait. L'appartement est propre et la terrasse très agréable ! Bien situé, à proximité de tout. Surtout un grand merci à Catia pour l'accueil malgré le checkin tardif qui a pris le temps de nous donner plein de conseils autour d'un verre de Porto bien sur !

Staying at Catia's place was a dream. 
The apartment is clean, has everything you need and the rooftop is amazing. 
It's really close to the center. 
Catia took time to give us recommendations about Porto. And her addresses were good. 
I loved it !!! 
Thank you !

Catia et David ont facilité notre arrivée et surtout Catia à pris le temps de nous recommander les meilleures adresses de shoping, restaurants et visites. Le verre de bienvenue sur la terrasse est un moment privilégié. L'appartement est très bien situé et calme.

Herzlichen Dank an Catia! 
Die Unterkunft und die Tipps und Ratschläge von Catia waren TOP!
Wir haben die Dachterrasse jeden Tag und Abend genossen.
Es war klasse!
Dankeschön nochmals an Catia!
Perfect place in porto! Nearby city center with great rooftop.

Our stay at City Centre  Roof was top in every respect.  The modern apartment with   its amazing rooftop is located in the historic part of Porto.  It is spacious, very clean and lovingly decorated. Catia gave us a very warm welcome and provided us with ample information about the city, places to visit or restaurants to go to (we loved the Francesinha!!!).
We can definitely recommend this place to everyone travelling to Porto. Thank you very much,  Catia and David.
The apartment is great and better that photos. In the middle of Porto downtown so perfect position. I recommend it.

Catia was a lovely host and very welcoming when we arrived. Despite a small mix up she was easy to get hold of and resolved the problem immediately.

The apartment was perfect, great location and lovely outdoor area. Catia also helped with many recommendations at the beginning of our stay, all of which proved to be fantastic.

Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to visit Porto. 

Thank you!

Great apartment, and great communication from Catia. The rooftop deck was perfect. 

Recommendations for around town were spot on, and the apartment was in walking distance to all the main sights.
La casa es estupenda. Bien localizada y con una terraza estupenda. Es más grande de lo que parece en las fotos. Katia nos dio un montón de consejos súper útiles. Muchas gracias por todo

Catia was the best host imaginable! She gave us all insights to Porto & made us feel so welcome. The apartment was amazing with a perfect roof top terrace where we enjoyed a port wine while watching the sun go down - heaven! We will never forgot our time in Porto thanks to Catia!!

It was a really pleasant stay. Perfect location and a clean apartment. Really made our stay great! Also the communication with Cátia and David was very good and a quick response was certified. Would love to stay there the next time I am in Porto

Our stay at Catia and Davi's place was great. The apartment was super clean, spacious, and comfortable. And Catia & David were always responsive and friendly. We particularly appreciated all of their recommendations! I would absolutely recommend staying here.

Marilyn's condo is wonderful - best located, very, very clean and lovely! The beach across the street is beautiful and perfekt for snorkeling and watching big turtles! The kihei village is very nice!!!! We had a perfekt, unforgetable time in kihei and in marilyn's condo! 
Unfortunately we didnt meet Marilyn.... But the communication was great! Thank you, Marilyn, we hope to see you soon in Maui!

Our stay in Kihei was great. The apartment is perfectly located.  Marylin was really helpful. She's also a very talented artist and you can see some of her work around the apartment. You can walk to the beach from there if you want or go check out some other amazing beaches. I'd stay there again.

Our stay at Marilyn and David's place was great.  The location in Kihei was excellent and easily accessible to everything.  The condo itself was clean and comfortable.  Beach chairs, towels, umbrella and a cooler was very convenient as well.  We'd stay here again as well as recommend others to stay here.

Marilyn's condo was everything we could wish for for a perfect stay in Maui - just few minutes across the street from a wonderful beach, tastefully decorated with an amazing personal touch, super-clean, calm, but close to all Kihei shops and all island destinations! Besides that, Marilyn is a great host and was always available by mail for any questions we had! Many thanks, Marilyn - we had a wonderful time and hope to have the chance to come back! We can highly recommend staying at Marilyn's place!!
Place was as advertised.  Across the street from what became our favorite beach in Maui.  Comfortable stay.
Marilyn was very nice and the listing was accurate.  Her home was clean and had all of the ammenities my wife and I needed to have an enjoyable stay in Maui.
Great spot, comfortable, very nice stay in Kihei.  Safe environment...feels like home. Marilyn keeps it very clean and organized.  Would def stay again!

Marilyn made us feel welcomed at her condo. She provided us with all the information we needed about her place and quickly responded to of all our questions. 

The listing description is accurate. Her place is clean and nicely decorated. The condo is located in a quiet residential community. The location is very convenient, and I would definitely recommend her place!

Check in and check out was very smooth and easy. I much prefer the location of Marilyn's Condo in Kihei versus the more toursity Lahaina resort section, which is why we selected this location. It is less than 15 minutes to the best beach in the world, Big Beach! A short 25 minute drive to the airport.  the location was also great for our snorkling tour which docked across the street. We only went up the north west side of maui for our luau and parasailing, which the drive is kinda far for that, but not too bad to do twice. Loved the we were able to use the beach chairs and umbrella, THEY ARE A MUST on a sunny day at the beach!!! Only draw back, which is common, was no air conditioning, but we knew that going into it!
The Apartment is very comfortable and clean. Check-in without any problems. Everything was fine. The beach is very near and perfect for swimming. Thank you very much, Mailyn!

The Kihei condo was wonderful. The location is stellar-central to all the great "to-do's" in Maui but tucked back enough from major streets to be quiet and peaceful. We loved listening to bugs at night and birds in the morning. The interior of the condo was clean and well-appointed and the grounds were lush. Marilyn's artwork throughout the home and skillful rendering of feng shui decor made the place a comforting and calming retreat. On a scale of 10, I'd rate our overall experience at a 9.5.
This is a nice condo on in South Kihei near Wailea. Across the street from a nice beach, and a good value. As with many places in Hawaii, there is no AC so it can be a little warm.

Excellent place to stay while in Maui. Great location in Kihei right across the street from an amazing beach with shops and restaurants walking distance away. The apartment itself was great with all the amenities available and fully stocked for use. I 100% recommend staying here!

Marilyn was an excellent host.  She was warm and welcoming in all communication, even texting us during our stay to see if we needed anything.
   I gave her 3 stars for a couple reasons, some out of her control.  Her place is charming, but lacks air conditioning.  I'm from the Central Valley of CA & know heat, but the place is too hot to be in from 12-5pm, even with the drapes closed & the fans on high.  This meant we often could not eat lunch at the apartment & had to eat in town or take something in the morning when we left.
  The upstairs neighbor also has a loud, aggressive, barking dog that we could hear most evenings.  The neighbor also chooses to brush her dog on the balcony, letting the dog hair fall onto Marilyn's patio below, even when we are sitting outside.
  The final reason, most evenings we would return to the smell of pot from neighbors.  Some may not mind this, but it bothers me.  
  I know most of these are not within Marilyn's control, but they did make our stay less than desirable. As mentioned, she was a pleasant host & quickly responded to any questions we had & made us feel welcome in her home.

We absolutely loved Marilyn's home! It was perfect and exactly what we were hoping for. The condo is super clean and Marilyn is wonderful at answering any questions or giving advice! She always got back to me very quickly. 
The location was great. Everything that we wanted to do and had planned was super close to the condo. The beach across the street is great. Just steps from the condo and never over crowded. The little town just down the road has great restaurants and shops to grab some Souvenirs. We would definitely suggest checking out the Paia fish market for lunch/dinner. You can't go wrong grabbing breakfast at the Kihei Cafe. Make sure to get there early and bring cash!! That's all they accept. 
If you head in the other direction towards Waliea-Makena you can go to Makena park. Big beach is located here. It's a beautiful beach. The waves get a little big though, so keep that in mind. 
Marilyn's condo had everything we needed. The view is beautiful. The complex is clean and very quiet. We never saw or heard another person the whole week we were there. It felt like we were the only couple in the complex. Our only concern at first was that there is no AC, but after one night, we quickly realized that it was not needed. Marilyn provides multiple fans and Maui gets very cool at night. With the fan and cool breeze, we slept great!! 
We managed to get around most of the Island while we were in Maui. And honestly, we always found ourselves wanting to go right back to Kiehi! It's a
Very relaxed and laid back community with not an overwhelming amount of touristy activity, which is exactly what we wanted. 
We definitely will be back to Maui and would LOVE to stay at Marilyn's condo again!!!!

Marilyn was an excellent host and we especially appreciated that she responded immediately with any of our questions.  Our stay in her home was wonderful! She provided all the things we needed including beach towels, beach chairs and an umbrella that came in handy.  The location was perfect. Very close the the beach and restaurant options. I would definitely recommend staying at Marilyn's!

Marilyn was an amazing host and answered all our questions (including a few last minute ones) quickly and helpfully. The house itself is amazing, super comfortable and Marilyn has put a lot of thought into little touches which just made our holiday perfect such as the use of her cooler for picnics! The garden is gorgeous and the perfect place for a morning cup of tea. We also loved the location right near some amazing local snorkelling beaches as well as big beach also close to the local health food store Hawaiian Moons which we kept returning to! Her paintings are also beautiful and add to the peaceful charm of the house. Definitely recommend staying here.

The location was good very close to Waimea which is a beautiful negihborhood with exclusive resorts. We love snorkeling so this aloud us to be closer to La Peruse bay which was exceptional.  In the other hand being close to the main road it had a bit of noise. The kitchen was well equipped and the space was big and comfy. Having air conditioning will be a plus because the building gets lots of afternoon sun which make it a little hot.

We absolutely loved Kihei and kept coming back despite traveling out to other parts of Maui.This place is charming and cozy, with a central location to medical clinics, markets, especially beaches.  It is the perfect spot if you want a home-feel/based location.

We didn't get to meet the host, Marilyn, but she was in constant communication - and followed up quickly on questions.

The only downsides were:
1. There is no AC. Coming from San Francisco and being used to the cold, the afternoons in the condo despite multiple fans were almost unbearable indoors. 
2. She had some last minute instructions that we were unprepared for (unlisted on her website) regarding guests/visitors.  She did, however, accommodate our request.
3. If you love nuts, and nut products, this is not the place for you. We felt a little restricted in the food we could eat/cook at the condo. I myself have multiple food allergies, and most of my food substitutions come in the form of nuts - which I could not eat while there!

Otherwise, you will have a lot of fun, with pretty much everything you need close by, good internet speed, quiet neighborhood, and clean home.

Prior to arrival Marilyn sent a text message out to me getting me and reminding me of the house rules. Her hospitality was very much appreciated and got us started on the right foot. 

The place was exactly as described and perfect. It's not steps from the beach but it's about a 6-10 min walk from the beach. 

It's very close to food and shopping in kihei. I would definitely recommend and stay at Marilyns condo when given the opportunity

4 amis et moi avons loué l'appartement de Mathieu et y avons passé de très bons moments. Les chambres étaient propres et agréables. J'avais des doutes sur le bruit, mais la chambre dans laquelle j'étais étais super calme donc j'ai pu bien dormir. Quant à Mathieu, un hôte super sympa avec d'excellentes adresses (Adega Viuva pour un dîner et la capela incomun pour le reste de la soirée, notamment). 
Un grand merci et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir chez toi!
Mathieu has been very welcoming and adviced us about some restaurants around. The flat was perfectly clean and well located. I do recommend Mathieu and his flat.

Conversation with Mathieu was always quick and helpful. We didn't meet him during our stay but his friend Ana more than made up for that. Friendly welcome, lots of useful tips and she even brought us the world's most delicious lemon tart for Easter.
The rooms are small, but cosy and clean. Kitchen supplies are basic, but who wants to cook when there are authentic restaurants just around the corner. Biggest bonus of the flat is its location in the historic center. So close to everything you want to do and see in Porto. With a bit of luck and Ana's guidance we found free parking close by and then just walked every day.
Rainy days in March can be quite cold, so the electric heater in the flat was appreciated.

Nous avons passer un superbe séjour à Porto dans cet appartement très bien situé, parfait pour découvrir la ville à pied sans avoir besoin d'utiliser les transports en commun.
Mathieu nous a très bien accueilli. Il a été très arrangeant et nous a donné de nombreux conseils sur les visites et les restaurants.
A recommander!

L'appartement est bien situé, on peut tout visiter à pied, La rue est calme, les chambres sont claires et propres, la salle de bain est par contre assez petite. merci Mathieu pour les conseils et les adresses!

L'hôte a été très accueillant et très arrangeant.
L'appartement est très bien situé.
Je recommande.

En un mot PARFAIT ! Le logement correspondait aux photos, et à nos attentes : à savoir idéalement situé dans le centre de Porto, avec la possibilité de tout faire à pieds. Et en bonus, les conseils avisés de Mathieu qui ont tous fait mouche ! Merci encore !

Communication with Mathieu was super easy. We met Pierre who gave us the keys and he was incredibly helpful and friendly - he gave us lots of tips! He mentioned that the apartment had a few minor watch-outs: like unlocking the apartment door (however we had no issues at all) and you need to nudge the toilet bowl as it can get stuck (this was not a big deal). The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. The location of the apartment is perfect. The only downside is that there is construction work in front of the house and you can hear the neighbors - however this is not something that the host can fix :-) Thank you for letting us stay!
Very well located apartment in the centre of Porto, with welcoming hosts.

Mathieu's place was in a great location;  quiet street yet near the action.  The beds are very big and comfortable. Lots of rooms, big spaces (unlike the pictures), and still cheap. Great washing machine with balcony clothesline.  The  bathroom has a bathtub and a very nice sink. When we got there a friend of Mathieu's greeted us so don't worry if the profile pic doesn't match. He set us up with a map and local recommendations based on our needs and interests.

Mathieu ist ein sehr herzlicher und netter Gastgeber, auf jede Nachricht wurde sofort reagiert und die Schlüsselübergabe verlief reibungslos. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet und liegt direkt im Zentrum der Altstadt, so dass man sich gleich wie zu Hause fühlte. Super gerne wieder! Mathieu is a very nice and friendly host, in case of questions he response very quick and was very flexible and welcoming. His apartment is very nice and cozy and in the centre of the oldtown - it made me feel like home. Thank you again for making the short stay so great! :)

L'appartement est vraiment très bien situé au coeur du centre historique de Porto ce qui permet de presque tout visiter à pied. L'appartement est très joli, bien décoré, dans une rue très typique et charmante. Par contre, il est totalement insonorisé. Durant toute notre semaine de vacances, l'immeuble en face était en travaux. Tous les jours dès 8h du matin, nous avons eu le plaisir de partager le bruit des marteaux piqueurs et des marteaux. Ce fut très ennuyant et surtout très fatiguant. Autre petit bémol, si l'appartement est fait pour recevoir 6 personnes (3 lits 2 places), il est impossible de se réunir à 6 pour manger puisqu'il n'y a pas de table (à part une petite table en plastique pour 2 personnes). L'appartement est sinon bien exposé puisque le soleil donne sur le balcon une bonne partie de la journée.

This was a great place to stay. It's very roomie and comfortable. The apparent in general is great with modern rooms and a very modern kitchen, and the location is optimal for exploring the city with many restaurants and attractions within walking distance. Mathieu is great and was very quick to respond to any messages.
Great stay!

Appartement très bien situé au coeur de Ribeira, proche des principaux centres d'intérêt, des rues piétonnes, des restaurants etc. Il est situé dans une rue calme (malgré quelques travaux en face en ce moment).
L'appartement est conforme aux photos et propre. Nous y avons séjourné à 6 : les chambres et la pièce principale sont bien, cuisine et salle de bains sont un peu justes pour 6 personnes. Notamment, impossible de prendre un repas à 6 sur cette petite table et difficile de cuisiner (équipement minimal). Ceci dit, il est plus sympa de profiter des restaurants du quartier.
Mathieu nous a bien accueillis et nous a aidé à réserver un taxi pour notre départ.
Au final, bon séjour à Porto et bon souvenir de l'appartement.

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. The apartment is within walking distance of the river , port caves, many restaurants, shops and Sao Bento train station. It is in a narrow cobbled street in the old part of the city where everything is either up or down hill so be prepared to walk everywhere which is the best way to discover all the hide local places. It is a short walk to get the bus # 500 to Matosinhos and the beaches on the Atlantic Ocean and the fresh fish restaurants where it is all cooked outside on the street.
The apartment was clean and comfortable and certainly adequate for our needs.
Nous avons passé un beau séjour à Porto dans l'appartement de Mathieu. Tout s'est déroulé comme prévu

Apartment is very well located in the heart of Porto and was comfortable. Construction outside is annoying, not an issue if you are out sightseeing all day but bring earplugs if you want to sleep in. Mathieu was easy to contact and resolved problems quickly.

Lovely apartment and the bedrooms are spread along a corridor which is nice for a feeling of privacy and space. Mathieu was very efficient and agreed to a late check-in at short notice which was much appreciated.

Logement très agréable, propre et très bien situé.
Matthieu est très sympathique et nous a bien renseignés.
Nous recommandons !
Amazing room with ocean view!!! We were very impressed with the Westin and the 5 Star service!!! Complete with a full kitchen and washer and dryer!!! Home away from home. Mahalo :)
The host canceled this reservation 179 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Malgré l'heure tardive à laquelle on est arrivés, Mickaël nous a très bien accueillis. L'appartement était propre.

Pro:
-great location & value
-quick response from the host and very adaptable 

Cons:
-hair and dust in bed
-pictures don't represent the actual apartment layout
-unstable Internet

地點離地鐵站很近,周邊的商圈非常熱鬧｡
集結所有交通條件｡真的是十分便利｡
住宿環境在這交通樞紐銅鑼灣市中心,是安靜的｡
安全性也很不錯,

房東也很熱情,服務不錯｡
彭先生是个很好沟通的房东,第一次到香港,不知道香港的房源这么小的｡总体还可以｡

please check careful who the true owner is. they always have different owner with the one they use in airbnb. even phone number, i had a bad experience about finding the owner about 30mins, no one take my phone until i found out they actually have different owner with different phone number.
算便宜啦
没有烧开水的壶 还是楼下大爷那里灌的
好!就是空调有点老化｡有点杂音
房间位于铜锣湾,一个房间隔出一个独立卫生间,麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,卫生也挺好的,洗脸台没有热水,房间空调噪音比较大,其他都很好
内地来的客户建议可以 (Hidden by Airbnb) 导航,更精准一些｡
与描述相符吧,和爸妈孩子去的,香港寸土寸金这样的不错了,我们是一家人去的地方小点相互克服下,一个淋浴间,全家就只有我洗漱需要比较久的时间所以还好不会赶,如果是朋友去玩的话建议两个两人间的可能会好点｡
整体还算不错的,还挺干净
房東人很好,很願意幫助房課解決問題;但在實際入住時遇到給錯地址,寄物規範資訊與airbnb上描述不同等問題,需再改善
他们屋里有点臭,而且并不能见到房东

不差钱的请绕行,其实房源不是民居,属于家庭旅馆,和屋主只有电话联系,负责的是手下一名菲佣,给老板打电话,张口就是boss(¯へ¯)｡交通便利,离铜锣湾地铁E口1分钟,属于商业区,没有热闹的夜市,但地铁站上方的SOGO有特别棒的大超市,shopping可以,体验香港风情就算了｡房间小的要命,相当于国内如家的标间放了两张大床,大行李箱打开几乎就没地方站人了,主要是经济,毕竟这里寸土寸金嘛,适合出门有地方住就好,不挑的人｡PS,网站预留的电话不是屋主BOSS的,是个深圳的电话,感觉像中介｡
太差了,小的不能再小了,噪音太大,第一天入住,热水器嗡嗡的声音响了一宿,第二天换了一个地方,屋里面的味道呛死人,一宿没睡,住的地方还有狗,还比不上北京的快捷酒店,总之是太差了,很失望的一次旅行
房东人很好,住这非常方便,从地铁口出来5分钟就到,附近餐馆很多,小店也多,吃饭逛街太便利了｡房间虽小但是很干净卫生,性价比高,值得推荐
距离地铁站特别近,出行非常方便,宾馆的阿姨跟前台都特别的友好,给我们讲解路线还推荐美食,我们两个女生买了好多东西在要走的时候有一位宾馆的叔叔还特意帮我们把箱子给抬下去了,真的特别感谢!房间也很好我们特别满意!下次来香港还会订这里!很棒的一次旅行!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

老板人真的很好｡
去香港大部分需要买的东西都可以在老板那里低价买到｡巴士票,迪士尼门票,手机卡,换港币都可以找老板搞定,而且老板也很乐意给大家很好的建议｡
老板很热心,位置也很好
我们在Jim的inn里住了3个晚上,头一个晚上因为房间空调有气味以及漏水睡得不是很好,不过次日Jim遍给我们提供了一个最好的双人套房,并且为我们免费提供水｡ 总体感觉不错｡
We had a great time here, thank you for your instruction about interesting place and food
Jim is always ready to answer your inquiries. Place is nice and comfy. Would definitely recommend this place
房東非常友善我離開嘅時候佢仲送我哋去車站非常感激下次再嚟我會選擇這裏
Jim's place is very convenience for everythings. Jim and his staffs are really helpful and friendly. I'm really sastified with the place.

located right smack in sneakers Street so it was super convenient, within 5mins walk to mongkok mtr as well. 

note that the elevator starts on the 2nd floor so you'll still have to climb up about 4 flights of stairs! 

overall decent room
地理位置优越,老板热情,走的时候还帮忙把箱子提下楼｡
谢谢前台热情的叔叔阿姨,还帮我们寄存行李｡房间虽然小但是打理得干净,五脏俱全,水壶洗漱用品拖鞋什么的问前台都有,还有公用冰箱｡位于旺角,交通购物吃饭超级方便｡不过晚上外面有时候会有飞车党有点吵,这也没事,戴耳塞就可以入睡了｡性价比很高,值得推荐｡

Jim and his staff were friendly and checking in and out was very easy.  Very well located in Mong Kok, close to the subway and lots of shops and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can be a bit loud if you're not used to sleeping with city sounds. A great place to stay in Hong Kong for the value and location

숙소는 몽콕 레이디스마켓에 위치해 있습니다. 다른 후기와는 다르게 시끄럽지 않았으며, 바퀴벌레도 나오지 않았습니다. 
2층부터 엘레베이터가 있기때문에 1층에서 올라가기엔 조금 힘들긴 합니다.
주인은 매우 친절하고, 짐도 잘 맡아주십니다.

Jim's place is great for traveling around, it is very near the MTR (about 5 mins away). There's also the ladies market and sneakers street nearby. The toilet has a bit of odour but overall, great stay and value for money. It was a pleasant stay for two girls. Thank you Jim and the rest like Margaret for your help and kind hospitality!
前台的叔叔阿姨人非常好 很乐于解答游客的问题 住的位置很好 方便购物和旅游吃饭 下次还会来香港还会选择这里的 赞!
好房东,值得信任,推荐住宿!^_^
老板人非常好非常热心 有什么问题就会很快的帮我们解决 房间虽然很小但是很干净
很满意

Stephen's place is neat, clean and as described.  Size is perfect for single traveller.  Stephen is very responsive.  Location is good with lots of restaurants around. Walking distance to MTR station is about 5 mins, very convenient. I enjoyed my stay very much at Stephen's place.

Small, one person room (size makes it a single room) not really well sound isolated against the neigbours. Recently renovated so fresh bathroom, could be better with something that blocks out the light from the "window" if you are a person that have trouble sleeping if it's to light in the room.

My stay in Hong Kong and at Stephen's flat went very smoothly and without any inconveniences. The flat is in a central location and easy to find as Stephen provided very good directions to the place with pictures and everything.

The room was as depicted in the pics and is suitable for 1 person to stay.

The room is tinier than I thought without any windows out. Another problem was that no cleaning supplies - not even a brush - was provided in the room. If you stay several days in the flat, as I did, it would be comfortable to clean and tidy up a bit every day.
Great location and beautiful room! Had a great time there. Host is awesome!
Good budget room for HK, clean and convenient, but no outside window :) Late check-in was easy and smooth. It's a good deal, at this price it's hard to find better in Wan Chai.
This is my second stay at Stephen's.  It's as good as my last stay.

The place was hard to find for me as the entrance is small and easy to miss. Nice cosy room that's in a central location. Desk and good wifi allowed me to work in the room. Fridge is useful for keeping food and drinks! And I like how there's food places just downstairs and everywhere around the building.

Great location in a reasonably modern building with a lift (which is a huge bonus having stayed on the 8th floor of a building without a lift last time I came to HK). Host was helpful and friendly and the room was clean with decent strength wifi, cold aircon and hot water.

Please note that facilities / amenities are minimal. There is a fridge, a kettle, and some bodywash/shampoo. You will need to supply your own towels plus cutlery and cups / glasses if you wish to eat or drink in the apartment (there are no cooking or laundry facilities either).

All in all, a good budget - if basic - place to stay in central Hong Kong.
It is a confortable room very well located!
Excellent location and great host! Remember to bring your own towle to this place.
The location is good.  Neighbourhood full of eateries.  Room is bigger than some other airbnb place.  Bathroom is clean.  Lift is located at the ground floor.  Good value for money.

Stephen was easy to reach via (Hidden by Airbnb) and the checkin instructions were very clear and easy to follow. The neighborhood and building feels very authentic and it is easy to walk to everything like restaurants/MTR/buses.

The room itself is very small and has no windows, so this is not a good place if you want to spend much time in your room. However, as a place to sleep and shower (plenty of hot water and good pressure) it was just fine. And at this price, you cannot expect more in HK.

The apartment looks exactly like the photos. Clean and nice. All the amenities are working perfectly good (the wifi, fridge, water heater, aircon, kettle) Good and central location with many shops and eateries around, near the MTR station. Stephen is very friendly and responses promptly. Ideal place to stay for solo traveller, value for money too.

Pros: Stephen was super responsive. I appreciate immensely that he contacted me several days before my arrival to arrange for key handover. The building is located in a very convenient spot -- eateries, transportation (7-min walk to closest MTR station, a few minutes away on foot from bus 5/5X that goes to Stanley Market or the 100-series buses on Wanchai Rd. that go to the Kowloon side using the tunnel and you'll arrive at Hunghom where you can take the MTR and trains to NWT and China; tramway, and lots of taxis). Despite the various problems re: cleanliness, Stephen was quick to arrange for his maid to show up more than once. And as other guests noted, hard to find a place so conveniently located at this price.

Cons: I would remove the "newly" word from the property's title of "newly decorated apartment". The cleaner obviously did a superficial job only--found dust and tissue bits below the bed and mouldy caulking around the bathroom sink. A working fridge was one of my must-have items, but was disappointed to find the fridge seal was extremely mouldy, including certain parts inside. I guess my biggest surprise is that this room is actually a room within an apartment which is subdivided into five rooms. There is no window as understood through other reviews and confirmation from Stephen, so won't be suitable for those who are claustrophobic, and you'll have to rely entirely on the air conditioning for fresh air. There is, however, a pseudo-window slot that is open to the corridor in the common area. Would have made the space much more homey if there were a small curtain covering this pseudo-window space since it is half-covered by a file folder and you can still see the dirty metal guard and the sheet of dirty plastic with a hole for the air cond. unit exhaust. I was much taken aback by this after seeing the more "modern" amenities, such as the cupboards and bathroom tiles. Another thing that bothered me was the absence of hooks for clothing, except for the three tiny adhesive hooks in the bathroom (but since the shower is in the same space as the toilet, one cannot use these tiny hooks for dry clothing anyways) and the bar on the glass door (but I didn't want to hang too much on it since the bar is against a glass door). Hence, the only chair in the space is hijacked by my clothes. So if you plan to stay there more than a week, you might find it inconvenient. 

All in all, if you don't have a keen eye for cleanliness, you will like this place for its proximity to amenities and quick response from host.

Hint: If you arrive at the building by taxi, give the taxi driver the Wood Road address, but then you'll have to walk to the Heard Street entrance to enter the building since the security code doesn't work on the Wood Road entrance.
Thanks Stephen for the stay, its been great.
The location was good and there is convenient store located right below the apartment! Host was fast at reply, enjoyed my stay! Apartment was true to picture.

I've been did HK several times, this was my first time exploring the HK side instead of Kowloon. I'm glad I chose this place, it's walking distance to a lot of places, there's a bus or tram nearby to take you wherever. The neighbor's can get a little noisy, but they make sure to stop before bedtime, so if noise is a problem, just go out to a cafe or put on some headphones. I'd recommend this place.
very good location near bus stops. clean room. good sized room with enough space for a luggage.
Very nice room for a affordable price in Hong Kong!
cozy and enough hospitality.

This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Cath's Garden Studio and we're already looking forward to a return visit. The studio itself is light and bright, as well as clean and comfortable. Cath was a welcoming and attentive hostess who was not only knowledgeable and helpful with all our queries, but provided a wonderful breakfast hamper with home made goodies that really made us feel welcome. The garden setting and chooks only added to our experience. We loved the location and enjoyed exploring the adjoining areas such as Newtown and Surry Hills.
Thoroughly recommended.

What a wonderful experience staying in The Garden Studio. We arrived and were greeted by the very friendly and attentive Cath - who introduced us to the chickens on the way to the studio. As soon as we stepped inside we felt comfortable. The decor is modern, quirky and stylish, there is a lovely area to sit and watch television, a user friendly kitchenette, a comfortable bed and a clean and modern bathroom. Cath provided us with a lovely array of breakfast and snack options and she even baked a delicious loaf of fresh bread which she left at our doorstep the following morning along with a newspaper. There is a large collection of DVD's to watch and books to read and the studio is in a quiet location with plenty parking - also within easy walking distance of public transport. I highly recommend The Garden Studio to anyone looking for a private, convenient and comfortable place to stay. My partner and I will definitely be returning in the future.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay with Cath.. This lovely garden studio is functional, modern and comfortable.. Delish freshly baked bread and cookies from Cath.. The breakfast hamper is welcoming and generous! Definitely highly recommended!

My boyfriend and me are a young french couple who stayed 1 week in the lovely Cath's studio. We really enjoyed this staying for our first booking on airbnb. Cath is a very smiling and nice person. The studio is fully adjust to feel like home.
The basket for breakfast is really complete and everything is thinked that we lacked nothing. Moreover it was a pleasure to be able to taste the delicious biscuits and bread, all home made by Cath. The bus stations and shops are close and there are only 15 minutes walking to go to the station Petersham.
I really recommend Cath's studio !

I had a lovely stay with Cath - the studio is beautiful and her chickens are so cute! She was a fantastic host - friendly, easy going  and kind (baked fresh bread!) but respected my privacy which was great.

This garden studio is absolutely comfortable  and private but also very clever in the way it uses space. Cath is a generous host providing muesli, home made muffins and fresh eggs from her very own chooks..wow. I was only able to enjoy 2 nights but I hope to stay again soon.
We had a fantastic time in Cath's beautiful Garden Studio.  Cath's freshly baked bread was amazing & the freshly laid eggs superb! Highly recommended.

The garden studio was a wonderful little place in Marrickville, close to new cafes popular in Sydney!  Cath was a fantastic host and provided more than we expected. We'd recommend couples to stay for a little hideaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

The Garden Studio was wonderful. It had everything we needed (and more!) and it is a beautiful space. Cath has thought of everything, from a change of towels mid-week to shampoo, cereal choices, and even a homemade loaf of bread for our 6-night stay. We felt truly spoilt. Marrickville is being hailed as the "new Surry Hills" and at the number of quality cafes and food stores nearby was just astounding. We rented a car, and we were really happy with the easy (and free) parking on the street too.
Great place to stay in a really interesting suburb I wish I had more time to explore.....

We felt so at home at The Garden Studio, it's a pity we didn't have more time to thoroughly enjoy this cosy space. 

We loved the ginger biscuits, & freshly baked bread, that Cath handed to us in the morning, still warm from the oven. Cath was approachable & helpful when we needed info on how to get around, but at the same time, gave us the space we needed. Her chickens too, were rather welcoming! A joy to talk to; we appreciated the short exchanges & enjoyed listening to her share bits about herself :) 

A gem of a place!

The studio is lovely space and convenient; small kitchen with almost everything, confortable beds, outside table, TV and WiFi service. We found many kind of cereal, jams, fresh eggs, fruits, chocolate, and etc. in the kitchen.  Cath gave us a freshly-baked bread in the first morning, and we could enjoy breakfast with the table in the garden.
There is a park near here and it is quiet area.
Cath is very friendly and a kindly person.
   裏庭にある素敵な可愛いｽﾍﾟｰｽです｡庭のﾃｰﾌﾞﾙで朝食を取りながらゆったり楽しみました｡ｵｰﾅｰに気兼ねなく過ごせるのですが､Cathさんは親切な方で､市内の情報を色々と教えてくれます｡最初の朝に大きな焼きたてﾊﾟﾝをいただき､2日間楽しみました｡

We had such a wonderful stay at the garden studio.
Cath is a very welcoming and generous host.  She even made us  freshly baked bread and cookies!
The studio is very well designed and has a very comfy split level bedroom. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood and close to train and bus stops. Guaranteed to make your stay in Sydney unforgettable.

My sister and I had a lovely time at Cath's Garden Studio. It was the perfect little space with everything we needed. Cath was extremely lovely and helpful making sure we were comfortable and happy whenever we crossed paths in the garden. The fresh bread was amazing to wake up to on our first morning and the food provided really helped us in keeping our spending costs down. I will most definitely return to the Garden Studio next time I am having a little getaway in Sydney!

Cath's beautiful little studio was the perfect place to visit Sydney and the local neighborhood of Merrickville. She provided a wonderful array of breakfast treats as well as fabulous teas! The place was clean, private, and had all the amenities we could need. Thanks for a great visit, Cath!

Our stay at the Garden Studio was perfect! Cath baked fresh bread and we had breakfast everyday with all the cereals, eggs, vegemite, nutella, etc. she also provided. The studio is small but cozy and she has taken care of all kind of details, we found anything we needed!
Cath also was very nice helping us with some directions and printing maps for us, thank you for a very nice stay!

My mom and I had a fantastic time.  Cath is an absolutely wonderful host and the place is lovely, super clean, relaxing and you get your privacy.  Street parking is free!  Do note that climbing the ladder might be slightly tricky, specially if you are slightly tipsy.  Ha ha.  Very happy with my stay and highly recommend the cute garden studio.  

Both my mom and I had a great time in Sydney.

I spent one whole week at Cath' studio and I loved everything about it! Cath is a very warm and generous person, nothing can beat her big breakfast hamper and the delicious bread she's providing you with. She even brought me some freshly baked muffins over!
There is a direct bus which takes you to the city within 25-35 minutes, depending on traffic. The studio is in a quiet neighborhood, it's perfect to relax after a busy day in the city.
This was a 5 star experience, I would book again anytime. Thank you for a lovely time, Cath!
Very best,
Daniela

We loved the Garden Studio. It is absolutely perfect with so much style, love and details and you have everything you need! The breakfast basket is delicious as well as the self made bread! Cath is very helpful if you have any needs. We could not imagine any better place to stay in Sydney!

Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen und man kann auch ganz leicht zu Fuß einiges entdecken. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel kommt man sehr gut überall hin. Wer keine allzu großen Erwartungen an die Unterkunft stellt ist genau richtig hier. Der Gastgeber ist hilfsbereit und kümmert sich um einen. Würde auf jeden Fall nochmal diese Unterkunft nutzen, wenn ich wieder in Istanbul bin.

Es un lugar barato así que no se puede esperar unas instalaciones de lujo, pero si eres una persona poco delicada es el lugar perfecto. La ubicación es inmejorable, el personal es muy simpático y hay una azotea donde relajarse y disfrutar de las vistas con una cerveza o un té. Lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda.
Все отлично.  Дом,  район супер.

Secondhome is in an ideal location for looking around the main sights of Istanbul. The hospitality was excellent, they were very helpful with our many questions and had great local tips on where to eat etc. I would highly recommend staying and if we visit Istanbul again we would rebook here. Thanks Secondhome!

Excelente lugar con una muy buena ubicación, el hostal se encuentra a unos 800 metros de Santa Sofía, y a unos 10 minutos caminando del puente Galatasaray, además a dos cuadras hay lugares para comer con excelentes precios, puedes llegar animando a cualquier lado. Recepción en inglés y un poco español, sin problemas en la comunicación. Recomendable

Me voy con muchos recuerdos, muchas gracias por alojarme disfrute mucho mi estancia en Estambul, me hiceron la vida mas facil con su hospitalidad y buena ubicacion asi como su buena disposición para las preguntas. Sin dudas lo recomiendo
Good place for it's price. Excellent location. Nothing fancy but very cheap :)

Нам в этом хостеле было очень комфортно, по-домашнему все. Персонал, как радушный хозяин, вежлив, заботлив и улыбчив. Жили на 4 этаже. Номер маленький, но уютный и чистый, постельное белье свежее. Санузел и душ на этаже на 4 комнаты. Гель для душа и бумага никогда не кончились, строго следит за этим персонал. Когда мы замерзли, учтиво принесли очень теплые одеяла)) Если номера и с удобствами в номере, но мы выбрали такой. Курить бегали на балкон на терассу. По вечерам на ней тусовка из проживающих. Но это не мешало особо. Оборудованная кухня, холодильник на 1 этаже. Очень понравилось, что в 20 шагах от  нашего хостел работает небольшой маркет в котором большой выбор и Очень маленькин цены. Покупали продукты, готовили сами.  А еще отличное расположение хостела, метро в 200м, трамвай в 220м, Гранд базар в 700м, мост с морским транспортом в 1км. Вот что еще важно: в отеле персонал говорит по русски! И очень нам рады))
Excellent location and cool atmosphere! Rooms are comfortable, and open spaces are great!

It is a room of a hostel. The hosts are very friendly and provides a lot of tips. Room is clean and towels provided. The shared bathroom was cleaned daily and sometimes it also depends on the other guests. I suggest add more light in the 2nd floor bathrooms. They also provided laundry and printing services. The lounge area is also a good place to hangout and meet other people.
Michelle was a very considerate, responsive host. The apartment is lovely and very comfortable and was furnished with everything we needed. We had a great stay.

Séjour merveilleux chez Michelle qui est une hôte adorable, le logement etait vraiment super... très propre, , fonctionnel,petit plus le rez de jardin ou l on peux manger et profiter des petits oiseaux car nous sommes à new york , mais vraiment au calme,station de metro à deux (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vraiment cette adresse, nous sommes venus avec nos deux enfants...
Merci michelle de nous avoir permis de passer un si bon voyage,!

I booked Michelle's private Brooklyn home for my retired parents, who were visiting me in LA from overseas and wanted to travel to New York for a few days. My parents returned from New York raving about Michelle, her graciousness and her beautiful home including a private outside patio! The apartment was attractively decorated and very clean with all the key amenities including coffeemaker, TV, internet, and even fresh fruit! The supermarket was conveniently around the corner, and my dad said he chatted with locals as he walked to the bakery to get bread each morning. My parents said it was like home away from home. They highly recommend Michelle as a host, and I can't wait to visit myself. Michelle, thank you for making my parents' New York trip so special. You and your family are welcome to visit us in Long Beach, CA anytime. 

Michelle, ist eine wunderbare und nette Gastgeberin.
Bei fragen und Tipps stets zur stelle und unglaublich hilfsbereit.
Das Appartement ist sehr geräumig und voll ausgestattet.
Die Lage ist erstklassig, U-Bahn und Supermarkt nicht mehr als 150 Meter entfernt.
Wir habe uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können uns nicht beklagen. Es ist jedem zu empfehlen der New York als Stadt erkunden will.
Jederzeit wieder!!

Very nice and big enough basement apartment with two rooms. Clean and nicely furnished with a good wide bed in one room and a sofa in kitchen, with all necessary dishes and coffee machine (Michelle even provided us with coffee for it) That was much more than enough for two persons. Also we used bbq in the court which also was great. Michelle was hospitable enough to meet us in the middle of the night!  We didn`t have any problems at all living in such kind of apartment. Should notice that the connection to Mahattan is a little complicated given the G metro line which is not very frequent. But in general the enviroment is quite ok with nice dominican dely on the corner of the street (highly recomended!)
Michelle was a nice person and really easy to communicate. We had a great time in this big apartment and no problem with to get into the city.

Very nice place!
Michelle is very friendly, helpfull and a nice person to chat with.
The place is very clean, homy feeling. The Subway is less than 100 yards away (about 1/2 hour ride from midtown Manhattan) which is VERY convenient. Neighbourhood ok. At the end of the day is much nicer to come to instead of a "cold" hotel room! The back yard is great for morning / evening coffe or even BBQ (the grill is already there).
Thank you Michelle  :-)
תודה רבה (Hebrew)

Michelle is a fantastic host, she made us  feel very welcome.
The place was clean and perfectly organized,  quiet at night, 4 very comfortable sleeping places, safe neighborhood, we had everything we needed. the subway is literally 1minute walk from the apartment, you get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. There are also buses that take you in no time to down town Brooklyn and Williamsburg. Supermarket is around the corner. Bakery for great breakfasts and deliciuos donuts place at 2 minutes walk from home.
The back garden is also very nice, we were too busy walking all day long, but it gave us a sense of big space, on a nice day you could spend time outside and enjoy a private corner of open air.
If I have the chance to go to New York again, I will surely go back to Michelle!
Everything was great in your apartment. Nice place, nice neighborhood with a subway station very close to the apartment. Thank you Michelle ! :-)

Notre expérience à l'appartement de Michelle fut merveilleuse! J'y suis aller avec mes parents, qui n'avaient jamais mis les pieds à Brooklyn, et ils furent enchantés par la proximité du métro, de l'épicerie, par la grandeur de l'appartement et ses facilités. Je recommande fortement l'appartement de Michelle, et j'y retournerai assurément à mon prochain séjour à New York!
-----
Our experience at Michelle's apartment was wonderful! I'm going with my parents, who had never been to Brooklyn, and they were delighted with the nearby subway, grocery, the size of the apartment and its facilities. I highly recommend the Michelle's apartment, and I certainly return on my next trip to New York!
Yol
Yol

Io e la mia famiglia siamo stati 20 giorni nell'appartamento di Michelle e siamo stati benissimo. Appartamento con ingresso indipendente, pulito, ben tenuto e con tutto il necessario per 4 persone. I letti sono veramente comodi (non si trovano facilmente nelle case per vacanze). Vicinissimo alla metropolitana, si raggiunge Manhattan in poco tempo, e vicino ad alcuni market, per cui fare la spesa è stato facile. La zona è abbastanza tranquilla, si rientrava anche a sera tardi ma non abbiamo avuto nessun problema. Michelle è una persona molto simpatica, molto disponibile e molto discreta. consiglierei sicuramente di passare una vacanza nel suo appartamento. Grazie ancora Michelle ...e speriamo arrivederci!! I love NY

Michelle was great host for my parents and very helpful in arranging taxi, showing shops and answering questions about New York. Her flat located just next to the metro station, which made it easy to get to the downtown. Had some minor problems with the radiator but Michelle took care of that so were no bigger issues. Recommended!

This was my first time to use the Airbnb and I'm glad I chose Michelle and her house. 
The house is as it's seen on the pictures. It is pretty good size for three people. My parents slept on the bed and I slept on the couch. I am 180 cm (5' 11'') and fit on the couch and it was pretty comfortable.
When we arrived Michelle's house she greeted us right away, took her time to explain how to commute, where to eat and what to do in the city. 
The location of house is pretty good. It takes 20-30 min with metro to Manhattan downtown, depends on which line you use. You can also take the metro from JFK, otherwise the cab costs  around $50. In the house everything was clean and neat. She also provided us towels for shower etc. Besides that, whenever I texted to Michelle she responded in timely manner, which made everything easier.
Honestly, our overall experience was much better than I expected.  Me and my family had a very good time in Michelle's house and NY. If one day I go back to NY, I know where I should stay.
We spent a wonderful week at Michelle's place. She was very nice and took care of what ever we needed. The apartment is just 2 min from the subway which helped us get to Manhattan quickly.

Michelle is really nice and her place is very cozy. This was my first airbnb experience and I enjoyed it a lot. Her service is much better than anything you would get at a hotel for a much better price. She gave us a recommendation on where to get breakfast that turned out great. The place is very clean and neatly decorated. It's literally right off the subway station, so that's a huge plus. We also met her mother, who is a fascinating woman. I highly recommend her place, if you are looking to visit the area.  
-- Later Edit:
I should mention that her internet is very fast. I don't know what ISP she uses, but it was a joy to go back to a temporary accommodation and know that you are well connected while traveling. I'm not sure of the exact setup, but it appeared that we had a separate modem and router just for us. This was a huge relief. Michelle had the SSID and password printed and ready for guests, so even if you forget to ask, you would still find them in the apartment. Overall, things were very well thought out before hand and Michelle was very proactive with tiny details like this that make all the difference. This was very surprising to me knowing that I'm dealing with an individual and not a company.
Michelle was very nice and her flat is very confortable, well located with the subway at the end of the street. I recommend her. Thanks a lot Michelle and see you later.
Michelle was an outstanding host and very helpful, apartment clean and convenient.

Amazing 4 day stay with Michelle in Brooklyn! We arrived a little early but she was still able to find time to accommodate us...arriving with fresh fruit and water for us. The apartment is amazing, plenty of room with all the comforts you could ask for (small kitchen/TV with cable/wifi). Easy access to trains and transportation, with many restaurants near by. After this stay, I don't think I'll be booking a traditional hotel in NYC again. Highly recommended!! Thanks again Michelle!

Très joli appartement dans Brooklyn! J'ai été agréablement surprise :) ! Nous y avons passé 4 nuits, et l'appart est parfait pour accommoder de 2 à 4 personnes. Très sympa de pouvoir rentrer pour prendre un verre ou déjeuner "à la maison". 
Le quartier n'est pas le plus trendy de brooklyn mais le métro est littéralement à 1 minute à pied! Michelle était charmante et tout était parfait! Et en plus, aucun problème pour stationner la voiture dans la rue, devant la maison! Merci!!!

Hermoso lugar, muy limpio. Michelle nos ayudó en todo momento y nos ofreció dejar las valijas gratuitamente unas horas aún cuando ya había pasado el tiempo del check out, el lugar es más lindo que en las fotos, y a muy pocas estaciones del downtown de Manhattan, 100% recomendable!
A pesar de que había nieve no se sentía nada de frío, excelente calefacción. El patio trasero era muy bonito y se veían ardillas!
Hay supermercado y KFC muy cerca, y es cómodo que esté a metros del subte.

Michelle is a great  hostess, she helped us with everything and even oferred to keep our lugagge some hours after the check out. 
The place is perfect, there are groceries, KFC, subway station, and it´s 20-30 mins from downtown Manhattan! 
Beautiful place, very comfy and cozy, everything was clean. We couldn´t enjoy the backyard because the chill, but it was awesome! and there were some lovely squirrels! We want to come back some year, and sure will recommend it to our friends

Nous rentrons d'un séjour de 8 jours à NYC où nous avons séjourn (Website hidden by Airbnb) Adultes et 2 ados) chez Michelle début mars. nous en sommes ravis malgré des températures froides.
==)positifs: 
Bon compromis rapport qualité / prix. La proximité avec une station de métro est un plus ainsi que celle de l'épicerie permettant de faire les petites courses pour les repas pris au gite. Michelle est extrêmement accueillante et serviable. 
l'appartement est simple et très propres. 4 vrai lits confortables. 
==)négatifs:
bien que situé dans un quartier + calme, la chambre donne sur la rue, et les nuits peuvent être difficiles pour les oreilles sensibles. le métro qui passe dessous est audible, tout comme les avions. mais à New York , il est difficile de trouver une endroit très calme. NEW YORK reste un environnement urbain et donc globalement bruyant, autant en avoir conscience. 
Pour une famille de 4, les lits enfants sont dans la pièce qui sert de coin jour. Une table et chaises pliantes nécessitent d'être pliés  pour installer le 4ième lit et inversement, plier le lit pour prendre les repas. Pour les français que nous sommes, la table est aussi importante que le lit. ça peut être un problème. 
Peu de vaisselle ( verres en plastique) ce qui est un peu dommage mais ça reste un détail.
Mais quand on vient à New York, ce n'est pas pour une ballade gastronomique. Nous recommandons vraiment cette adresse. Très bon compromis.
La cours arrière sera appréciable pour les périodes + douces.

English comments:
Just returned from NYC where we stayed with our 2 teenagers in Michelle's appartement. We are really delighted .

==)positives:
Good compromise quality / price ratio . Proximity to a metro station is a must as well as with the grocery store allowing some errands for meals at the appartement. really practical, opened until 21h. Michelle is extremely friendly and helpful.
the appartment is simple but  very clean with 4 real comfortable beds.

==)negatives:
Although located in a quiet neighborhood, the parent room is overlooking the street, and the nights can be difficult for sensitive ears. Subway is audible,as well as cars & trucks in the street. But to moderate this aspect,  in New York, it's difficult to find a quiet place because it remains a generally noisy urban environment as knowledge.
For a family of 4, children beds are in the main room. A table and chairs need to be folded to open beds and vice versa, folding bed for meals. it could be a problem.
Very few dishes ( plastic glasses ) which could be improved but it's still a detail.

But when we come to visit New York, it is not for gastronomic ballad, and it's important  to find a confortable & clean area. The backyard could be pleasant when the weather allows to use it. Unfortunatelly for us it's was too cold begining of march.
We really recommend this address.
Many thanks to Michelle.

Pascale et Yann.
Everything was fine
Felt very welcome, great house, good location, very clean, lots of information about Porto. Overall a great few days.
We were really happy with the place. It was close to everything but still separated so we could have our own place. The terrace is huge and sunny. I would recommend the place to everyone!

Logement conforme a nos attentes , le séjour s est relativement bien passé , 2/3 petite chose sont a améliorer comme mettre a disposition un ballet , une serpillère ou bien même un parasol pour la terrasse extérieur qui est génial mais en heure de chaleur on ne peut pas en profiter sans parasol ... Une bouteille de vin nous attendait a notre arrivé , ça nous fait très plaisir en arrivant après le voyage ... Sinon que dire d autre parfois quelques odeurs de canalisation d égout , c pas très agréable mais ça dure pas longtemps généralement , sur ce les chambres étais vraiment bien , très confortable et avec clim ... La cuisine est fonctionnelle et il ne manque rien ... Le salon est agréable également , le logement a donc contribué a notre très bon séjour a porto ...

La casa es preciosa, pequeña, pero bien equipado; cuenta con una gran terraza y está en una zona tranquila. Justo al lado hay una estación de tren, desde la casa se oyen los trenes, pero no molestan demasiado a la hora de dormir. Aunque la casa contaba con garaje privado, tuvimos problemas para dejar el coche en él, por lo que el dueño acordó pagar el gasto en wl párking de la estación de tren cercana (3'50€ al día). Nos dejaron una botella de agua y otra de vino como obsequio de bienvenida. Si quieres conocer Oporto y alojarte en una zona tranquila y cercana, es una buena opción
Quartier proche de l'activité (15 min à pied des quais de Porto)

La descripcion de la casa es perfecta. Muy buena situacion y zona muy tranqyila. Al lado de la casa esta el tren y un parking muy economico. El tranvia pasa a 1 minuto caminando.
Como megativo decir que el baño de la habitacion tienen que arreglar el tema del olor, hay que cerrarlo que no se soporta.
Deberia de tener una escoba y recogedor. Por el resto todo genial.
I think Jose does not exist, the guy who came did not know the place at all. The place was clean and just renovated. The neighbourhood doesn't feel really safe but we did not have any problem at all.
Good location, really nice apartament, convenient for families with children due to lerge terrace. The only minus is the paid parking place. Recomended.

merci pour la bouteille de vin !
spacieux, clean, bien équipé et très grande terrasse.
super logement.

The place deserves 6 stars !
 We had the entire house and it has excellent. The location is 1 min away from the metro station, 10 minutes away from the river side, prefect location. 
The apartment had everything: a big terrace, clean bathrooms, beautiful rooms and you could find all that you need there: hair dryer, iron, sandwich maker, toaster, everything. 
We did not meet the host is person, we communicated by e-mail and what's up, his response was in minutes, he even gave us tips and tricks regarding Porto. 
I definitely recommend the place .

A casa tem um espaço muito bom. Comporta 6 pessoas de maneira excelente. Como pontos positivos posso citar a localização, a cozinha bem equipada e com coisas novas, camas e travesseiros de boa qualidade. Como ponto negativo principal foi o mau cheiro do banheiro do quarto, muito forte. Outro ponto é a questão do estacionamento, que entendi quando aluguei que era do imóvel, mas, no entanto, é em um estacionamento privativo próximo. Quando cheguei ao local, o responsável pela casa que me recebeu informou que voltaria no penúltimo dia para reembolsar o valor gasto com o estacionamento, mas não foi o que aconteceu.
Quando liguei me passaram que deveria encaminhar por email os comprovantes de pagamento, e assim seria feito o reembolso. Não tenho como afirmar se funcionou ou não, pois até o momento ainda não obtivemos respostas sobre o assunto. Tirando esses pequenos
percalços, tudo foi excelente. Voltaria com certeza para a casa em questão.

The White Dove is a beautiful house in a beautiful neighborhood. José wasn't there to show us around, but he gave us the information we needed by phone and there was someone else to show us around. The beds were very comfortable and the terras in the sun is lovely. We enjoyed our stay in Porto very much.

It took more than 24 hours for The Port Concierge to reply us the day before check-in due to change in itinerary. We called, texted, messaged numerous times and couldn't contact them until 10am that day. That was a bit disappointing. Other than that the house was great, comfortable bed and soundproof environment. The kitchen doesn't have all the essentials such as oil, only salt. The free wine and water was a nice touch, but still having all the necessary amenities for cooking away from home was more important. Overall a good stay.
A casa é ótima, bem equipada com quartos confortáveis e limpos. Próximo ao metro e com um curta caminhada chega-se facilmente a Ribeira. Adoramos!!! José é um excelente amfitrião.

La casa está bien equipada y es funcional. En la cocina hay una cafetera de cápsulas Delta por lo que si no llevas de casa a lo mejor te quedas sin desayunar ya que solo había 2.
En el pasillo hay sensores de movimiento así que por la noche no puedes moverte sin que se encienda la luz y por el día también se enciende así que no creo que ahorre mucho.
La terraza es agradable para comer si hace buen tiempo.
La situación está bien aunque no está en el Centro de Oporto. En 5-10 minutos paseando llegas a la Ribera del Duero (lado de Gaia) y está a 20 metros de la estación de Metro General Torres que te lleva hasta el centro en 10 minutos. Difícil aparcar por la zona porque es zona de estacionamiento regulado 24h, en la estación de metro hay un párking en el que puedes dejar el coche 24h por 5€.
El anfitrión fue correcto y nos permitió salir un poquito más tarde
Great stay. Secluded but not far from city center. Very spacious balcony. Perfectly equipped kitchen. Perfect for vacation with friends.

La maison et la terrasse étaient exactement comme sur les photos, les lieux étaient propres et la cuisine était parfaitement équipée !
Je recommande vivement ce logement pour vos séjours à Porto

Modern villa with all facilities required for a comfortable family stay - in good location to walk to riverside cafe's, restaurants and attractions, or take tram to City Centre. Cost effective car park and tram station literally next door. Only slight negative is the neighbour has two dogs that are put out every the night that bark at anything that moves!

Un logement confortable et bien équipé à proximité du métro et du quartier Gaia. Nous avons apprécié les lits confortables pour se reposer de nos journées de vadrouille dans les rues en pente de Porto. Seul point négatif, la rue est très passante.

Keythia was a wonderful Host. 
She made myself and partner feel very at home. 
The apartment was very clean and tidy with all necessary amenities. 
The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were 5 star. 
Keythia left out a beautiful selection of breakfast treats. 
I would highly recommend this apartment. 
Many thanks 
Mark & Rebecca

Again we had such a lovely experience staying with Krythia. She is such a wonderful host. 
Krythia make you feel like your right at home. 
Highly recommend this apartment. 

Many thanks 
Mark and Rebecca

My wife and I had a really fantastic stay with Krythia. The apartment is super homely, cosy and private. The bedroom we stayed in was really nice and had a private courtyard attached to it. We also had access to our own private bathroom. Everything was really comfortable and clean, and we were able to do our own cooking too. Krythia herself is a lovely hostess. We had several interesting conversations with her and she made us feel welcome right from the start. The apartment is just a few minutes walk from the bus stop, with it being very easy snd convenient to get into the city from there. Highly recommend this apartment, especially if you're a cat lover - Krythia's cat Cindy is super friendly!

We stayed at krythias apartment for four nights. The apartment and the room is as you can see it on the pictures. Modern and nice looking. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfy. Krythia is a really nice lady and we had some great short conversations with her. We felt very welcomed.
