The only thing we like to mention for the apartment that is located in a really nice area of Sydney, is that you can only reach it by bus (5 stops) - so there is no tram nearby. The last bus we were able to find to the direction of the apartment left the city at 8:30 pm. That was sometimes a little bit early for us and we had to take an uber (which costs around 20AUD). Everything else was really awesome and we can recommend to stay there for sure. Thank you Krythia for the amazing stay in Sydney.
We received a lovely welcome, everything was as described and perfect for our requirements. Thanks so much Krythia, for sharing your home with us.
Very good house, very clean room and private bathroom, very lovely cat and one very kindliness host. Spend a nice week with Krythia
Super comfortable bed and Krythia is very friendly and welcoming.
Krythia room was just what we looked for. Quiet location. Great price. Easy walking to places. Kriathia was a gracious host.  All was as we hoped.
Very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Krythia very welcoming.
Very clean and comfortable,
Very pleasant location, spacious apartment, extremely clean bathroom and kitchen. Excellent WiFi reception. Very friendly and helpful host
Highly recommended. No problems at all .

Great apartment located at a nice area. Good public transportation to the city. Car park available and very easy to get around. Lots of cafes and restaurants around the area. The room is nice and clean with a nice private bathroom. Cindy the cat is very friendly too.

Krythia's apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable and close to beautiful Balmoral.  Krythia was very understanding about our late arrival into Sydney and ensured we could access the property in her absence.  Krythia ensured we had everything we needed to make ourselves comfortable for our brief stay (tea, coffee) and was a generous host.
Great place, host and value

The apartment is in a small, modern complex, very close to a bus route direct to the centre of Sydney (10 minutes). Shops and beach are close but a LONG walk.
The bedroom is A-C, very private with very comfortable bed.
Amazing place, friendly host and good in value

Vi spenderade en natt hemma hos Krythia och det var bra. Vi gillade Mosman. Ävenom det är lite längre bort från stan så tyckte vi att det var värd.
Tack Krythia!

Krythia's place is central to Sydney and close to some beautiful beaches. The room is soacuous and the courtyard offers a nice private area to chill out. Krythia was a great host and very accommodating.
Krythia was a lovely host. The unit was central in Mossman and a short walk to buses which were only 10 minutes to the city. The bathroom and bedroom was lovely and we had a fantastic time.

A Beatriz foi bastante atenciosa e respondia as minhas dúvidas muito rapidamente antes da viagem. O bairro do Catete tem uma localização boa, conseguimos ir para a Lapa à pé e também para outros lugares como o aterro e a praia do Flamengo durante o carnaval. A estação de metrô também é perto e tem várias opções de alimentação muito próximas à casa. O layout da casa assemelha-se à um hostel, o quarto que eu fiquei tem tamanho excelente para 4 pessoas e tem ar condicionado, o que faz muita diferença com o calor que está no Rio de Janeiro. Existem 4 banheiros, que são suficientes para o número de pessoas que cabem na casa, entretanto durante todos os dias que passei lá, o banheiro não foi limpo nenhuma vez, por sorte os hóspedes estavam mantendo-o em condições de uso, mas seria importante limpar o banheiro de vez em quando. 
Outro ponto importante é que os quartos são ligados por uma porta que não tem fechadura e é bem fina, ou seja, a privacidade não é garantida e o barulho de um quarto pode ser ouvido perfeitamente no outro.
O preço é justo pelo que é oferecido, seria importante apenas melhorar a limpeza e verificar se é possível fechar a comunicação dos quartos.
Luísa é uma pessoa muito correta e preocupada com a boa estadia. Apartamento aconchegante e perto da praia.
Luísa é excelente pessoa muita atenciosa, seu apartamento é bem aconchegante e perto da praia. Voltarei em breve
Luísa é excelente pessoa, o apartamento é muito bem localizado e amplo.  E 01 quadra da praia.
Excelente imóvel, bem localizado e aconchegante e proprietária muito atenciosa. Voltarei
Ótimo imóvel, uma Quadra da praia e próximo de farmácia e supermercado.

Ótimo imóvel aconchegante e próximo do melhor ponto da orla.
A anfitriã é muito atenciosa, voltaria em outra oportunidade.
地理位置很好,也很安全,房间可以满足基本需求
Good place to stay. It is very strategic place
交通很方便 地铁站出来一两百米就到了  附近有朗豪坊 药店 sasa 卡莱美 便利店 茶餐厅 等等等等 一应俱全 满足我的基本需求  房间格局寸土寸金  空间布局很紧凑节约  整体干净卫生  房门两重锁 感觉还蛮安全的  房东会贴心的准备多个转换接头  内地游客不用担心带的电器用不上 房东还有保管行李箱服务 很满意 下次来还会选这家
Very convenient. Just a few steps to MTR. Everything is okay.

Room is small and cozy, and the alley to the room is narrow and kinda spooky lol

The room is located near the emergency exit on the 19th floor
房间和描述的一样,地理位置在市中心,里面的设施也很齐全｡唯一的不足是临街会有点点吵,不过也能睡着啦,下次来香港记得备耳塞｡
类似于宾馆,不算完全意义的民俗｡但是位置很便利,购物很方便
交通特方便
和照片差距还是有点大的 唯一的优点就是交通便利
房子不错,干净,地段超级棒
两日游 住旺角 旅店的位置很适合在附近玩耍 总体也算好找 只要找到新兴大厦上楼就行 房间除了隔音略不好之外 其他还OK 总体来说适合结伴出游入住

Location can't be beat, beds were surprisingly comfortable by HK standards. The room had everything we needed. 

Only unusual thing to note is that the host asked for a 200 HKD cash safety deposit (I guess this is standard policy for the hotel they run).

Initial room given was not as advertised on either photo of the guesthouse. Rather it was a bunk bed with little to almost no room for luggage storage, when we asked for a room change we were told "That is not how business is done here. If we gave each guest the room pictured we would not make money." We were finally given a room change after voicing our concerns that room given was not a pictured and insisting for a change in rooms, but the second room was also not as advertised.
老板人很好,服务很周到,住的地方很干净,位置很优越,离地铁口很近,购物很方便!下次还会选择这家的!
优点是房间洗手间还蛮干净整洁无异味无不明昆虫,也不会很旧,另外一个是在弥敦道中心区域,购物饮食还有交通还是很方便的｡缺点是实在是小,有点压抑睡不踏实,因为预定得仓促而且没经验,实话说如果可以再选一次,同样价格(120美金)会选择提前两周预定远离旺区的正规酒店,既然是来玩的,还是更希望舒坦一些,其实过一晚的话其实行程也没这么紧迫的需要订在这么旺的区域里面的｡
Accessable location, and Danny is responsive when I contact her.
交通方便,近地鐵站,預定訂了以後,只需入前台跟服務員說就可以｡房東態度良好,友善及貼心地招待我們｡
Gd location
房间小是小了点,但是好在很干净
最重要的是图片跟现实差距太大了,整个环境实在是不值一晚650多,性价比达不到｡｡卫生间太小,洗手台还漏水,总体而言,体验不好｡优点就是位置很不错,交通便利,周围也有的逛,房东回复很及时

The Host made us feel very welcome , we were six of us. Everything was clean and spacious and the neighbourhood  was right in downtown with all the amenities and resturants. Although it rained we still had a good time.

The apartment was lovely and in a fantastic location in Montreal. 

Just as described. 

Kenny was welcoming and helpful. He made our stay very pleasant and accommodated our arrival and departure times.

We had the most wonderful experience at Kenny's spot! It's in an awesome location central in the Plateau and a quick 10-15 min drive or cab into downtown.

It is cute, clean and he leaves you towels and other nice additions that really make you feel comfortable! 

The property is set up through an entry code so no key exchange makes everything so seamless and efficient.

We will definitely come back to stay here again!

Although we didn't meet our host in person he communicated with us via text and promptly replied to any of our exchanges. We arrived in the evening and the lights and airconditioning were on for our comfort. Fresh flowers were on the table and the apartment was clean and stocked with all necessary supplies. The apartment was spacious enough for our family of six. Great location, close to shops, clubs, and restaurants. We would definitely come again.

L'appartement est très bien situé, sur le plateau du Mont-Royal, tout près des resto et des commerces.
Kenny était très prévenant et a tout fait pour que notre séjour se passe bien.
L'appartement est comme sur les photos, avec 3 belles chambres et une terrasse.
Nous recommandons vivement.

Very nice place with three proper bedrooms and a sofa, kitchen and living room. There were four of us and we were perfectly comfortable. In a great central location, easy walk or short drive from many Montreal destinations. Kenny was very accessible. Thank you!
It's my first time in Airbnb, overall it is a nice house!

Kenny's Airbnb was very spacious and unique. Everything was clean and the location (Plateau) was really good. Close to many bars and restaurants without the noise and crowds of the downtown core of Montreal (which can be reached by foot in 20 - 30 mins or easily via subway)

Check in / check out was convenient using a keycode. The apartment had a dishwasher, AC unit, a washer, and dryer. There's also a TV box with Netflix, a nice added touch.

Provided free parking in the back of the house was VERY helpful. Finding parking in Montreal can be a huge headache.

I would definitely stay here again!

Cute place that sleeps 3 singles comfortably (although we were only two). Loved the quirky decor. There was coffee, sugar cubes and a French press which was nice. No hair dryer though, so ladies - bring your own. :)

Très bien organisé
Rue cependant un peu bruyante
Very big space. The photos didn't do it justice. Has everything you need. Great location. Car space is a bit awkward.

Our experience with Kenny was wonderful.  Kenny was very quick to respond and helped us find an extra parking space for our U-Haul trailer which we had with us as we were moving our son into his apartment for the school year.  

The location is perfect, the apartment is large and I especially enjoyed sipping my coffee on the back balcony! Also, the free parking was fantastic for a small/regular sized vehicle. Parking may be too tight for a large SUV. The keyless entry was convenient, and the ac was welcome as it happened to be a hot and muggy couple of days.  Finally, we asked what we should do upon leaving and Kenny quickly wrote back "don't do a thing" and "good luck" to our son. It was a nice, personal touch.

It was great staying at the heart of Rue St Denis, just 2 blocks from the Metro. Having a parking space is an added bonus.  Airconditioning was great. Kenny was so thoughtful; she left bottles of water for us, which was a nice treat during the hot streak. The terrace was a nice treat. This is an awesome place for a family.

This property has a great location and unlike most in the area has a private (albeit small) parking spot in the rear alley. 
It has two terraces, one over busy St Denis, the other overlooks the backyard.
The parking spot is a bit hard to get in and out of. My full size car fit but I had to have my travel partner guide me when leaving the spot. 
Coffee and bottled water were on hand and a nice touch.
The Metro station is very close.
I think it would be tight getting 6 people to fit comfortably. One bed is pretty small, 5 would be more accurate.
The free WiFi was fast and reliable.
Host was very responsive with emails arranging how to access the apartment.

Great place to stay!  Very clean and was in a great convenient location near all the bars and restaurants and a metro station.  It was very quiet, so you don't hear anything from the outside.  I would definitely stay again and recommend it to future Montreal travelers!

We had a great experience for our first time  at an Airbnb.  We really enjoyed our stay, and the location was wonderful.  The rooms clean, and the place had a cozy feel to it.  We would definately repeat.
terrific place in Montreal.  great location.  clean and comfortable.

Kenny's apartment is a great place to stay in Montreal. Like others have said, it's in the heart of great neighborhood, Plateau Mont Royal, and right around the corner from a metro station. There are multiple great bars and restaurants (including a bistro called Cafe Cherrier and the famous L'Express) within just a few minutes' walk.

We were a group of four and the apartment fit us very comfortably. The rooms are spaced pretty far apart for privacy, which was an added bonus. The bathroom is large and the water pressure in the shower was excellent (it's a pet peeve of mine when pressure is low!).

Kenny was extremely responsive -- he answered a bunch of my emails before the trip and a couple I had while we were staying at the apartment, most of them nearly immediately. 

I would definitely stay here again!
Great
Kenny's Place was very clean, what we expected and she even let us come back when we forgot our trays the next day. We would definitely stay here again.
Foram dias maravilhosos. O apartamento é muito aconchegante, com uma vista espetacular e uma localização incrível. super recomendamos para quem quer descansar e curtir uma boa praia.

Excelente departamento en uno de los mejores condominios de Recreio. 
Ubicado literalmente frente a la playa. 
Apartamento cómodo, con un balcon precioso, amplio,  con vista increible y frontal al mar.  Equipado con muy buen gusto y detalles que lo destacan,  con todo lo necesario y más para tener una estadía muy placentera.
Los servicios del condominio excelentes, sobre todo el mantenimiento de la pileta.
Cercano a locales comerciales como minisupermercado, farmacia y otras tiendas.
El anfitrión super hospitalario, siempre en contacto y brindando  información. 
Super recomendable. 
Gracias Alexandre!!!!

Отличная квартира и отличные хозяева! Очень радушный и теплый прием! Рады, что не бронировали отель, а выбрали снять квартиру, так как атмосфера была домашняя и нам было весело провести все эти две недели с ребятами) Обязательно приедем ещё, и не один раз!  Скучаем по вам и ждем в Москве!!!

¡Hola! La verdad que el lugar es espectacular, estuvo por encima de todas las esperanzas. Además de estar situado el barrio y lugar muy grato, además de haber sido acogidos como en casa, fue cautivante alojarse ahí. ¡Nos ha encantado todo-todo mucho-mucho :-), muchísimas gracias! ¡El espíritu de España por el precio tan agradable!

Место на самом деле суперское, превзошло все ожидания. Оно не только располагается в приятном районе и хорошем месте, нас не только приняли, как своих, но и остановиться там было очарованием. Нам всё-всё-всё очень-очень-очень понравилось, большое спасибо! Дух Испании за такую приятную цену!
Very nice guy, thanks for your help
la casa è in una buona posizione,ordinata e pulita, Neiguel  è stato davvero fantastico e gentile. siamo rimasti soddisfatti e contenti di averlo contattato.
Neiguel was a great host. We had great time in Barcelona.
Neiguel and his flatmate are really easygoing people. The flat was nicely located near Camp Nou (only 2 blocks away!) and for the cheap price, we get what we paid. Recommended! Thanks Niguel! :)

Nos encantó nuestra estancia! Excelente relación precio calidad!

Nahuel, gracias por la buena onda y por recibirnos en tu departamento.
La pasamos muy bien y esperamos vernos de nuevo.

Abrazo
Pame y Salva

We enjoyed our stay,  it was super easy to communicate and Very nice apartment with such nice Guys to host us! Everything was perfect,  so close to the metro station,  and to almost  20 supermarket!  Thank you a lot! :)

L'appartement était bien et propre ! La chambre aussi et elle était juste assez grande. Les hôtes étaient gentils et nous avions du rangement dans la cuisine et dans le réfrigérateur pour nos trucs. l'ambiance était plaisante. Ils nous aidaient et nous conseillaient pour certaines choses là-bas et c'était apprecié!The apartment was nice and clean and the room was good. The hosts were nice and we had enough place to put our things in the kitchen and the fridge. We don't regret our choice for staying there! They help us when we had questions.

It was a good stay in Barcelona city. Comfortable room - that exactly on the picture you see. Perfect view from the window. Five minutes to famous Camp Nou. Thousands of necessary shops. Close to metro.  Two minutes and you have all you want. What more do you need? :)
Its impossible not to mention the host of that flat.Neiguel -  good, easy-going, communicative man. He is eager to help you in any situation. Explain the easiest way and give important marks of Barca. We were happy to stay at his place and suggest you to choose that flat - you will not be dissapointed. We will come back. And now its your time to visit Minsk!

Уже во второй раз остаюсь у Наеля, настолько у него все замечательно, тепло и уютно. Как человек он прекрасный, разнасторонни развитый! К тому же расположение дома очень удобное, рядом с метро, через дом стадион Барселоны Камп Ноу, во время матчей очень хорошая атмосфера создается!)
Un placer haber estado en casa de Nahuel, fue una estancia agradable y sin ningún problema. Si volvemos a Barcelona sin duda volveremos a su casa.

We stayed one week at Nahuel’s flat and he is a great host. We could use everything we liked in the kitchen and Nahuel always said: It’s all inclusive ;-) The other (Hidden by Airbnb) are also very friendly and help you whenever you have questions!

My stay at Nahuel's place was fantastic!  It was the 1st place I stayed in Barcelona, and I was deffinitely a bit overwhelmed when I arrived.  Nahuel, and Juaquin, couldn't have been nicer, or more hospitable!  Made me feel right at home immediately, shared stories, some wine, helped me translate some things;), always helped with directions, they just made their home feel like my home:)  So laid back, so genuinely nice.  It was a total pleasure staying there, I'd suggest them to Anyone!

This is a very nice place, near to the fc barcelona stadium. And not so far of the center. Nahuel is very pleasant person. He is welcoming and he had help us to find the better place to visit and more. Don't worry about language ! He speak spanish, english and... may be french in near future :) . We have take a nice trip to barcelona ! See you soon friend ! you can come to france when you want ! ;)

Jérôme & Marie from France

Здраствуйте. Были у Nahuel неделю,все очень понравилось. Квартира находится рядом с метро. Район очень спокойный, но когда играет ФК Барселона на улице творится праздник жизни)) ведь стадион всего лишь в двух кварталах от дома. По возможности посетим Nahuel еще.))

Hola. Fueron a Nahuel semana, todos mucho. El apartamento está situado al lado del metro. La zona es muy tranquila, pero cuando se juega en el FC Barcelona en la vida de la calle de irse de vacaciones)) debido a que el estadio está a sólo dos cuadras de la casa. Si es posible, visite Nahuel aún.))

Nahuel is a great host. The house is clean and tidy. The house is also really close by to Camp Nou, Barcelona FC Stadium. There is a supermarket and also a pizza shop just below the house. The metro is also really close by. Nahuel will tell you where are the tourist attractions in Barcelona. You will definitely enjoy your stay at Nahuel's house. I would recommend him to be your host at Barcelona.

Our trip in Barcelona was really short and fast but we enjoyed it alot :)
The flat looks exactly like in pictures, clean, colorful and with a nice view. It is close to the metro station and there are many shops nearby.
It is sad that we didn't have the chance to meet Nahuel, but we met his flatmate and he is really friendly and willing to help. 
We would definitely stay again. Thanks!
Well worth the money. It was exactly what we needed for the one night in Barcelona for a Champions League match.

Nahuel e Joaquin sono stati molto disponibili con me e la mia ragazza , ci hanno fatto sentire come a casa nostra , ideale per una coppia . il quartiere molto carino e non molto distante dal centro ,ben collegato ( stazione metro a 5 minuti). esperienza da ripetere , la prossima volta a barcellona già so chi contattare

My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!
Apartamento muy bien situado en el centro de Oporto. Excelente relación calidad-precio.

Cristina´s apartment is great, very well located. The apartment is even better than the photos, very new with excellent decoration, with lots of natural light. Cristina was waiting for us with his husband and children. They were so friendly.  She also left us some typical portuguese cakes. I strongly recommend Cristina´s place.

El apartamento está situado en pleno centro del casco histórico de Oporto. Cerca de la torre de los Clérigos. Lugar privilegiado. 
Dejamos el coche los 3 días aparcado en la misma calle y andando a todos los.sitios 
Las vistas desde varias ventanas estupendas 
Todo el apartamento equipado, cuidado, recogido. 
La única pega es que es un cuarto sin ascensor

Un bel appartement bien placé, cosy et fonctionnel à proximité de l'emblème de la ville - la tour des Clérigos.
Rénovation récente et décoration sympa.
Equipement adapté à une famille (nous étions 5 et n'avons pas manqué de couverts par exemple).
Petite épicerie à 2 pas, bien pratique. Restaurants au pied de l'immeuble.
Cristina aux petits soins pour nous.

Tout c'est bien passé , Cristina était disponible pour nous !
Appartement très beau , bien placé proche Metro sao Bento ... N'hésitez pas à y aller!

The apartment was exactly like the pictures show. It was clean and really lovely decorated. Cristina was very fast in her replies via email. The apartment is in a great location, you can walk everywhere.
Nice and well located appartment.was perfect with our three children.
A localização é excelente e o apartamento é super aconchegante e confortável. Cristina é uma excelente anfitriã. Sem dúvida recomendarei o apartamento para os meus amigos e familiares.

Très bon séjour à Porto.
Accueil chaleureux.
Appartement très propre, fraîchement refait et bien situé.
Un délicieux restaurant de cuisine traditionnelle juste à l'angle de la rue, à seulement 20 mètres.
Pour ceux qui ont le sommeil léger, rue bruyante le samedi soir.
Je recommande sans hésitation !

Bel accueil de la part de Cristina qui était là à notre arrivée pour nous aider à nous installer et à découvrir cette très jolie ville qu'est Porto ... merci beaucoup ...
l'appartement est merveilleusement bien situé, et très bien équipé, parfois un peu bruyant mais c'est sans doute le prix à payer vu sa situation en ville
le quatrième étage sans ascenseur complète bien les dénivelés importants lors des balades dans Porto !!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Christina. L'appartement est idéalement situé dans Porto, près de tout et de quartier sympas. Il est conforme aux images et à la description, lumineux, propre, et agréable. Christina et son mari nous ont très bien accueillis en dépit d'un petit raté sur l'horaire d'arrivée, on les remercie. Elle nous a offert tout ce qu'il fallait pour notre petit garçon: poussette, lit bébé, chaise haute, l'appartement est donc très bien équipé pour les enfants en bas âges (même si le notre à grandit vite entre la reservation et la venue, et n'a donc pas tout utilisé !).
Nous les remercions encore chaleureusement et conseillons ce pied à terre Porto.

Cristina's apartment was an oasis in the desert except the desert was the continuous rain in Porto. We were so grateful that there was space heaters so we'd be able to dry our clothes. 

The apartment location is exactly has advertised: close to everything. Another plus is the proximity of an underground parking garage (15€/day, ask the attendant for coupons). 

We were a family of 4 adults. We found the apartment very well equipped and very spacious. It was clean and everything was in good order. Showers were hot with plenty of pressure. There is a second WC and with 3 women in our group it's a bonus. 

Cristina was a joy to communicate with and she answered all of our questions very rapidly. She was waiting for us when we got there with a smile even though we were late getting there. 

We hope to return one day to Porto to experience it without the rain and we will be staying at Cristina's place again most certainly.

Thank you Cristina for welcoming us!

La gran ventaja del apartamento Lula II es su situación en pleno centro histórico. Es un apartamento luminoso acabado de reformar, las fotografías reflejan fielmente la realidad. Es un 4º piso sin ascensor, pero las escaleras se suben muy fácilmente y eso no fue ningún problema para nosotros. La entrega del piso fue cordial, un poco rápida porque nuestro avión llegó con más de 1 hora de retraso ...
 Es un apartamento muy práctico para pernoctar. 
Cristina contesta rápidamente a todas tus preguntas y cuestiones.
No horário marcado, fomos bem recebidos e tivemos ajuda para subir as escadas com as malas. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, organizado e bonito.

Accueillies à l'heure par le mari de Cristina, nous avons découvert un appartement tel qu'il était décrit : 2 chambres donnant sur la rue, une cuisine, un séjour.... Le tout avec une décoration actuelle ! Tout est propre, bien entretenu. Nous y avons bien dormi et étions ravies de retrouver "notre" appartement chaque fin de journée.
Le quartier est très sympa, à 2 pas de la Torre de los Clérigos et de nombreux petits restos traditionnels ! Nous vous conseillons le restaurant à tapas juste au pied de l'immeuble, en sortant à gauche.

The apartment was clean and comfortable. Housekeeping services were a great amenity providing fresh towels/sheets and cleaning weekly.Access to the trams and metro were nearby taking you to the beautiful sights all around Porto. We highly recommend this apartment!
Great location, the apartment was beyond adorable and spacious enough for 5-6 people.  Cristina was very friendly and welcoming and we had a fantastic time in Porto.
Everything went perfect, according to announcement. The apartment is very well located, very central but also quiet. Cristina is really really nice and easygoing. No complaints at all.
Muy amables y muchos detalles.
Very clean appartment, well located. Cristina is very welcoming and cares about all details to make her hosts feeling good ! I recommand this stay ! I hope to come back soon.

Dellasie was a very nice and gracious host. The room was huge, clean, and looked precisely as pictures. Her home was very conveniently located near transportation (train/bus/cabs), food... Anything you might need. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone coming to NYC!"

My stay in the house was perfect. The house was very clean, and comfortable. With so many space. I feel like in home. She was genial. The place was in the middle of Broklyn, so many local stores (food, clothing...) good located to the subway and bus station. I recommend this place to have a good time in NYC.
The space was comfortable, convenient, and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Dellasie was a great host, was friendly and kind, gave us our privacy when needed but was always up for a chat. The flat is very nice, the neighbourhood is nice and lively, it is located very close to transport links, and you can be in Manhattan in 40 mins. A great place for anybody visiting New York! We would definitely stay again

Dellasie is a very prompt, helpful and easy-going host. Everything was set very promptly and prepared for my stay. The underground is cca 3 minutes walk from the apartment. Good choice for a short NYC trip!
Very clean and comfortable space. Separated from the main apartment area by a thick curtain. The apartment is close to the subway and very easy to access by car.

Dellasie was very warm and friendly - I felt very welcome in her home. The room is right in the center of her apartment but she was careful to make me feel like the space was my own private room. The neighborhood is great and one of my favorites in Brooklyn. I felt happy wandering around on foot in the day and the subway station is very close by with useful links. And the bed is SO comfortable!

The bed is in a large space which is on the living room of the apartment. Privacy is provided by large black curtains. Dellasie was really friendly and stayed out of your way. The Kingston metro station is just a couple of blocks away. It was a good deal for a short stay.

I had a very good experience here Dellasie was a good host and very kind. The place was clean and it was nice and quiet but most of all its in the middle of all the best places to go so no where is too far. Thank you Dellasie I would definitely come back.

I loved staying at Dellasie's place! She was very friendly and so helpful with any questions I had to ask. The room was just as described. I was perfectly comfortable the entire time and I felt right at home! I spent one day being lazy in the apartment recovering from my rough travel day and she even brought me a bunch of movies to watch. Great host!
Dellasie was easy to contact. Answered all my questions and welcomed me when I arrived. No complaints. The place was spacious, clean, easily accessable with public transport.
Dellasie made me very welcome.   Convenient location.   Very secure.

I waited a couple of days to write this review, as I want to digest this experience and try to review it as objectively as I can. 

The guest before me needs to check out late so she contacted me the day before I can do the check in between 4PM to 6:30PM. I was enjoying my holiday, I guess I could as the place I stayed before is not far from hers. So I replied yes. Long story short, the following day I got stuck in the traffic and got locked out from the place I stayed before. 

I was late. 

Dellasie was not happy, even I apologized. She won't listen to me explain either, "don't argue!" That's what she said

I didn't see her much during the days I stayed. She did provide me privacy and a big bed. Thanks.

The kitchen sink was always full of dirty dishes, I was not cooking there, just not so pleasant. The neighbour was loud at night, I can hear the TV is on till 2am, but this is New York, which is ok.

Generally it is ok, liveable, have privacy, safe area, loads of good restaurants. The host could be more welcoming, which is kind of her job. Smile once doesn't hurt.

Dellasie was very welcoming when I came to stay at her place. It is a very spacious room, and Dellasie will give you all the privacy you need. The apartment is a bit far away if you look to spend most of your time in Manhattan, but it is easy to access by train. You should check out Dellasie's music, she is a very talented singer and musician!

Dellasie was a terrific host. She was quick to respond to every inquiry. She was enthusiastic and acommodating without being intrusive. Her place was easy to get to (by subway) from Manhattan. Large room, thoughtfully furnished.
Dellasie is a great host, and the space is good as described. The area was a little noisy at night, so if it summer bring your ear plug ;)

The place was easy to find. If you come by car though,  be prepared to look for parking, especially in the evening. The room is indeed very clean and spacious.  However the bed is a bit smaller than shown on the picture. The room is separated by a thick curtain. Don't worry, it will still give you total intimacy. There is a big leather couch and a large table full of magazines; I liked the attention to details.  Dellasie is a very sweet and funny hostess (she's also a great singer!). On the bed was a basket with clean towels and a bottle of water. I thought it was a nice gesture.  I didn't see her a lot but she does respond quickly to her emails. Overall,  it is a very convenient and  safe place. I would recommend this room for a single traveler.

Even though I arrived just before midnight, Dellasie was very welcoming and showed me around the apartment straight away. She made it clear that she was available for help but left me my privacy, which was much appreciated! Good location, only a few minutes to the subway and reasonably close to Manhattan downtown. Really enjoyed my stay here and would definitely recommend!

Dellasie is a wonderful host.
Very pleasant stay. Being an artist myself, it was a bit easy to connect with her and I enjoyed our conversation.
She is extremely accommodating as we arrived a bit late, also that we kept her well informed about our whereabouts and when we would arrive.
There was a bottle of water, fresh towels and a card showing the wifi password by the bed which I thought was a nice touch.
Though I disturbed her in the middle of night when I did not try the door right, after grabbing a pizza in the corner, she and her boyfriend did not mind at all. Good people!

Dellasie is very generous and the space is pretty great - there's a large black curtain that segments the living room so you have your own space. Dellasie leaves you a towel and clear instructions for the wifi etc, and there's a huge fan in place and a place to hang your clothing. The apartment is clean and spacious, though some may find the makeshift bed a little too small. The only bad thing to me was the awful heat!
Best AirBnb experience so far! No issues at all. Everything was fine.

We had a fabulous and comfortable stay at Grand Champions! The unit was accurately depicted (actually looked even better in person) with beautiful furnishings and equipped with all the essentials for added comfort and convenience! It is private and in an excellent location within the GC community. A beautiful gift basket was awaiting our arrival. Check-in is a breeze. The lanai faces an amazing garden with views of the mountain and a peek-a-boo view of the ocean. Kitchen is well stocked for cooking if you so choose. The master bath has an amazing walk-in shower. The pools are beautiful and the grilling areas are kept clean. Some very nice beaches nearby and a great central location to get around the entire island by car. Host Amanda represents the best of hospitality; friendly, responsive, and professional! Will definitely recommend and come back again.
Amanda was great! We loved the grand champions villas and was surprised by how close it was to everything.
Very nice condo with 2 full baths and walk in shower!  Gift basket on arrival was an unexpected nice touch.   The wall mirror makes the mail room look really big.   We will be back soon!
The hosts were very responsive.  Unit was very quiet.

Beautiful place very clean and more that we expect very convenient with beach chair umbrella and beach towels. 
We will comeback and stay in the unit #137 . Very close to everything and Amanda is a very nice host ! My friends really love it !
Overall a great place
G

Excellent location, close to shops and great beaches.  We had a minor cleaning issue when we arrived, but CBI was very responsive and addressed it promptly.  The unit was well equipped with furnishings that met our needs.  The pool access, parking, and check-in was seemless.  We enjoyed our stay.

Thank you to a wonderful host! The place was immaculate and beautiful decor nice island touches. The master shower is so spacious. Location was ideal close to shopping and beaches and easy to explore the island. Looking forward to our next vacation!! Mahalo!

This unit is at the ground floor and there is another unit above it. The area is very quiet. Very short drive to the shopping resort area and the beaches. Rental car is highly recommended.
The unit comes with a dishwasher, washer and dryer, and even a juice blender. There are two bedrooms and two shower rooms. The main walk-in shower room is very pleasant to use, especially with young kids. 
The management company is professional, always fast to respond and very supportive during our few weeks stay. 
We would definitely come back again!

This place was beautiful and so centrally located. We loved that everything was either a quick drive or in some cases walkable. If we ever get a chance to get back to Maui, we would want to stay here.

This house is wonderful! 
It is one of the best Airbnb experiences ever. 
Beautiful neighborhood, very nice apartment (big, elegant and comfortable) with everything you may need. 
Everything was perfect: car park, easy access, beautiful views, two fantastic bathrooms, garden and terrace, etc. 
Definitely top!

Leila's place is truly amazing. A very clean, well equiped and beautiful place for our stay on Maui. The view from the terrace was great. I would recommend friends to stay here and if ever be back in Maui, I would reach out to Leila again!

A truly piece of paradise. Lovely decorated and very clean.

We hope to happily return one day. :-)

Mahalo

Albert & Maya

Hi! Staying at Leila's condo in Lahaina was my first ever AirBnB stay! Leila was accessible. She responded to any questions I had very quickly. She was always helpful! Her condo was amazing! Very clean, just as described, and I loved the location! Woke up to so much sunlight! A great view of the ocean! Had breakfast on our patio everyday! There is a cool breeze that will make you never want to leave! As for drive, it was less than an hour from Kahului Airport and the drive to several beaches were less than 10 minutes, I would highly recommend staying at Leila's!! It was a great experience!!

Thanks again, Leila!

Can't speak highly enough of the house, great location.
House was immaculate, owners were helpful and got in touch with us to make sure all was ok. 
Great value for money and would highly recommend!
Beautiful lovely house! We really enjoyed our stay and believe it is perfect for everyone looking for a beautiful quite place on the west side of maui.
Beautiful contemporary place with everything you would need and the location was great being a short walk from Kapalua bay (swimming snorkeling) and many great restaurants and a grocery store.

The views from the bedroom
And great room are wonderful - hard to leave!   The location is perfect for us because we think Kapaluna is the best at
Area of Maui

Leila was an excellent host. We had a delayed flight and did not arrive to the condo until 1:30am. Easy to find. Easy to access. Excellent amenities. Beautiful view! Quiet. 
Very responsive to any questions. 
Location is awesome! Walking distance to beaches, restaurants, etc. or easy & FREE shuttle (5-10 minute wait) in the Kapalua area.
We are looking forward to working with her again in the near future.

We stayed here on our first trip to Maui and we couldn't have had asked for a better place to vacation. From the spacious living areas to the modern decor, Leila's condo is located in a prime spot with spectacular views of the Pacific Ccean. After staying at her place, I wanted to highlight 4 great things about our experience: 

1) Resort amenities- there is a complimentary shuttle that can take you between the Ritz Carlton and Montage resorts from your villa, along with other places in the Kapalua resort. This is great, especially for trying the top rated restaurants at the resorts without having to pay for parking...plus you can have a glass (or bottle) of wine and let someone else worry about the driving :) Or you can walk!

2) Accessibility- Whether you are looking to take in a nice stroll along the beach or play a round of golf, her villa is nestled right in the heart of the Kapalua Resort. Even in the rain, you can enjoy the nice pool with a covered eating area! And I need to mention that the views from her condo are breath-taking, so if you fancy a night in, hers is the place to do it!

3) Her Condo- I've stayed at hotels and resorts before, but I have to say that her villa exceeds anything you can find at a high end resorts. The wi-fi was strong and fast - able to be used among multiple devices. And the entire space was so clean! We had the security of knowing that the crew didn't just do a once over and be done, but actually took the time to make sure that it was ready and prepped for us, as if no one had stayed there before us. I'm a stickler for very nice bedrooms and beds, and hers was not only comfortable, but also offered me a great night's rest after a day of beach, beach and more beach :)

4) Leila & Dan - They have been a gracious host, allowing us to stay at their condo. They were quick to respond, always providing us with best in class service, and were able to provide some great recommendations on activities and events to do on the island. 

I want to thank you for taking the time to read my review. Our experience staying at Leila and Dan's condo was great, and we truly enjoyed the time we spent on Maui. I cannot thank them enjoy for allowing us this great and special opportunity, and for giving us a chance to experience this beautiful island in a way that like no other. For this we are very grateful! 

We wish you all the best in booking your stays through AirBnb and hope you have the opportunity to stay at Leila and Dan's condo... we hope to as well very soon! 

Mahalo!
Great location, clean and comfortable place. Leila was a responsive, helpful and kind host!

Excellent place to stay, modern with an incredible view from the bedroom. Perfect place to stay for our mini honeymoon. It really felt like a home and we look forward to watching the place grow and change with each trip to Maui.
This house and location was truly amazing and the views breath-taking!  The neighborhood was quiet and close to everything we needed!
Really good place to live in. Love it, great view! Quite clean close to beach! Def stay there if I have the chance again!

The place was perfect for us, we went to wholefoods and got our supplies for the week. Was able to do our own cooking and relax at the beach everyday. Not alot of food choice around the area for breakfast/lunch so recommend doing own shop.

Very classy place!  Check in was a breeze and since we didn't have to meet up with our host to get the keys, we were able to arrive quite late.  The "instant book" was also really nice.  This house is on a beautiful golf course in a quiet and scenic neighborhood.  We were able to watch giant crashing waves and humpback whales from the porch.  Just lovely.
Fantastic place!

Beautiful location! The view was great and the community was so quiet and convenient. Room is well stocked and comfortable. Very clean and the host was very easy to talk to and responsive. There are no beach chairs or cooler to use FYI. We hope to be back to Maui soon! Definitely would stay here again.

Leila's place was quiet, secluded, and in a beautiful neighborhood on a golf course. The house had an incredible view from both the living room and the bedroom, and while there was an air conditioner, it wasn't needed due to the lovely breeze. The house is walking distance from a small beach, and is a quick drive to the Honolua General Store which has coffee, pastries, sandwiches and hot food, toiletries, towels, sunblock... pretty much everything. 

The house comes equipped with travel size shampoo, body wash, hair conditioner, and bar soap. It also has a small hair dryer.

There are beach umbrellas and chairs in the backyard ready to be taken to the beach.

The wind gusts can get a little loud at times, I think because of how the house is situated on the hill. The bed was a little bit lumpy, but mostly soft and comfortable. The house renovations are gorgeous and look brand new, and there's a huge second bathroom with a great bathtub not pictured in the photos! Very clean, bright, and lovely. As other reviewers said, the photos do *not* do this house justice.

Overall, it was a wonderful place to stay. Thank you!
A+
Great communication as well as an superb property and location!

When we where at the entrance from Puamana we already had a good feeling. When we where entering to the place from Elise the Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow we felt like at home. The place is even better as shown on the picture. It is very clean and tastefully furnished. The kitchen has everything you need to cook. And all the bedrooms are very nice. You got even surfboards or bikes to use. We had every morning our breakfast on the porch which was always a very nice start into the day. From the house you will get in approx. 30“ to the ocean where you can enjoy every day the moast romantic sunsets. Its just fantastic. Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow is located close to Lahaina where you also find a lot of nice restaurants and grocery stores. And from Puamana you also can do realy nice daytrips like going snorkeling or do the road to Hana, to Wailea Makena or you go to Haleakala where you have a nice few on 10000 Feet over Maui (if the weather is nice) And if you just feel like relaxing than the ocean pool from Puamana is the perfect place just to calm down an enjoy the beauty of the pacific. Right in front of the club house are two surf spots where my son and daughter went surfing every morning. We just can highly recomand this beautiful place and we are still overwhelmed. Thank you so much Elise for having us. You have been always so nice and flexible and did respond very quick to our e-mails and answers. We had a realy great time and we will miss this quiet and romatic place. We just love Maui and all the other Hawaiian Islands. 
Mahalo for everything. 

Lajos and Family

This was my first time using Airbnb and it was perfect!   The bungalow is very comfortable, in a beautiful setting and within walking distance (one mile) of shops and restaurants.  Elise had everything available for us and we felt right at home.  If we ever return to Maui, we would love to stay here again.   Thank you Elise!!!

We spent a week and a half at the Ocean Breeze Bungalow in Lahaina and it was absolutely perfect. The house was well appointed, extremely clean and  Puamana is centrally located to everything Maui has to offer. We had everything we needed to feel right at home. The complex is within walking distance of Lahaina. And a 30 minute drive to everything else. You really can't find a better place on Maui.
Elise was an ideal host and we had great communication from her and her onsite manager. 
One note - If you are looking for more of a party scene or a place to get a little wild this is probably not a great choice....if you want a sweet peaceful place that's not a pretentious resort, this is for you.
Lovely Place and quiet community

Elise was fantastic - quick and responsive to all communication.  She sent a very detailed e-mail with all the necessary check-in information. Her place was exactly as described and the photos were accurate.  It was, neat, clean, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen had everything necessary to cook and prepare meals. The neighborhood was awesome - clean and safe.  It was an easy walk into town and located close to many of the activities we had planned.

Fantastic location with many amenities and easy walk to all the shops, restaurants and activities that Lahaina has to offer. Limited sand on the beach at location (December), but plenty of activities for the whole family to enjoy. Elise is a pleasure to work with; outstanding communication and information shared!

This is a wonderful property, private, and walkable to the town of Lahaina. Good for family or couples getaway. Elise was readily available for any questions we had! We loved hanging out on the back porch in the beautiful Maui weather!

Great location! Just a nice walk down Front street brings you to the heart of Lahaina. A beautiful Airbnb steps away from the ocean and in a very nicely maintained community.

Elise is very very responsive. The guests before us left the place in a mild disarray breaking various items but she let me know as soon as she found out and attempted to fix what she could in one day. She sent us a lovely basket of Maui-an goods to make up for the honestly very minor inconveniences, which was a very nice gesture. Check-in instructions very clear and easy.

The house has a lovely back deck, while although not entirely private as you can see the other neighboring decks, was a nice place to enjoy some meals.  She offers many of the essentials such as a SUP, snorkels, watershoes, boogie boards and a outdoor shower, which made going out to explore the beaches hassle free. The rooms are nicely appointed and we really had everything we needed. Could not have asked for a better place to stay.

Great location and very comfortable.  Comes with everything you need for a beach vacation including boogie boards, paddle/surf boards...  we watched the sunset every day from the pool/clubhouse area.  Elise was wonderful and very responsive.  Mahalo for a wonderful vacation!!!

Puamana is the best place to stay in Maui. Elise's place is also the best place in Puamana. It had everything we needed to relax, swim, eat and play. Thank you for sharing an incredible place with us!

We had a great time. Elise's is a nice place with everything you need for a fun trip to Hawaii, including kitchen equipment, beach toys, surfing and body surfing boards, and beach lounge equipment. There was one minor mistake in the listing but Elise promptly corrected it when it was brought to her attention and made amends for the confusion. Everything else was as described and made for a wonderful trip to Maui! Thanks for sharing your place with us!

I would definitely recommend Elise's condo to anyone staying in the Lahaina area. It is even nicer than the pictures suggest and we were very comfortable during our stay. Elise thought of anything and everything you could possibly need - from making a home-cooked meal to spending a day on the beach. Also, the community of Puamana is beautiful! Do not miss the ocean front pool - it's spectacular.
Don't hesitate to book here - it's a great value and you'll love every minute of your stay!

Elise's place in Lahaina was perfect for the couple days we visited. The home is in a great location off front street, close to multiple restaurants and shopping opportunities. She has a lot of beach equipment that comes with the house. We used the snorkel equipment, SUP, and surfboard. All equipment is in good condition and beach access is everywhere you look. A really great place for a quick beach vacation. Wouldn't hesitate to go back.

Puamana and specifically Elise's lovely townhome were perfect for our family of four's vacation in Maui. We had everything we needed, most importantly an absolutely beautiful and serene central location.

Check-In was easy and the property was just as described. The property is located within a mile walk of downtown Lahaina. Wonderful selection of restaurants and the nightlife is second to none. Elise responded immediately when we needed new batteries for one of the remotes and had an issue with operating one of the ceiling fans. Her on-site handyman Rick responded within minutes to assist us. The property met all our needs and I can highly recommend the property for a comfortable stay.

We had a great stay at Elise's place. The unit was comfortable for four guests. We loved the back patio area and having the charcoal grill was really nice. There was no beach access for us as the sand was covered by rocks however, this was stated in the description that beach access can vary depending on the time of year. The grounds were neat and clean and the views of the ocean are surreal. Elise was very responsive to any messages or texts. The check in process was easy and all the information was accurately provided by Elise. We had a great stay at Puamana and loved exploring Lahaina ( several shops and restaurants are close by). We would love to come back some day.
Incredible property.  Fast communications.  All the little touches (Hulu, grill, beach gear, charcoal, etc) were awesome!

This place his just amazing. Loved the private surfbreak! Very close to downtown lahaina. Elise was very accomodating for our schedule and responded very quickly. I don't have much more to say than our vacation at Elise's place was amazing!!
This was such a nice home to stay in. We had a fabulous time. The house had everything we needed for a fantastic holiday.

Gwen was a fantastic host. She was very accommodating of our late arrival and very early departure. The apartment was exactly as we imagined with a lot of natural light, sleek "beachy" decor and only a 5 min walk to the beach, everything you need for a perfect weekend away. I would definitely stay with Gwen again.
Great location, lovely helpful hosts.

Gwen is very sweet! met with her briefly and she gave me good tips. The flat was cozy and clean, 5 mins walk to the beach and amazing restaurants: I loved BrownSugar right in front of their place. Staying here depends on what you are doing in Bondi. If it's to party and enjoy the nearby festivities until the wee hours of the night then this is perfect for you. I have to say that this place was a little too loud for my taste. Loud music from neighbors late at night and the busy street wasn't all that fun for an early sleeper like myself dealing with jet lag but it's out of Gwen's control so I just put my earplugs in and hoped for the best. Other than that, their place is perfectly located in safe area, and very close to the beach. Like I said it all depends on what you want out of your stay!
Great location, very close to the beach. Gwen and Jim were very helpful.
Great

Best location, the apartment was lovely and super close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Would recommend  Gwen's apartment to anyone and everyone that's wanting to go somewhere funky and fun! Gwen was super helpful with places to go, things to do and with questions and communication was great. Thanks Gwen for the best weekend!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gwen and Jim's.  Both were great communicators and made our 11pm arrival a breeze!
Good little place in an amazing location, only very short walk to the water.  Thanks for having us!

House is really close to bondi beach to walk! And many restaurants are near to house;-) 
Host is also kind! She explained about nice places to visit!

Gwen and Jim went out of their way to provide me with information on the apartment and neighborhood. They were fast to reply to communication and did everything they could to make sure my stay was comfortable. 
The location is out of this world. Close to good restaurants and bars and a 5 minute walk to the stunning Bondi Beach. 
The apartment is easy to access and comfortable. I would definitely stay here next time I am in Bondi.

Gwen provided great information regarding the apartment and also the surrounding shops and cafes. 10/10 

Was also contactable 24/7 as described. :)
This property is next to a busy road with a landing walkway the other side. Very hot with no a/c or fan. A very basic apartment with a wooden create as a coffee table!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location, and very easy to deal with. 
Thanks.
Beautiful location. Lovely unique apartment. Highly recommended
Great location close to Bondi, perfect for us and our puppy. The hosts were wonderful.
Great location right in the middle of Bondi. Gwen was so helpful and made the whole process really easy. 100% would recommend.

This apartment was absolutely perfect for a holiday in Sydney. It's a fantastic location-right in the heart of Bondi, 5 minutes away from the beach. Gwen was extremely communicative, and left us some great tips for things to see and do in the area.  I wish we could have stayed longer!
Gwennaelle was very helpful in providing lots of recommendations, house was clean and in a great location

This place was adorable.  I️t was perfectly located and has everything you could want.  The outside balcony was really nice to wake up to and read.  I couldn’t have asked for a better experience!!  The hosts were also very responsive at all times, which was key.
Lovely clean apartment opposite the best nightlife in bondi walking distance to everything and great balcony
Irene is a lovely and very helpfully host with a very nice place, tidy and clean. Recommended!
It was a great stay in Irene's place! The apartment is clean and cozy, located within walking distance from a train station as well as bus station. Both Irene and John are very helpful and welcoming.
Lovely apartment great location Irene was very friendly definitely would recommend
Perfect place to stay a couple of days to visit Sydney ! Irene is an amazing host !
Very clean and comfortable house. Location is  very close to city . The house lady is good to us when we stay there. Lovely Sydney.
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Clean , Spacious and comfortable room.
Very close to staion and up and comming REDFERN CAFES .
Great communication and flxible peerson .

Freat host and Room
The reservation was canceled 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely & very neat apartment with a really comfortable bed & that's really conveniently located. We loved the close proximity to Redfern Station & small shops nearby. Irene was very friendly & hospitable to us & responded promptly to any questions we had prior to our arrival. Highly recommended host!
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

NICE to meet Irene&Glenn! I had a good time in their home.They provided all that we need, the location for their apartment is convenient for us, room and bathroom are both clean. I had a great trip with my friends in Sydney.
Very friendly and helpful couple, also the place is great and looks like the pictures. Would recommend it for people with smaller luggage though because the room is on the 2nd floor

Irene and Glenn were the perfect hosts, period. Their home was perfect, they made us feel welcome every step of the way and even for NYE standards, our stay was absolutely worth the money. Definitely recommend to other guests! Thank you!

This was a great listing and an amazing place to stay. Sofia's place is clean, well decorated and just the right amount of space for 2-4 people. The space felt cozy and we loved it. We were only a bit disappointed that we found out at the last minute that there was no AC (as listed) but Sofia was very understanding and compensated us based on our experience. 

Sofia herself is a great host who is very attentive right from the first moment we wanted the place. She kept in touch by email and text and even checked in with us daily. The instructions she left were clear and she was available to help when we needed anything. The neighbourhood was nice and quiet as well. 

I would definitely stay at this listing again!

Sofia's place was exactly as advertised. It was really clean and her directions were very clear. Sofia kept in contact with us to make sure everything was ok. Her restaurant recommendations were good as well. I would definitely stay at Sofia's place again. I really liked her condo and the neighborhood. The building was very quiet and we enjoyed staying there. 

Thanks again for everything Sofia!
The apartment is great, clean, modern, easy to find, and with all the amenities we needed

We had a beautiful stay. The pictures represent the apartment perfectly. Sofia is a sweetheart and was a pleasure to deal with. The apartment is conveniently located near the highway & the metro. Will definitely try to stay here next time we're in town!
Un logement parfait. Très propre et très  tranquille. On se  sent comme chez soi. On retournera, si les dates sont disponibles. Le contact avec Sofia a été facile.

Place was exactly as advertised. Just outside downtown Montreal and a quick drive into the heart of it. Owner was more than helpful, was available to answer any questions we had for the entirety of our trip. Would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for somewhere close to downtown without paying downtown prices.
Good

Honestly, this is one of the best airbnb experiences I've had so far! Sofia's place is really close to public transit, and she lives in a nice quiet neighbourhood. Although I didn't get to meet her, she made sure everything was ready and easy for us. Check-in was a breeze. I'd definitely try to stay here again whenever I plan another trip to montreal!
Tres beau sejour

Clean place, good owner. :)
Spacious apartment.

Sofia has a cozy apartment in a quiet place in Montreal. It is perfect to relax, and it is very easy to go downtown or other places from there. the kitchen is complete, the washing and drying machines are very modern and efficient. We had a wonderful time in Montreal, and hope to get back soon!

My mom and I loved staying at Sofia's place during our trip to Montreal. Her place was clean, quiet, and well equipped for a very comfortable stay. Parking behind the building was so convenient. My mom had to work from home for a couple of days, and the living room made a great home office as well. Definite recommend for a peaceful retreat in Montreal that's still reasonably close to downtown.

Die im obersten Geschoss gelegene Unterkunft hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Sie war mit allen Annehmlichkeiten einschließlich einer Vielzahl von Lebensmitteln ausgestattet. Parkmöglichkeit besteht hinter dem Haus. Die Wohnung ist über ein Treppenhaus erreichbar. Für den ersten und letzten Zugang muss die Außentreppe benutzt werden. Zur nächsten Metrostation sind es 7-8 Minuten (Preis für Hin- und Rückfahrt 6 Dollar pro Person).

I had an amazing experience, Sofia directions was very clear and precise. 

Thank you

We had a great stay at Sofia's place! Photos are accurate. One private parking spot behind the apartment was very convenient.  It's one the third floor with no elevate, which was no problem for us. 

There is no air conditioning, but in the middle of June with the window cracked open and the fan on, it wasn't a real issue.

It's about a 10 minute walk to the subway, depending how fast you walk. We took the subway every day and  got very used to the walk. There aren't many things to do in the area, but with the subway so close, it didn't really matter to us.

At first glance, the neighborhood appeared a little sketchy and run-down, but we never had an issue. It's a very quiet neighborhood with quiet residents who seem to keep to themselves. And the interior of the apartment is very welcoming and well furnished.

All in all, we had a great time and would stay again! Montreal is a beautiful, relaxed city and I recommend it!

Sofia's place is money worth for it's value. Although it's not located in a very good neighbourhood but this is the place where close to downtown and easy access to any where. Sofia is a good host, she prepare her place like a home for family traveler and give very clear instruction and everything are accurate.

Appartement très bien situé, proche d'un metro et cartier tranquille. Sofia était facilement a rejoindre en cas de probleme. Le condo était impeccable, très beau séjour, je le recommande sans hésiter!
Great location, close to downtown and the Metro.  Nice quiet neighbourhood and the unit is as described.  Great value when visiting Montreal.
Great two bedroom place close to the metro with off street parking.  Easy check in/out.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
O ap é muito bom, recomendo a todos, conversei pelo whats o tempo todo com o anfitrião e nao tive nenhum problema, obrigado por tudo

Excelente comunicação com o anfitrião e sua esposa, bem como, a recepção no Barra Leme Hotel Residence, o qual possui piscina aquecida, hidromassagem, serviço de praia sem custo, academia, salão de jogos, cabeleireiros(custo adicional) e o melhor lugar da praia da Barra (entre o Posto e Posto 2). Local seguro e agradável, com preço muito justo. Parabéns aos anfitriões e obrigado.

Lucy is a great host. She is so helpful and responds quickly.
Her place is compact with all amenities which I needed. 6-8 minutes to the underground and plenty of good local restaurants around .
Condition of the washroom needed to be improved.

Really nice room with good location. Both the host and roommate are friendly and eager to help. I love the dim sum restaurant Felip recommended which is near by the apt. I love the food in HK so much that I plan to visit again. :) Btw, be careful of the mosquitos in HK when U visits in the summer time.
Nice place. Close to the down town. Would stay again :)

Hola a todos! Hemos pasado una semana en casa de luis y su compañero de piso, Camilo. Ambos muy simpáticos, receptivos y nos han ayudado con todo siempre. La casa está cerca del metro Kenedy Town, del tranvía y de numerosos autobuses que pasan por allí. La zona tiene muchos sitios para comer y supermercados. 
La habitación es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, pequeña pero con un colchón cómodo y aire acondicionado. El baño, completo y hemos utilizado incluso la lavadora y la cocina, nos hemos sentido en casa. Gracias chicos! 
Pilar

因为是去探访朋友和欣赏风景所以交通便利对我来说很重要 罗湖口岸出关之后地铁和巴士都很便利,从地铁站出来大概需要步行三分钟就可以到达,期间需要经过长长的台阶,拿着行李可能会劳累一些,房子很好找位于三楼,房东会很详细的安排与介绍,并留下钥匙,浴室很清洁,屋内虽小但五脏俱全,房东还贴心地准备了两个转换插头｡居住的五天确实温馨舒适,如果下次来香港的话我觉得我还是会选择住在这里｡要注意的是房间内两个屋子一个给旅客使用另一个是房东住,有时可能会带gf回来,介意的谨慎选择｡

Great location. Right next to the backside of Victoria Peak so if you're looking for nature you've found it. Very quiet and serene surroundings. Luis is very detailed in how to get here, just follow the instructions he sends you. 
Also right next to the Kennedy-Town MTR stop. Luis is a great guy, very friendly and outgoing and we very much appreciated his hospitality. Hope to stay with him again soon! Thanks!
Close to HKU and Kenndy Town. Nice roommate. Host is quite helpful.

Simply the best for its price among the dozen Airbnb offers in HK I have tried so far. 

The location: very close to MTR station; 7/11 store just down the street (free wifi), a couple of great local restaurants (one offers an awesome 2-person dinner for only 120 HKD, with free wifi), easy access to banks and supermarkets, all within 5-10 minutes walking distance. 

The room: very quiet, clean bedroom and air conditioner (I'm amazed there is no smell at all), comfy living room with kitchen, washing machine (you need that during summer time), and a refrigerator. And you could even find a copy of Animal Farm on the shelf, LOL. This really is what airbnb should offer in the first place, not some small and smelly hostel rooms without a window.

The host: quick response, easy communication, friendly permanent roommate. 

To summarize: awesome place, would definitely come back and also recommend to friends.



在香港住过不下十家的Airbnb平价旅店里,Felipe是我目前的最佳选择｡地点便利,步行五至十分钟可达坚尼地城地铁站｡楼下就有7/11便利店(有免费wifi),数家粉面店､茶餐厅(120闷二人晚餐好超值),Watson､百佳､惠康超市｡Felipe的房间安静､干净,空调无味｡起居室有沙发很舒适,附带厨房､洗衣机､冰箱｡书架上还有动物农场和其他一些书,不知可不可以拿来看｡｡｡与房主沟通很好,回复很快｡永久室友(真*房东)也很友善｡总之,远远好过无窗劏房小旅馆｡强烈推荐｡

Following the instruction that the host send me in advance, I have no difficulty finding the place. What a lovely and cozy home! I really enjoy my trip here. Thanks a lot!
看到中文评价很少,所以我用中文详细介绍一下哈*^_^*这里离坚尼地城地铁站和机场巴士站都很近,步行五分钟左右｡周围社区很安静,晚上可以休息得很好｡屋主细心的准备了液体蚊香,不用担心被蚊子咬｡关键是周围很多好吃的!攻略上有的太兴茶餐厅､新兴食家､源记甜品､德记潮州菜等等都在附近啊,吃得特别开心!推荐大家来啊,屋主很贴心很热情很友善,特别特别温暖!再次感谢!
Was a nice place to stay. In a fairly quiet section of Hong Kong, very easy to get to off the train and airport bus. About 15 minutes to Causeway Bay.

This Airbnb is what this site all about. You get a proper feel for living amongst the locals. The flat was well laid out with everything you need and the instructions from the host were super clear. 

The neighborhood is really friendly, on a rainy day we even got to borrow an umbrella from the downstairs neighbors (using sign language as we don't speak Cantonese) and the food in the area is sublime. Definitely go to the dim sum place they recommend!!! Our best meal while in HK.
Great location, just minutes walk from Kennedy Town MTR, yet located in a peaceful neighborhood away from the main road. Small but well equipped home.
Overall, it is a pleasant stay. Comfy bed and cozy room. Clean bathroom and easily accessible from Kennedy station. Great to rest up and continue  travelling around hk. :)

Charming, nice, and personal apartment in a cozy area.
A cozy place for two people with a small suitcase is perfect as there are many stairs and the room is small. 
And thank you for all your help Connie :)

We stayed 10 days, 9 nights and had a comfortable stay. The bedroom is small and we left our 2 backpacks outside of the room. We took advantage of the facilities provided and had breakfast in the kitchen and did our laundry.  The neighbourhood is lovely and gave a real local feel with cheap restaurants and a large supermarket across the street. Transport connections are excellent. We took the tram, bus, ferry and train after purchasing an octopus card all around HK. The hosts provide detailed instructions when checking in yourself and are always available to answer questions. This worked for us perfectly as we arrived very late in the evening.  If you want to get a local feel of HK with good hosts, this is the place.

The codo is very nice, beautiful and spacious. Two bedrooms, which both stayed a decent temperature at night. Also has 2 AC units. Pretty cool balcony. I enjoyed staying on the balcony on my laptop and watching the sunshine or the rain falling. Washer/dryer were nice to have. Anke was extremely responsive to my calls, and even brought over garbage bags when we ran out. I also enjoyed the pool. The condo is within walking distance of a beach, which is nice.

Anke, 
Your place was wonderful for our family. The kids used the pool every day, my parents participated at the ukulele jam session at Keolahou Church, and my wife and I loved running by the beach.  Thank you again for making our stay memorable. 
Aloha, 
jason

We absolutely loved the place! It has everything you might need during your stay. Close to the beach and a short driving distance (~10 minutes) to a number of good restaurants. Anke was super nice and helpful. I highly recommend this place for staying in Maui.
Everything was great!

This condo is amazing and perfect for a one week plus stay. It's very spacious and, with the two AC units plus the ceiling fans, can stay cool despite the hot weather. It's right across the street from the beach and kitty corner to 2 parks. It's also really close to a lot of good eats! It has a full kitchen and comes with cooking utensils which allowed us to cook and prep meals for extended days out (i.e.  Road to Hana). To our surprise, the condo came equipped with beach chairs and a boogie board which we took full advantage of.  It also comes with in-unit laundry and dryer as well as soap and dryer sheets! The resort is very quiet and the people who live there are respectful of quiet hours. You get to meet fellow travelers and residents in the pool / jacuzzi area which is also a plus. All in all, we enjoyed our stay. Just don't forget to bring your own soap and shampoo!
Everything was as described! A very beautiful and clean condo directly at the beach in Kihei. Anke was also very responsive and helpful, would love to come back any time!

Anke communicated very well with me prior to arriving.  She sent me documents that gave me clear directions to the condo.  Once I arrived I noticed that I did not need anything as everything I could possibly need was at my finger tips.  I will definitely stay at this condo again.   Thank you Anke.

Our stay at Kihei Resort was wonderful. The place was perfect for the 4 of us. The place was spacious, clean, comfortable, quiet and well located. The condo had many amenities such as the community pool and free guest parking and was situated 5-15 mins drive from many eateries and stores. The beach is walking distance away across the street and Wailea is only about a 10-15 drive away as well. Anke was a great host giving us all the necessary information we would need as well as checking up on us via message during our stay to make sure all was fine. Definitely recommend this place for travelers! In the heart of Kihei and close to the airport and other attractions.

This is a beautiful place by a beautiful beach with great amenities, like hot tub and swimming pool. You probably don't need them though. Just walking across the street, you can snorkel in waist deep blue water, where I saw five turtles and a lot of fish. It is very safe for kids or people don't swim. 

The place provides enough towels so you don't need to pack them. Washer and dryer is conveniently located in the unit - not those coin operating ones. 

Anke is very nice too. We got a box of chocolate as gift when we arrived :)

Everything was exactly as described and we were made to feel welcome immediately with a nice little care package and local tour guide notebook!

The Kihei resort is amazing and very private and low key and relaxing.  The spa and pool area is great at the end of a long day of adventures.

I would recommend Anke and her property to anyone!
Anke was very helpful and the apartment was everything you'd expect and more. We had a great time I would highly recommend this place to others.

This place has beautiful gardens and a nice pool and hot tub in a quiet community. We really enjoyed our stay and it was a very short drive to the south or north to get to great beaches. You can easily walk to the beach as well if you don't mind using the shoulder. We did a good amount of cooking and had everything we needed.

Pros :
Close to the beaches
Quiet
Beautiful garden
Having own Washer and dryer
Beach toys, umbrella, small surf board, beach towels, beach chairs provided

Cons :
Kids under 14 years are not allowed in the hot tub (The policy we received before we got to the condo didn't mention anything about kids not allowed to use the hottub)
The sink and bathtub drains don't work very well
Old and dated property 
Restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops are in driving distance (you can only walk to the beaches and one Korean restaurant that I wouldn't recommend anyone to go. 
Poor quality kitchen equipment  (if you try to cut or cook anything, it will be challenging)
I broke $40 blender and I got charged for $80.73 for it so don't break anything :) 

This place is ok but not if you have young children. It's more suitable for people without children, retired people. 
Oh, they also don't recycle or compost so if you have any environmental consciousness, it is probably not suitable for you.

Beautiful condo in a gorgeous development full of well manicured gardens.  The view over the tropical garden and overlooking the pool is lovely.  The condo was super clean and quite huge.  Everything you could possible need and perfect for a group of 4!  Very smooth check in and communication process.  Thank you Anke for everything!
A great location and nice and spacious condo. We loved our stay here, and Anke was very quick to help us with anything we had questions about!

Anke's Condo was amazing! A beautiful two bedroom, walking distance to the water, and came with every amenity possible. Unfortunately, our flight was canceled so we did not arrive until the next day and our travel was extended. We were very nervous, because we thought we would have to arrange an extra night stay else where, but luckily Anke was very understanding and allowed another night. We could not thank her enough for her time and help. I would highly recommend Anke and her condo to anyone and everyone.

This property has it pros and cons.

Pros:
Anke was very responsive and nice.
The place is nice and clean.
The condo is right above the pool which was nice.
People there was very nice.

Cons:
It's a older property which was fine but the condo was old as well.
AC units are on the top floor and middle floor but not in the middle bedroom. Which got hot in the room but it was humid when we stayed at.
There was no sideway outside the resort which was not safe to walk outside.
There were some bikers staying there as well which was loud sometime because of the bike.
