If you to want walk around in Kihei then I would recommend another place near the kamaole beach 1-3.

Overall, it was a ok stay for us but my kids loved the place because they had the upstairs to themselves. Lol

The condo is beautiful and well-furnished.  All appliances worked.  The supplies were more than adequate and easily found.  The host was always available via telephone and answered all questions clearly and quickly.  Would book again tomorrow if I could!

Anke's place is awesome, just as advertised. Mellow, low key and quiet. More over its beautiful and close to everything you'd need. Inside the complex it's like a little tropical village with plenty of greenery and birds gently chirping in the trees. Pool, hot tub, BBQ area,etc, etc. If you never left the complex you'd still have a great vacation! Outside the resort everything you need is close: supermarket, coffee shops, gas station. Great location to access roads for any point you'd want to go. Two thumbs up & 5 stars !!! I want to stay here again.
Thanks Anke.
We enjoyed our stay.

Il nostro soggiorno è stato molto bello, lei è stata molto disponibile. L'appartamento era molto pulito e in una posizione abbastanza centrale (a una quindicina di minuti dalla rambla a piedi). Ottimo!

Ottima posizione e in una zona tranquilla e sicura. Molto vicino alla metro e a tante attrazioni turistiche che si possono raggiungere facilmente a piedi (massimo 25 minuti). Ho davvero apprezzato la pulizia degli spazi! Ottimo in tutto!
Zona tranquila. Muy bien comunicada. Nos movimos caminando a todos lados.

Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.

Bundeena is beautiful. The perfect spot for an easy weekend away from the constant noise of the city. And Belinda and Chris' Garden cottage is a fantastic place to spend time. Stones throw from the beach and beautiful coastal walks, but completely private in a little garden oasis. Birds everywhere. The cottage is fitted out beautifully, with thoughtfulness and great taste. We would love to return. And next time we're hoping for better luck spotting whales!

Bundeena and Royal National Park is a wonderful getaway from Sydney. Belinda and Chris' garden studio is separate from the house. Staying there was perfect -  It was cosy and inviting, well-equipped and had everything we needed. The porch overlooking the garden was peaceful while having a morning coffee, birds chirping... We walked along Jibbon's Beach the first day, and then to Marley Beach the second day - sighting migrating whales along the way! Very ideal for exploring Royal National Park, and a short walking distance from the ferry. Belinda was a wonderful host, friendly and available whenever needed. Thanks for having us!

Belinda and Chris are lovely people and very welcoming hosts. They were friendly, prompt in their communications, and provided us with a warm, quiet and cosy space for a winter getaway. Their studio is private, very well decked out, and closely situated to the beaches and bushwalks in Bundeena. Thanks for the wonderful weekend away :)

Belinda was vibrant and welcoming. The studio is lovely, private and decked out with everything you need for a cosy weekend away - there was even a fire pit which Belinda generously allowed us to use. The location is gorgeous, Bundeena is so relaxing, I didn't want to leave!

The Bundeena garden studio was a delight to stay at. Beautifully renovated, it is light and spacious. It has a very comfy bed in a peaceful environment. A lovely place to wake up to. 
Belinda is lovely and friendly and made the stay easy and comfortable.
An easy place to holiday and one we will be recommending to our Bundeena-bound friends!
I look forward to returning one day soon.

We loved our stay at Bundeena! Belinda's cottage was beautifully presented with quality comforts, privacy and has all the amenities you could need; perfect for a couple's getaway. The location is ideal just a short stroll to the beautiful beaches, bushwalking and dining. We fell in love with the area and look forward to returning there many times. Thank you for having us, we had a wonderful weekend!

Hi All, for those wanting a hideaway with the options of city experience if needed, then a cosy bungalow in Bundeena is a must. It was a lovely warm space with the fresh air or Bundeena and modern facilities. The kitchenette and bathroom were easy to use and made my life so easy. With private access it leaves you free to enjoy the environs on your own terms. The beach is a stones through away. I would love to have stayed longer. It is a quiet refreshing space in which to contemplate. A ferry ride to Cronulla is available if one needs to re-quaint once self with urban life, with the addition of train to CBD if needed. I highly recommend for those who have the time to relax and enjoy. Cheers, Brendan.

We've stayed at a few AirBNB places now and this has been the best so far. Everything was as promised and more. The cabin is a renovated artist's studio at the back of the garden, secluded and private behind trees. Belinda, the host, was lovely and welcoming and gave us some advice for how to best take advantage of the natural surrounds and events that were on in town.

The amenities were clean and exactly like the photos. We were impressed with the host's taste in DVDs and books provided for our use. 

We caught the ferry to Cronulla for the day ($12.60 return for an adult, must have cash to pay on the boat - a bit steep but worth it) and had a wonderful time enjoying the spring fair.

All in all, the host's made our stay extremely comfortable and gave us the privacy we needed to fully enjoy our stay.

Thank you Belinda and Chris!

Hi Belinda, I'd like to thank you allowing us to stay in your beautiful studio. It had all the necessities and was in an amazing location near the beach. Just perfect for our little weekend away! Your artwork is very fascinating as well, I will get in touch with you about those shortly :) thanks again and hopefully we will come back again in the future!

We had a fantastic weekend staying at Belinda's studio. The location is perfect, a short stroll to the beaches, bushwalks and the local shops. Ideal setting in the back of her garden and all the privacy you could want! We wouldn't hesitate to come back again!

We had a fantastic stay. The property is lovely, has everything you need. It was very clean and tidy. Very close to the beach, great walks. Incredibly peaceful. We liked it so much we stayed an extra night. 

Belinda was accommodating and a pleasure to rent from.  

I would recommend it to any friend.

My husband and I just had a perfect weekend in Bundeena.  This garden studio is everything it claims to be - Belinda has very thoughtfully set up this private sanctuary for 2 - it is very charming.   We will definitely come back.
We had a very pleasant short stay in Bundeena.  The accommodation was clean, comfortable and close to the beach and village amenities.  We would happily come back, but next time stay for longer.

We had such a fantastic weekend at Belinda’s gorgeous studio. Its just as lovely as in the photos – clean and beautiful and bright and airy and everything there that you could possibly need (even salt and pepper and pasta and tuna…AND scented candles). The place had a lovely vibe and even the bed and the pillows were comfy – and we have a Tempur at home so I’m very picky with beds!  Oh and the artwork is awesome!

The garden is lovely too and it’s a short walk to the end of the street to the beach and the national park. The beach is GORGEOUS!! Crystal clear, calm water and pretty seashells. Its also nice and protected so you don’t get blown away or sandblasted which happens on some other beaches.  Just past the beach is a path to the national park, which is so pretty. There were lots of birds and trees and beautiful giant rocks and some Aboriginal carvings. 

It bucketed rain most of the weekend we were there but we still had a lovely weekend. We’ve already booked our return visit for next month. :-) Thanks Belinda!

This apartment is a lovely place to stay, it's comfortable, clean and has everything you need for a stay in Bundeena, or even if you want to visit Sydney but don't just want to see city life! We would definitely recommend staying here and would love to stay again when we're back in the Sydney area.

We stayed in Belinda's garden studio for three days last week, and found it to be exactly as advertised. Very private and comfortable.  The location is really good, being so close to the beach. Overall the experience was very pleasant indeed and reasonably priced.  Lee

Belinda was great to deal with - she was organised, communicated well and best of all provided a perfect retreat! Her granny flat/studio has plenty of space, love and comfort and is perfectly positioned within walking distance to all the attractions!

We were very pleased with our accommodation and hosts Belinda and Chris. They have accessed what their guests needs may be then thoughtfully provided  everything down to an umbrella I noticed on the verandah. Everything was clean and fresh no tired old cast offs of any kind. We would recommend this BnB highly.

You can't really beat Belinda's place in terms of location and experience. I had a friend visiting from overseas and we had a lovely time in this little laid back beach town. Belinda's place is a cute little place where you can hear the birds sing in the morning and the waves crashing on the shores as you sleep. 

Just lovely and I couldn't be more happy to recommend it to anyone looking to get out of Sydney for a few days!

Hôte très sympathique.
Appartement avec une vue magnifique.
Séjour agréable.

DEFINITIVAMENTE LA EXPERIENCIA HA SIDO AGRADABLE Y FANTÁSTICA EN PORTUGAL, EN CUANTO A SU ATENCIÓN DE NUESTRO ANFITRIÓN A SIDO 100% ATENTO. NOS FACILITO MUCHA INFORMACION SOBRE LOS PUNTOS MAS TURISTICOS .
SIEMPRE ESTUVO PENDIENTE DE NOSOTROS DURANTE NUESTRA ESTANCIA EN PORTUGAL, NO NOS HIZO FALTA NADA.
TIENE LA MEJOR COMUNICACIÓN DE TRANSPORTES EN AUTOBÚS AL CENTRO.
SU CASA TIENE LAS MEJORES VISTAS AL MAR TAL Y COMO SE VEN EN LAS FOTOS, PERSONALMENTE ME FASCINO... SI OS ENCANTA LA PLAYA OS RECOMIENDO QUE RESERVEN CON JOAO!!
MUITO OBRIGADO POR HACER AGRADABLE NUESTRA ESTANCIA Y FACILITARNOS TODO, E MUITA SORTE JOAO !!

Soggiorno fantastico! Siamo arrivati verso le 7 di sera con un ritardo di 3 ore rispetto all'ora stabilita e Joao si è messo a disposizione venendo a prenderci alla stazione e portandoci direttamente al suo appartamento. L'appartamento era pulitissimo e dotato di tutti i comfort, in più Joao ci ha fatto trovare già molto cibo all'interno dell'appartamento e ci ha descritto tutti i posti da visitare migliori spiegandoci anche tutti i mezzi di trasporto da utilizzare.
L'appartamento è a dir poco spettacolare con una bellissima vista sull'oceano.
Dalla posizione di Joao possiamo raggiungere in 20 minuti il centro di porto in bus ed in più subito sotto casa sua c'è un ristorante sushi che è buonissimo e di ottima qualità più moltissimi altri ottimi ristoranti e bar dove fare un buon aperitivo.
Joao è una persona disponibile e ad ogni evenienza ti risponde subito dandoti una mano.
Per finire in bellezza, l'ultimo giorno ci ha anche offerto il taxi per andare all'aereoporto.
La sua ospitalità ha superato in ogni modo le nostre aspettative. 
Esperienza assolutamente consigliata e da ripetere!
Un saluto e un grazie a Joao dall'Italia.

It was amazing from the moment we walked in. João was an amazing host and the apartment was an absolute delight. The views from the balcony were just gorgeous. The apartment had everything that was needed and more. It was a slice of paradise. Really enjoyed our time their and look forward to going there again in the future. I would highly recommend it to anyone. A pure delight.

João is an excellent Host in true Portuguese tradition. The house in modern and adapted for everyones requirements. I had spent some time with my Grandparents at his house and even though they are nearing 80, accessibility was as easy as home. Complemented by his service was the well thought out location and layout of the house. Stunning beach views and a stones throw away from relaxation in the sun.

Apartamento cômodo e acolhedor, vista maravilhosa, anfitrião simpatico...
Experiência a repetir...
Obrigado

A very nice stay in Porto and in Joao's flat. The apartment was very big, clean and à lot of utilities and equipments. Moreover, the view on océan is fantastic and Joao gave us a lot of advices and useful tips. Thanks a lot again and à nice place to go
We loved our stay at Joao's beach house! He is an awesome host. So helpful. And it is an amazing spot. Hopefully we will be back some day soon!

Perfect hosting and view to die for.
It's a modern 5th floor apartment looking out to the port and end of the beach. Lots of ships coming and going to view.
Joao makes every effort to make hosts comfortable and is very available for enquiries. We felt we were treated royally. 
The apartment is well equipped for self catering and a well stocked larder.  Joao made some very good local restaurant (many in close proximity ) recommendations too. Major Supermarket other end of beach so handy to have bikes as transport. 
Everything made available from washing machine to bedding. Massive walk in wardrobe. Hot water reliable. 
His knowledge of Porto and provision of maps and information including travel cards was very helpful. There is a bus stop very close which takes you into the city in about 40 minutes for only €1.85. Matosinhos is a 20 minute walk away where you can pick up Metro, visit a market or eat at the many fish restaurants (fresh from fish market adjacent).
We made good use of the bikes and this saved us time and expense also.
We took the brilliant cycle way (no hills!) along the coast for about 20 km (Vila do Conde and beyond). Beaches and cafes all the way so a great escape for the day.
Unfortunate the lift not always working but we survived and our fitness improved. 
Probably true of all apartments of any height, you do get some road noise and barking/ howling from local dogs.
Happy to return to what became home away from home for nearly 2 weeks.
Thankyou Joao for making it possible.

Joao is a great host! He met with us at the apartment and help us bring the luggage up. There was food for us to use at our arrival so we did not have to run at the convenient store right away. Everything is just as explained, very clean and modern. We walk on the beach and used the bikes to go to Porto! We loved our stay!

Picked us up from the airport, and took us for a little tour round. Dropped us at the shopping center and picked us up an hour later. A very sweet and talkative man, very quick to offer help and quick at replying to our questions. Apartment was very clean and spacious. Very modern with a large television.

Das Apartment war sehr schön und der Ausblick war fantastisch. Es befinden sich viele kleine Restaurants in der Nähe und ein Supermarkt welche gut zu Fuß zu erreichen sind. Ansonsten stehen zwei super praktische Fahrräder zur Verfügung mit denen man den Fisch & Obstmarkt besuchen kann. Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen. Es wurde keine Mühe gescheut. Sogar vom Flughafen abgeholt und hingebracht wurden wir... Alles im allen waren wir sehr zufrieden und können es nur empfehlen!!!!

Unser Aufenthalt in dem Apartment war super! Joao ist ein sehr bemühter Gastgeber, der einem den Aufenthalt sehr erleichtert und bei jeder Frage oder Bitte bereitsteht. Das Apartment war sehr sauber und der direkte Blick auf den Strand ein Traum.

Difficile de faire mieux quant à la précision des descriptions et réponses à nos questions avant notre arrivée. Sur place, Joao s'est montré d'un accueil et d'une précision catégorie 5 étoiles, nous proposant même le transfert depuis l'aéroport . La vue depuis l'appartement, situé à l'abord d'un quartier ancien et calme, est juste splendide, et même si c'est éloigné du centre de Porto, les transports en commun (pas chers) au pied du logement permettent d'être à la fois au calme, presque les pieds dans l'eau, et en même temps de faire facilement du tourisme. L'appartement lui-même est moderne et confortable, à 3 personnes nous avons passé un séjour au delà de nos espérances. A recommander !
Excelente!!

João's place is a great place to stay.  I feel lucky to have found it. It is right on the ocean overlooking a wonderful beach with good waves for surfing. 

I am really happy I stayed here. The pollution from the cars in downtown Porto is intense. João's place has clean air. 

There is a nice bike path that goes to the downtown and João has two bikes for guest use. 

There is a large fish market a few blocks away that also has vegi's. There is a wonderful sushi bar downstairs from the apartment. 

João's place is well situated, with easy access without traffic. This is a huge plus! The downtown can get gridlock. 

João is a friendly, helpful host. 

I hope you enjoy your stay. 

Brad
João is a very great guest. He does all his best for the guest to feel comfortable. Warm and welcoming. He makes everything easy.
The flat is fantastic! Great location, not close to the city but right next to the sea and with nice restaurants, coffee shops and bars around! We spent an amazing new year eve!
Joao was the perfect host I could not ask for anything more. He was helpful, informative and honest.  This is the one air bnb place I truly would like to come back and stay at.  Thank you.

Joao is very kind and open-minded guy. He met us at the airport and made a little city tour. His apartment is very nice and clean with amazing view of the ocean. The bus stop is near the house. It was really beautiful holidays. thank U so much
The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The house is really near to the main sightseeings of istanbul old city, with a nice terrace. The hosts are confortable and polite. I had really good time and was glad choosing Kamuran's flat.

Kamuran is very kind host. She gave us full information and support us all the way from airport to the end of our trip. Apartment looks smaller than on photo but it's very clean and light. Looks like new shower installed in the room.  Absolutely unbelievable  view from terrace: one side is Blue Mosque, another is seaside. This apartment lefts only positive emotion for us. Just 2 min walk and you are in the heart of the Old sity. Very suitable for peoples who first time in Istanbul. 
P.S. Be ready for morning praying  in the Blue  Mosque )

Nice and simple room. Good central location in Sultanahmad. Just a short walk to the blue mosque and Hajia Sofia through a nice bazar. The rooms facing the street side are a bit noisy from the street traffic, so if you want a quite room, get the ones facing the garden. There is a washer and a small kitchen upstairs that you can use, and it connects to a terrace. Kamuran welcomed us when we got there and showed us our room. She's usually in the travel agency office downstairs so you can reach her easily if you need anything and get some recommendations on what to do or where to go. Word of advice, don't use their airport transfer car because it's more expensive then just getting a taxi from the airport (taxis run about 50 TL to Sultanahmed and their car transfer is 20$ which is about 72 TL ). We also had to wait 30 minutes outside the airport for the driver to pick us up.

Все было круто, расположение отличное, единственное что полотенца за 3 дня ни разу не поменяли и дверь тонкая, что если кто то ночью ходил- я просыпался. А так за эти деньги просто супер, уютно было очень, все очень чисто, в ванной все выбелено было. Женщина очень приятная, разрешила багаж оставить у нее, пока мы полдня гуляли по городу. Спасибо ей огромное!)
Molt correcte! Hem estat molt cómodes. I el servici per part dels anfitrions ha estat mol amable. Habitació recomanable 100%

We booked this room for 5 days because we wanted to split our visit to Istanbul between the Sultanahmet area and the Taksim area. But as soon as we got here, we knew that this is where we wanna be and so extended our stay. The emplacement of this place is just PERFECT. We have walked all over from here, the metro stop is also close. There is a small kitchen and laundry place on the roof, which was great. Also the view is beautiful. ONE small inconvenience would be the morning noises from the street, but that didn't keep us from having a great stay here. I recommend it, and would certainly stay here again if I ever visit Istanbul again!

We had an amazing time at one of the rooms rented by Kamuran , when we saw the place for the first time we were surprise by the view on the blue mosque and the sea from the roof terrace ,we were having our breakfasts here and enjoying a beer/ wine in the night. The room was very clean we had everything ,even a shower gels and hairdryer, iron,washing machine,we could stuck over food in the fridge that was very useful. During our stay it was very hot in Istanbul so air-conditioning was a life saviour. For all the questions we had about where to go and how to get we got the most detailed explanation,me and my boyfriend couldn't imagine best host then that. All the problems you might possibly have with the room will be solved in a blink of an eye! Location was more then just great, Sultanahmet is the best district to have all the points of interest around you, Hagia Sofia 10min,Blue mosque 7 min ,tram station 8min,lots of place to eat around, only be weary Turkish people(sellers/restaurants) cheat the whole time ,don't order a beer in the restaurant without asking the price ,don't pick up a brush from the shoe cleaning man when he dropped it,in Istanbul is a lot of scam is going on!

Location is just awesome, it's really 2 min walk to Blue Mosque. Many shops, cafes, markets are nearby, which is so much convenient. Approximately 7-10 min walk to tram stop, also so cool. And it's a magnificent atmosphere there. We already miss this place. Host are so nice people, which will be glad to help you with everything. The view from the top is amazing. The room is small, but very clean and cozy. There are candles in rooms which make chill and warm atmosphere. Highly recommend to my friends and will definitely cone back again!
Great location. Easy to walk to many areas of Istanbul

Es war einfach richtig schön und vor allem richtig sauber!! 
Ich würde immer wieder dahin gehen. 
Auch in der Straße, die Menschen sind sehr Freundlich und man wird immer begrüßt wenn man aus dem Haus geht.
Wir hatten alles in der Nähe und konnten auch zu der Bahn in dem wir nur 3 minuten gelaufen sind.

It‘s location is very good, nice view, near to shops and restaurants and Sultanahmet (with a great view of this beautiful mosque). It’s rooftop is great! We loved it. Ardal, the man in the small café downstairs was really nice and kind and trying to help. 
It could be a great place to stay only if it becomes a bit cleaner. The walls need painting and a small repair, and the linens need to be changed!

All in all AMAZING!!
Super nice people welcoming you! Super central, but still quite. Super view. Super service. Just great. I recommend this place to everybody!

La vista de la habitación es espectacular!... y la ubicación es cercana a la estación del metro. 
la estacia fue bastante buena

It was amazing week in great accommodation - clean, cozy, great view from rooftop and very convenient location in the center of Istanbul. We had a great Blue Mosque view from window and it was fantastic and authentic experience.

Lovely lovely stay @ Kamurans!!! The place was clean and well stocked with necessities (everything exactly like in photos).
Istanbul was amazing but I think staying here made it all that much better. Great location, safe, exciting.  Everything was perfect.
The terrace is amazing, I will never forget the view.
这个离清真寺很近,出行特别方便,开始我开始是靠马路的房间,有点吵,跟房东说了,房东很贴心的帮我换了,我行李很沉,帮我提上提下,真的很感谢
Thanks you for everything, it was a perfect week end in Istanbul!
Clean and very nice hospitable hosts
Great place to stay!
This was an amazing stay. Clean, comfortable, and very close to Hagia Sophia and Blue mosque. Perfect!

Fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Ana Lucia made us feel right at home with fresh fruit and snacks! The apt is blocks away from the beach, near tons of great food (Go to Amir and Galeto Sats, thank me later) and plenty of places to hang out with locals (Bip Bip). Highly recommend staying here for your visit to Copacabana.
Ana Lucia foi muito prestativa, nos recebeu super bem, apartamento bem equipado e bem localizado, próximo a praia, transporte público, restaurantes...superou todas as nossas expectativas!!
Ana Lúcia foi super atenciosa, rápida nas respostas e flexível com meus horários de check-in e check-out. O apartamento é ótimo e super bem localizado!
muito bom
Ana Lúcia nos atendeu muito bem e tirou todas as dúvidas da estadia, além de nos orientar em algumas questões. Parabéns pelo ótimo atendimento!
Adorei!
Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado e em ótima localização

Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado, limpo, confortável. Localização perfeita, muitos comércios na redondeza, perto da praia.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pela anfitriã que foi bem flexível com o horário de checkin.

The appartment is great! We visited with 3 people and really loved the appartment. At arrival we where received very friendly. Communication was quick and easy with Tugba. Beşiktaş is nice neighborhood with lots of small shops and cafes.
Tugba was an amazing host, very cheerful and warm. We felt at home in her flat that has a great location, close to nice cafés and restaurants. Thanks a lot.
It was a great stay, and Tugba is a wonderful host. Thank you!
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Tugba's place was great and as described.  It's a small, but very nice and comfortable one bedroom in a great location.  Though it says Besiktas in the listing, this place is central Tesvikiye/Nisantisi and the walk to anything you'd need is extremely short.

The apartment is really cozy and exactly as described and shown in the pictures. There are a lot of nice bars, restaurants and cafes in the area - walking distance from the apartment. We got a very warm welcome with fruits and drinks and recommendations. Would come back!

Nisantasi, Istanbul'da ulasim acisindan cok avantajli bir yer. Tugba'nin evi de Nisantasi icerisinde cok avantajli bir yerde. Bircok aktivite ve ilgi cekici yere yurume mesafesinde. Taksi ile ulasim cok kolay. Asansor ve klima olmamasi biraz caninizi sikabilir ancak bu bilgi zaten onceden veriliyor.
Thank you! I like this apartment so much!

Great people! Very hospitable and helpful! We had a great experience at her place! The place is very clean and very beautiful! It exactly the same as in the photos. It is in a very nice area to. I highly recommend this place! Tugba is a great host! Thank you Tugba!
Tugba hanima tesekkur ederim.

This place is one of the most comfortable and well-provisioned apartments that I have ever had the pleasure of staying in through AirBnb. All the amenities that you would hope for are available and the location is wonderful! As a host, Tugba was quick to respond to our questions and flexible with our check-in time. My girlfriend and I chose this place in advance specifically because we liked the kitchen very much and we planned on cooking during our stay. We were definitely not disappointed! This location and price are a real bargain!

Just a stone’s throw from one of Istanbul’s hippest neighborhoods, this is a very stylish flat with a nice open kitchen. Only drawback is that it’s on a steep hill- but then again most of Istanbul is! Definitely a great place for people planning on spending a lot of time in Nişantaşı ör Beşiktaş.
Tuğba harika bir ev sahibi. Ev çok temiz ve kullanışlı. Çok merkezi bir lokasyona sahip. İhtiyacınız olabilecek her şey evde mevcut. İhtiyacınız olabilecek her zaman ulaşabiliyorsunuz kendisine.

Evin yeri gerçekten çok harika. 4 dk az eğimli yokuş çıkınca nişantaşı, 6-7 dk dimdik merdivenli yokuş inince beşiktaş çarşının içinde buluyorsunuz kendinizi. Ev son derece temiz, derli toplu ve iyi dizayn edilmişti. En önemlisi bi evde ihtiyacınız olabilecek her sey vardı, çamaşır deterjanı, yumusatıcı, kurutmalık, baharatlar, yağlar, sert/yumusak yastık.. Tuğba Hanım ise son derece cana yakındı. Çok yardımcı oldu demek isterdim ama her sey o kadar yerindeydi ki yardımcı olucağı hiç bir durumla karşılaşmadık. Konum-temizlik-ev sahibi her şey dört dörtlüktü. Fiyat-performans açısından çok memnun kaldık açıkçası. Konumu sebebiyle ulaşıma da cok para harcamadık. Teşekkürler

There's so many nice things I have to say about this apartment, and Tugba as a host! Location wise, this apartment is absolutely perfect its on what seems like the border of Nisantasi and Besiktas. Nisantasi is fabulous - lots of high end designer fashion stores, and Besiktas has endless lovely restaurants and cafes. The apartment is also a short walk to the Besiktas ferry, which has wonderful views on the Bosphorus to other great districts in Istanbul. The apartment was sparkling clean and had so much style which I can imagine comes from Tugba's great sense of style as a designer. It also next door to a small convenient store that keeps late hours, and around the corner from a big supermarket. As a host Tugba was very understanding and responsive and pleasant. I would absolutely love to return to this place, and I am going to encourage my friends to stay here when they are in Istanbul! Fabulous time here!

Tugba, was a great host and the place was very comfy, cozy and neat. I stayed there with my brother for the first week and the 2nd week with two friends after  my brother left. We all enjoyed the place very much. It was very well equipped. Thanks to Tugba and Ali for their nice place, help and advices.

Super comfortable apartment, with all the facilities. It is located in an excellent area. 
Tugba is very kind and she is willing to help you in whatever you need. 
I highly recommend this place for a stay in Istanbul!

Evin yeri gercekten cok guzel, hem toplu tasima bakimindan hem de Nisantasi’nda olmasi sebebiyle kalmaya elverisli bir ev. Ayni zamanda evin dekorasyonu oldukca guzel ve evin ici oldukca bakimli, fotograflarda gorunmeyen giyinme odasi ise cok ise yariyor.

A very nice flat in a great location.   I particularly appreciated the very comfortable bed and the selection of pillows, including an orthopedic pillow, as I have back and neck pain problems.  The shower is excellent, which was also a big plus for me.  I would have liked to have air-conditioning, as it was very hot when I was in Istanbul.  There is a mobile ventilator which helps a lot, but sometimes it is not enough.  You have to be aware that there is no lift, so you will need to go up two flights of stairs which might be a problem for those who have trouble carrying heavy luggage. Tugba is very kind and attentive and is very quick in responding to any queries.   Recommended!

Tugba’s place is strategically located between Besiktas and Nisantasi both of them are very nice neighbourhoods. The apartment is spacious and has everything you need even for a long-term stay. There are plenty of eateries, cafes and bars nearby too as well as supermarkets that are open till late.
Tugba is very nice, she met me in person while my flight had 2 hrs of delay and I literally arrived 1 am. Very pleasant stay, highly recommended.

Ev fotoğraflarda gördüğümüz gibiydi. Yatak odasında ki yatak ve yastıklar rahat değildi. Temizlik olarakta eksikleri vardı. Bina otoparkı kullanılabilir yazıyordu, fakat otoparkın dışarıdan kullanılamayacağını söyledi. Onun dışında kalınabilecek bir yer.

Thank u!
For sure will be there again :)
Irmac is a great host. Very nice and pleasant and always responsive.
Mark is very helpful n friendly! The location of the accommodation is perfect, close to Soho n central. Not to mention the tram station is just opposite the building n the mtr is nearby!
Really cozy and awesome apartment on a really convenient and authentic location. Easy check-in/check-out with no keys required -> really handy. And my favorite coffee shop now is just 2 mins away :)
Very nice service, welcoming environment, communicative owner.
本次和太太旅行對這個小公寓很滿意,環境舒適,交通便利,門口就有港鐵和叮叮車｡Mark的服務很周到｡唯一的遺憾就是電視無法觀看,可能是遙控器問題｡

I had a very good time at Mark’s studio . The flat is very well located in Hong Kong . Only two subway station to Central . There is also the tram line to discover the island . The area is quiet if you compare to busiest area in HK . It is also a good mix of Chinese culture (restaurants,shops) and trendy western venues ( good eateries,bars). Mark is a great host always answering any request or question I had . Overall a great experience in this city and a great stay .
Quemeneur Philippe
Enjoyed staying at Mark's place. Amazing host!
Very good!
Mark's studio is modern. It is very close to MTR, tram and bus stops. There are lots of nice restaurants and bars close by. He also is good at sending information

When you're not used to Hong Kong, this place is of course small for a relatively high price, but in HK this is not at all unusual. The quality of the place is very high - it is nicely designed, in a great location, well taken care of, and I found it quite comfortable. I loved the feeling of being in the middle of Hong Kong when you step out of the door and the fact that it is a modern apartment but in an older building means that it is comfortable, yet feels very local. The size is really small, but the way the space is used is very clever.

There are multiple units and not all of them seem to have windows. Mine did, with a nice view of opposite flats and Des Voeux Rd.

I would definitely recommend this place.

The flat is really lovely as seen in pictures. It's new, clean and well located, close to the centre, shops and restaurants. We had a great time staying there. Tomas was very nice and incredibly helpful introducing the main attractions in town. He made sure we had everything we needed, welcoming us with complementary tea and biscuits. He was a wonderful host and genuinely cares about the property and people renting it out.  I recommend this place!
Tomás no pudo estar presente el día de la entrega de las llaves, pero una amiga suya quedó con nosotros para darnoslas, así que todo perfecto, nuestra estancia fue corta pero muy buena.

It was an amazing stay at Tomas's. Really beautiful apartment, right in the middle of the centre. Communication 1A!
Will def. come back-
Nous avons été très bien accueilli à Porto, l'appartement se situe au 3 ème étage. Si vous aimez le réveil des mouettes c'est idéal. Rien à redire hormis le petit problème de colonisation de fourmis.

Clean, attractive remodel, comfortable sleep accommodations for at least five people. Tastefully decorated, fun and funky. Great location, near top sites and restaurants, cafes. Tomas was very responsive and accommodating; he forwarded a helpful info guide, and in the flat had an even more helpful book full of suggestions and commentary on local restaurants and sites. The part of town can be noisy - especially the seagulls! - and lots of sound leakage from other flats, so earplugs may be helpful at night. Though that's true of most central city accommodations.

Tomas ha sido un magnífico anfitrión. Disfrutamos de unos días excepcionales en su apartamento. Tuvimos una estancia de gran calidad. El apartamento perfectamente situado, cerca de la zona nocturna. Las camas muy cómodas. Sin duda para repetir.
The apartment in Porto was great. Really new and clean. Great bathroom. Nice living space. And a greta area close to the shops the night life and the sights.

Appartement très bien situé, propre, au dernier étage. Les mouettes sont bruyantes ! Nous n'avons pas vu Tomás à notre arrivée mais la clef était à disposition et tout était bien indiqué. Attention si vous venez en voiture : trouver une place en fin de journée et dans un endroit non payant.
Very friendly!

Tomas was extremely helpful and professional throughout the process. He emailed instructions with the best way to get to the apartment well in advance, and there was a detailed guide book waiting for us when we arrived that included restaurants, attractions, and maps.

The apartment itself was very clean and fairly well-appointed. A wine opener would have been nice to have, but we successfully cooked fajitas for dinner without any issues, and the location is very convenient to all the sites in the old city.

The apartment can be noisy in the evenings depending on other residents/guests. Also, there is no A/C (which is not necessary in Porto), but the area can be loud overnight with the windows open.

Espaço fantástico, super bem localizado. Limpeza na perfeição, mobiliário e decoração simples mas de muito bom gosto. A localização é perfeita, perto das principais atracções e ideal para ir com a família. Tem restaurantes muito bom mesmo por baixo do prédio. O Tomás mostrou-se sempre disponível e correu tudo na (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza numa próxima ida ao Porto será o meu espaço de eleição.
The apartment corresponds perfectly to the announcement. It is functional, comfortable and placed well. Do not hesitate!

Una estancia maravillosa. El apartamento impoluto, perfecto para ir en familia y en una zona céntrica. Tomás nos ayudó en todo y nos dejó información turística y de transporte muy útil. Muy recomendable.

J'ai apprécié le message d'accueil, l'ardoise avec mon prénom sur la porte d'entrée. Bonne indications préalables par mail pour récupérer les clefs. Appartement très propre , bonne isolation phonique. Bien situé dans le quartier historique et proche du métro ce qui est très pratique lorsque l'on arrive de l'aéroport. On peut tout faire à pied. Très bon séjour.

Un grand merci à Tomás pour son accueil et sa disponibilité ainsi que tous ses conseils bien utiles. L'appartement est idéalement situé en plein centre ville. Parfaitement fonctionnel et propre, je le recommande vivement
Tomas was extremely welcoming and helpful with everything we needed. The apartment has an amazing location, however it is fairly small.

Tomas' apartment is quite cute. Equipped kitchen, fridge, big table for dinners, etc.
Rooms are big as well and double beds are comfortable. Single bed is not so comfortable, probably it's expected to be used by a baby or little boys.

Very well located, you can reach any point of interest in max 20 minutes walking (have a good breakfast, Porto' slopes are exhausting!)
A very nice flat located in the heart of a great city. WiFi was a little slow at times but it didn't matter as the rest of the flat (and specially location) made up for it.
L'hote a été super disponible, réactif et nous a fournis toutes les précisions nécessaires pour un excellent séjour et visite

Fui con unos amigos y la verdad que nos sorprendio mucho la ubicacion y el trato de el hacia nosotros. Como teniamos que hacer checking a las 15h nos dejo dejar antes las maletas en su oficina. Seguro que cuando volvamos a Oporto repetiremos. 100% recomendable.

L'hôte fut très acceuillant et nous a montré les lieux et monuments que nous pouvions visiter ! Les bons restaurants également ! 
L'appartement était trés propre
Le rapport qualité-prix est très avantageux ! 
Seul bémol : apparatement assez bruyant la nuit
Mais je le recommande fortement !

La casa cumple todas las expectativas y fue entregada impecable!. Excelente host, muy atento y con un amplio repertorio de recomendaciones de lugares para visitar y comer, sin duda alguna me quedaría otra vez!

Thank you so much for everything. An amazing place and good communication. Bruno was always there and answer all the questions quickly. The apartment is in a good location and clean. We will definitely choose this apartment again when we go to Porto. Thanks a lot Bruno.

I've stayed in this apartment for two night with other two friends. Everything was fine. The location is very central, close to every important monuments in the city. There are also many nice bars in the square just in front of it.
The apartment was clean, maybe just a little bit cold, but it was raining while we were there, so we were not that lucky with the weather.
Bruno's girlfriend welcomed us to the aparment and she was really nice and gave us valuable tips for exploring the city.
Highly recommended!
Muy buena opción

The appartment is very central and has all the necessary amenities.
Bruno was really helpful and explained tons of tips about the city. We were sure to try all the best things of Porto.
On the minus side, I was there in winter in a big storm, and we could  feel some wind getting in through the window, which made the flat chilly! Hope to come back in summer!
Thank you Bruno and see you around.
Local excelente!! Muito bem localizado, com muitas opções de lazer por perto!! Aprovadissimo!!
Super séjour dans l'appartement de Bruno ! Très bien placé dans la ville, propre et confortable ! La rue est un peu bruyante mais c'est normal pour un logement au centre ville.

Piso muy recomendable. Situado en pleno centro de Oporto. Desde allí puedes ir caminando prácticamente a todos los lugares turísticos además de tener cerca el metro y el tren. No sólo por localización sino por lo acogedor que es el piso. Estancia muy agradable.

El anfitrión muy atento. Nos facilitó mucho la llegada y nos dio información de la ciudad. Además de estar pendiente a cualquier cosa que nos faltara. La casa muy limpia y ordenada y la situación perfecta! sin duda repetiríamos.
Super zentral. Die Tipps von Bruno waren klasse und können wir weiterempfehlen

The apartment is in a great location and kept very clean. Bruno does a good job making sure his guests are happy, and he's readily available to answer any questions of concerns. I liked the place so much that I decided to stay a little longer. I'll stay here again whenever in Porto.
Todo bom

Je recommande !!!!
Merci pour tout
Great place, in great location. Easy access from the airport and railway station. Highly recommended.

Eu amei o apartamento, a localização é excelente perto de tudo... lojas, shopping, restaurantes. 
O metrô (estação Bolhao) fica a 5  minutos apé e leva para todos os lugares que precisar. 
O apartamento é super aconchegante, limpo e seguro.
O Bruno foi muito receptivo, sempre que precisei de algo ele respondia super rápido. Não tenho oque reclamar. 
Quando voltar em Porto já tenho um lugar certo onde ficar. Super recomendo.
We had a short holiday in Bruno's place. He's been very helpful throughout our stay. The place is very central, clean and comfortable.

We had an absolutely fantastic time at Bruno's place.

The flat is cozy and located right next to the most important city highlights. The two balconies are an absolute treat. The rooms are spacious and well organized.

Bruno is an amazing host - he took the time during check-in to show us around the map and give recommendations.

Thumbs up from us :)
Muy bien localizado. Amplio y comodo. El anfitrion muy amable
Great!!!!!
he is the best thanks nice clean comfy home

Мы останавливались в комнате у Кубилая на 3 дня,нам очень понравилось и комната и общение с ним.В квартире очень чисто и комфортно,много времени проводили в гостинной,хороший интернет и вобще расположение квартиры очень хорошее для передвижения по Стамбулу-рядом автобусы,10-15 минут до всех известных стамбульских мест.Отдельно про хозяина-очень дружелюбный и общительный,встретил нас рано утром,все показал и рассказал,каждое утро предлагал завтрак и чай, после отъезда помог нам с поселением в другую гостиницу,т.к. в ней никто не говорил по-английски)Будем рады встретиться опять и остановиться в его доме.Спасибо за радушный прием,Кубилай!)

이 숙소에서 일주일정도 머물렀네요. 

숙소를 정할때 이것저것 꼼꼼히 따지지만 인터넷상으론 절대 알 수 없는게 주인은 어떤 사람일까 이잖아요. 아무리 좋은 시설의 숙소라도 주인이 별로라면 아무리 방안에만 있는다해도 마음이 편하지 않더라고요. 
Kubilay 는 게스트의 마음을 편하게 하는 법을 아는 사람이에요. 겸손하고 유쾌해서 대화를 나누어도 친구와 편하게 이야기 나누는 것 같았고 또. 혼자서 조용히 시간을 보내고 싶을때에도 그런 저를 배려해주었어요. 

전반적으로 집도 깨끗하고 사진에 보이는 것처럼 방도 넓어서 지내는 동안 불편하지 않았고요 또 과일이나 커피등도 마음껏 먹었습니다. 저녁에는 Kubilay가 직접 전통차를 내려주기도 해서 차 마시며 밤 늦게까지 이야기하기도 했네요. 

위치는 중심가하고는 조금 떨어져있어요. 버스타고 20분 정도 거리입니다. 보스 정류장은 집에서 멀지 않아요. 게다가 종점이라 중간에 내려야하느라 신경 곤두 세우는 일은 없습니다. 탁심이나 술탄에선 멀지만 이 곳도 쇼핑가와 먹거리길등이 있ㅇ요. 오히려 음식 가격은 중심가보다 훨씬 저렴해서 좋았네요  

다시 머물고 싶을 만큼 좋은 곳이었습니다!!

Thanks Kubilay :)

Kubilay is a very welcoming and kind guy, I can easily recommend anyone to stay with him. Comfortable bed, nice room and nice flat. The location is in a non-touristy area, which is great for good, cheap food and a better experience of local life. There are also good transport connections to the rest of the city for when you want to do sightseeing.

At this point Kubilay feels just like a member of my family , an older brother  I'd say (even that he's younger than me :) ). I always know that no matter what when I go to Istanbul there is a warm welcoming Kubilay there always ready to do what ever to make your stay more pleasant.

Don't miss having that delcious breakfast with him on the weekend.

We arrived home with wonderful experience. Kubi is excelent host, everything was exactly as on explanation on site. Happy that we have new friend in Istanbul, and our warm recommandation for everyone who want to stay in this city. Can not wait till summer to meet this wonderful guy again! 
Resime: PERFECT!

I throughly enjoyed my stay with Kubilay. Although he wasn't there the first few days he stayed in touch and made sure that my stay in Istanbul was going smoothly, as well as having his friend meet us and show us the neighborhood etc. 

Kubilay is very sweet, trustworthy, friendly and good person to stay with. He is dedicated to making sure that your stay is as good as possible and extremely helpful. Makes for great conversation with a great vibe. I hope to return to Istanbul and when I do I'll stay with him once more!

This apartment is very nice for the duration of your stay in Istanbul. Kubi best and very good man. Spacious and clean apartment. Near the apartment there is a restaurant, a market all the necessary. If you want to leave a good impression living in Istanbul, I Recommend Kubi apartment)))

I liked that Kubilay's place because was nearby public transportation. I liked that there mere many resturants and shops close by. I enjoyed the farmers market on Wednesday, that was in walking distance from his house.
Everything is simply satisfying and great, the host is very helpful and his english is really good so it was eazy for both to communicate, i advise everyone for this house

It was a wonderful time for me in Mr. Kubilay house , I spent almost a month in his beautiful house and enjoyed a lot of Discussion and talking about cultures and Istanbul with him , also the neighborhood is quiet and very warm.

Kubilay is the best! Truly a superhost, there are not enough words to describe how great the Istanbul experience is when your host is Kubi. Thank you Kubi for your hospitality, friendliness and for for being such an amazing person!

Its always great to return to my “second home”. Well, Kubi’s abode is always the perfect place to stay as not a single day you feel like a stranger renting at his place. He always makes you feel so welcome and treat you like his own family members. He will always be there for you in times of need during your entire stay in Istanbul. In addition to that, he has a great heart too as he also support me for my humanitarian work in Istanbul in donating brand new clothes for the refugees! Wow! Definitely a gret host to stay with... for my entire month stay in Istanbul!

This is my first AirBnB stay with a super host and now I know what it means.
Kubi truly is a super host, he made my stay in a Istanbul more lovely, he is really a very helpful person.
The place is nice, many shops & supermarkets nearby, Buses and metro are close.

Спасибо большое Куби за гостеприимство и молниеносный ответ! Оказавшись в аэропорту Стамбула, Куби очень быстро откликнулся на мой запрос  Квартира находится рядом с автобусным кольцом оттуда можно добраться до самого центра! Рядом очень много магазинчиков и очень вкусная пекарня.

I was a bit afraid to go to Istambul alone, but thanks to Kubilay I enjoyed my stay there. He is very hospitable, sociable, always ready to answer any questions and give advice. 
The house is very spacious and warm, with all necessary equipment, and the atmosphere is so that I felt like at home)  
You will need about 30-40 minutes to go to the centre of Istambul by bus, keep it in mind when you plan your trip.
But though it is a bit far from the centre, there are advantages too. The house is situated in the district for locals, not for tourists. So you can buy cheap food there. You can find locum for 6 lira/kilo, cheap nuts and other turkish delights. There are also local shops near the house with good quality cotton clothes, underwear, tights etc.
Definitely recommend this host! Thank you very much for your hospitality!

I  stayed at   Kubilay’s place for  7 days and it was everything as advertised. It is the best location and shortest walk to access the bus and metro and minibus . It is also very convenient to shopping, restaurants, . The location of  the unit is incredible. My experience with the Kubilay’s  was very responsive and helpful . He personally makes us breakfast every Saturday and Sunday . The bottom line is I received very good value for my money and  Kubilay’s place will be my first choice on future trips to Istanbul .

Kubilay house is amazing good. Kubi is good and so nice guy who help me to search everything. He inform me everything about what i need. This place near from everywhere you no need scare for hungry becuase this place really central place. You just need walk little to get bus station and the hostes really nice to help you. No dispointed to stay here. I will stay here everytime i go to turkey. Good experience. Tessekur ederiz kubilay for your services

Would highly recommend Kabulai. Friendly down to earth and very hospitable - dont hesitate. The guy is awesome and his place is very spacious and clean. Made me breakfast on the Sunday I was leaving which was a good gesture. Wish I could've stayed longer.
The gentle home of a gentleman's educator, he can give you the utmost enthusiasm and help. You can't be mistaken for living here.

What a great place this is, walkable from cool part of east williamsburg and short subway or walk from williamsburg so great for exploring. Guillermo is a real friendly host and the apartment is really clean spacious and comfy to relax in after all that exploring!

Appartement tres agreable Avec salle de Bain tres bien equipee,cuisine adapte pour petit dejeuner principalement
Guillermo tres sympathique et tres a l' ecoute
Station de metro tres proche. Et tres pratique pour se rendre sur manan than ( ligne L ) 
Quartier sympathique Avec magasin alimentaire 
Seul bemol travaux nombreux Avec bop de passage de Camion  et de betoniere  sur borom street Avec en prime un parking de betoniere mitoyen de l  'immeuble difficile de faire la sieste
Bonne adresse tout de meme

Guillermo met us when we arrived and showed us round the place, as well as giving us some good recommendations for the local area. The apartment is very light and a really nice space to come back to after a long day. The road can be a little noisy at times, we had the windows open at night as it got quite warm in the apartment. However,  Guillermo offered as an AC Unit when I mentioned it to him. Good restaurants/bars/coffee shops a few minutes walk away, and the subway is 2/3 minutes walk too. Would definitely stay here again, thanks for having us.
We met Guillemo on our arrival. We were shown around the apartment  and made to feel really welcome. The apartment was just great. Perfect for our needs..

This second floor walkup is just a few blocks from my son's place in Williamsburg making it a perfect location for us.  The apt is modern, new construction, spacious and conveniently located to the subway line at Montrose and Bushwick.

The  host was extremely accurate and dipicted what the place looked like. The room was very clean, very organized without too much clutter within the living spaces. Host was also always in reach in case of questions or concerns and answered within minutes of the requests. Me and my girlfriend had an absolutely amazing time during our stay and really had no complaints. All wifi passwords and tv show programs worked. 10/10.
Walking distance to most places we wanted to see.  Subway two blocks away.  Restaurants, grocer, pharmacy close by.

Guillermo was a great host. He recommended plenty of places for breakfast/coffee around the neighbourhood. The place is beautiful, clean and spacious. As described it is near the L-train and very convenient to get to most places. We had a wonderful time staying and exploring the city. Thank you!

We had a great stay at Guillermo's lovely apartment. It was close to the L train to head into Manhattan or to Bedford and also some great places in the neighbourhood for food, coffee etc. Guillermo was quick to respond to any queries we had and arranged a cab to the airport for us on the way home. Thanks for a great time!

Lovely apartment. Very clean, modern and spacious. Comfy bed! Was exactly as was advertised. Met Guillermo half way through stay - very friendly and welcoming. Quite far east in Williamsburg - 30min walk to main Williamsburg strip but 5 minute walk to the nearest subway, with a couple of bars and coffee shops along the way. Very easy to get across to Manhattan. Only downside was no decent convenience store - closest one was very expensive and didn't have everything we were looking for. Otherwise lovely stay and would highly recommend.

Guillermo nous a attendu le jour de notre arrivée alors que nous avions beaucoup de retard. Il nous a rapidement montré l'appartement et il est resté très disponible lors de notre séjour. L'appartement est à quelques blocs d'une station du L Train, parfait pour une première visite de NY, avec la possibilité de visiter aussi le quartier de Williamsburg. Le logement est très lumineux, très grand et très propre.   C'est vraiment un très bon rapport qualité-prix et notre hôte est en plus très à l'écoute!

This host was a great host. His host skills were very host like and it's what a lot of people would expect from a host. 
Overall score I'll give him is an A

Guillermo's place was ideal fo us. Close enough to walk into Williamsberg and just around the corner from the fantastic Roberta's.

The apartment itself is immaculate and stylish.

The key handovers were really efficient even though we landed quite late; and although we needed no help, and liked to be legft alone - it felt that Guillermo would have been there.

Highly recommended.

Lovely quiet well well appointed spacious one bedder in Brooklyn . Guillermo was there to meet us at the apartment when we arrived as he lives downstairs . He was kind enough to prepare an extra bed for my daughter who came with us at short notice . We stayed for 4 days and found it a great area although we spent all our days in Manhattan , we are looking forward to returning in a few weeks and exploring   The area around East Williamsburg . Fabulous comfortable apartment ,

Guillermo's place is very well lit, spacious, clean and very close (about a 3 min walk) to a subway station which is definitely a plus..wifi worked properly the whole time..the bathroom amenities functioned really well and all in all our stay was very pleasant and (Website hidden by Airbnb) is also great that our host was in touch with us through our stay and answered promptly on Airbnb chat..We would definitely recommend this lovely appartment in Williamsburg to anyone looking to visit NYC while trying to relax and have a quiet time when they are not in the heart of the city

Guillermo's place was a wonderful refuge after spending long hot days  in the city. Communication with Guillermo was simple and we had no problem getting into the place. The space was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.

Guillermo's place not only met, but surpassed our expectations! It was really comfortable, super clean, much less noisy than we anticipated and very convenient to lots of great places in the neighborhood (especially the subway station.) Guillermo was a fantastic host -  a really nice person and very considerate in every regard. I would highly recommend staying here!

I stayed here 4 nights, very comfortable bed, very close to Montrose metro stop, very very clean, and to top it off some of the best graffiti art/ street art areas in the city are right outside the door. I would definitely stay here again.

We are a family of 3 and stayed at Guillermo's apartment twice during our month long stay in the US and Canada. During our trip we stayed in many Airbnb apartments but none as fabulous as this Brooklyn gem .
 Clean,comfortable , spacious and in a great location . Although in a heavy industrial area noise was not a problem as we were away during the day and in fact it was such a quiet haven and great to return to at the end of a busy day sight seeing.
Guillermo was an lovely host and kind enough to accept and prepare  a futon  for my daughter who travelled with (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was excellent as Guillermo  lives down stairs from the apartment .  Wi- fi was excellent and strong. This was a fabulous and memorable stay.  I cannot recommend it highly enough .

Great, clean, stylish and spacious apartment between Bushwick and Williamsburg. Guillermo was communicative and check in and check out were easy. The area immediately around the apartment has quite an industrial feel but once you know where you're going there are some great places - Arrogant Swine was a particular favourite for us.

This condo was in a very convenient location, near shopping, beaches, and grocery stores. Very nice well-kept condo complex and a fantastic pool. Good AC that kept the condo comfortable.

This was our first visit to Maui and it was great! When we visit Maui again we would absolutely stay here again. Condo owner was very helpful with very quick replies to our questions.

Andrew was a very responsive and enthusiastic host!  He made us feel very welcome at the unit, which we appreciated.  He also replied very quickly to emails and checked in with us when we arrived and left.

The apartment itself is very well-stocked with kitchen appliances, cookware, dining essentials, and beach gear (e.g., boogie boards and beach towels).  We appreciated the convenience of the dishwasher and washer and dryer.  The grounds themselves are perfectly manicured and have many bbq grills which we used on several occasions.  The grounds are very clean and the bbq grills themselves are cleaned by the apartment complex's maintenance crew.  The grounds are right on the edge of a shore (not exactly a beach that one would go to for swimming and lounging) that provide stunning views of the water and sunset.

This apartment is a great value in that you are centrally located among different sights such as Wailea Beach and Lahaina (a 15-30 minute drive).  We would recommend renting a car so that you can drive around the island.  Very few sights would be easily accessible to you otherwise.  There are also a full bathroom for each bedroom, so you have a 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment.  The master bedroom has a lanai the provides a good view of the island.  The second bedroom's window looks out into the dark hallway of the apartment floor though.  A free parking spot was provided for the unit, which was convenient for our rental car.  There is also a balcony off of the kitchen that provides you with a great view of the water.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this unit!

The listing is in a great location with an incredible pool and great place to watch the sunset. It is close to a grocery story, restaurants, etc. The listing was about as described. Bathrooms were both small but worked, and lots of towels and beach gear were provided.

Andrew is a fantastic host - he is a very active and quick communicator. His apartment in Kihei, Maui is beautiful: the location is ideal, the building complex even has a swimming pool and is right at the beach. The apartment itself is spacious, well maintained and gives of a holiday/aloha vibe. Andrew is a generous and flexible host and tried to accommodate wherever possible. We truly enjoyed our experience and stay on the island and I can only recommend his place if you are looking for a fantastic vacation!

Andrew is a perfect host ! I recommended this host to all ...
If all host was like im! That will be perfect
Great place for the money!! Nice beach and clean condo.  Andrew is VERY responsive and great to deal with!

Andrews condo home  is excellent but the check in at the front desk will be unexpected if early going in. It is not what I expected cuz I was told to check at the front desk and I will receive the keys  ASAP but she made us wait until 14:00hours... it was a bummer..

The condo is in a great location central to everything.   The place is well maintained.  My only complaint would be that you will not want to spend much time at this beach.   The ocean is very rocky and not good for any activities.  Also, no walk on the beach as have to go to Walea to do anytime of beach path walking.  The rooms were ok and everything was there that you needed.
Tons of cool beach gear available, very nice place. Road noise a little much, but quiet other than that. Beautiful sunsets & beach a 3 minute walk away.

Andrews place was PERFECT for our group in town for a family wedding.  VERY well stocked with all of the perfect amenities and even some extra touches for the beach, etc.  The condo is convenient to EVERYTHING around Kihei.  The sunsets were AMAZING!  We LOVED the pool.  Andrew was easy to work with, easy to reach and had all of the info we needed to enjoy our stay.  GREAT AirBnB experience
Great location, a lot of equipments for beach entertainment, very clean. We will definitely stay here again.

Andrew's condo in Kihei is steps from the ocean.  Tennis courts/gym/hot tub and pool will keep you entertained all day.   The condo is. Also stocked with everything needed for a smooth vacation.  After hours check is was a breeze and Andrew's timely responses made the vacation that much better.   Will definitely be back!
Andrew’s place was great!!! Has everything you could need. He was incredibly quick to answer any questions I had. We loved it. Thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 327 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The house has just about everything one would have at their own home! Very well stocked! Thanks.
Very nice place, excellent location!

Everything was great! Location, equipment and surroundings were really good. I would recommend you to rent a car, but there is a bus stop really close. About 1 mile from apartment there is a nice shopping center Napili Plaza. Also it is really quit place so it is better for couples or business trip rather than for families.

We had a great stay. The apartment is as advertised - clean, spacious, quiet. Kitchen had everything we needed for cooking. Donell answered all our questions, check-in/check-out was a breeze. The beach is a short walk away and very nice.

To all looking at staying in Maui, this place is fantastic. It is a 5 minute walk to a beautiful beach with snorkelling, two restaurants, and sea turtles. By the beach there is also a rental place where you can do a week rental of all snorkelling equipment for $20 which I recommend. The place is very clean, has a bunch of amenities, and also has some beach accessories. We came as a couple but we able to make a couple breakfast meals and just relax instead of always having to go to a restaurant. It is about 45 minutes from the airport but is only 20 minutes from the main town of Lahaina (which is great to walk around, shop, and eat) and 10 minutes from kanapali which has a lot of great restaurants and shopping. If I were to come back to Maui I would stay in this same area! 
Donell has been fantastic, accommodating, and very open to offering advice and tips. We thank her very much for her help! 
Mahalo!
Check in was super easy. Location was a short walk to beach and local mini shopping plaza. House was clean and neighborhood very quiet. I would stay again for sure!

Great place to stay in upmarket Napili. Amazing sunsets and restaurants and beaches very nearby (all a walk away). We basically chose to stay close by for our 3 day trip, enjoying Merrimans, Honolua bay and Lahaina. Donnell's served as the perfect base!
Place was clean great location very close to beach store not far at all you won't regret booking mahalo

Wonderful experience. Safe neighborhood, well equipped space, and close to the beach. Great communication.
The home felt very much like a home.

Imagine everything you could need from an Airbnb apartment. You got it. And more. The apartment is BEAUTIFULL, in a very quiet and safe neighborhood. You are 5 minutes waling from a beach, and 15 minutes drive from the best beach on the Island. The place is very clean, you have a lot of beach accesories like a body board and more. Donell is very very very kind and sweet. She will respond every message within 5 minutes. Check in was super fast and easy. I definitley recomend you to stay here.

We really enjoyed our stay at Maria's place. Pleasant, quiet place for vacation.Very close to restaurants, beaches, anything you could want. Large amount of beach equipment. We would stay there again.
Walking distance from the beach and the Gazebo restaurant! We had a great stay!

Great Airbnb, Maria's place has everything you need and more. It's breeze cooled and it's great to sleep with no a/c and feel the breeze blow through at night. The location is awesome, Napili Bay is a  really nice beach and Sea House restaurant is perfect for a drink at the bar looking at the sunset. Kapalua is a couple minutes further along and is even better, spend a day there you won't regret it. Great value for money and perfect place to stay in West Maui!
Maria's home was perfect! It was exactly what we were looking for! We felt right at home, we were comfortable, and we really enjoyed the breeze and the sounds that it brought at night!

Great location for exploring west Maui! 

Beautiful view out from the back of the apartment very private feel yet minutes away from the beach and shops.
Secluded, quiet, affordable get-a-way that was close to a beautiful beach!  We walked down there a number of times.  Nice breezes through the night.
Well located, clean, well stocked Condo walking distance to Napili bay and Gazebo restaurant. Pool and barbeque too.
Best Airbnb experience so far. Wonderful apartment, cozy and clean, perfect located. Feels like a home far away :-) Highly recommended!

Great spot, apartment is fully kitted out with all the gear your need for a great stay in Hawaii. You can wake up in the morning and jump in the local Cove and swim with the turtles and grab hot cinnamon buns and coffee by the beach! Would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone! Thanks again!
Great location. Beaches and shops were very close by and the area was just amazing.

My situation is somewhat different in that I own and reside full-time in a condo at the same property, and I work for a vacation rental/property management co. that's been here 30+ years (long before Airbnb).  My husband and I stayed 3 nights when our own condo was undergoing some maintenance.  I have to say that renting from Maria was an absolute pleasure.  Her condo is clean and fresh and perfect for anyone who really wants to experience authentic Maui living. Maria's home is located in a very private and tranquil area of the property.  I'm grateful the time we rented fell on my days off from work because I got to enjoy reading on the lanai, grilling dinner and night swimming in the evening at the common area pool (hubby and I do this anyway, but this felt like an actual getaway!).  Also, the breezes everyone talks about? They're amazing.  It's a special place.  I highly recommended.

Napili is a wonderful place to stay. Napili Bay is beautiful and great for snorkeling, lots of turtles. You can walk to The Gazebo restaurant from the place. It rains a bit more up north and it's a more local vibe. I'm from the west side of Maui and really love Napili. Kapalua has excellent restaurants and is very close by. The condo had a couple little things that made it seem very "lived in" like a dirty bar of soap in the shower. The towels smelled a little musty. You must be VERY quiet as it was only two of us there, going to bed by 9:30 PM and still got a note on our car. It read "we can hear you walking heel tow down the stairs". Basically tiptoe around because the walls are very thin. Overall affordable spot, good communication and Napili is great.

The apartment was neat and tidy. Very close to transport and good location of you're working in the CBD. The check in procedure was very flexible and Angela was very easy to get in touch with and followed up. She even left me a box of chocolates as a warm welcome. Will stay again.
Great area and beautifully presented apartment, very clean. Angela was extremely helpful and easy to deal with. Loved staying here.

Angela was an excellent host - extremely welcoming and helpful throughout my stay. The apartment is immaculate - extremely clean and new, central location, close to shops and the train station. A perfect apartment for people who want to explore Sydney. I highly recommend this Airbnb without any reservations.
It was a perfect stay. The location was great as was the friendly service. It was meticulously clean and had the most comfy bed IVE EVER SLEPT ON!!!
Really enjoyed my stay and I am looking forward in staying again, it's clean, great location for my needs .. Prefect and great wonderful hospitality best regards
Outstanding communication prior to and during the stay. The apartment was great - would stay again!

Angela was a fantastic host! She was very friendly and responded to any questions that I had.

The apartment was nice, clean, and most of all comfortable! It had all the amenities that I needed. Wifi worked perfectly. Great location as it was within walking distance to many sights such as the Rocks, Opera House, Harbor Bridge, Darling Harbor, and George Street (shopping district). It was also conveniently located near the train station if I needed to head someplace far and to the ferries (that I took to Taronga Zoo and Manly Beach).

Would highly recommend Angela as a host and her apartment to others!

Fantastic apartment in very convenient location. Getting the keys wasn't a problem at all and was a pleasure to walk into a very clean apartment and have 2 cold beers in the fridge awaiting me too. I was very quiet which suited me as I was staying for business.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sydney.

Great location!!!! 10min walk to Pitt at and 10min walk to circular quay. Great little apartment, especially if you're staying in Sydney for more then a weekend! Has a washing machine/drier, which was super convenient. Also a little kitchenette so we could have breakfast etc in. Also Angela left us a cute little gift on arrival, which was the sweetest touch. Definitely will be staying here again next time and recommending it to friends. 
Thank you!!!!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I feel so fortunate to have stayed at Angela's property.  Angela is extremely responsive and friendly, and the studio is just perfect - so clean and spacious with everything I needed.  Staying here was a breeze :). She even provided me with chocolates and grocery items when she found out this was an extended stay!  I would definitely love to stay here again and highly recommend Angela and the property to everyone visiting Sydney :)

I booked for an extended stay at Angela's apartment and it was everything I could hope for in an Airbnb stay and more! The apartment was extremely clean and well-kept with all the amenities included.  I loved the beautiful marble bathroom and the spacious living space.  The kitchen included a stove top, microwave, toaster and kettle so I was able to easily prepare simple meals and breakfast.  The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and there are various cafes and restaurants just around the corner.  It is also within a short walk to Wynyard station and major shopping spots.  This apartment was perfect for my stay in Sydney and I highly recommend it to everyone looking for a home away from home :)
Angela's place was exactly as pictured in a nice and secure building. I enjoyed the quietness, and she was very respectful of my needs and privacy. I'd return to her place next time I visit Sydney!
Angela was fast to respond to any queries, and provided excellent directions and arrival instructions.  The apartment was as described, and the location suited me perfectly.  I will be booking again.

Could not speak highly enough of the host! I let her know it was a surprise for my husbands birthday. She went out of the way to put up banners and purchase a cake as a surprise for us! Communication was A+! The room was fabulous and so clean and comfy! Thanku so very much!
The studio is comfortable and really clean.  Great location for exploring Sydney.  Quick walk to The Rocks, Sydney Harbor Bridge and Circular Quay.  Host is very accommodating.

Angela was extremely easy to deal with and was wonderful in going above and beyond to ensure we had a comfortable stay. Her communication was amazing and the overall experience was very positive. 

We felt very welcomed and can't speak highly enough of her kindness and professionalism.

The property is located in an excellent spot - very safe and super close to Darling Harbour, Circular Quay and the CBD (all within 5-10 mins walk).

The building has excellent facilities and the apartment is very clean. This was our first Airbnb experience and most definitely will not be our last.

We highly recommend Angela and the apartment. Thank you so much again for everything :)

A gem for any discerning traveller to Sydney! Lovely well appointed apartment with everything you could ask for in a stay, the marble bathroom was a bonus. Private but convenient location in the city - ten minutes walk to Wynyard's main attractions and the shopping district. Angela was a wonderful host, leaving some groceries in the fridge and communicating well to ensure I had a smooth stay. I'd love to be back the next time I'm in town!

My husband and I had a great time staying at A's place. It was super cozy, clean and in a good location close to the rocks, circular quay, transit and a grocery store. A was very responsive whenever we had a question. Definitely will recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney CBD

This was the perfect place for my friend and I for our first trip to Sydney! The place looks exactly like the pictures and was as clean as a hotel room when we arrived! Angela was very accommodating and even provided some basic foodstuffs for us in the fridge when we arrived. 

You could not ask for a better location staying here. It's only a few blocks to Darling Harbour and a short walk to The Rocks and Circular Quay. It was easily accessible and we had no issues throughout our time staying there. I highly recommend this studio and would definitely stay here again!

I've never used Airbnb until this trip, and I was a bit nervous my first go around in an international city, but Angela made the process very smooth and saw to it that everything was taken care of for me. Very clean place and comfortable to stay in.

really good location, and the centre of downtown is in walk distance.
Room is marvelous, new and mordern decoration, except there's a little bit decoration odour.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful apartment right in the middle of all the action downtown Montreal! Very easy check in, responsive host service, and everything you need for a short stay! I would definitely want to stay here again for my next visit.
the place is very clean and things are accurately described.
Awesome apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything. Would definitely stay again !
Very nice appartment, very well located. Only problem: buiding ventilation is very noisy. However, host provided ear plugs and was very quick to respond. Excellent customer service!
They were very helpful!
Bon endroit. Tres propre. Tres bon rapport qualite prix.
No keys required. Great location.
Great stay, host was easy to communicate with via (Hidden by Airbnb) messenger. They fixed a problem with the smoke detector in a timely manner. Would stay again.
Place is in a prime location downtown Montreal. Can walk right up Mt Royal and close to many bars and restaurants in the middle of the city. The place was exactly as it appeared in the pictures.
Great apartment great location
Great spot!

I stayed in this listing w/ a colleague on a business trip. It was perfect and the area is really nice too. Communication w/ Sonder is so incredibly fast and easy. Entry was via keypad so check-in was super easy.
Superbe appartement dans le centre-ville!
I really recommend this rental which was beyon expectations, well located and very clean and tidy.
Nice place!

We can't say enough great things about this host . Any question or concern we had he responded within minutes . The unit was clean and looked like the photos that were posted & all the details about the location were accurate . We would highly recommend this unit and host to anyone considering visiting downtown Montreal .

This apartment was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. It looks like the pictures and was very quiet, though nearby to restaurants and shopping in the downtown area as well as Mont Royal. The kitchen had all the standard amenities. They provided shampoo/soap/conditioner and towels as well. I would stay in this apartment again. There were only 2 of us but it is large enough to hold a couple more people (though only has 1 bathroom).

Two things to note: as stated in the description, the building is currently under construction. It was very loud for 2 days of the trip but we didn't hear it at all on the 3rd day. Keep that in mind if you choose to book while the construction continues. Second, Sonder requires you to register on their website (with name, email address, and phone number) in order to rent an apartment from them.

The highlight of this place is its location. Easy to access shops, the metro, restaurants, etc. The amenities are good. The kitchen, dinning area, and living room have basic furniture that will work for most travelers. The beds are a little stiff but there are worse places to lay your head. The bedroom with the ball lamps on the side table is very bright while the other bedroom is wonderfully dark. Temperature control is challenging since the only AC unit is in the dining area.
