Note that power outlets in Brazil come in about 4 different flavours and you can never really be sure whether it is 110V or 220V. So bring adapters and make sure anything you plug in won't be fried by being plugged into a 220V outlet. In this apartment all (and there are surprisingly many) the outlets are IEC-906-1 type plugs at 220V. It is 3-pronged but still 2-prong Europlug compatible so if you are coming from most of Europe you won't need adapters. If you are coming from North America, bring some regular US-Euro adapters.

The view of Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer statue) is especially nice at sunset and in the evening when it is lit up. There is a shot of it at sunset taken from the window of the apartment here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Alan and Catherine were lightning quick to respond and made the process extremely smooth.

All in all this was a perfect and relaxing 4 nights in Copacabana for me.

Hola a todos!! Estuvimos en el Studio Apartment de Catherine y Alan a fines de junio de 2011 con mi marido. Fue una excelente elección, gracias Alan y Catherine!!
La UBICACION del depto es ideal, ya que estás cerca de todo (queda en Capacabana) y te podés mover en omnibus a todos lados sin problema.
La ZONA es muy seguro, tranquila y con lugares para comer y comprar comida cerca. Siempre nos sentimos MUY seguros.
El DEPARTAMENTO está buenísimo! Es tal cual las fotos. Todo nuevo, impecable y con diseño- Está todo pensado hastá el mínimo detalle! Tiene todo lo necesario y más!  El wifi anda perfecto; la pantalla plana es GRANDE, no como dice el comentario de Marcus. El sillón camo es muy cómodo, tanto como sillón tanto como cama(más cómodo que muchas camas de hotel). El baño está impecable!!! El depto está buenísimo para ir con pareja o con un amigo.
Tiene SEGURIDAD LAS 24HS.
ALAN y CATHERINE son muy organizados y amables. Siempre contestaron rapidisimo y nos dieron datos para la llegada que nos sirvieron mucho,  MUCHAS GRACIAS POR COMPARTIR SU CASA EN RIO CON NOSOTROS!!!
LES RECOMENDAMOS a todos los que quieran conocer Rio, quedarse en el Studio Apartmente de Alan y Catherine!!!
Saludos,

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Patricio & Mercedes

The studio is really nice and comfy, modern and well-equiped in a nice building, in a great area of Rio - its location, a few meters away from Copacabana beach, is really central and convenient. There are a lot of shops, coffee places, bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby, and the area is really safe.
Alan and Catherine have every thing prepared to make of your stay a great time - all you have to do is to enjoy!

Pase mucho tiempo buscando por AIRBNB algún lugar en el cual pudiera pasar mis vacaciones. En cuanto vi las fotos del Studio, me di cuenta que era un lugar agradable y acogedor. Cuando me puse en contacto con Alan & Catherine, me di cuenta que eran personas muy amables y atentas. Siempre se mostraron dispuestos a resolver mis dudas y ayudarme a encontrar sitios en Rio de janeiro. El Studio es muy bonito y muy comodo, me gusto la vista que se tiene del Cristo Redentor desde la ventana. Muy recomendalbe el Studio! muy simpatica Lelita y muy cordiales los Porteros! Rio es una ciudad magnifica su gente es muy agradable!

My rating is 5 out of 5!!!!! This studio is simply amazing!

Alan and Catherine's studio is a beautiful place to stay. The creative design and artistic details are inspiringly put together. It is also wonderful because it is situated in the heart of Copa. Very close to the shops, the beach, the metro, and major tourist attractions. Location and design are the perfect combo to make your stay comfortable and rewarding!

Alan is such a kind, polite and thoughtful person! I will not forget his kindness. He went above and beyond to make my stay a happy one. In fact, he went well and beyond my expectations of a land lord. He even helped me organise a taxi to leave and booked it for me. Alan also arranged to get the apartment cleaned mid-stay. I did not ask him to do this. In sum, you could not want nicer person to deal with! Alan is a rare gem! He responds to emails in a timely manner and is a generous, helpful and wonderful!  He thinks of everything to make your stay a happy one!

The apartment building is nice and the couple that work at the door and look after the cleaning are such warm, kind and beautiful Brazilian people!!! They helped me so much with many things. When I arrived my luggage was missing, so they rang the airport and even offered to drive me to the airport! They even helped me go shopping for electrical goods so I could use my computer. Outstanding kindness!!!  It was a joy to come and home and say hello to them on the way to the elevator. I will miss them very much!

The apartment is comfortable because every last detail has been very well considered. Coming from Australia, I found the internet speed very fast and easy to connect. The cable TV is excellent and nice to watch after a long day touring Rio! The kitchen is perfect and is a delightful place to make yummy breakfast etc. The bathroom is very well designed. While the living room and bedroom is a joy to be in due to the artwork and beautiful use of form and light. The use of colour in the studio is visually sophisticated and joyful. I really loved the use of design to create atmosphere and mixed with Brazilian art, this is a real treat to enjoy! Loved it!!!

I really enjoyed dealing with Alan and Catherine. They are perfect hosts and I will be coming back to stay again for sure! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine for letting me stay in your beautiful home. I had the best time and will always remember how lovely your home and your wonderful kindness! 

Thank you!!!!!!

The pictures really shows what you get: a modern and cozy studio. At first may look tight and small, however the decoration work done by the owners are very smart and find for every single free space an appropriate use. The location also could not be better. Just one remark: the street is very peaceful, but Rio de Janeiro is a very noisy place. And the studio is placed between two very busy streets. Finally, Alan,  Catherine (the owners) and Lelita (the maid) are extremely friendly and attentive. The will do whatever they could to help your stay to be the best.

Perfect ! The studio is a a Little gem In Copacabana In a quiet tree-lined street NeXT to The métro. Very tastefully decorated  
Communication with Alan and Catherine was great. They are perfect hosts. 
100% recomended

Pasamos una semana maravillosa en el studio de Alan y Catherine. Realmente han pensado en cada detalle para hacerlo funcional, cómodo... y muy bonito!! Tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar al máximo. 
Además esta ubicado en el mejor rincón de Rio, en el centro de Copacabana, con todas sus tiendas, restaurantes, transporte y vida urbana, pero en una calle tranquila y silenciosa. Un lujo.
Comentamos varias veces durante nuestro viaje la suerte de haber encontrado este lugar para quedarnos. Alan y Catherine fueron siempre muy atentos y accesibles por mail, excelentes anfitriones a distancia. Recomendamos 100% este studio!!!!!

I had such a lovely experience here. Alan and Catherine were extremely helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Everything was IMMACULATE and looked exactly like it does in the photos. Although the space is small, the furniture and set-up made it very comfortable for two people. Such great use of the space. Loved the location...short walk to the beach. Neighborhood was friendly and felt very safe. Alan and Catherine provided suggestions for places to visit and also stocked some key items in the fridge. Amazing!  If I return to Rio I would love to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.

We stayed at Alan and Catherine's studio in November for 6 nights and had wondeful time.  From the point of booking, Alan and Catherine made sure that we were prepared for our stay in Rio.  They shared their thoughts and recommendations with us, this helped us enormously.  The studio is exactly as described, and the location is great. We are more than happy to recommend this studio to our friends and family and we will definitely stay again when we return to Rio.

tuvimos una excelente estadia. Alan y catherine han sido muyamables, nos han dejado el departamento super equipado con todo lo necesariopara disfrutar unos hermosos dias en rio. !muy cerca de laplayay del centro. excelente ubicacion

muchas gracias por todo!

Alan and Catherine entrusted me with their apartment for a whole month and I would not be too surprised if I were to learn that they had nightmares about this. I am a newcomer to this fantastic forum and had no recommendations or much detail in my profile while the apartment that Alan and Catherine entrusted me with truly is their home in Rio. It is a lovely designed little gem in Copa. It is amazing to see how much thought this couple spent in developing this small apartment into a little home where everything just fits perfectly. 

The apartment is light during day and the sofa transforms into a most comfortable bed at night. When I read the description of the apartment I initially had my doubts about the sleeper coach but chose this apartment as all other things just sounded perfect. Well, it turned out that the sleeper couch is as perfect as the apartment proved to be. The most comfortable sleeper I have ever experienced!

The apartment was recently totally renovated and is kept in such good shape that it still feels new. One of the apartment's big asset (apart from its beautiful furniture and interior) is the large shower! And of course the aircon for the hot Rio summer nights!

The apartment is nearby a vast range of fair, good and excellent restaurants and various supermarkets and shops.

The special treat is the welcome pack which allows you some time to study the wonderful recommendations and tips Allan and Catherine provide you with in a little info brochure to assist you in finding your own way in the surrounding area. Alan also offed a Kyle chat to assist me finding my way, but I found the info provided so detailed that this was not necessary.

As with most apartments in Rio, security is tops with a watchfull 24/7 door guard, who by the way is always keen to help where he can.

The Wifi is pleasantly fast and reliable! 

I can only recommend Alan's and Catherine's home in Rio. It is stable for short term, for long term, for business or for just visiting Copa (which, if i may stray off the point :) ) should be on everyones list of things to do while you still can!!!!!)

Thank Alan, thanks Catherine! Your apartment and I will meet gain :) !

A fantastically located, very neat and carefully designed studio!  

The location is excellent, very safe with extremely friendly door-men, lots of good eating and drinking places within easy reach of Copacabana beach (and nice walk to Ipanema beach) as well as the underground to get into central Rio.

The studio is very well designed, and makes excellent use of a small space with everything you could need; a comfortable bed, desk, a kitchenette including full fridge, good bathroom, good internet access and a wide range of TV channels including 3 in English.

Catherine and Alan are excellent hosts, have provided lots of useful information about their local area and its haunts, and have been prompt in all their dealings through Airbnb.

I cannot recommend this place strongly enough! Thanks Catherine and Alan.

The studio is fantastic and I had a great stay! Highly recommend to anyone going to Rio! Great location, in a quiet street and yet close to everything you need in Copacabana! The hosts Alan and Catherine are great and the communication was always clear and the are very attentive people! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine! Looking forward to staying with you again! 
**
O studio é fantástico , super bem localizado, numa rua tranquila, mas ao mesmo tempo perto de tudo em Copacabana. Recomendo a todos que vão ao Rio! O Alan e a Catherine são ótimos, a comunicação  super clara e eles muito atenciosos. Obrigada Alan e Catherine e espero me hospedar com vocês novamente!

Samba,Sun and  Rio Carnival!

Alan and Catherine were absolutely exceptional hosts who went above and beyond their responsibilities as hosts and we could not recommend them more highly. They were extremely fast in responding to our quires and we had a good few especially as it was over carnival (They even responded to out quires during our week in the apartment and helped us with a problem we were having booking flights to Iguazu falls). The studio is ideally situated in a very safe area (although we found nearly everywhere in Rio to be very safe) that is perfect for exploring Copacabana and the surrounding areas. The city itself can be somewhat overwhelming at first but Alan and Catherine’s starter and information packs gave us the confidence to venture all over they city without hesitation. Carnival is an amazing time to go and it is good to have somewhere private to go back to after a long day or night at a bloc party (which you will run into everywhere). As a first time couple using this site we could not have been more happy with the outcome and it really made our trip to Rio carnival one we will never forget. So all that’s left to say is go and in stay in Alan and Catherine’s beautiful apartment, don’t believe the negative things you hear about Rio and bring a wig or a hat for carnival as you wont see a local without one :)

Our experience with Alan and Catherine's apartment in Rio was a dream experience.  Our first time in Rio, we were faced with a 1:00 AM arrival at GIG.   Already wary of what I had read about airport taxi, I wondered how we were going to deal with this one.  No problem, everything was promptly arranged with their trusted driver who was at the airport promptly with our name and a reaonsable cost. 

The apartment is on a beautiful quaint street in the heart of Copacabana.  Building security is fantastic with trusted 24 hr porters,  restricted access to the floors.  We felt much safer than in a hotel -- but Rio  not to be construed as an unsafe city.  We felt fine everywhere we went.  The metro is clean and efficient.  

Everything in the apartment is well organized and works.  The high speed internet permitted flawless (Hidden by Airbnb) calls at all hours - a great stress reliever when you're on business.

Alan and Catherine responded immediately to al communications, offered tons of helpful information about the area, checked in frequently to see if anything needed.  Its just goes on and on.  In short, they "get it".   Its not about the apartment, rather the total experience. 

Put this on your A list and consider yourself lucky if it books..

Tom and Cecilia Kessler
Guadalajara, Mexico

We had a wonderful time in Rio! The studio is great! It is very well designed. Everything works perfectly well and Internet is faster than what we have in Switzerland! The location is great too! About 5 minutes walk to the beach of Copacabana, and located in a safe neighborhood. The bus station to go to the Sugar Loaf is about 10 minutes walk and the subway and the supermarket are only 3 minutes walking distance. Ipanema is only a 30 minute walk or you can take the subway (2 stations). Catherine and Alan were very helpful in helping us organize our trip. They were very patient with all our questions and fast in responding emails. They also helped us book our transportation to the apartment and all went very smoothly. We also loved the handbook loaded with all sorts of recommendations. We tried out a few restaurants and were not disappointed. We also went to Churrascaria Carretao (10 minutes walk) as my husband loves grilled meat (very touristy, get there early to avoid the tourist buses!). The hotel Othon has a restaurant on the top floor with a beautiful view of the beach of Copacabana. The food is rather pricey but the view is definitely worth it! The restaurant Colombo in the Fort of Copacabana is supposed to be good too, unfortunately we ran out of time! There are some very nice markets on Sundays. When heading to the hippie market in Ipanema stop at this very small market off Avenida Atlantica just before the Fort of Capacabana! They sell great pastels and the best caldos de cane! There is also an information center on Copacabana only a few minutes  towards Leme... And all this in short walking distance from the studio! 
We highly recommend this place!

Estuvimos en el estudio de Alan & Catherine por 5 días y todo fue perefecto. El estudio es precioso, en un ubicacion muy comoda, cerca de la playa, el metro y muchos buses para diferentes puntos de la ciudad.
Ellos fueron muy amables con nosotros, enviandonos recomendaciones de actividades cerca del estudio y en todo rio!
Fue nuestra primera experiencia con airbn y realmente nos fue muy bien!
De volver a Rio no dudaríamos en volver aqui!!! :)
...............

Were in the studio of Alan & Catherine for 5 days and everything was perefect. The studio is beautiful, in a very comfortable location near the beach, the metro and many buses to different parts of the city.
They were very kind to us, sending us recommendations of the study activities near and around the river!
It was our first experience with airbn and really was great!
Ww hope go back here! :)

I stayed in the studio for 4 days with a friend and it was perfect! It was recommended to me by my cousin Mercedes who had stayed there previously. She talked wonders about the hosts and the place and fortunately it was all true and more! Before going, Catherine made sure that we had everything we needed. All our communications were really helpful and clear. Such attention to detail and genuine concern to make our stay smooth is hard to come by! The recommendations she sent us with places to go to were amazing, especially the restaurants! The studio itself is well located, near the beach, the metro and in a safe area. Everything inside is new and works perfectly. Internet connection is wonderful! Porters are nice and inclined to help. All in all, a perfect stay in Rio!!

We stayed for just under a week at Catherine and Alan's place in Copacabana.  Catherine was very easy to communicate with, and was incredibly helpful with tourist and non-tourist things to do in Rio.  I couldn't believe that they provided us with tea, coffee, fruit and cereal for our stay -- I haven't had better hospitality in some 5 star hotels.  Other reviewers have mentioned that the place is "cosy" (which I confirm), but for us it was fine.  On top of everything, Catherine and Alan have tastefully decorated the apartment and have quality appointments.  I would definitely love to stay here again, and would highly recommend it to others.
Everything was exactly as promised or better. This was a wonderful location in a family friendly setting.  We would stay here again for future visits.

My sister and I just got home from an amazing weekend away in Montreal! This was the first time we used airbnb and Manon was a wonderful host. She was prompt to answer any questions we had. The condo was spotless and beautiful and looked just as the picture described. The neighbourhood was lovely. Was only abou a 7 minute drive to downtown and we used uber! It was a locked and secure building. We have only amazing things to say about our stay and the host. Thank you again Manon!

Marcos had been most helpful, trying his best to make my stay a pleasant one even when he was away on holidays. The apartment was very cozy, the bed was especially comfortable and the place was warm even in the winter. Just opposite the busstop, with plenty of restaurants around.

It was the second time I was renting a flat from Marcos. No surprise. Marcos is a great host. Always available if you need anything and making your stay as nice as possible.
The flat is of perfect size with its separate bedroom and good living room space. The walk through dressing room is also very convenient. Plenty of room to put your stuff (which is not always the case in Airbnb flats in HK).
Stanley is great, you'll meet people easily just by going down at one of the bars. I recommend Verns for their beers and Smugglers for the atmosphere. ;)
Marcos's flat is in a good location. It is easy to find and very convenient to go to downtown. I like Stanley very much and will stay in his place again in the future.
很方便的地點,很舒適的屋子!

We found the appartment as advertised on airbnb. The place is cosy, clean (for long time visitors: the cleaner comes once a week), and the location could not be better (5 minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, shops, Stanley market; half an hour by public bus to central Hong Kong).

Marcos is a very nice and helpful person. He answered all our questions quickly both before and during our stay. He even came up with a few beach toys for our children and offered them participating in a tennis lesson for kids free of charge.

Perfect appartment offering value for money, perfect host, perfect stay - thanks!
It's such a nice place for a holiday, the location is great and the beach is just 10 mins walk, Macros is very nice and helpful, we had a good time at Stanley.

Very nice flat, in the heart of Stanley village. Home away from home, the flat is very cosy. Thank you Marcos for your welcoming and your advices about Stanley. We could not have gas in the kitchen, but that was a minor problem given all the very nice restaurants around very very close, eg in Stanley plaza.

Marcos gave very specific instruction on the location of the flat before our arrival via phone and message.  Altough we made some misunderstanding about "the room on left side of the stair" , no one answered while knocking the exact door (with TV noise). And we found a key in the running shoe for the other room as instruction. That confused us.  But he is warm and very nice after all.

Except the air condition is a little noisy, the room is as comfortable as our home and extremely convenient, close to the bus station and shopping area,with a wonderful rooftop.

Marcos' place was terrific. A comfortable 1-bedroom, an incredibly comfortable bed, and an awesome location right next to Stanley Market. It was the second time Marcos was kind enough to host me. He's quick to respond, and has an easy-going personality as well. I'd highly recommend a stay there. Thanks again, Marcos!
Really good place to stay. Great host

Nice one bedroom flat in one of the best neighborhoods in Hong Kong. A good  escape from the busy city centre but still with easy access to everything. Marcos is a nice host. He kept checking if things were ok during our stay. Thank you for hosting us, Marcos.

Marcos' place is a perfect location for being in Stanley, right near the market, waterfront restaurants, the bus station and shopping.  We were not able to use the grill, which was disappointing, but his place was clean and adequate for our stay.
This was a great location in Stanley, near bus depot, coffee, and market. Bed was very comfortable. Ma cos was easy to get in touch with via email.

We had a great time in Stanley staying at Marcos' flat!  Awesome location... walk to both beaches and restaurants and shops and bars and the market and coffee houses and... well, everything!  For trips to the city, the bus stop that takes you right to downtown Hong Kong is literally across the street and very easy to navigate.

Marcos is a great host, very friendly and welcoming and there to answer any questions you have and/or give you great recommendations.  Would definitely recommend.

The property is very well located in Stanley market. Short walk to the Beach. Instructions were accurate and made it easy to locate - it's on the 5th floor with a nice staircase. Marcos apartment was neat & clean, exactly like the pic and I enjoyed my stay with him. Thanks.

Marcos, the host, has been extremely kind and helpful during our stay.  The flat is excellent and exactly what we need for a mini family vacation in a quiet seaside place. We love Stanley very much, and Marcos' flat would be our definite choice for our next trip there.

We are a family of three with a young toddler. Marcos was very friendly and he prepared a teddy for our daughter to play with during the stay. He upgraded us to another apartment of the same building and he attended to our requests even at night time. Thank you.
Had a little confusion with the key, but the overall place was very nice. Great location as well

Marco's place …is simply perfect!! A very nice place for stay-cation! Located at a great location which allow accessing bars around pier, the beach and the market in walking distance. 

For the house, it's with artistic decoration and fully equipped kitchen! The rooftop makes the perfect place being incredible!!

I enjoy my time there so much and would definitely return!!
Marcos was a great host and always responsive. The flat is very nice. Would recommend to stay there!
Localização ideal. Apartamento novo. Preço justo.
O apartamento da Gabriela é incrível. Super bem cuidado. Estava organizado, limpo e ainda recebi um kit de boas vindas :) Me senti muito bem acolhida. A localização é muito boa. Recomendo.

Nous avons passé un très beau séjour à Porto dans l'appartement de Maria. Il a été rénové il y a très peu de temps. Il est encore mieux que sur les photos!!! Bien situé dans le quartier des arts (très beau quartier), même si un peu loin du métro (10 minutes). Maria est très accueillante et souriante, et parle français ! Nous repasserons par cet appartement si nous revenons à Porto!

Both Maria and her husband were very nice and caring hosts. The Apartment is beautiful, quiet and nevertheless close to Porto's Center and sights. We had a great Porto experience - and hope to come back soon!
everything was great

This apartment is amazing. It is clean, bright, well-equipped and on a delightful quiet street 15 minutes from downtown. Maria is an excellent host and if we return to Porto, we would definitely stay here again.

Apartamentos seguros, confortáveis, e muito bem localizados...Maria do Céu e Antônio foram excepcionais anfitriões e formamos novos amigos no Porto...esperamos voltar em breve e desfrutar do conforto oferecido. Obrigado por tudo...já estamos com saudades....
Maria est très gentille, l'appartement est fonctionnel et bien placé.

Maria's apartment is one of the most beautiful spaces I have stayed at. It is located on a beautiful quiet street, in a renovated old house, but carries the spirit of old times. It has a small garden where you can have lunch and relax. The apartment is equipped with everything you need and is great for a couple, friends or a family. It is bigger than it looks like on the photos, very bright and clean. Maria and her husband are very very helpful and kind. They met us, gave us recommendations where to go and where to eat. We usually walked to the center because it is a nice, downhill walk and took a taxi back - just 5 euro or so. There is a nice park right behind the corner, a supermarket 5 minutes of walking away. Thank you Maria for everything!

O apartamento é lindo: exatamente como está nas (Website hidden by Airbnb) não for mais bonito. A região é ótima. O prédio tem um espaço atrás que minha filha brincou bastante. Maria é muito simpática e esteve sempre preocupada se precisávamos de alguma coisa. Muito cuidadosa conosco e com o espaço. Recomendo muito. Se voltamos a Porto, com certeza nos hospedaremos lá.

Everything was perfect.
Location, decoration, hosts were perfect.
Maria was so kind.
She made us comfortable.
I really appreciate it.

정말 추천합니다~

We fell in love with Porto.  Maria's place is so beautiful and exactly as described. It is very convenient to all of the sight. Maria is warm and so helpful. There are many personal touches. We hope to stay again.
Maria was an excellent host. Very kind and helpful.  My friends truly enjoyed staying at her beautiful place in Porto

El apartamento de Maria es muy lindo, tiene lo necesario para una agradable estancia, está muy bien ubicado y aunque no cuenta con parqueadero es muy fácil conseguir uno cercano, de pago. Además Maria le da a uno indicaciones precisas y respuestas rápidas. Lo pasamos muy bien en Porto, que además es una linda ciudad!

Maria was so kind - quick to answer all messages, met us in person for check in and check out, provided us a map and helped us pinpoint some places to see. The accommodation is perfect - spacious, clean, good location, quiet, and we used the laundry which was an added bonus. Everything was perfect, I would 100% recommend Maria's place!

Tha apartment is stylish, spaceful and located in a very good area of Porto. It is also very quiet as there is almost no traffic on the street. Maria is very helpful and we had a very good contact with her.

This apartment is very nice, good space, and nice kitchen cookery with utensils 

Great location
최고입니다!! 위치도 좋고 시설도 좋습니다!!
The place is really good! nice location and very pleasant host) highly recommend!

First of all, Thomas is truly a Super Host! He is communicative, polite, and detailed with the itinerary. Thomas answered all of our questions quickly and made sure everything was good. We stayed in his lovely apartment for the weekend after extending our trip a couple more days. His home is clean, nicely decorated and a 5 minute walk around the block to Charlie Young Beach. He provided beach chairs and towels. I love that his apartment feels like you're staying in a hotel! 

The apartment is also close to restaurants and stores in Kihei. Thomas was very kind enough to send his personal favorite list of places to visit/eat in Maui! If you want a home away from home, this is the place to stay.
Good place to stay, Thomas made sure we were confortable and satisfied!

Sehr gute Ausgangslage für Ausflüge auf der ganzen Insel. Die Wohung war perfekt für 2 Personen und sehr nahe an einem tollen Strand.
Supermarkt sowie Bars und Restaurants gut zu Fuss erreichbar.
Reservierter Parkplatz direkt vor der Wohnung.

We enjoyed two wonderful weeks in this well equipped, great location apartment in Kihei. Thomas is an excellent and attentive host. Communication from the very start was fast and detailed. Every question was answered, and our request to start our trip a little early was accommodated without any fuss. He also sent us a PDF guide with lots of pages on tips for restaurants, beaches, snorkeling, driving adventures etc. A lot of them we followed.

The apartment itself is exactly as advertised. Comfortable, well equipped with all the essential kitchen appliances and accessories. Air conditioning in the main living room, and portable air conditioning in the bedroom which worked a treat during our stay. The added extras such as beach chairs, beach mats and a drinks/food cooler was very much appreciated, and used every day. Parking is right at the front and easy to access. 

The location is to die for. Having explored every part of this amazing Island we agreed that our favourite location was Kikei. The locals were very friendly, access to restaurants and supermarkets was just minutes away, and many of the Island learn to surf clinics (highly recommend doing this!) were run from a beach 5 minutes walk along the street. Every day we swam with turtles at the beaches immediately in the area of the apartment. You can literally walk out of the apartment, across the road and watch the sunset over the ocean every day. Amazing!

I highly recommend this apartment and Thomas as a host.

The apartment is really nice and perfect for a couple or a small family. Perfect location within walking distance to Charlie Young Beach (children-friendly) and Cove Beach (Surf Spot). Grocery store (Foodland & others), restaurants and markets are also within walking distance. Would definitely return here.

The flat is in a great location, clean and with all you need to have a comfortable stay. I didn't meet Thomas in person but he is for sure a great host.
Thanks for you space Thomas!

Great location, apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Loved the list of local attractions to visit while in Maui. 
Thomas was very helpful, he came to help us find the apartment the night of arrival. Thank You!

Thomas was an excellent host - from responsive, quick communication before our visit, to the nice little touches and treats in the apartment, all the way through our stay. 

His apartment was magnificent - very chic and nicely furnished, with a great kitchen and dishes, pans, and tupperware for making meals and cooking up local farmer's market produce. It's in a terrific location in Kihei with reserved parking, in close walking proximity to two great beaches for easy sunset viewing. He also sent us wonderful tips and .

Service above and beyond the norm: Thomas was even willing to receive a package and hang onto it when I realized I'd left ordering a bit late for it to make it all the way to the mainland before our trip. Truly outstanding service!

Thomas, thank you for your outstanding hospitality and beautiful space. I will be wholeheartedly recommending your apartment to friends!

What an incredible find:?)  Close to the beaches, very clean, plenty of amenities (laundry, well-stocked kitchen, comfy king sized bed and a private lanai!)  Thanks to our host, Thomas for accommodating us on short notice!  Your hospitality and aloha will not be forgotten!

If you are looking for a great place to stay with an excellent location to multiple beaches, dining, and shopping look no further! Thomas was a great host and his place was super clean and up to date with everything we needed plus more.
Very nice and clean apartment! Thomas is an amazing host and communication was excellent. Very flexible check in process.

The location was great and the space was exactly as described. Clean with well thought out details and all the best amenities.

The only issue was we found the bed to be a bit on the soft and lumpy side, that's about the only area that could be improved in this very nice space.

Location exceeded my expectations!
Great walking distance beach, shops and restaurants.
Quiet nights sleep and really appreciated the hair products in shower since I neglected to pack any. The place itself was clean and comfy!

Great location! walkable to some nice shops and great places to eat - but just far enough away from the “resort scene”. The beach is across the street, which makes catching a sunset or doing some spontaneous snorkeling quick and easy. The condo itself is roomy and a perfectly good spot to close your eyes. It is well suited for someone that likes to get out and doesn’t plan to spend a lot of time inside. Thomas is very responsive and even provided some local tips. Great spot!

This was my first time using Airbnb! And I’m converted! Thomas was awesome! He made me comfortable by assuring that the place is reserved and gave me specifics on how to find the it, parking, getting in, etc. This is the perfect location to explore the Kihei area. Exactly what we needed. Thank you so much!

Thomas’ place was easy to find and conveniently located...made a great starting point for our adventures. Cute and clean. Thomas also provided a couple of nice surprises and good suggestions for places to go.
Thomas was awesome!  Excellent communication, amazing location & nice touches.  I look forward to visiting again :)

Very good central location in Kehei, easy to get around from there to all the beaches.  Well equipped kitchen for cooking your own meals if you want.  Nice space, we spent several days there and were very comfortable.  Front room just a bit noisy because it's close to a busy road.  But the bedroom was very quiet and we slept great, super restful!  Excellent natural ventilation, air flow through was quite pleasant.  Thomas was very welcoming and helpful, we'd love to stay here again!
The apartment was good! We had a great time and everything was organised perfectly! Thank you!

Thomas’ apt was a comfortable place to relax and he had some very sweet touches for us when we arrived. Check in was seamless and he had 2 bottles of water for my husband and I in the fridge. He also laid out some snacks and candies for us, and had coffee and tea for us. We thought it was very kind of him to do that. The only con was that the air conditioner is in the bedroom closet, and when the closet door is closed it’s okay. But when you open the closet door to let that cool air into the room, the AC is loud. So this made it a bit difficult to sleep through at night. We were also bummed we never got to meet our host and we called him to inform him we were checking out and he never got back to us. Other than that he was communicative throughout our stay and we enjoyed our trip to Maui. :)
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Spacious, welcoming apartment that feels like home.  Very comfortable bed, and a great place to relax in and/or make your home base while visiting Montreal.  Clean, with anything you might need to cook - laundry, wifi, close to metro and shops and very quiet.  

Natalie was a very accommodating host, was very easy to communicate with and was available to answer questions and make sure everything we needed was there.  Will definitely book again!
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed here for a month, and the place was great, just like in the pictures and even better.
Nathalie is a great host, responsive and ready to help.
5 star review with no doubts.

athena is a good, sweet and very helpful host. I had a change of plan of 4 times, but she was all patience with me and even help me to get a additional room at the very last min, given me a list of eatery and shopping guide, and even help me book a place for resturant. despite she wasnt ard when i checked in, she even left a gift. The room is as what shown in the picture. Location was ard a 5min walk to MRT and very convience with lots of eatery right behind. The staff there is also helpful and much more polite than those hkg hotel that i had stayed previously. Must say i had a very good stay at athena place. my 1st choice for my next hkg trip.

Our experience overall was great. the host was so kind, generous and hospitable. We love our room so much.. very clean and cozy, and most importantly very affordable.Everything was there: free personal care supplies, hot and cold shower, etc. Moreover, the place is very strategic; its along the business district and near MTR stations. I love to go back there very very soon. So those who planned to go to hongkong please try this place and I am pretty sure you wont regret it.

Direction to our room was clear. Mr. Keith is very helpful. Answer all of our calls even at wee hours. Never had a problem. Linens are crisp and clean. I asked for another pillow and he gave me for no extra charge. The room was small though but clean. I would recommend this place for back packers.

Athena was very helpful as she provided us various information that makes our trip to HongKong wonderful. Although the room is quite small, it is very clean and it is located near the MTR so its very convient. Overall, it is really a nice place to stay at if you are looking for a budget place to stay.

Our experience was good as Mr Yiu and Ms Luk were excellent in facilitating our check in and answered all our queries during our stay. They even provided us with a local SIM card and ended our trip with a sure win lucky draw prize!
The room was small but cosy and clean. Shampoo, shower gel and toothbrush with toothpaste are provided. Towels are available on request. 
The location is right in the middle of Nathan Road. You can choose to walk to either Mongkok and Ya Mau Tei MTR and both are just a 5-7 mins walk away.
Overall, a good convenient place to stay for short trips.

We knew our 3 nights stay got off to good start with warm welcome from Mr Yiu :) Very near to Mong Kok MRT station which is made it very convenient for us to explore Hong Kong. Room fitted the description listings and daily room service in tidying up our room was definitely a plus point. Ms Lok and Mr Yiu also are very helpful in accommodating our request for our early check out. Will recommend this place to our friends and we will be back to stay at this place again if we visit Hong Kong again.

Yes! The room did look like from the pictures- the beds came in single twin beds, and even the comforter sets, the bedsheets were exactly like in the picture too! (even the curtains). 

I've to commend the room's cleanliness. One of the first few things that I noticed about the room when I stepped in was its clean floor- spick and span, I did not spot clumps of hair or the floor being covered in dust- that was one of the strengths of the room. 

Secondly, the toilet's floor was clean and there was no hair lying about the floor, or murky stains spotted about the toilet (not that I dared inspect every corner dilligently- but I stepped into the toilet barefooted, assured that it was clean)

They only provide basic body foam and shampoo, which are put into wall dispensers. I found the body soap to suffice but the shampoo was abit drying and so you might want to bring your own shampoo perhaps. 

Cleanliness-wise, I give the sleeping area room + the toilets a 3.5 / 5 stars as I did not spot any dirt that irked me, the floors were clean enough to walk barefoot and they looked without dust. 
Perhaps, the only area which I did not walk barefoot much on was the doorway area as we were wearing shoes in and walking on it, during our first day. 

Space-wise, it may be small, but mangeable for 2 people. I would say that it is just nice- roomy for 1 pax but just nice- slightly tight (depending on how spacey a room you are used to) for 2 people. Hong Kong is known for small room sizes though, so I thought this small room space is common.
The toilet is quite small though, and the places to hang your clothes/towels might not be as luxurious as hotels but we managed alright ultimately. There's not much space to move in the toilet. But its cleanliness and the reasonable price topped the space constraints! Bedroom wise , space is alright for 2 people.

Perhaps, the room window was the only difficult thing managing as it was abit hard closing it and some slight dust.

Towels and linen smelt fresh! Bedsheets felt clean!
You need to request for towels. 
Host was very obliging, VERY, in answering all my many questions! I emailed her TONS. 
Keith & Joey were on duty when we were there and both are helpful, obliging people. Joey was very friendly and helped us to check which Karaoke places were cheap and the night bus to the airport! Their guesthouse is quite systematic I feel, with either Keith or Joey(lu xiao jie) on duty at different times of the day and they give you the number to call them with a phone hung outside the reception door. 
Keith answered any questions we had too! 
They even provided us a SIM card with internet!
THANK YOU Athena, Keith&Joey! 
For this price&cleanliness, it's worth.

3박4일 일정 중 첫날을 제외한 이틀을 머물렀으며,
첫날 묵었던 숙소와 비교하자면
창문이 있어 답답하지 않았고,
전체적으로 깔끔하고 깨끗했음. 그리고 첫날 숙소에 없던 헤어드라이기, 콘센트변환기 등이 잘 구비되어있음.
난방, 에어컨도 양호함.

以香港寸土寸金來說這間價錢小而美
雖然不像五星旅館雄偉壯觀
但是對於想要深入了解香港的自由行旅客
想把錢花在香港美食和文化而非交通的話
這間旅館是不錯的選擇!
離旺角地鐵站非常近周遭生活機能很完美

房東非常熱心
有有疑問在詢問都可以迅速地得到解答
房東在各方面的協助都非常細心仔細
這次因為遇到中秋連續假期所以問了一些當地特別活動消息
房間也快速的把相關資料給我們參考
就連在一開始check in的時候還借我們一本很有內容､非廣告類別､台灣出版的香港旅遊書說可以從裡面找到更多訊息

房間內乾淨且安靜
清潔人員也很和善
就算到了需要提早check out也不需要擔心不方便找房東

真的非常推薦!
房间比较小,打开箱子就比较麻烦了,不过基本设施都挺齐全的,挺干净的｡
很適合背包客自助旅行,地理位置很好,房東人也很好｡

Nice atomosphere, good location.
Communication has something bad..
But I really enjoyed at here.

Thank-you very much for receptionist and all staffs:)

Athena is very nice. She will give you all informations u need.
The place is very easy to find and very close to everything.
Rooms are very clear and comfortable. Just need hear plugs if ur neighbors talk to much.
I definitely recommend this place.
地点非常方便,姐姐人也特别nice,我们不懂的地方,都很有耐心帮我们解决｡房间非常好,东西非常全,又很干净,下次来还会住在这里｡
每次来香港必须要住的地方~性价比超高~

nice staff
close shopping area

우선 예상했던 대로 숙소는 매우 비좁았습니다 하지만 그 점 빼고는 그외 불편한 점이
하나도 없었습니다 꽤 청결한 편이었고 불편사항이 생겼을때 호스트를 호출하면 바로 와서 해결해주었습니다 위치는 mtr역과 도보7분정도 거리였고 근처 번화가에 위치해 있어 편리했습니다
房间干净,地理位置很好,买了很多东西随时可以放回去,附近环境也很安全!重点是老板人也很好
small but has everything that you need. stratehic location. highly recommended
This guest house offered a clean & comfortable room with window, cold a/c & no bugs. The 10sqft toilet requires getting used to but I expected something very basic in HK. Stay was good.

Barbara was a most gracious and generous host.  She went out of her way to make me feel comfortable and (in effect) have a home away from home.  Her apartment is nothing short of amazing.  It is a great size for Hong Kong, incredibly comfortable, spotlessly clean and elegantly furnished.  The apartment is an an oasis from the hustle & bustle of Hong Kong.  It is perfectly situated on Hollywood Road, in the thick of a great selection of restaurants & bars and parks and is walking distance to Central & SOHO.  The apartment is open and airy, filled with natural light and is perfect for the business person that needs space to work out of or just to have a breather from the Hong Kong pace (a real luxury for Hong Kong).  The rooftop garden is a real bonus.  What a wonderful and unique experience.  I highly recommend this to any business person and discerning traveller.  I hope to return there soon.  Thanks Barbara! :-)
Luxurious and spacious penthouse in a trendy neighborhood; the pics really don't do it justice. Smooth communication and check-in. Would definitely recommend. Thank you for a great stay!

Barbara's place is fantastic and she is a wonderful host! We stayed for 10 days and felt at home as soon as we walked through the door. Really enjoyed the neighborhood - it was fairly quiet at night, but just a few blocks to walk to the shops and restaurants along Hollywood Road (the art/artisan shops at PMQ were our favorite). The kitchen is well equipped and there are two grocery markets within a few minutes walk (one Chinese-style and one English-style), so it was easy to make breakfast each morning, open up the balcony doors, and listen to the birds chirping in the park across the street. Barbara was very helpful with suggestions on dinner places - she gave us 6 suggestions within a 5 minute walk; we made it to 5 and had a great meal each time. The Sheung Wan area is very convenient to Central and it's easy to pick up taxis, trams, and the MTR within a few blocks of the apartment to get anywhere in the city. We'd definitely book Barbara's place again if we return to Hong Kong.

A very beautifully furnished space in a very trendy area roughly equidistant from Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan MTRs. Lots of cool cafes, restaurants and bars surround the flat. Check-in was easy and communication with Barbara was fast and effective. The doorman (particularly a charming gentleman by the name of Albert) gave tips to travelling around the area and it was always a nice feeling to see a familiar face when returning to the apartment. Will definitely stay in this space again if I get the chance!

AMAZING - the Penthouse in real life is 10x better then the images, PLUS the rooftop is so amazing and has such an amazing view it's all to your self with enough furniture to have 8 friends up there ( though I was by myself ) 

The community is amazing there's a MUST go to coffee shop right next door ( I forget the name ) 

Wifi is great 

Bed was super comfy 

Barbara is super helpful and I couldn't recommend the place enough, was worth every penny!
A real gem, beautiful apartment, well located we loved staying here. Barbara is a great host and was super helpful. Would highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay at Barbara's house. It was very clean and Barbara has a great taste of designing the house. The kitchen, bathroom, dining area, all of those are very well decorated. The location is very convenient, and it was a great experience exploring this side of the Hong Kong island. There was a great combination of modern and histories.

Barbara’s place is wonderful and perfect, it’s very comfortable and have a great design, totally same with the photos who shown. 
And the place really bring us a cozy home feeling when our staying, and the environment is quiet and peace, and also nearby the convenience store. 
The location is convenience too, if you’re familiar with the tramway, it’s so much easy to roam around the central.

A wonderful location and a beautiful studio nest to come home to, what more could one ask! You can find endless places to explore within walking distance, and a range of simple cafes to hip restaurants. So different from staying in the usual hotels. Highly recommended for the discerning Airbnbist.

Amazing apartment in the most stylish central area of hong kong. It is close to all the shops and restaurants that you need on your holiday and even for your longer term business trip. Highly recommend.

An absolutely wonderful place to stay while exploring Hong Kong.  Beautiful apartment, clean, wonderful views and open spaces...a rarity in HK.  Kitchen was well appointed, bed was comfortable, shower spacious and washing machine/dryer a nice plus for longer stay.  Doormen are sweet and always there to help.  

The location is great with a 5 minute walk to the two closest metro stops (we used Sai Ying Pun A1 mostly) and a few grocery stores.  This area provides a lot of atmosphere with many small Chinese stores and a couple temples nearby.   Cute cafe for morning coffee on ground level of building.  Hollywood Park across the street.  Antique stores just down the street and nightlife of LKF and SoHo are within walking distance but far enough away to not disturb your sleep.

Barbara was very responsive and easy to communicate with.  She made suggestions on a few restaurants too.  A perfect place to call home during our stay.  We will be back on our next visit to HK!

Barbara went out of her way to make our trip special. Because we arrived late on a Sunday, she took the extra step of asking what did she could have waiting, and she also made excellent recommendations regarding local restaurants and bars. The space was lovely and the neighborhood is a perfect mix of old and new. I loved the balcony and roof, and enjoyed waking  up to the activity across the street at the park each morning. There is also an interesting small temple perhaps a block or so away. The walk to the MTR is perhaps 10 minutes, and there is plenty of access to shops and food. I highly recommend this space for anyone visiting Hong Kong!

I’m always too lazy to write reviews but this trip has really changed my view towards HK (housing and residents etc)! I was on a hectic blitz like business trip and booked this apt very late at night after exhausting myself at work. Despite such a crazily short notice Barbara immediately arranged a key for me to get in without any complaints. The 24hr doorman is always so nice. I didn’t have a chance to wander around but as far as I know restaurants, convenient stores or even hospital are all downstairs and IFC (the usual working place) is just 5-10min taxi away. I’ve had some terrible experience staying at Airbnb HK previously and switched back to the boring 5 star hotel mode since then. But I would now defo place Barbara’s apt as my top choice whenever I travel to HK. I would sincerely recommend it to anyone who wants to have a down-to-earth experience in HK esp those on business trips. Last word, the pano view is amazingly refreshing - you’ll know what I’m talking about if you are familiar with the HK housing conditions ;p

Barbara's apartment is in the perfect postion on HK Island , close to an MTR, not far from the ferries ( an easy walking distance) lots of good cafes and restaurants in the area and grocery shops if you want to self cater. Being on Hollywood Road it is also close to lots of popular tourist (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a very stylish, beautiful apartment but also very practical and extremely comfortable. It had everything you could possibly need during your stay and was spotlessly clean. The roof terrace and balcony are a real bonus too. It overlooks a beautiful little park and the area is very quiet at night. Barbara was a very helpful host, easy to contact and quick to respond to any queries. The concierges were also very curteous, friendly and helpful ( especially Albert!) I really hpe we can use Barbara's aprtment on our next visit to HK!!
My second time staying here. Barbara prepared some super delicious fish congee for me. Love this place so much!

Wonderful AirBnB with a beautiful view over the treetops of the park next door. Very spacious and comfortable with lots of natural light. Perfect location on Hollywood Road, walking distance to SoHo and the Sheung Wan or SYP MTR. The 24/7 front desk is super helpful and friendly, and Barbara is a wonderful host!

Barbara is a lovely person!
She gave us a lot of tips about HK which made our trip awesome.
The apartment is amazing, clean with geat view and location, walking distance to everything.
We highly recommend this space for anyone visiting Hong Kong!

Really, a great apt to base yourself - agree with all previous reviews. Comfortable and stylish apt. We liked the neighbourhood for its restaurants & cafes.  In walking distance - but just far enough away - from the craziness of Central.

Amazing place. It’s more beautiful than pictures. The big balcony has a great view of Hon Kong buildings .  The apartment is good designed. A lot of Chinese paintings and photos. Bathroom is made from marble, elegant. The kitchen has everything you need. The bed is very soft. And most thankfully, there is 24h guard, help us a lot.
房间会比照片美很多,充满了设计感,还有一个超级大的阳台,风景很好,楼下就是荷里活公园,周围到处都是咖啡馆､小吃店､商店,去半山扶梯､九记牛腩走路大约10多分钟,楼下的保安叔叔超级和蔼,感恩!
Barbara’s place is perfect in every way - location, comfort, and style.  We had a wonderful stay and enjoyed meeting Barbara.
Shannon's apartment was left lovely and clean with plenty of towels and bedding, the place was huge and it was a pleasure to stay there.

Shannon was very helpful and flexible, available for questions whenever I had them. Her apartment is gorgeous, just as described and very clean and spacious. The apartment complex is also really cool, and we were lucky enough to meet some of the other lovely residents during our stay. The location near the myrtle JMZ train station was so convenient. We had a fantastic time here.

I only hope that every airbnb host is as friendly and efficient as Shannon. We couldn't have asked for a better stay in her lovely apartment. It was clean, spacious, fully stocked with linen/bathroom supplies and super close to the JMZ train line. Thanks so much Shannon, it made the trip that much easier.

we spent a great time in the appartment of shannon. everything we needed was there- perfect kitchen, lots of fresh towels and sheats, very interesting building with billiard, ping pong,etc.downstairs. perfect subway station to everywhere nearby. nice delis around. perfect for a new york brooklyn trip - not the snobby one.
thank you shannon

Shannon is so cool ! And her loft is conveniently located for almost everything. Very close to the subway station,bars.restaurants,and delis. She helped me,and my girlfriend to find things to do nearby, She also took good care of us. I would stay at her place again and again.
Wonderful apartment, great hostess.
Great space in an amazing area. Very unique.

Appartement très bien placé, au carrefour de Brooklyn (Bushwick-Williamsburg) et Manhattan. Très bien déservit par le métro et les bus.

Ce qui nous a plu est la vie de quartier très populaire sans aucun souci, gens sympathiques toujours près à aider ou renseigner (comme partout ailleurs à NYC )

I had a really great time at Shannons Apartment. Everything was perfect and everything was there to feel like home. Shannon is a very nice person and i hope to be there very soon again. Thank you for all.

Shannon's Appartment is amazing. 

The place is in a great location within walking distance from two subway lines, great restaurants, 24 hour fresh produce and deli, close to good clothing shops and a quick 15minute subway ride to everything manhattan has to offer. 

The bed is comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked, the games room is good fun and the rooftop is jaw dropping. 

Shannon is a great host, she had plenty of good recommendations to help us get the most out of bushwick and it's surrounding neighborhoods. And she was incredibly accommodating towards our crazy 2am arrival! (Thanks for waiting up Shannon!)

If your looking for a more unique stay in New York, away from the swarms of tourists in Manhattan then this is the perfect place to base yourself. 

10/10 could not fault the place.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay at Shannon's loft. Shannon was extremely friendly and considerate, and she was very reachable when we had questions. I felt safe in the building, and the room suited the two of us just fine. Loved the book collection. No pool balls in the common room, but we just played ping pong instead. 

The location is extremely convenient - just a couple minutes walk to subway. We were able to get all over NYC easily and it was great to come back, relax and cook a nice meal at the end of the day at the loft. We would definitely stay here again - wish I lived here!
Perfect. Great location. Great host.

Shannon's place was great, just like the home I would want in NYC. I used to live in Manhattan years ago and I was visiting with my girlfriend for the New Years. It was her first trip to the U.S. and she wanted to see New York, a real, authentic, and old New York. Bushwick is that right now. It's hip, arty, and with just enough grit to make it feel like you're in New York not the theme park that tourists end up going to. Her apartment is close to trains, some great restaurants and grocery stores, and the building is really cool. We mostly stayed out, but when we stayed in we could cook and watch Netflix like we were home. I can not stress how comfy she has made it. I really felt like I was home. I would highly recommend Shannon's place and would love to stay there again

Shannon's place was perfect.  Not too sparse, not too cluttered.  A great loft experience.  Location is great - subway two blocks away and the Citibike station only 3 blocks away.  Shannon was very easy to deal with, quick to respond and was a pro at hosting.  Hope to stay here again!
OK:)

Shannon était en déplacement, mais nous avons pu facilement la contacter, et avons été reçu par une amie qui nous a donné les clefs. Nous avons pu avoir les informations qui nous manquaient par mail ou par téléphone avec Shannon.
L'appartement correspond à la description, un des couchage est sur une mezzanine au dessus d'un lit 2 places. Le Building est très sympa, c'est super pratique de pouvoir faire ses lessives, et de pouvoir répéter son instrument (pour les musiciens) au sous-sol!
Le quartier est typique, c'est agréable d'être les seuls touristes, de pouvoir se sentir immergé.  C'est un quartier authentique et populaire, mais on s'y sent en sécurité. Il y a des commerces à proximité.
The place is very nice, big, clean and stylish. We really enjoyed our week and Shannon helped us very quickly when we had questions, thanks a lot!

For our first time in New York, it was somewhat courageous of us to live like locals, deep in the neighborhood of Bushwick, Brooklyn.  It took some adjusting for us to hang out in the area.  The area is considered 'gritty' which is extremely true. I cant stress that enough. It is dirty, you might be bothered for spare change, you might be asked to swipe your metro card for someone,  however the area does have some of the coolest restaurants in the city. But you must go looking for them, otherwise you will only find corner deli's that don't take international credit cards and random pawn shops etc.  We actually loved our experience at Shannon's though. Shannon's studio was great. Lots of space for two. The only complaints we had were that the walls were paper thin and it was all around a bit dirty. We washed the dishes before using them since they were dusty and just kept a fan at night to block out noise. We also could not reach Shannon until the day of our reservation and had to wait past check in time to get the keys. Once we were in contact, Shannon was super nice and helpful. The roof top is amazing! You can see some of Manhatten's skyline. The subway takes about half an hour to get to Manhatten , once you are there, probably another 15 to wherever you want to go. It is nice to get away from the zoo of Manhatten, I strongly recommend staying in Brooklyn, it's gives you more of a well rounded experience.  For us, this was great, we loved the experience of what it would be like to live there.

Shannon's apartment was fantastic. A great location super close to the subway and to plenty of delicious spots to eat and drink, this apartment provided us with a very relaxing place to take a break from the hustle and bustle of the city while still remaining close enough to get back it when rested. A great price for such a fantastic location would make this apartment a no-brainer for any future trips we take to New York. Thanks for such a great place!

The accommodation was very good, we liked the neighborhood very much even though is a little gray in contrast to other areas. Brooklyn, however is a neighborhood that is being transformed. It takes about 30 minutes to get to Manhattan, but worth staying in Brooklyn and explore this part of the city. Shannon's attention was good although not met, although slow to respond to messages so you have to take that into account. The apartment was clean, but the building was not.

Undoubtedly it is a good option to stay especially if you're a tourist and you want concoer both Manhattan and Brooklyn.

It was exactly as the descriptions states: "a comfortable stay". I just stayed for one day and everything was nice. Comfortable private bedroom. Lane and her sister helped me in everything I needed at any time. I definitely recommend it for a short stay close to the JFK airport!! Thanks for everything Lane!

Great host. Was very nice, clean, quiet apartment.
Really appreciate the hosts, friendly people.
Will be staying again!
That's a wonderful stay in New York. Lane and her sister is helpful for our stay and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can cook  and get everything as our want.

I had a nice time in a peaceful atmosphere. Clean place and quiet area, even if it's located in Jamaica Queen. 8 minutes walk from the f and e lines that go downtown. A perfect stay if you are on a budget and really good hosts.

I stay in many an AirBnB, and most I judge on the accommodations alone.  This time it was Lane's warmth and hospitality that stood out.  The place was exactly as described and Lane was wonderful.  I hope to stay there again.
Amazing host, very welcoming and great communication.

Had a one day layover in JFK and wanted to see Queens! Close to airport and train to the places in NE Queens I wanted to visit, then continued on to Manhattan and eventually made it back to JFK. Laney was helpful and made sure I got there alright and followed up with me the next day. Great place to get some sleep and be ready to explore in the morning. About a $20 cab ride from JFK-- was easier than navigating train later at night after long day.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lane was very responsive to my messages. Lane's sister was very friendly during my stay and made sure I had everything I needed. The room itself is quite comfortable, and I slept great! Quiet and clean apartment in a nice neighborhood. Train is just a short walk away. Just be sure to bring your own towel and soap. Well worth the money,  5/5 would stay again.

We had a great stay here! From the moment we (My 4y/o Godson and I) arrived we felt welcomed and very accommodated. Annette made sure we were comfortable and even texted to check on us when we didn't come back one night. She is the best! Its clean, has a nice kitchen, and its in a nice neighborhood... a quick walk to the subway. She made me feel like I was a part of their family and that meant a lot because I am here alone. I wish we could've stayed longer and will definitely return if need be... Thanks so much, Ladies!!

Omg where do I start?!?! Lane is so sweet and gorg. She answered all of my questions before I arrived. I felt so comfortable that I had to hug her when I saw her. We didn't interact because I was so tired and had a flight to catch in the morning. Her sister welcomed me when I arrived. The sheets were clean, the room is as pictured but I was cold in the middle of the night (but I'm always cold) also someone started playing music at 11pm until 11:45pm. It was very loud but not Lanes fault. I'd stay with Lane again

Lane was very responsive with any questions I had.  I never met her but she was very friendly and helpful.  Check in was with her sister who was also cordial.  Room is basic, nothing special, but enough for me who just needed a place to sleep, shower, and store luggage.  Lane was nice enough to let me check in early and leave luggage / chill on the couch for a while.  Good place if you don't need anything fancy.
Lovely people.. Quietly neighborhood.. if u on vacation in Queens the best spot to sleep is here people.

Lane was on a trip that day and her sister Annet took care of me. The host is very nice and easy going. The room is like how it was shown in the picture. The bed is soft and comfortable. The apartment is on the third floor and there's no elevator. The place is 10 minutes of walking distance to the nearest subway station.
Nous avons été accueillis gentiment par la sœur de Lane. La literie était confortable et propre. Quartier calme, pas très loin du métro , environ 15 minutes de marche.

Lane's sister arranged my arrival as Lane as out of town. If you need a good rest/sleep, this room is the perfect choice as it's incredibly calming and quiet. The house is very clean and the people were nice and quiet. The neighborhood is one of the better/safer neighborhoods in New York. NB: the layout is a bit confusing despite it being a grid system, and asking for directions can be rough as the people don't really know where the street is.

Wonderful experience.  Everything was just as it was advertised and the hosts were very accommodating.  The bed was comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet, and the price was right.  I will definitely be staying here again next time I frequent New York.
This listing is located in a really nice and safe neighborhood. Even though it is just for one night, I have a really comfortable stay.

Lane and Annette, her sister made me feel more than welcome, the room looks exactly like what was listed. The neighbourhood, very peaceful and about fifteen to thirty minutes drive from the JFK Airport, depending on traffic. Annette was available to describe to the cab driver just how to get to the apartment which was extremely useful considering my taxi was metered.

I had been in the air for a total period of 22 hours so I thought I would just rest a little and then go out a-discovering the Queens neighbourhood, thanks to information already supplied by Annette, but the peace and basic comfort of the room and surroundings conspired to ensuring that I did not wake up until much later in the night when most shops were closed or near to closing.
Pleasant stay at this place. Safe neighborhood. Accessible to subway. Friendly host who made us feel at home. Will definitely recommend to friends.

A estadia com a Fátima foi maravilhosa!! O apartamento é muito bem localizado, a suíte estava em perfeitas condições, havia uma cama super confortável, um excelente café da manhã e ainda ganhamos um mimo em nossa chegada! Eu e meu namorado ficamos bastante satisfeitos! A Fátima é um amor de pessoa e fez de tudo para que nossa estadia fosse boa! Seu filho Israel também foi muito simpático, nos explicando os detalhes do (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza quando voltar para o Rio procurarei pela Fátima! Quem estiver precisando de uma hospedagem pode fechar sem medo de errar! Não tem como se arrepender!

..Foram sem dúvidas as melhores mini férias que já tive!!A Fátima nos recebeu com aquele sorriso no rosto e  uma simpatia carioca que só ela tem rs tivemos uma estadia maravilhosa,o quarto é perfeito,cama super confortável,a suíte TOP e todo restante do apartamento uma graça..literalmente: Me senti em casa e com certeza voltarei em breve!!Além de ter passado ótimos dias na barra,o condomínio é super organizado e seguro e a localização perfeita!!Ahh dica SUPER ÚTIL: Usem o aplicativo UBER ao invés de táxi,muitoooooo mais em conta e o serviço prestado é ótimo!!Já estou com saudades dessa fofinha que nos acolheu tão bem!
Fátima foi muito solícita e muito preocupada em fazer com que seus hóspedes se sintam bem.  A localização é muito boa. Um excelente custo benefício.

Amamos a hospedagem na casa da Fátima! Super atenciosa, gente boa, prestativa.. Nos sentimos em casa! Foram realmente maravilhosos dias que já nos deixou saudade! Quarto Mt bom, apartamento Mt bem localizado! Recomendamos de olhos fechados! Vale a pena conferir! Esperamos voltar em breve...

Olá quero deixar meu feedback sobre minha estadia. O anúncio cumpri com o que descreve. Ótima localização, tranquilo e confiável. 
A anfitriã foi super educada nos deixou a vontade para entrar a sair. Ela nos deu suporte em tudo o que precisávamos  inclusive no café da mãe. A casa é muito higiênica e nos atendeu para o que queríamos. Água quente no chuveiro e tolhas e roupas de cama em perfeito estado e inclusive com direito as alguns mimos ( drinks no frigobar e docinhos welcome) Obrigada por tudo.
Fátima nos recebeu muito bem ! O apartamento fica bem localizado e o quarto é muito confortável ! Adoramos nossa estadia!
Everything was perfect I felt just at home :)

Ótima localização, a anfitriã deixa o apto praticamente para os hóspedes, pois ela fica em 1 cômodo separado, a cozinha é bem equipada e oferece um ótimo café da manhã. 
É muito simpática e deu algumas dicas de roteiros.
No frigobar havia algumas bebidas não alcoólicas de cortesia.
Piscina aquecida muito apropriada para a época do ano (julho).
Condomínio de alto padrão sem burocracias.
Muito bem recebido, tudo conforme descrito, só tenho elogios. Pretendo voltar novamente.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado e a Fátima, uma anfitriã muito solícita, simpática e acessível. Foi uma estadia curta, somente uma noite, mas voltaria em outra oportunidade, com certeza.

非常棒的一次住宿!
1.房东人很好,是个超棒的老太太,拿着谷歌翻译跟我对话,详细介绍了房间,还给准备了糖果､饮料,相当贴心｡
2.关于地段,Barra 区算是里约的新区和富人区,在里约的南边,人不多,而且算是安全的一块区域了,这个住处的周围全是酒店和小区,紧挨着大西洋,超长海岸线,平时当地人都会去海滩玩耍｡主干道上巴士也很多,想打车去旁边的酒店门口就有很多车在等着,还算方便｡就是在吃的上不太方便｡周围是有几家餐馆,我吃过一家买墨西哥卷的,一般般还不便宜,其他的没吃过但我感觉都不是便宜的主,最近的麦当劳有一千多米,说近不近说远不远,比较尴尬的距离｡附近有几个大的 mall 但都得坐公交或打车去｡
3.关于房间,一个独立房间双人床,带一个独立卫生间,有电视,能看到海,相当不错,主要一天才一百多人民币(可能记错了,但也差不多),在物价不低的里约来说相当便宜了｡
综上,非常推荐这里!

Highly recommend the room!
Thank you Fatima!
Mesmo pouco tempo foi um ótimo dia e estadia ... Nossa anfitriã muito simpática e comunicativa..: nos sentimos em casa e com certeza voltaremos ... Fátima obrigado pelo carinho.

Nos sentimos como en casa gracias a la hospitalidad de la anfitriona, no manejamos con total libertad, l ubicación del lugar es realmente buena, y pudimos utilizar todos los servicios del edificio, como la pileta, el jacuzzi, el Gimnasio. 
Tuvimos comida todos los días y la limpieza es excelente.

Experiência maravilhosa! 
Tratamento VIP da querida Fátima, muito gentil e atenciosa do início ao fim da hospedagem. Nos deixou a vontade.
Limpeza e organização nota 10.
Só tenho elogios e voltarei em breve.

It’s my first AirBNB experience ever and I couldn’t be happier to have spent it at Mama Fatima’s house! 
 If you want to spend your vacation in Rio, spend it in Barra, and spend it in her home. Her place is well secured and is very close to the beach!  There’re also plenty of food available in the kitchen and there’s a grocery store just outside her place. It’s a plus that you can also wash your dirty clothes and cook your own food!
People in her neighborhood are very warm & friendly, they would smile back when you smile at them. They would greet you if you greet them. I wish I could have spent more time in her place!! I highly recommend this place for those who want a more relaxed & carefree vacation in Rio.
- lawrenzo, myra, & aba

Mantenho o meu discurso de 6 meses atrás quando fiquei pela primeira vez com a Fátima...tudo excelente! Já não é mais possível ir ao Rio e não pensar em se hospedar em seu apartamento! Fantástico! Recomendo de olhos fechados!

Minha estadia na Fatima foi incrível. Sempre que vier ao Rio ficarei em seus aposentos... O melhor tratamento que o ser humano pode ter.. parabéns Fatima... tudo muito show... Amamos... Sempre irei recomendar...

No sistema Airbnb foi nossa primeira experiência. Somos viajantes de acomodações exclusivas em hotéis, pousadas e as vezes casas. Saliento que somos casal e casal de filhos de 15 e 11 anos. A anfitriã foi o diferencial juntamente com seu outro hospede que tornaram a experiência ótima! Adoramos os dois! Ao ponto que gostaríamos de retribuir recebendo ambos em nossa (Website hidden by Airbnb) dica fica pelo seguinte; pra quem tem nosso perfil e estiver fazendo uma reserva no Airbnb, pergunte sobre o perfil do outro hospede(s) que estarão no seu período e se derem a sorte que demos, o único risco que correm é de fazer novos amigos e viver uma experiência que queremos repetir!! Abs Denis.

Eu e mais duas amigas ficamos hospedadas 5 dias com a Fátima. Ótima anfitriã, não temos queixas nenhuma é somente elogios. A Fatima nos deixa realmente em casa, sempre muito disposta a fazer de tudo para uma hospedagem maravilhosa. Impossível não virar sua amiga no final
Da viagem. Em relação aos quartos, impecáveis, muito limpos e roupas de cama bem cheirosas. Banheiro limpo e com todos produtos. O café da manhã é digno de hotel e fora que ela da total liberdade para fazermos lanchinhos no meio da tarde. Temos muita privacidade em sair e chegar na hora que quisermos. Enfim, foram 5 dias maravilhosos, Fatima arrasa na estadia.

Everything was great at Fatima's house, fully recommend her place and her great attention!

Best,
Gustavo

удобно добираться, рядом со всеми интересными местами, чисто, все есть. 
Не дорого. есть завтрак

This amazing place is the best! It is very close to everything I need, old city Sultanahmet (Mosques and everything) just few minutes walk. All amenities are around the hotel and easily accessible. Although it is in the heart of tourist spot, it is in a quiet street and really give a nice cosy place to sleep.
As a lone traveler and woman, this hotel give me a sense of security. It feels safe.  The staffs are extremely helpful and friendly. 
I left my wallet in the lobby area, the staff helped secure it. I need to go to airport, the staff who were on the way somewhere, brought me along and dropped me in the nearest metro station, saving me the trouble to drag my bagage around....and it was for free.
If I come back to Istanbul, i will stay in Sultan's inn again.
Как всегда, все супер. Спасибо!
Helpful host, many tips and arrangements for transportation. The place is 2-3 mins walk from Blue Mosque, 5-6 minutes from tramway.

My trip to Turkey means a lot to me. Alihan and his team helped me with everything I needed which I appreciate so much. The place is affordable and decent and everything is walking distance. Beautiful city. Definitely recommend.
Very good location, clean, comfortable - when you need only a place where you you want only to go sleep and whole day you spend outside the hotel it is a good choice.

Expérience très positive. Emplacement idéal dans un quartier agréable et touristique. Une femme de ménage qui passe tous les jours et remet le nécessaire de toilette. C'est une petite chambre d'hôtel mais c'est idéal si vous visitez la ville toute la journée et venez seulement pour dormir. Dommage qu'il n'y ait pas eu des bouteilles d'eau dans le frigidaire, par contre. Je recommande ce logement.
This was a great location to stay at in Istanbul I would recommend.

Очень удобное расположение для тех кто решил посмотреть достопремичательности.Подходит для одиночных путешественников и пар.Мне достался номер с недостаточно убранны сан узлом.А так хорошее соотношение цена качество.
Sultan Ahmet is a great area. Everything is in the neighborhood and if you're up for it.. just a walking distance away (tram is recommended)

Well, the room is small for many days, but if you used it just for sleep it’s okay. The air conditioner works but it’s old and we missed something better, and we think that this room - 20 - needs an upgrade. 

The location is very nice, close to all main places and super secure!
Very nice Hotel. Especially for that price. Thank you guys.

Хорошее место, не далеко от основных достопримечательностей . Своих денег стоило! 
Чистенько, красивый вид с крыши))
Cozy clean place, hospital friendly receptionists ,  close to Old city

Great location, very clean and truthful, there is always someone at the reception to help and guide you ... I only need extra blankets for cold nights. Overall perfect

Gran ubicación, muy limpio y veraz, siempre hay alguien en recepción para ayudarte y guiarte... Unicamente falto cobijas adicionales para noches frías. En general perfecto

Très bien situé, très propre et sincère, il y a toujours quelqu'un à la réception pour vous aider et vous guider ... Je n'ai besoin que de couvertures supplémentaires pour les nuits froides. Globalement parfait
В принципе, понравилось. Близко от достопримечательностей.  Хороший завтрак.Но оставляет желать лучшего чистота в номере. На прикроватной тумбочке пыль. В ванной волосы...
Vey good location easy to find. Kind personal. Clean accommodation.
De l'accueil aux prestations, tout était très bien. Je recommande chaudement cet établissement.
Stass and élani are very Nice ,  Thanks you .

Leni was very well coming. The flat was very tidy and the room was very comfortable. Perfect for a couple or a single person. She helped us with every request.
The location is very suitable. The flat is approx. 10 minutes away from the nearest subway station and 35 minutes by subway to 34th street.
Eleni's place is in the heart of Brooklyn and a cosy home base for the young crowd. Eleni and her roommates are helpful and fun people, thank you very much, we had a great time.

Finding the apartment was a breeze. Communication with Eleni was easy and always timely. She was very accomadating as we arrived later than I had originally stated. The room was perfect and exactly as mentioned. My dad and I enjoyed talking with the roommates after returning from the city one night. The apartment/flat has a very welcoming vibe.
Great room in good location in Brooklyn close to subway lines. Really friendly housemates

Eleni's place was very nice and cozy. Roommates were very friendly and helpful. The room had only one window on the ceiling and I didn't quite like that. Except that, eveything was great! I enjoyed my stay .
Awesome
Sakinlik arayanlar için güzel bir seçenek.Evde ihtiyacınız olabilecek her şey var.Deniz manzaralı geniş pencereli salonuna diyecek bir laf yok zaten.
