The only thing that is a drawback to this place in my opinion is that the loft can get quite stuffy, even with the fans going full blast. We were there in August, and several nights up there were fine, some others were uncomfortable, and there was 2 nights where it was extremely hard to sleep up there.

So overall, this place is perfect if you value a tranquil atmosphere with a killer view, in a nice unit in a pleasant complex, at a fair price. If you have enough guests to where you have to utilize the loft, the weather may be a roll of the dice as to how comfortable it is.

Angelica's apartment is excellent and the view is out of the world. Centrally located to almost everything from farmers market right across the street to malls to dining options to beaches to hikes to water sports. My kids 2 and 5 had a blast watching turtles from the patio and did not want to come back. I cooked many meals and enjoyed our dinners watching the sun set. The only thing i wish is this place had an AC coz the afternoons were very warm and the apartment felt like an oven. Nights get cooler though. We will be definitely going back again. Angelica is an amazing host and she was very prompt in answering all my questions. Thank you for having us stay in your gorgeous apartment.

Angelica responded quick and was very helpful whenever I had any questions about the stay. 
The description is accurate. It was a great place to stay with useful amenities that made the stay better.  Having the beach so close made a trip to the beach hassle free. The balcony served as the perfect spot to catch the sunset. 
Location of the apt was great. It was walking distance to restaurants and stores. The drive to Lahaina and Kaanapali was easy. There is also a park around the complex that looked very nice with shaded areas. 
Overall, it was a very good stay and space for a family.

Made a last minute decision to stay here the day before we arrived which can always be risky when you don't have time to research but we had a great time. Good location to stay on the west side. Definitely a great value for the price. Hard to get a view like this without paying an arm and leg. No AC but it is pretty windy on Maui and you get good air flow through the unit. Might be too hot for some especially if they are sleeping in the loft. Local health food grocery store is across the street along with a Boss frogs to rent paddle boards, bikes and snorkeling equipment. Many of the best beaches and snorkeling as well as downtown Lahaina within 10-15 minute drive.
Great experience!  Our host was awesome and helped with all my questions. Very clean and comfortable. Only steps from the ocean! My family enjoyed eating meals out on the balcony! Highly recommend

We stayed at this condo for 5 days in early October 2016 and had a great time! So close to all the best snorkelling spots and not too far from restaurants, etc in Lahaina. Farmers market (more of an organic and gluten free market) and coffee shop are a 2 minute walk and there is a nice little beach next to the pool. From the balcony we watched sea turtles feeding on the rocks and beautiful sunsets. Loved this Air BnB!

Skøn bolig lige i vandkanten. Dejlig badestrand,  hvor også skildpadder nyder at tumle sig.
Lejligheden er ren og pæn og har stort set alt, hvad man har behov for. Der bliver lidt trangt, hvis man er mere end 4 Pers., men det gik OK for os at være 5.
Vi brugte terrassen hele tiden. Derfra er der den flotteste udsigt.
Området blev passet fint, og lækker pool hører til komplekset. Roligt kvarter med gode indkøbsmuligheder.
This is THE best place to stay. It is clean, quiet, and well-equipped. The beach is private and beautiful. I would highly reccomend it to anyone.

Angelica was an excellent host. The location and amenities were perfect and accurately described. We found it hard to leave our little oasis as everything we needed was close to home. Thanks again for sharing your home with us Angelica!
The host texted me with all the information, everything was  great.

Loved this place!  Perfect for a family of 3-4. The view does not disappoint at all and the complex is fastidiously maintained. The beach next door is perfect for little people playing in the sand and/or breakers. We saw turtles in the water everyday and one came up to rest on the beach the last day! 

The loft gets warm and we were there in November. I can't imagine August. 

We would absolutely go back!
Perfect location and right on the beach.

I really appreciated how easy it was to contact Angelica and how quickly she responded. The condo was exactly as listed, if not, better! Location was great, a little quieter and less busy. It was wonderful falling asleep to the rolling waves every night! We could see turtle and whales spouting from our Lanai! Would definitely suggest her place to anyone that wants to have a clean,
Comfortable and beautiful place to stay in maui!
Beautiful place in a beautiful area. The condo was as advertised which is all you can ask for when booking outside of a resort to have a truly authentic Hawaiian vacation.
Great property. Little local stores and park close by. Good snorkel area

Angelica's place was great.  As others have noted, there is no air conditioning; however, with the trade winds and ceiling fans the condo stayed a nice temperature. There is a farmer's market, coffee shop, and lunch places a few blacks away.  The best part was the small beach just out back.  It was perfect to spend a day at or visit after driving around the island.  Everyday that we were at this beach we saw turtles swim right next to us!

The location was incredible...small private beach, amazing sunsets, private pool and walking distance to a few stores/restaurants. On the down side, the master bedroom is close to the street, so there is road noise from the occasional bus and a steady flow of traffic. There is no AC, so the condo can get warm during the day, but it cools off at night. The blinds in the master bedroom don't close all the way, so morning sun floods the room making you an early riser...all the better to get your day on Maui started.  Overall, we had a great stay and would consider HaleKai again!

Very well located and furnished property.  Close to the nearby Honokowai park/beach (with resident turtles!), the grocery stores, great spots for restaurants and nightlife within ten minutes.  The view from the balcony is fantastic.  The unit stayed cool during the nights and mornings but did get hot in the afternoon given there is no A/C and the unit faces west.  I recommend using the fans to help with the circulation and also keeping the windows and shutters open for cross-ventilation. Would highly recommend the property!

Beautiful location - it as nice having a pool too for those of us that didn't get in the ocean.  Liked being able to walk to shops, grocery and small restaurants.  The snorkeling was really fun up and down the coastal area.  We saw lots of turtles and other sea life.

Luiz and family met us when we arrived in Rio and drove us to the house. It was wonderful to have them greet us in a foreign city where we may have struggled to make our own way.
The house was very comfortable and having a maid service made our stay there very relaxed. Luiz and Lillian responded very quickly when we did have a little problem and got things put right very quickly.
We really appreciated the transport provided by Lillian's father Willian on several days.
Overall a marvellous experience.
Susan and her team are fabulous.  They received us at the apartment and explained how everything worked.  The location is unbeatable.  We had a really good time.

The apartment is very near the Metro system and plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. Very good service from manager on arrival and also from the staff at entrance to the building during our stay. The apartment itself is in our view somewhat smaller than it appears on the photos - the sofa pictured accommodates no more than 2 persons of european size.

My wife and our 2 children stayed in the apartment for a week. It was perfect for us. Great location very close to MTR and in the middle of busy Causeway Bay. Wjile the apartment was small by western standards it was good for us and gave everybody their own space. A much better option than a hotel. The fridge and small kitchen were functional and allowed us to prepare small snacks and breakfast if we wanted. Let's face it you will be mainly eating out in HK. All communication with Susann, Joanna & Szilvi was prompt, professional and helpful. We would recommend highly.
Perfect apartment in the Center of Honkong island, we enjoyed our stay for 4 days and I can recommend 100%. The service prior arriving is well organized. I plan to come again for the next exhibition.

Everything went well from the beginning. We got picked up by the driver and arrived safely at the apartment. The host was awesome and she kept our luggages after we checked out which, I am extremely grateful. The apartment was typical HK, small, cosy, efficient use of space and in a perfect location. Only downside is there isn't a safe deposit as advertised but didn't bother me much.  Would recommend as well as return again!

Our trip to Hong Kong could not have been a better experience and many of those thanks were due to the hospitality of Susann and her team. There were four of us arriving throughout different points of the night and having an apartment with an electronic code vice keys was extremely helpful. The apartment was clean, and the beds were very soft. This was my third stay in HK and in comparison to the other apartments this was slightly bigger than average. Located in Causeway Bay, there are tons of shops around and you are easily within walking distance to michelin star rated dim sum (at which we ate at twice in four days). Susann and Alessandra were extremely thorough, with an extensive helpbook provided to cover all your needs from dry cleaning to police to food. I highly recommend staying at this location, as everyone involved was extremely communicative and helpful! I would definitely stay here again, as I plan on continuing to visit my favorite city throughout Asia.

The overall experience was great. Susann was very communicative and supportive of our requests.  Via who was our local point of contact was also very welcoming and helpful.  The apartment is a good size by Hong Kong standards.  It had all the amenities as described and I appreciated that a blender was added to the kitchen appliances.  The location is very convenient to local shopping and MTR.   

The only challenge was that the bedrooms have very poor curtain blinds that dont block the light so there is no let up from the lights from the next door buildings and the 6am sunrise.

thanks again for a wonderful stay!
My friends and I had a fantastic time at Susann's place. The location is incredible and the apartment was comfortable to fit three adults. I would highly recommend this place!

The response from the host especially prior to check in is very prompt and very accommodating with our requests. Perfect apartment for a family holiday in Hong Kong. Location is excellent, close to the MTR, shops and restaurants. The concierge/pick up services I think is just as good as major hotels. The security of the flat is also very good and certainly felt very safe. The flat was well appointed and Via, our local contact was very helpful and accommodating. All in all, a great experience!

We stayed 3 nights at POSHandGO apartment and  the location was great. Walking distance to mall, shop, eateries, bus stop, MTR station, etc. The apartment building was next to Cafe de Coral and Food Republic; so nothing to worry when it came to meal time. The host was very courteous. Overall, we had a wonderful holiday experience =)

We had an amazing time at Susan place. We were picked up promptly from Airport. Via was very helpful. She even provided us a baby stroller than we needed for a few days. The apartment was cozy. The best thing about this place is location. Just 1 min to MTR and Hysan Place Mall..

Susann is the best host! Love her!she haves me much help ,and she is so nice .the house is very beautiful more than the picture ,room is very clean ,and the bed is very comfortable,very quite,we sleep very well all the night ,downstairs has much more delicious restaurants ,great location!I will be here when I next time come to hong kong !susann and via makes us so warm and welcomed !

absoluly highly recommend! First, great location: expecially for family trip. very near MTR and all the best shopping area in HK. Second, check in & out are both convenient, Via is helpful and also Susanna, sweet host they are. come to pick up us with the heavy luggage. Finally, the apartment is useful as HK size is always cozy but, here, totally enough space for us (three adults and two kids). we will definely come back again for such family trip.

The space in HK is limited, but Susann's kindness and hospitality is unlimited . She's the best host and her apartment is very nice. It is a harbor for us while we stayed in HK. She always understand our difficulties and offered her help immediately. 
Thank you Susann. Just like my daughter said, we like you and your apartment.

Affordable rates. Conveniently located in front of Hysan Place. Where Times Square is also of walking distance. The apartment is nice and clean. Complete with kitchen utensils. A/C works great. The only problem is that the toilets were too small; some of the faucets were broken and the doorknobs of the bedrooms could not be locked.
房子的地理位置很好,房子很干净,三个房间装修都不错｡
房子很好很干净

This is my first experience with Airbnb and it was wonderful. Suzann is very helpful right from the beginning｡The apartment was nice and comfort as pictured , location is the best, right at the center of causeway bay.
nice apartment!great location!everything is perfect, but the washing room is small. I love the apartment!
It was a very good location for traveler. And Susan is really nice and have very good introduction of her house. Great experience.

Lovely and very central apartment in the heart of Barcelona. It's position made exploring the city very easy either on foot or using public transport. Plenty of shopping areas and restaurants around and a lovely organic and vegetarian shop near by. 

The apartment is quite airy but unfortunately the blinds do not work in the rooms so there is no natural light. Even though the apartment is very central all the windows are on internal patios ( the living room windows are enormous and let lots of light) which makes it very quiet.

We had a lovely time and we certainly will use it again when we return to Barcelona.
Great neighbourhood, and very central.

Apartment clean, wide and cozy. Near to Casa Battlò, Placa de Catalunya and many restaurants, it's a perfect place for families. The host was kind and helpful, we didn't have any problem during our stay.

Bel appartement très bien placé et silencieux. 
Par contre pas de parking comme indiqué et pas de demodulateur pour avoir des chaînes françaises
the apartment has very central  location, near to Placa Catalunia. It is bright, beautiful and comfortable, with all the ecquipment one can need. good for 5-6 people. Thanks to Tendency!
Increíble! Súper buena la ubicación y un departamento de lujo!
Very well located and great looking place.

Very good location and flat. Everything was perfectly clean, bright and as described. We had a very nice stay. 
We use the bagages services company that the host advised us during our check in: for €5 they come to get your luggages and bring them later at the airport (because our check out was at 11am). 
I would just recommend to bring your own hairdryer (if you are coming for special occasion as us - we were in BCN for a wedding). 
I really recommend this flat
A lovely apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay there again.

très bel appartement situé à l'arrière de l'immeuble.
immeuble magnifique avec un gardien.
deux chambres sont plus sombres où il y fait plus chaud.
il manque juste un rideau opaque dans la grande chambre.
je recommande cet appartement spacieux.

The apartment is very close to Plaça de Catalunya giving very good access to all public transport. The neighborhood is very nice with cafés, restaurants and bars close-by. I stayed in the apartment for 5 days with 5 friends of mine and the apartment turned out to be very comfortable for 6 people with its 3 rooms and 2 bathrooms.
Excellent option when staying in Barcelona! I loved how close we were to a grocery store, restaurants, and major attractions. The space was comfortable for our family of 6 adults.

Everything is as described. It's central, a lot of supermarkets really close, one of them is 24/365. It's very confortable, amazing beds, amazing shower and well equiped kitchen. It's perfect for a few days to really see Barcelona.

Peaceful location steps from all the action. 

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona staying in the 3 bedroom flat we used though Tendancy. It had tons of space, good beds and was very clean. Being less than one block from Las Rambles, I was worried about noise, but once you enter the building, all the city noises go away. Check in was easy as a representative from our host met us at the door, let us in and showed us around. The location was awesome. Literally steps away were many restaurants, shops and other places to go. There is even a small food market 3 doors down on the same street. The main square was a 5 minute walk. When in Barcelona, I would definitely consider staying here again.
Fantastic location, and the apartment had everything we needed.

Great location to access all parts of the city. Just a little north of Plaza Catalunya so a nice departure from the touristy Las Ramblas area. 

Sitting area is nice and spacious. Master bedroom is quite large but very bright from the floor to ceiling windows.  The other two rooms are a bit on the small size but not too cramped to fit 2 twin beds.

Had a really great time in Barcelona! Would stay at this location again!
Great apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything and highly recommend.
Fantastic apartment, brilliant position. Can't fault it.
Very spacious apartment in great location.  At corner is Las Ramblas.  Quiet, safe area. Coffee, bakery, market nearby. Modern, well equipped kitchen. Great for families and business travelers.
This apartment was gorgeous and in a perfect location. We had a very delightful stay and enjoyed the nearby restaurants and shopping areas. We highly recommend this listing!
Location very good, in the shopping center, and many fast food place,  traffic is very convenien !
交通确实很方便,香港住的地方都不大,好在即便如此设施也都有｡性价比高
总体来说算是便宜的,性价比还是蛮高的,地理位置也挺方便的

Well recommended place. Very close to Mtr Jordan station and many shops nearby. Place is just like how it is in the photo. Good for solo travellers. At first i got lost finding the place but on the next days i feel like i am a local in hongkong. Thankyou until next time!
很好的一次体验,香港寸土寸金这个价位住到这样的房间很不错了,地理位置也很好非常方便,离地铁站很近,周围也有巴士站,大厦楼下有保安首先安全很到位,其次能分到有窗户的房间也很好空气流通好,就是香港的汽车喜欢改装排气管,一踩油门轰轰的很吵,不过还好,其实香港给我的感觉非常好很安静很安心,除了消费高点没什么不好的,总体来说这次体验还不错,下次再去还会住这里,也会推荐给朋友

- 非常靠近佐敦地鐵站,交通十分方便
- 附近有不少美食,也開到很晚
非常便利的地段
真是太太太好了,下次还来耶,我爱｡

The pictures are quite deceiving I would say. The room we stayed in was quite dirty and there was a roach crawling about the place. Linens were riddle with stains and towels as well. The bathroom had a peculiar odour. The size was just as expected and not a problem.  The location is great. I would recommend spending the few extra dollars and getting a place much cleaner.
觉得整体性价比还不错~就是早上起来感觉身上痒痒的,发现床上有小虫子~
大体上还是可以的,但是太过于狭小拥挤,给人感觉有一丝简陋吧｡卫生间的马桶盖一直无法完全开启
地点超级方便哟,附近也好多好吃的,好玩的｡比想象中干净｡

The address in Airbnb app was just to show where the reception counter is. I’m glad I’m staying in another building. The room was refurbished although the exterior of the building was old. Saw tiny cockroaches but I was not surprised as the building was old. Space was good for me as Asian. We could hear noises from the street and other room but we are okay as we are not light sleepers. We need to share hair dryer with other guests. Thanks to the staff who helped to empty trash bin daily and I liked the firm bed very much as I could rest really well after walking all day long.

Audrey est très gentille et réactive au questions durant le séjour. L'appartement est fonctionnel bien équipé et se trouve dans un quartier calme et non loin du centre! La chambre est cosie, je recommande ce logement!
Audrey's flat very nice and exactly as on the pictures. The location is great and area is full of bars and restaurants - thanks:)

The place is my standart of staying in HK, bright, comfy, clean,  perfect size rooms, picture perfect kitchen, especially sweet scented candles in every rooms which I found rarely in HK. Convenient location and Audrey is truly amazing host!

I warmly recommend Audrey's place ! The location couldn't be better : on top of Cain   Road, in a pedestrian super quiet street, it is very Central but extremely quiet around the neighborhood. 
The apartment is charming, spacious, light, very clean and well decorated. 
And Audrey s roommate is as lovely as the place! 
The price is very okay for the place !

A neat and stylish abode right within Central - a great base from which to explore HK. Take the famous Central-Midlevels Escalator on the way home and experience the hustle and bustle of Soho.  Or take the ferries from Central to other parts of HK. Plenty of artisan coffee, local cheap eats, restaurants, and bars just a few steps outside the apartment. The place was very clean, had great storage and all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. Audrey was very responsive and even suggested some amazing eats. Her roommate, Stella, was just as friendly and welcoming. I had an amazing time in HK thanks to Audrey and Stella. Will definitely revisit when I'm back in HK.

Stella is  a great roommate! I was very happy with that.
I felt very welcome and the communication was perfect. Thank you for the hospitality.

Audrey's appartment is great and very close to Soho. Getting there is kind of a workout since the build is on a hill but you can take the Mid-level escalators which makes it easier. Checking in and out was very easy. I didn't get the chance to meet Audrey in person, but communication with her was very reliable. Can definitely recommend her place!

The unit is as it appears on the description, small and cozy, located in the heart of Kowloon. I find it good for young travellers that want to discover the city (our case). Not recommended for copuples seeking a romantic trip since is quite busy and noisy. Big dissapointed was that Water heater didnt work and had to take a cold water shower. Regarding owner response, it took a while for him/her to answer but afterwards everything was fine.

It was my first Airbnb experience and we like its brand new and great location of this apartment. Jenkin is a fabulous host that has answered all needs in a quick manner. We will definitely stay again at his place in the future (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Really nice!The apartment is new and comfortable.The bed is soft.And there are a lot of restaurants and shopping malls near by.House keeper is so warm because she help us a lot.

Great little place in a very convenient part of Hong Kong.  We are a family of three who have been to Hong Kong a number of times.  Although we usually stay in a hotel on Hong Kong Island, we decided to stay in Jenkin's place due to the price, apparent cleanliness, and in order to better experience life in Kowloon.  We were definitely not disappointed.  The unit is quite small but they make efficient use of the space and the reality is that it was more spacious than any hotel room, aside from the most deluxe suites. Location wise it doesn't get any better.  Just steps from Tsim Sha Tsui (TST), and then everything that TST has to offer readily at hand.  Shopping and eating for all price ranges and tastes.  We won't hesitate to stay there again on future visits to the city.

Hey the apartment is centrally located , 2 mins walk from the TST MTR and the apartment has been beautifully decorated. Also the Host Jenkins and lilo are welcoming and very helpful , they do everything possible to make sure you are comfortable. I would highly recommend this apartment for smaller groups. 

It was a wonderful experience and I really enjoyed my stay. I am sure the hosts will make your stay comfortable and do everything possible to make sure you face no problems.

We had a great time! Hosts were very easy to get in touch with, promptly helped us out with a water issue at the building (that was not their fault), and the space was very clean and comfortable.

It's a small space, definitely best for folks like us who just need a comfortable place to sleep after a day of exploring the city. Thanks for a great experience!

Our stay was wonderful and hassle free.  The apartment is what we expected it to be, warm and homey. The location of the place is convenient as public transportation, convenient stores, local restaurants and malls are nearby.

Suggestion/Feedback 
Toilet - at the shower area, to do a sliding door instead of using curtain  as water will spill to the floor near the toilet bowl area.
No place to hang socks after washing. 
Sofa bed - material catch dust easily. To extend it to become a bed and making sure that it is fixed correctly, must be extra careful as  my son hurt his hand. 
Living room aircon - thought aircon was spoilt as we couldnt on it. We didnt know that the switch, which is hidden in the cupboard, is not switch on until when we met Helen when we are checking out.
Overall, we still can accept and hope that there will be improvement. Thanks to both Jenkin and Helen.

Wonderful location, seconds from MTR and so much to do and eat in the area. The apartment is small but comfortable. Glad there's an elevator too! The check in process was flawless. Easy to communicate with owner and check in person. Will definitely stay here again in the future.
Great location in the heart of TST.  Newly renovated unit perfect for a short trip.  Jenkins is very responsive to messages and accommodating.  Great stay.  Highly recommended.

I didn't personally meet Jenkin/Ricky. However, communication was a breeze. He connect me with Helen and she was nice! Jenkin allowed me to put my luggages first in the apartment which make things easier for me and family before actual check in. He also allowed me to keep those luggages while I kill some times before leaving. Thank you for that! Room was very nice, clean, cozy (looks exactly from the pictures). Amenities are there, TV, kitchen, iron, etc. Wifi is good! Location is perfect! Going to places were easy via MTR. The area around the apartment was always busy but very safe, I must say. Happy with the whole trip to HK. Stay with Jenkin, highly recommended! Thank you for everything, Jenkin and Ricky! And thank you to Helen too!
Fast, easy and good service :)
位置很不错,靠近地铁｡我这次是替妈妈定的apt,联系上有点困难｡这也没办法,不过当时特别挑了会中文的房东,可是妈妈说到了香港后是另外一位女士来给钥匙的....语言上交流比较困难,鸡同鸭讲｡还有被子感觉上没有更换新的....房子是新装修的!
Due to the personal reason, I cancel the booking of the second day. Thanks for the understanding and support.
A kind host greeted and directed us over the phone to make sure we were alright. Highly appreciated! The place was very clean and comfortable.

Location is almost everything in Hong Kong.  Host service is a close second. Jenkin is an accessible and attentive host, and that's something you may need in a complicated city like Hong Kong. This is an efficiently designed very small space which makes it seem larger than it is. The layout is (1) a bed-sized sleeping area with a curtain and sliding door for privacy; (2) a comfortably sized and appointed bathroom with a nicely tiled shower with plenty of hot water and strong water pressure; and (3) a living room with comfortable sofa, reliable wifi, and clothes hanging rack. There is a fridge and microwave and hotplate, with enough cookware for two people. You wash your dishes in the bathroom.  All three rooms are recently remodeled and tiled.  The bed is very comfortable. Both the bedroom and living room have air conditioners.

The little apartment is on the 6th floor of an old and dingy (but clean) Kowloon apartment building one block from the stunning fountains of Kowloon Park and the subway, and a million places right there in your face.  It is a 10 minute exciting walk (as in every single time its exciting) to the picturesque  harbor ferry to Hong Kong Island (or you can take the subway there).  Like many Asian buildings, the elevators are very slow and often crowded with friendly people, but remarkably, each floor has an elevator on either end of the hallway. You walk out of Jenkin's apartment, look left and look right to see which elevator will arrive first, a fun little game for us. 

The very safe neighborhood is extremely trendy, filled with excited locals and tourists, and many places open until late. (My favorite bar and restaurant were open until 3am, both very funky). 

I might stay in one of Jenkin's larger units next time but, you know, I'm not sure since this little place just grows on you after two days.  He is a master host, his cleaning lady is so nice and right nearby, and he takes a lot of pride in making your stay high quality.  He even guided our taxi driver to the front door by cell phone, and he is always, always accessible.  It's remarkable.
我们去玩迪士尼很晚回来害怕要找一段时间,地理交通条件好出地铁口走几步就到了,很容易就能找到｡去维多利亚港看完夜景回来到楼下有便利店茶餐厅吃点东西非常方便,房子感觉卫生,有电视和无线网络整体感觉不错!

The apartment is in a great location for exploring the Tsim Sha Sui area. The MTR station is right outside the building entrance, and the harbor area is just a few blocks away to the south and west. The living space is small but well organized, with a separate bedroom (just big enough for the bed) with its own air-con, and the bathroom is a very usable size. The main drawback to the apartment is that it is on the 6th floor of a 15 floor building and the queues can get long for the elevator. There is one elevator at each end of the long hall on the 6th floor but on the ground level they are completely separated.  A few times I waited on the ground floor in a queue for 15-20 minutes and the elevator fills up before being able to get in, so plan your trips, don't expect to go in and out a lot, and avoid mid-day and evening hours when people are coming home.  Of course this is not an issue the host can resolve, but I think any guests should anticipate.
地理位置很棒 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都比较方便

位置十分方便 近地鐵站 商場 晚上吃東西都方便
房間有點小  浴室更小  有許多雜物堆放在櫃子裡  打掃也不乾淨  沙發上有需多頭髮  垃圾桶只有一個  因為不知去哪倒  對旅行的的人來說 不夠使用   
浴室一沖水 浴簾就會亂飄 常會黏到身上  老實說以房間的價格還是打過折的  不如住飯店  既沒有價格優勢  環境也不太ok
The room is clean and modern looking. Great stay. The foldable bed makes more space during the day.

Comment raconter en quelques mots les trois semaines magnifiques passées chez Fatma ! Impossible. La pension est charmante et possède une terrasse très chaleureuse. Fatma est une personne extrèmement intéressante avec qui il faut absolument prendre un café dès quelle le propose (ce qui arrive très souvent !). Elle cuisine merveilleusement. Elle connait Istanbul comme sa poche. La chambre est au dernier étage, elle est calme et douce. Elle a un accès direct sur la terrasse ce qui permet de bouquiner avant d'aller dormir ou de faire un peu de yoga le matin. Le quartier est au coeur de Beyoglu avec une foultitude de restaurants et de bonnes adresses à découvrir. Si vous hésitez encore à réserver, n'hésitez plus ! Quant à moi, je reviendrais le plus vite possible !

Ich bin unheimlich glücklich bei Fatma Abla gestrandet zu sein. Es ist immer was los und selbst wenn mankein türkisch kann,Fatma Abla versucht mit English und Händen und Füßen zu reden. Eine unglaublich sympathische und unterhaltsame Dame, die ich sehr schnell ins Herz geschlossen habe. Sonntags sind wir zusammen zum Bio Bazar gelaufen und an einigen Tagen kochen wir sogar was zusammen.  Mein Zimmer befindet sich im obersten Stock, wo ich komplett meine Ruhe habe. gegenüber von meinem Zimmer ist eine wunderschöne Terasse, die zum Yoga machen oder ein Buch lesen einlädt. Gäste sind auch immer willkommen. Fatma hat ihre eigenen Stil, welches dem ganzen Haus, bis auf den Eingangsbereich, einen unglaublichen charm gibt. Jedes Zimmer ist individuell und man muss sagen, dass bis her die Leute, die ich im Haus kennengelernt habe, echt toll sind. Wenn man sich für Fatma entscheidet, sollte man auf alle Fälle kulturoffen sein und sich diesem schönen antiken Stil und der Nostalgie einfach fallen lassen. Ich bin durch Fatma und durch die Wohnung in einem alten Istanbul angekommen und fühle mich super wohl. Zu meiner Arbeit in Cihangir laufe ich täglich zu Fuß. Die Lage ist sehr perfekt. Ich brauche kaum Bus oder Bahn zu benutzen, da ich alles in Beyoglu und Taksim finde, was ich brauche. Nur für meine Touristentour habe ich lediglich die Bahn benutzt. Obwohl man zum Eminönu auch zu Fuß laufen kann, wenn man spazieren gehen mag. Ich danke Dir, Fatma abla, so wie ich dich gerne zu nennen pflege, für Deine Offenheit und Deine Wärme. Ich werde Dich sehr bald wieder besuchen kommen und hoffentlich sogar mein altes Zimmer beziehen im obersten Stock.

Fatma's home is a perfect place to enjoy Istanbul : peacefull place, independence, located close to main places ... Fatma is nice, and other people staying in Fatma's house so you can meet new people etc
So I recommend it !

I stayed with Fatma for many weeks in December 2013, in the attic room on my own, and then with my boyfriend in the larger double room, and had an amazing time. 
The neighbourhood, Tarlabaşı, is different and more down to earth than the posher neighbourhoods around. The location is wonderful: it's easy to get anywhere by foot, taxi, bus, dolmus, metro or boat.
Fatma, who lives there, and her daughter Elvan, who lives in Italy but is quick to communicate by email, are extremely friendly and helpful. 
Fatma also cooks wonderfully and even offers cooking classes. 
I would definitely recommend staying there, for three nights or three months, and hope to stay there again myself.
Be aware though that if you have respiratory issues, this might not be a good choice as there is a fair amount of smoking happening inside, and even the neighbourhood is quite smoky because of the coal heating.

Sono stata 5 giorni ospite da Fatma. Purtroppo non l'ho conosciuta perchè era in Italia dalla figlia, con cui sono riuscita a comunicare molto bene in italiano (dato che il mio inglese è molto scarso..), è stata gentilissima! come anche gli ospiti che mi hanno accolto lì a Istanbul! Si è creato un bel clima e anche se spesso ero fuori per visitare la città, ho passato due bellissime serate in un clima multiculturale!

The perfect visit. 

For me, this attic room in Beyoglu was perfect for my time in Istanbul. My hosts were wonderful, the room is great, the terrace is greater, and the location is fantastic. I was in Istanbul for a intensive summer school at their Technology University, and got the privacy, space and support I needed to get everything done, and to a high standard. I was sad to leave and am looking forward to returning again in a few months. 

Thank you thank you thank you, and will miss you guys!

Beau x

Fatma, Elvan, her daughter, Hasan, her husband, and all of the other guests with whom I shared the house made this one of my best travel experiences. Fatma really tries to make everyone at home in her home and in her city. We shared dinner on the terrace several times with her past guests / friends, and they made me feel so welcome and quickly become knowledgable about Istanbul and the broader society. 

The room, itself, and the neighborhood have been correctly detailed in the room information, guest feedback, and the feedback for Fatma's other rooms' feedback. I encourage you to read them all to get a clear idea. 

All said, the room is good value for money, and the people will make it a fond, memorable experience.

I stayed for one month in the attic room and was very pleased with how everything turned out. Fatma and Hasan are very welcoming, and I have many good memories of my stay (like drinking raki and talking about Turkish music with Hasan at the dinner table). If you stay here you will meet many interesting people from Turkey and around the world passing through the house. The area will not be to every ones tastes, but I highly recommend it for the more adventurous among you.

Thank you Fatima and family for a wonderful time in Istanbul!
I love your house, my attic room which is very central and from where I was able to walk to all sites in Istanbul. You, your husband and daughter, all were very welcoming and helpful. I definitely want to come back.

Fatma and Hasan, the hosts, are truly some of the nicest people I've had the chance to come across. I stayed for 3 months and loved every second of it, only regretting that I could not stay for another three. The landlords are fantastic and experienced Airbnb hosts, which makes the experienced that much better. Fatma is an outstanding cook, and one should not miss a chance to dine with her and Hasan! The house is great, very typical and nice - as a bonus, the bathrooms were all renovated and they look fantastic. The terrace made for many evenings relaxing away from the hustle and bustle of Istiklal St. In terms of location, the house is in a great spot: seconds away from Istiklal, minutes from Taksim and the cool Cihangir area, and a short train ride or longer walk to Sultanahmet, Topkapi and all the tourist sites. Would recommend without any hesitation, as I already did to two friends of mine who also stayed at Fatma and Hasan's house.

I spent a really nice month at Fatma's house. The room is lovely and fits the description. I also really enjoyed the beautiful terrasse from where you can watch the neighborhood. I thought the house was in an ideal location to explore the city. The street where the house is on is pretty calm. 
This room is on the same floor with the terrasse and the kitchen, so you have ideal access to both of them. The kitchen is ideal if you just want to cook something small from time to time as there's only one cooking plate.
This room is perfect for people that wish to be in contact with the host and exchange with them from time to time as you walk by their living room and kitchen as well as share the bathroom with them. If you rather be a little more to your own and mind cigarette smoke, I recommend one of the other rooms.
Fatma and Hasan are both very very nice, always asked about my day and they were very patient when I tried to say something in turkish. I hope that my turkish will be better one day so that we can have longer and deeper conversations!  They made me feel very welcomed and I also really enjoyed meeting Fatma's daughter and grandson!They are very generous, sometimes invited me for tea or something to eat. I also got lucky to taste some of Fatma's amazing food!

It was fantastic to stay at the house of Fatma and Hasan! The room is very nice, like you can see on the pictures. Next to the room is the kitchen and the terasse, which is great. The bathroom of which you can´t see picture was aesthtic too.
Particularly if you are in Istanbul because of learning Turkish Fatma and Hasan´s house will be the best choice as both are very communicative and patiant with beginners. Above all Fatma and Hasan are such nice people, I am really looking forward to stay in contact with them. 
I highly recommend the room. But you should have no problem with shareing the bathroom with the hosts as well as shareing the kitchen and the terasse with a lot of other guests who stay in the house. But that´s why the attic room is the best one for people who want interact with the hosts and get to know other guests.
I also loved the neighbourhood.

Fatma and Hasan are wonderful hosts, warm, welcoming and very hospitable.  The room is just as describe.  Central location, easy to get around by foot or public transportation, grocery stores and lots of dining options at your finger tips, can't be beat.

I really enjoyed staying at Fatma and Hasan's. They were incredibly sweet and welcoming, it almost felt like staying with my aunt and uncle. I was alone with Hasan for the most part as Fatma was out of town. During that time he always made sure I'd get home safe at night. I thought that was very endearing. The room itself is super cute, with its own kitchen and terrace access, which I tremendously enjoyed as it gave me the sense of having an entire apartment. The neighbourhood is a bit off the tourist track but for that reason very charming. And it still is very close to Istiqlal, essentially just across the street. So you are strategically located.

파트마는 친절하고 가족처럼 대해줘서 편안하게 잘 쉬다갈수있었네요^^ 가격에 비해 좋았습니다. 오래동안 머물면서 특별히 블편한점은 없었구요. 샤워 요리 빨래 등등 마음껏 눈치안보고 할수있어서 좋았네요.
추천합니다 :)
Amazing and warm place that I fully recommend. Hassan does delicious Turkish breakfast...
A lovely place to stay! The house has character, there's a gorgeous terrace and it's well located for bars, cafés and museums. Hasan was the perfect host!

A wonderful journey at Fatma and Hasan's house !! So pleasant place, clean, very very well located, lot of plants on the terrace... But above all, amazing and great people live here ! Fatma and Hasan are so welcoming and warm, it was a real pleasure for me to spend time with them. I definitely recommend this place, and hope to come back as soon as possible !

Fatma and Hassan are wonderful and caring hosts. I accompanied Hassan to work and he showed me his favourite breakfast stops; I also had a lovely few hours drinking tea with both of them chatting Turkish recipes.
The room was just what I had hoped for with a lovely terrace just outside it.
I will be back!
Great little room on the top floor. Perfect for solo traveler. Lots of other people staying there also. Both Hasan & Fatma were warm and friendly. Lots of stairs
Ben's place is in the perfect location. Had a lot of fun staying there.

Ben's apartment was perfect for a few days in Sydney - well located, clean, bright and spacious. 
It is quite big for a studio, and the floorplan gives the feel of a separate kitchen, bedroom and living area. 
A great view, well ventilated and bright. 
Ben was a great host, with really good communication. He was very accommodating with check-in and check out times. 
Only downside is that the apartment doesn't have wifi, so perhaps not ideal for business travellers or longer stays.

I enjoyed my stay at Ben's place. Perfect location for public transport either to city (5 mins) or Bondi or Coogee beaches.
Small but has everything you need to explore Sydney with and best of all, great city views!

The apartment is in a nice building with some cool Art Deco details. Location is good - we pretty much walked to all major sights in city (opera house, darling harbour etc.) and there are some great shops and places to eat nearby (thanks to Ben's suggestions). Apartment has all the stuff you need for a comfortable stay, and Ben is super helpful and excellent in communication. We had such a nice time and would recommend Ben's apartment!

Ben was an excellent host; he met me on time and showed me around the apartment ensuring that I was comfortable and had everything I needed. 
The apartment itself is a small but comfortable studio with beautiful views of the city. It's located close to Oxford St with access to public transport if needed. Only a short walk to Darlinghurst and the city. Also, a Woolworths Metro within 200m. 
Loved the place and would stay again.

Bens apartment is in a great location in Sydney close to great restaurants, museums, bars and shopping - Everything you need. Ben was also very friendly,  helpful and communicative. We would highly recommend !
Great central studio!
Great location for work or holiday, clean, lots to explore in the neighborhood, a stress free stay, thanks Ben

Bens apartment was perfect. Great location and everything in Surry Hills, Oxford St and Taylor Sq are walkable. Perfect for Mardi Gra weekend as we watched the parade from the lounge room windows. Would definitely stay here again when in Sydney
에어비앤비숙소중에  가장 좋았다

Ben's place is centrally located with a great view of the Sydney skyline. The place looked exactly as it did in the pictures and was the perfect size for the two of us. Ben was a great host -- always quick to respond to my messages and happy to answer any questions. I would highly recommend this place.
Ben's place was in a great location and close to transit.  We enjoyed the coffee shop downstairs, the shops and theater.
The charming apartment is conveniently located with beautiful view of Sydney Tower and Habour Bridge.
Great location. Apartment exactly like pictures. Perfect for two people and nice and clean. Great communication.

Great location, perfectly positioned for getting into the city or to Bondi. (It's very close to the Darlinghurst nightlife so it can be a bit noisy on weekends, but you can't be in a central location without a little activity!) The apartment is clean and tidy and great for two, with very good shower water pressure. And that gorgeous view across Sydney!
Great apartment in a fantastic central location! All the ammenities you could possible need and an added bonus of harbour bridge views!
It was really nice.
很小巧精致的房间,独立的厨房卫生间,各项设备齐全,居住十分方便｡位置也十分便利,能观望到悉尼大桥和海湾景色｡美中不足的是入住第一晚隔壁房子在举办彻夜的party及高声唱歌,相当打扰睡眠
Amazing view, great area and a great studio
Great pad!

Excellent place with all the facilities as described in the ad. Perfect location as the place is literally across the road from the beach and has shops and restaurants 1 mile down the road.

The complex also has a beautiful swimming pool, jacuzzi and very clean barbecue facilities.

The hosts were superb and even went out of there way to accommodate our every need.

I strongly recommend this place.

John was great at communicating and making sure I was comfortable at his studio right across the street from the beach. He even went as far as to offer me a ride to the airport which I thought was incredibly considerate. As far as the place itself it was very large and conveniently located with a very clean pool and hot tub. I would definitely recommend staying here.
John was a great host. Awesome communicator and very easy going.

Staying at John's listing was a great experience from start to finish. The place was great and customized with hand-picked flowers and "where to go in maui" for my first visit to the island. The place was very clean, very nicely kept and had all the amenities I needed especially in the kitchen.

John persona davvero speciale! Abbiamo trovato fiori freschi in tutte le stanze e degli snack di benvenuto! Appartamento bello, curato nei dettagli e pulito. A disposizione A.C.,microonde,TV, wifi, asciugacapelli, lavastoviglie, lavatrice e asciugatrice, teli mare, sdraio e borsa frigo. Cucina super attrezzata. Piscina,bbq e parcheggio. Ottima posizione. John e la sua ragazza molto simpatici ed estremamente disponibili...tornerei senza dubbio e lo consiglierei a tutti...grazie John e a presto...Mahalo...
John was easy to communicate with and provided us with everything we needed. The place was clean and spacious and is in a great location, just steps away from the beach.

What a guy, what a welcome, what a place! If you're looking for a homely space, comfortable and clean and well located, this is your spot! Throw in a welcoming host with a great sense of humour, willingness to help you find a cold beer upon arrival and give you great tips on island life, you may well have hit the perfect combo!! Mahalo Johnny :) See you next time champ!!

Great place, has everything you need. The lanai (balcony) is spacious and wraps around corner. Has everything you need for beach; towels, cooler, etc. Nice pool area with hot tub and grill. Conveniently located in Kihei, short drive to some of the best beaches in Maui, big and little beach, and across the street from kalepolepo beach and fish pond. Many restaurants and businesses just down the road on S. Kihei Rd. Communication could have been a little better. Could only respond via text, no voicemail or calling, and some of the texts were delayed or vague. With that said, I did leave an item behind and John stayed in touch so I was able to retrieve it two days later - so thank you John. Would recommend this place if staying in Kihei.
The place is absolutely amazing! So clean, cute and cozy! The location is absolutely perfect. I will definitely recommend John to all my friends here on Oahu.
Felt right at home at John's apartment. Accurate listing description. Easy to communicate with, would definitely stay here again.
Great experience

I enjoyed staying Kihei Bay Surf. This family is very sweet and willing to help me out all the time! Neighbor hood is very quite and beach is right cross from the apartment. It's such a peaceful place to stay. However, you need a car because there is not grocery stores and restaurant. You can walk to those places but it takes about 20minutes. I'd love to visit this place again :)

Staying at John's place was perfect for my husband and I. We felt the location was awesome, fairly central to the rest of the island and Kihei was so relaxed it was perfect. The condo has everything you could need and we especially liked that there was Tupperware so we could pack our own lunches and snacks. There were also two sets of snorkel gear which was great since we left one of ours at home accidentally. The beach towels were great too since they take up room when you bring your own. We enjoyed spending time by the pool and right across the road is a great park with a perfect swimming spot for kids. On our last day we had a late flight out and asked if we could stay a bit later so we could shower after the beach and John was very accommodating. We really had a great last day knowing we still had a home base for us and our stuff, it was greatly appreciated.  We would definitely come back!
perfect stay !
John was very nice, we live on island and would defiantly stay again there again for a quick getaway!
Thanks for everything. Felt like we were at home on Maui rather than vacating!

Had a great time in this place. We had breakfast on the lanai in the morning, enjoyed the beach all afternoon and finished by grilling pineapple on the gas grill and relaxing in the hot tub. Great area, great host and great place! We will be back.

This fabulous corner unit condo is exactly as John has described it!! It's spacious (twice as big as the neighbouring condos!), clean, fresh and airy! A wrap around balcony which is perfect for a glass of wine at sunset! Ideal for drying clothes also! Screen doors back and front meant a breeze could run through the apartment. 
Swimming pool was really clean as was the hot tub and well looked after by the on site manager, Mark. The pool wasn't that busy so we felt like it was our own private pool on several occasions! There was a barbeque area beside the pool which was great to use on those evenings we didn't feel like going out for dinner! A laundry room was also situated beside the tennis courts. 
The location on Kihei was great, we had a beach right across the road that we could see from our balcony. No matter where you're  staying in Maui a car would definitely be necessary. John recommended Kihei car rental which turned out to be a fraction of the cost of an airport rental! A shuttle bus runs to the airport also from there. 
Monsoon Indian(restaurant)for any Indian lovers is directly across the road and was recommended by Johns dad to try it out, it was so good we went there twice! 
Snorkelers- there are so many great snorkelling beaches within a ten minute drive(by car)! 
Molokini + Turtle town-definitely a must!! 
The Road to Hana- beautiful scenery and waterfalls I would advise camping along the route as there is so much to see in just one day!! The road is quite windy and narrow! 
Definitely go to Hookipa beach near Paia if you want to see turtles basking around 17.00hrs! 
We can't wait to visit Maui again next year and were hoping John will have a free space for us in his condo!! I can't thank John and family enough for their hospitality :)

We really enjoyed our stay at John's place. The apartment is very conveniently located--right near beaches, central highways to explore the island, 24hr grocery stores, and places to go out at night. John's place is also well outfitted (cooler, snorkeling gear, beach towels, etc.) which makes it easy to do day trips. The unit is a good size with a smart layout, and having the option to turn on the AC at night is nice too. Thanks so much for a great stay!

Great Location! Good vibe! I enjoyed staying at John's place and would definitely stay there again. My only feedback would be regarding towels. I would recommend bringing your own towel, I am not sure the towels were very clean. Enjoyed my stay!! Thank you!!

Ricardo's apartment is wonderful.  The patio helps you feel connected to the city, and is a scenic place to share a candlelight meal or drink.  To the right is the ocean and to the left is toward Ipanema beach.  The beds are cozy, the kitchen is stocked to cook in, the front room is a relaxing place to watch movies (or, in our case, Olympic highlights).  The neighborhood below has a grocery store, pharmacy, restaurants, juice bars, a gym, yoga...anything a traveler could need.  It is a 1 and a 1/2 block walk to Copacabana Beach and a short walk to Ipanema.  We could not have asked for a better place to stay, or for a kinder, more gracious host.  Ricardo helped us with Uber, shopping, bike rentals, getting money exchanged, what sites to see, and had some nice surprises upon our arrival.  Thank you, Ricardo.  We hope to entertain you when you visit California.

O Ricardo foi um excelente anfitrião, nos deixou muito a vontade em seu apto, nos recebendo muito bem, deixando toalhas e roupas de cama, indicações do que fazer no Rio durante as Olimpíadas, dicas de restaurantes, enfim tudo para o nosso bem estar. A experiência foi ótima desde a chegada até o dia de ir embora, ele sempre muito acessível quando solicitado. 
O apto é muito bem localizado, com fácil acesso ao metrô, praias de Copacabana e Ipanema, além de ótimos restaurantes. Recomendamos bastante o apto do Ricardo!!
Apartamento super bem localizado, super limpo, aconchegante, lindo e super bem equipado. Perfeito para quem procura uma estada no Rio de Janeiro.

C'était un vrai bonheur de passer ces quelques jours chez Ricardo! Tout était très bien :
La situation de l'appart, la belle terrasse, et surtout, le super accueil de Ricardo et sa bienveillance tout au long de notre séjour (conseil, assistance lorsqu'on avait des questions...), merci beaucoup pour tout!
En résumé, c'était parfait, je recommande sans hésitation!

This place is a gem!  It's in the heart of everything from western restaurants to shopping to the nightlife district.  It was still very quiet though in the building.  The place looks exactly as the photos and was recently renovated completely. The concierge was helpful when we needed help. Tara was fantastic as well. She waited for us for over a 1.5 hours when we were late, gave us a thorough run down of the apartment and neighbourhood, and made some very good recommendations for places to eat around there in her welcome guide package. Would highly recommend this place and going with her suggestions.
It's good. Tara is very kind person. This bnb is located soho street. It was fantastic!!!!!!

Die Wohnung war super! Sie ist sehr zentral gelegen. Von dort aus kann man in nur 20 Minuten bis zum Hafen laufen. In der Nähe gibt es sehr viele Restaurants und Bars. Die Wohnung selbst ist sehr gut ausgestattet (es fehlte nichts) und war für 4 Personen ideal. Auch die Gastgeberin war super freundlich und war für Fragen immer da. Ich würde diese Wohnung immer wieder buchen!

Tara's Apartment ist der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um Hongkong zu entdecken. Auch für eine unkomplizierte An- und Abreise vom / zum Flughafen ist die Lage super.
Der Bezirk Soho bietet viele tolle Cafés, Bars und Restaurants die man fußläufig erreichen kann.
Die Ausstattung des Appartement lässt keine Wünsche offen. 
Alles hat prima geklappt. Wenn ich noch mal in Hongkong bin, bin ich auf jeden Fall wieder bei Tara.

stayed at Tara's place for 6 nights as 3 adults and 2 children. quiet apartment with 24hr friendly doorman, located right next to the mid-level escalators, about 15 minutes up from IFC (easy access with a stroller with only a half-flight of stairs between Hang Seng Bank and the Central Market building). two grocery stores just down the street. 2 bedrooms with good cabinet space. plenty of sheets and towels. large open-design kitchen/dining/living room with good counter space. well stocked kitchen with coffee/tea/sugar. welcomed with bottle of red wine and fresh fruit. provided with baby cot, baby tub and high chair for the the little ones. umbrellas came in handy for the 2 days of rain. overall a very nice place to stay with family in Hong Kong.

No doubt, this is THE apartment for enjoying a stay in Hong Kong:
- Prime location
- Full equipped apartment 
- All facilities around (organic shops, mini-supermarket, good restaurants, ...)
- Excellent tips from Tara on good adresses around her place
- What else? Everything was perfect and thanks to Tara who has been friendly, reactive and flexible (late check-out due to personal reason)

L’appartement est très bien situé près de l’escalator. Quartier branché plein de bars et restos mais situation très calme malgré tout car l’appartement donne sur l’arrière de l’immeuble. Entièrement refait, il est propre et moderne, très bien équipé. Une belle pièce de vie et des rangements. Je recommande fortement. Tara est très rapide à répondre également à toute question. Et en plus, nous avions une belle corbeille de fruits et une bouteille de vin qui nous attendaient à notre arrivée. Séjour parfait.
Die Wohnung ist super gelegen und Tara eine super Gastgeberin. Auch wenn wir sie nicht persönlich kennen gelernt haben, war die Organisation und Kommunikation spitze!

My brother, a friend of mine and I stayed at Tara's place for just under a week. The location of the place is spectacular, the view is amazing (nestled inbetween so many skyscrapers) and getting in and out of the place is really easy! We had a bit of trouble checking-in, since we didn't have the apartment number in the information provided to us. That was not Tara's fault though.. When you come here, just make sure you get all of the neccessary info in advance from airbnb. The aparment was clean and well-kept and communication with Tara was easy and quick. She let us check out pretty late (3pm), which we really really appreciated! The only thing we didn't love about the place was that there sometimes was a bit of an odor coming out of the bathroom.. I'm pretty sure that isn't Tara's fault either though, it must be a problem with old plumbing. But there is a window in the shower, so it's very easy to just air-out the bathroom with the door closed!
Over all we are very very happy with our stay at Tara's place and would definitely come again:)
good and valuable place with nice location

Tara’s place is absolutely fabulous. 
She also made it very easy foe us in terms of communicating super fast for any requests. 
Location is great. It’s nicely decorated with good lighting and art. 
The bathroom is modern and well kitted out. 
We cooked meals at home on the great stove. 
The apartment has everything you need, and is in one of the best locations in town. 
We highly recommend staying there (if it’s free!)

This apartment provided me the perfect balance needed for a memorable holiday weekend. It was lose enough to access the vibrant nightlife, but far enough to enjoy a quiet morning respite. The space was cozy enough to lounge amongst friends in the salon, but large enough to provide two private bedrooms for a restful slumber.  And Tara’s communiques we’re friendly and informative, but never intrusive or inflexible. I highly recommend this Cameo Court apartment as the place to stay as you enjoy all that the Midlevels has to offer.
Perfect location for discovering the city’s local hotspots and a close enough walk to the MTR. Great living space when plenty of amenities for us, couldn’t have picked a better spot in Soho!
Very convenient location.  Good size.  Quiet apartment.  Reasonable price.   All very much appreciated.

Loved the place and definitely would stay again! Great location (right in the middle of SoHo), stylish + clean place and very friendly host. It's up on the 4th floor which means it's pretty quiet from the street noise. Would highly recommend it when visiting HK!
Location right next to the escalators was perfect! And the building security guards were so nice and helpful. Tara always answered my messages right away and was very helpful!

This apartment was exactly what we were looking for in HK: a central location away from the super-touristy hubbub, and with space for those stay-at-home moments you crave when you’re travel-logged. The place has a modern feel and included all the amenities one would need for cooking and relaxing, including filtered drinking water. We felt safe and cozy, and the building was quiet at night for restful sleep. Tara was very easy to get in touch with and provided responses quickly. I loved the location—super walkable to great restaurants, the zoo, Victoria Peak, and lots of public transit—but beware, if it is your first time to HK island and you want to walk from the subway/ferry, (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps won’t show you the amazing escalators and walkways that will make getting there a breeze, and you might get stuck carting luggage up many flights of stairs (as we did). I highly recommend staying here if you want to experience HK island like a local. Just remember to research the walking path, or take an alternate form of transportation if you’ve got heavy luggage!

Tara’s place is a real gem - it is centrally located, right next to the Central Travelator, with the convenience of acesss to pretty much everything (restaurants, grocery stores and public transit etc. BTW we simply walked with our luggage to the place directly from HK Station which took <15 minutes).  It is one street up from the hustle and bustle of the Soho district, in an area that is more upscale, largely quiet and family oriented.   The place itself is very spacious and sparkly clean - we even had closet space!  It is a place that we would like to stay again next time in HK and I would highly recommend to anyone, especially families with children.  Tara is also a wonderful host who was very responsive to all of our communications.  Thanks Tara!

Tara's place is really awesome. Neighbourhood is safe and full of restaurants, coffee shops, etc. You're right in the mid levels and it's easy to walk anywhere. Tara is a great host and was there to meet us. Super great our new home away from home in HK.
Great location next to the mid-levels elevator and in front of a great French bakery. all amenities nearby. very nicely decorated. we had a great stay with our kids thank you !

The room was lovely! Large comfortable bed, separate bathroom, and an array of complimentary toiletries and water. Joanna was a wonderful, and we would highly recommend this location to anyone looking for a nice and convenient area to stay in HK.
it's really wonderful place to stay for trip,comfortable .convenient .hospitable.additionally,Joanna is lovely,sweet modern girl.  you will easy to enjoy Hk
非常好的一次体验,房东一家人非常的热情｡一出地铁口就能找到很方便,楼下就有公交车和电车,方便出行｡附近有很多食肆和士多店,网推的米芝莲美食也有,相当方便｡下次如果再去香港玩,一定会再次入住｡

This place is great for Single or Couple looking to live like a local in HK, which is what I get out of this trip. I value my privacy, Joanna and the family respected that, and gave me plenty during this stay. Great Host. The place is off to the Main Street so make sure you call Joanna before arriving as you might not be able to find it immediately. Very close to all Public transport and very convenient. It is as advertised - Nice cozy room with 3 mins walk to transports.

I had a comfortable stay at Joanna's apartment. The room was nice and cozy with a private bathroom and had all the amenities I needed. Joanna and her family were very nice and helpful as well. Highly recommended!

Joanna was a great host! She always had a place in mind to recommend and she was always willing to help translate for when Cantonese was the only language around lol. She was always very fluid with keeping in contact with her guests too! The place itself is just like the ad says. Definitely rent this place if you get the chance!
Had a great time Joanna and her mother were so helpful. Even though I was so busy and never got to go out with her, I felt like I made a friend for life.

Joanna is super nice. She picked us up at the mtr station. Her place is lovely, cute decoration and the ensuite toilet is perfect . My friend and I love it so much. it is even better than hotel. it is really exceed my expectation. it is like what advertisement. Highly recommended to whoever visit hk.

Joanna was an excellent host!  Her apartment was very comfortable and clean with everything we needed to stay comfortable (towels, shampoo, conditioner, comfortable bed, air conditioning).  It is also a couple minute walk from the Northpoint MTR station which was very convenient for travel.
Joanna is a nice host. Room is clean and comfortable. We were pleased to live in her apartment.
非常棒的体验!房子交通便利,在地铁口旁边｡附近有很多很棒的餐饮｡太古城也值得一逛｡房子跟照片一模一样,很温馨,舒适｡人也非常nice,就是房子太抢手,难预约上｡可以的话下次还会过来住!

Joanna's readily available over the tel...she provided personal escort all the way to her home from the airport bus stop, even helped me with my heaviest carry on bag...I arrvd so late that her mom's already in bed and I didn't get to meet her til the next evening ..She's such a nurturing mom that she's extremely helpful in making me feel at home, showing me how to use kitchen gadget unfamiliar to me, did my laundry twice, generously showered me with gifts like Santa Claus revisiting HK in Spring...

I had a wonderful stay at Joanna's home. Lovely house and very comfortable. Joanna is an excellent host and got everything ready for the guest. Will definitely recommend to friends and stay again. Thanks a lot Joanna.

Joanna is very attenttive and responsive to all my questions.  She gave perfect advice on how to get to her place and came pick me up.
Her family was very welcoming and you will not die of hunger with her mother around  who makes you taste her favorite snack foods.
Recommended!

Joanna's place is quite cozy, and I spent nearly 2 weeks with the families. They are very nice person and gave me a lot of good recommendations. Joanna's mom even helped me doing laundry. Anyway, you won't regret to enjoy your staying in Hong Kong in such a lovely place.
Very welcoming. Convenient location.

Joanna's apartment in Hong Kong is an excellent place to call home on a trip to her fair city.  She is a consummate host and I had everything I needed for a very pleasant stay.  Her apartment is very well located near the train and the bus from the airport drops you off just across the street with no transfers or changes.  

Her place is clean and comfortable and I just can't say enough about how gracious, generous and kind she and her cousin Purdy were the entire length of my 4 day stay!
Joanna是个超级大美女,很热心,很棒｡房子就更不用说了,位置安静,房间干净整洁,东西都准备得很齐全,毛巾､浴巾､头巾､甚至还有小零食､面膜､头发夹子,入住两天的感觉很棒,下次去香港还是会选择Joanna家~么么哒

I had a wonderful two-night stay at Joanna's place. 

Lots of Airbnb listings say 'cozy' when they just mean 'small' - but this really was cozy!
The private room has an ensuite toilet and was well stocked with everything I needed to be comfortable. 

The location really is very close to the MTR (and trams!) and from there it's easy to reach lots of points of interest and the airport.
 
Finally, Joanna and her mum are warm and generous hosts, very much worthy of 'superhost' status.

The Room is big and clean and has an own bathroom. The Bed is comfortable, there is a big wardrobe and really everything what you need. The Flat is well prepared and located near a bus and the MTR-Station, in a great area of HK Island. Joanna is really friendly and easy going. During my time I felt really relaxed.

We arrived late in the night and the host assistant was so nice with us. She gave us some typical food and presents so that we could feel as good as home. She showed us how stuff works. Then we went together to see where the supermarkt and resaturants were. Everything was clean and tidy. The apartment was big enough for 5 people. It´s perfectly furnished!
It was located in the typical familiarly and quiet neighbourhood, only 20 minutes walking to the city center and near a Subway station. Restaurants and shops are cheaper than city center ones.

He offered him to pick us from the airport and a guided tour as well.

We´ll come back for sure! 


Llegamos muy tarde por la noche y la asistente del anfitrión nos enseñó la casa, nos dio dulces típicos y vino de Oporto. Vino con nosotros por el barrio para recomendarnos restaurantes y enseñarnos dónde estaba el supermercado. 
El apartamento estaba limpio, ordenado y perfectamente equipado. Tenía armarios vacíos para poder dejar cómodamente las cosas. El salón es muy grande. 
Está a 20 minutos andando del centro de la ciudad y tiene una parada de metro cerca. El barrio es familiar y tranquilo. Nada peligroso. Los restaurantes y tiendas eran más baratos que los del centro.

El anfitrión se ofreció a recogernos del aeropuerto y a hacernos un tour guiado por la ciudad.
Volveremos!!

Andre was able to meet us at the apartment. We had a nice long stay there, so we got very comfortable. The apartment is lovely and well furnished and equipped with everything we could have needed. We loved the neighbourhood too!

Great and spacious appartment with a wonderful view and location, it is even better in real life than in photos. We spent a month there and everything worked perfectly, the person who gave us the keys was very welcoming and was always there in case we needed him. Don't hesitate to stay in this appartment, you will not regret it!

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à la description (peut-être même mieux). Situé dans un immeuble calme, dans un quartier calme où l'on peut se garer.
Accueillis avec une grande gentillesse par Fernando, qui a répondu à toutes nos questions et les a même devancées.
A recommander !

It's a very lovely apartment. José Fernando welcomed us with a great kindness and answered all our questions. Thank you very much for your hospitality and port wine. Everything was clean and tidy. There was lots of space for my family of 4. Especially we enjoyed a big balcony. It's well furnished and equipped but it would be great to add a washing machine. TV has a great channels list in Portuguese and English. The apartment is located in a walking distance to the city centre, metro stations, grocery shops, bakeries and pharmacies. WiFi worked perfectly. The bath has a handle grip, it's perfect for elderly guests and young kids. There is a small lift in a building. Our experience was great and we highly recommend to stay in this apartment.
Malgré nos deux heures de retard l'hôte nous a reçu comme des "princes". Appartement conforme à nos attentes.

Excellent place to stay with either family or friends. Very spacious living area and bedrooms. Close to the centre and we thoroughly enjoyed our daily walks to the centre and local bakery. José is excellent in giving directions as needed. Problems are always fixed on time with the customer in mind.Will highly recommend this place.

Vanessa
The location was really good . You can reach the place by walking
Ok

Si vous allez chez Andre vous y serez comme à la maison! Rien à redire sur la propreté et l'appartement. Je recommande très fortement Andre et son co-host Josè. Ils accueillant, serviable.. enfin bref ils sont top!
Me encanto lo espacioso,como y limpio k estaba todo maravilloso
A very nice apartment. Within a few minutes you are in the centre of Porto. We loved our week here. Almost everything we needed was in the apartment. Thanks for the wine and the fruit!!
Appartement agréable , avec une belle décoration et surtout accueil chaleureux par Fernando .
O apartamento apesar de um pouco velho, é um bom custo benefício. A cozinha tem o que é necessário, as camas são boas, roupas de camas e toalhas não faltam. Só falta uma máquina de lavar roupas.
Excelente! Recomendo!

Excelente em tudo. Agradecimentos especiais ao José, que tão gentilmente nos acolheu e apoiou durante toda a estada.
Recomendo muito a morada.

André est une personne exceptionnelle pour la qualité et la bienveillance de son acceuil, il est naturellement chaleureux, et son logement est situé dans un très bon endroit de Porto, en plus d'etre assez proche du centre ville et transport en commun.
André est une personne admirable, largement recommandé,
Un grand merci a André

Great place to enjoy Porto with space and small attentions.
Our host was lovely and knew perfectly the city which was very helpful !
Appartement confortable, calme et bien situé ! Propriétaire aux petits soins ! La salle de bain aurait besoin d'une bonne rénovation pour correspondre au standing  de l'appartement.

La casa en general está bien y es agradable. La persona que nos recibió también muy agradable y solícita. Pero, el agua caliente el primer día no nos funcionó porque había saltado un plomo. Los días siguientes, al ser calentador eléctrico, para 3 duchas el agua caliente llega justa.
Regg's place is clean and bright and at the best location in Hong Kong. Regg is communicative and easy going. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Güler yüzlü hoşsohbet bir ev sahibi
Thanks for being a great host
Great apartment

Alquilamos el piso por un mes, fue una experiencia fabulosa. El Piso es una belleza, elegante, cómodo, tenía todo lo que se necesita y está ubicado en una de las mejores zonas de Barcelona. Sabrina siempre estuvo atenta con nosotros. Quedamos encantados con la decisión que tomamos y nos sentimos privilegiados y agradecidos. Altamente recomendado, con los ojos cerrados!
Gracias miles Sabrina!
Estuvimos un poco mas de un mes en el apartamento de Sabrina. La verdad. Ls encantó. Es super bien ubicado, muy cómodo y agradable. Sin duda repetiremos!!
Es un apartamento muy comodo y está muy bien situado , me gusto mucho estar allí , y todo está cerca comercios Restaurates , más bien todo lo que uno espera para sentirse como en casa!!!!!

We had a very lovely time with Aurora and Alberto in their beautifull home in the Bom Fin area. We felt very welcome and A & A gave us a lot of usefu tips on what to do and see in Porto. They surprised us with a nice breakfast, the second day even in the garden.
Very fine, trustworthy and fun to talk with people!
Next time we will stay longer to also enjoy the yoga classes :)
Muito obrigado cariñosos Aurora y Alberto!! Hasta la proxima!
Miko & Swaze

Aurora and Alberto were very welcoming hosts and we really enjoyed our time at their beautiful place in Porto. They are helpful and kind and also prepared breakfast for us with fresh fruits from their wonderful garden.

We really would like to put 6/5. We felt very very well welcomed by Aurora and Alberto, who receive you in a charming house with caractere, originality and calm. 
Traveling with our little daughter (2 months) could have raised some issues, being hosted but I didn't at all.
On the contrary, Aurora & Alberto were careful and we appreciated sharing breakfast, conversations and their knowledge of Porto.
Little by little we build experience on Airbnb as host and as guest, and Jardim Yoga will ever stay an inspiring reference.

I had a great experience at Aurora's home. Aurora and Alberto are extremely nice people who will make you feel at home, are very helpful, considerate and are fun to be around. They offered that I join them and their friend to join them on a walk around the city which was very helpful. Also the chance to meet so locals and learn more about their culture and food was very unique. The home is very spacious with a lovely garden, the room is nice, clean and the bathroom is just fantastic. They prepared a healthy breakfast to start my day off and I already miss Alberto's unique and fresh morning juice. Overall I would highly recommend staying at Aurora's home.

Beautiful cosy house! Full of armony and with an outstanding decoration.  Aurora and her Husband were extremly kind. They even took us to a restaurant and explained all the activities in oporto. 100% recommended, and is a great value for money opportunity  :)

We had a great time at Aurora's, both her and her husband were really nice and made us feel just like at home. They gave us useful tips on what to see in Porto and how to get around which was very much appreciated. The room was very comfortable and the house was especially cozy and well located close to the metro and train station. My first airbnb experience was an amazing short stay thanks to both of them, definitely recommended!

Aurora and Alberto were the nicest and sweetest hosts ever. They invited us to an inspiring yoga class, were dedicated to help us discovering Porto and Alberto even took us to a great local restaurant.
The room (and the house and the garden) is beautiful, cozy, clean and silent.
This is the best place you can stay in Porto. We will definitely come back!

Oh my gods (we have 8 million gods who cover everything and all aspects in Japan)! It was the first time for me to stay in an air bnb. Although I was quite confident from their profile before my arrival, the quality of my stay was even beyond my high expectations. Aurora and Alberto confirmed they are the ideal hosts, and their house and garden were the ideal place to stay. I arrived with an empty stomach, and Aurora took me to one of the neighborhood restaurants and explained the menu in English (6 Euros for everything). After lunch, Alberto showed me all flowers and trees in the garden and later he had set up the hammock between the trees. I relaxed myself in the peaceful atmosphere with birds chirping among the fragrant orange and jasmine blossoms. During the stay, my friend, Emma and I received more than what we needed: beautifully decorated room and bathroom, delicious daily breakfast (sometimes in their lovely garden), good recommendations for restaurants and 1 day trips to nearby towns (they had prepared to give us all the information we need before we arrived). They learned my precise breakfast request in one day and prepared perfectly for the rest of my 11 day-stay. Also we enjoyed their yoga classes in the studio which is located in the basement with the window opening out to the garden. They sometimes offered me the fresh vegetable-and-fruit juice and yummy soup (They are vegetarians). On Sunday, when they have no classes, they offered us to drive around town. The highlight of the tour was the museum which also has a huge garden. Alberto knows all the flowers and plants, and has a lot of stories about almost everything. I shared their tastes and felt they were my friends for years. I totally recommend this place and will come back in the near future for a longer stay. Machiko

If you are searching for a place tot stay near centre of Porto, I can recommend the place of Aurora and Alberto.
