The place is calm and lovely, has a very nice garden with you can use, a served breakfast every day, lovely, nice decorated room and even more lovely bathroom of your own. They have lots of tips what to visit in Porto and are alway wiling to help.

Porto centre is at walking distance, supermarket and postoffice too.
Near a metro/train station and bus to centre. 

If you stay buy a massage for an even more relaxed holiday feeling after a day of exploring Porto......

AMAZING room in an AMAZING house with AMAZING hosts. I had a great time at Aurora's house. She offered me breakfast and her husband helped me during 45 minutes to circle the best locations in Porto on a map. I strongly recommand this place and the center of Porto is a 20 minute walk away. Very confortable and truly memorable. Thanks for everything :)

Aurora and Alberto are the best! they give you tips and make you a lovely breakfast, but most of all, they open up their house and live style to you. Very calm, elegant, simple and caring. Besides, they have the most beautiful garden that makes you breath and fall in love with the house. Great place, lovely people, osom shower and bed. Walking distance from everything. It was the perfect home to get to know Porto.

Our stay at Aurora and Alborto was fantastic. They are very friendly. Their house is spacious and in a quiet neighnourhood, though close enough for a walk to the city centre. They have a nice bathroom wit ha bath and a beautiful garden full of fruit trees, flowers and a o so nice hammock :)
I would almost forget to say about the really good breakfast which is included. Could highly recommend.

Thanks again!
Dirk and Hilde

Coming back in the night to Aurora's and Alberto's place, we were already looking forward to the next day, which would start in the cozy garden with a nice breakfast. The guys were happy to help us find interesting places in the city and it was always great to share with them what we did and saw the day before. They were also so kind to bring us to the contemporary art museum on their weekend. Thanks to Aurora and Alberto we definitely felt very welcome to get a glimpse into the life of the local people. The best experience we could have hoped for! Also the place itself is beautiful and filled with individuality. The city center is within easy reach.
We were very happy to have stayed with Aurora and Alberto during our Porto trip!

Vraiment j'ai adoré Aurora et Alberto, et oui, Micha (la chatte) aussi!
Ils sont super sympas et accueillants. On se sent comme chez soit tellement ils sont chaleureux. Ils font un petit déjeuner super bon, nutritif et sain. D'ailleurs, tout l'ambiance de la maison respire la zen attitude!, c'est calme, beau, lumineux et zen. La chambre où j'ai été logée est belle, propre et tranquille. Le jardin est magnifique avec ces fleurs et arbres fruitiers. La saille de bain est super agréable, ample et propre. Enfin, toute la maison est remplie de bon gout et bonnes ondes. Le quartier est aussi bien, pas très loin du centre (on peut aller en marchant), desservi en bus et métro et au même temps calme. Alors: je vous conseille vivement chez Aurora et Alberto, pour votre séjour à Porto!

Nous avons été très satisfaits de notre séjour chez Aurora et Alberto. Ils sont juste adorables, au petit soin des invités. 
La maison est très propre, lumineux et possède un jardin sympathique. Elle est 1000 fois mieux que sur les photos (je n'exagère pas :) )

Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. Ils sont formidables.

Encore un GRAND MERCI!!!

Un séjour au top ! Aurora et son mari ont été très accueillant ! Ils nous ont donné beaucoup de conseils pour notre séjour pour tout ce qui est lieux à visiter, bonnes adresses... 
La maison est superbe, la salle de bain ultra spacieuse, le lit est spacieux et on y dort très bien. Le luxe : un petit déjeuner complet et vraiment bon dans un jardin très agréable ! 
Une superbe adresse pour visiter la magnifique ville de Porto ! 
Charles&Constance

Conveniently located near the Campanha station, easy for us travelling by train from porto to lisboa. Aurora and her husband were extremely helpful!! They gave wonderful recommendations for things to do in porto and told us about the history and culture of portugal. Delicious and generous breakfast. clean and comfortable rooms and toilets. Aurora even went the extra mile to get us pasteis de natas for breakfast simply because we enquired the day before on where we could find some in Porto. Highly recommended!!

Aurora & Alberto are such lovely and kind hosts!!! The house is very beautyful and cute furnished, the garden seems to be a small wellness oasis :). I enjoyed my stay in Porto so much and had a great time and fun at St.Johns Festival with lovely people. Definetely I recommend this wonderful place and I'm sure, I will come back!
Thank you so much! Yvonne

nous avons passé un tres bon sejour,dans un cadre soigné ,alberto et aurora nous ont donné plein d 'infos pour visiter porto ainsi que les horaires de train et adresses de resto la chambre est bien située pas loin de la gare et du metro et des bus  jean-luc et monique

Aurora and Alberto are really great hosts! It's a nice and cosy house, clean and charming room & bathroom. The garden was our favourite place for breakfast or to rest a bit in the shadow when it was too hot. They gave us all the help and information we needed in Porto, and extra tips and to do's. The location is near to Campahna station, easy to get to from the airport, and also good when you want to take the train to lisbon. A walk to the centre takes some time, but you can take public transport. We really recommend this place and will certainly go back there if we ever visit Porto again.
Scott place was great. It was clean and very spacious.  It was an easy check in and check out process.  I highly recommend it.

Great spot. Small and cozy- perfect for one person. The hostess is friendly and welcoming. I had to leave early and she was very accomodating despite having arranged to only come back to the city after I had left.

Nous nous sommes sentis les bienvenus et Marie-Amelie était très disponible en cas de besoin. L'appartement correspond tout à fait à la description et la localisation est parfaite (rue résidentielle très calme à seulement quelques pas de Ste-Catherine). Nous y retournerions sans hésiter !

Our stay at the condo was great.  The host was very easy to work with as far as being able to check in early and check out late, which was very appreciated considering we had two babies with us.  The only downside was that there was no AC. Given, it was my fault for not checking the listing, and although I thought we wouldn't survive a night there, you felt a nice cool breeze when you opened both front and back doors so the AC wasn't needed after all.  (One of the neighbors came to yell at me because one of the babies was crying so I had to keep the door shut) The location was perfect! It was walking distance to the very popular breakfast spot "The Gazebo" and to the Napili Bay that is very beautiful and you can see turtles.  There were a couple of issues with roaches, but it's inevitable considering they are condos and not everyone that lives in a complex is clean, although the condo was.  We would stay there again

Lovely little place for one or two to stay. Car park available at no extra cost, good kitchen which is well furnished, and a quiet place. Good access to the freeway. The beach was walking distance and the area was something from a dream. Would stay here again.

Location:
A place looks as expected, 5 min from Kapalua Beach.  We didn't have any issues with neighborhood  condos. Despite there are a lot of people in this Condo Complex (Napili Ridge), we didn't feel the place to be crowdy (as well as elsewhere in Hawaii). While the most interesting activities (IMHO) are in Lahaina, there is just 12-15 min drive. You can drive elsewhere on Maui within 3.5-4 hours (one way).
____________________________________________________________________
Facilities/Equipment:
It really looks recently renovated, all facilities and equipment are good. There is a fridge, microwave and regular oven, plates and silverware. We enjoyed having breakfast on Patio with a nice garden view. Parking lots are not the issue - you just need to fill the form and submit it to management office.
____________________________________________________________________
Cleanliness:
The place was clean as expected. Host provided to us beach and bathroom towels which was greatly appreciated
____________________________________________________________________
Overall
Great value-for-money deal for Hawaii travelers who don't want to spend tons of money for vacation. Note that rental car is required in most cases when travelling to Maui.

The place was very cute. Perfect size and a 5-10 min walk to the beach. We came when I was pretty high temps and it did get hot at night due to no AC. We made due and enjoyed our stay very much. Would definitely rebook. Thanks!

Linda-Lee's place was in a great location (walkable to the beach and a few restaurants). The remodel is truly done well. The only negative we really had was regarding no AC. When we reserved this Airbnb we didn't see it mentioned in her comments, but it's clearly stated in them now. She was super easy to communicate with and ensured we got settled in okay. Perfect getaway for a couple or small family.
Everything was simply great. Enjoyed the place. Mostly the opportunity to cook your own meals which is quite important for me. Thank you!
The flat is really pretty and bigger than I expected. I had a wonderful stay there!

Our stay at Linda’s was great. We had quick responses to our questions. The place was very clean. Quick walk to Napili beach. Kapalua trail is nearby which is an easy and scenic hike. Overall our stay was great!

We had a great time at this place !! Excellent location.  Close to the beaches (walking distance). Close to Lahaina (15 minutes drive). The condo had everything we needed and even more (we really enjoyed the beach stuff provided - chairs/boogie board and we liked the big fridge with freezer). We also used the BBQ every night and the pool. And the king size bed was a great bonus. We recommend this place !
Linda-Lee's 1-BR unit in Lahaina is professionally managed and a great place to stay. I liked that it was quiet late at night and close to a grocery store and beach!
This condo was exactly as described. We especially liked the short walk to the beach and the WiFi signal was excellent.

Upon arrival the condo was clean! I highly recommend Linda's condo for a vacation stay in Maui. You're not too far from beaches and Front Street. There is a beach about 20 minutes walking distance from the condo.
She provided a coffee maker, toaster and other kitchen items for cooking as well as food storage. Linda also contacted me and made sure I made it to the condo.

Eine sehr schöne Unterkunft nicht weit vom Napili Beach, bei dem man täglich Schildkröten beobachten kann. :) Sehr gut eingerichtete Wohnung, sehr geräumig. Bushaltestelle und Lebensmittelmarkt in der Nähe. Check in hat super geklappt und es gab einige Tips für die Umgebung bei der Ankunft.

Good home-away from home. 

The apartment had plenty of amenities and a fully stocked kitchen so you could certainly cook if you wanted to. There was even a blender and toaster. One item that was missing was a bottle opener! There are wine glasses but we couldn't find an opener... 

Although the area feels residential, it's a quick drive to many beaches and you could walk to Napili Bay, if you wanted to. It's very quiet so if you're looking for an escape from all the resorts, it serves as a good home base. 

Overall, we were very happy with our stay and appreciated the new-ness of the amenities, even if small (e.g. sponge, dish soap, etc.).

Beautiful, clean, &  organized. We love having all the amenities such as stove, fridge, coffee maker, etc. Plus having beach supplies and a cooler was a bonus too! Napili Bay is a great beach for sunset and turtle watching! We drove to Lahaina and/or to/near Kaanapali area most days and although it's a short trip (15 mins?), we didn't mind as it's a beautiful ride. The condo is close to some stores as well! We forgot there was no A/C when we arrived and thought we might get hot overnight but sleeping with the windows open and a fan was perfect for all 3 of us.

Linda's place was perfect and suited exactly what we had in mind - we were walking distance to the most beautiful beaches, as well close to shops. 
The Bus stop is at the end of the street, which was a perk as well. 
The place itself is lovely, warm and inviting – with everything you need. 
It was lovely living with residents of Maui, as we got the chance to get to know them and find the best local places to swim, eat and sight see. 
We will be back!!

The apartment had everything we could need and was in a great location - up a quiet road just a five minute walk from nice beaches and trails and a short drive from some great restaurants! Lilla was a fantastic host and drove out to help us when we accidentally locked ourselves out of the apartment late at night! I would definitely recommend this place! We had a great stay!
Great value! Quaint little no-frills place with all the amenities. Walking distance to great restaurants, snorkeling and the beautiful Kapalua Ocean Trail.

Great place, about 5 minute walk from the beach, local grocery store and shops not too far. Perfect location if you’re looking for peace and quiet away from the hustle and bustle of resort style accommodations!

Great stay. The place is spotless and a good size for a couple. Nice lanai for a drink. Bed was super comfy. The bathroom was super warm and we were always overheating after being in there! We stayed at a time where the whole complex is undergoing a facelift and therefore was quite noisy early mornings and during the day.
